item.text: bla@#// rgyugar skad du/ Ar+ya sam tsA ra pra ta bi b+hug ga
dzu ti po na yak+Shan tu nA ma ma hAyA su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags/
pa yang dag par spyod pa 'i tshul dang/ nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul
klu// ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang shi
po/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'du phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa can na/ rtog pa se la
ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ra la/ drang srong
rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas pan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
bar sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa chen po byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med pa'i snying rje chen po dang/ sems
can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad
la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas/ kun tu ngoms pa dang/ tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shekyis/chos thams cad nam
mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa chos kyi sprin dang/ lhag mthong dang/ jig pa dang/ ye shes kyi stobs kyi ma rig pa'i
mun pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ bsdu ba rnam gzhis sa ma sa can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar bya ba'i bshes dang/ sems
can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/ byams ba dang khong khro ba med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam de ga su dag nga/ chos kyis yang dag
bar 'jug pa/ ye shes chen po 'a mkhas pa/ 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag par ston nga/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing/ dge ba'i rtsa bas
longs su sred pa'i chu bsam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa
zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyisams mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir/ thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba
tsayang dag par ston pa// nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad mad pa'i stod chos rin po ches yongs su bkang zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir/ skye bo thamasacad kyis nye bar
'tshob/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhisarkang pa'i ngeshugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo rjes su zhugs pa// mtshungs pa bachos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa// bskal pa ba
stong gras med pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med cing rgyun bcad nga 'i yon tan thams cad 'byungab/ rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las
'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes su 'brel ba nyon mongs pa rab tu sngangs pa/ tshad med grangs me da nga 'a ting nge 'an dang/ gzungs dang//

bzod pas rnam par rtsa ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po cha mdakar ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'ar rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' ra ba zla ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang ba rnam par bskyangs pa ma zad pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang 'a zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa la ngur smig seng ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi bod kyi tshogs shes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'a
rab mtshams shes khyab dang/ byang chub gnas dang 'a rgyal mtshan namapar sprul pa 'dubyas rashes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' klog ga phung po zhes bya ba dang tshu
byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyigazabarjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ra ba stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dbab gtogs 'dod mthu

bo che zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ de lasogs pa byang chub sems dang 'a stong phrag bcudang/ sngon du 'gro drang srong rtarlung dang/ drang srong stong phrag sum cu dang/ lha
bran brgyasong phrag bco brgyad kyisas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa
la bka' sul pa// legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge 'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de
chab zhin no zhes gsol pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho
thams cad dang ldan pa la rnam par kun tu baltas te/ pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong gzhan dgakyang stan 'as langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi ba btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba nagang lags/ de bzhinagshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas brtags pa ji lta bu 'gas/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong de la 'daskad ces bka' sul to// dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten ces bya ba dang/ de de bzhinagshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas/ brtags pa 'a jatsan zhes dge slong
khyod de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid l zung shig dang ngas bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ dge slong de
bcom ldan 'das la phyi nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong 'a jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rtenadang 'du byed kyi
'jig rten no// dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni gang/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni gang zhen/ sa'i khams dang/ chub khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dzatsam ngan snodacas bya'o//
dge slong de la nang gses khams yod de/ dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gasra ba' sra ba nyid zin pa ni bdat+taste/ rus pa dang/ sen modang/ so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni nang
gsa' khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams na 'ad lta ste/ 'gron bu dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/
bakhrurludang/ dung dang/ rdo dang/ byu rudang/ dngul dang/ sa le spyan dang/ gram bu dang/ gcig ma dang/ gyom dang/ bshang dang/ rtswa dang/ sAn dang/ phyag dar dang/ 'di dag ni phyi rol/
gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o// chu'i khams gang zhen/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod na/ nang gi chu khams kyang yod de/ de lanang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang chu'i khams kyimakhris
pa dang/ bad kanadang/ rnag dang/ khrag dang/ klad pa dang/ klung rgyas dang/ mnyil na dang/ rdul dang/ ngan snabs dang/ snabs dang/ sa dang/ rkang dang/ gcin yodapa kun tu len
pa 'di ni/ nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhen/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams na 'di lta ste/ chudang/ chu'i khams kyi snam pa dang/ khom dang zho dang/

dar ba dang/ bu ram dang/ shing gi rodang/ chang dang rtsub mo dang/ bu ram chang dang/ me tog chang dang/ lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun tu len nga 'dan phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so//
de la nang gi ma'i khams gang zhe na/ lus bad la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dri ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dri ba nyid/ du ba dang/ gdungs pa dang/ rams dang/ yongs su tshig pa dang/ des/
the 5da dang/ 'thus pa dang/ 'chos pa dang/ nyal ba de'i yang dag da lta yongs su smin par 'gyur ba bad nang gi me'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi ma ba khanus gang zhe na/ gang
ma'i gdung ba dang/ nyis ba gdung ba dang nor bu'i gdung ba dang/ 'bru dang sman dang shing dang/ rna'i drob dang/ lca ba'i dri ba dang/ phyag dar gyi dri ba dang/ 'di dag na phyi rol gyi me 'a khams

zhes bya'o// de la nang ga rlung gi khams gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di la gyon du rgyu ba'i rlung dang/ thur tu rlu ba'i rlung dang/ ma zhuba' rnying dang/ yan lag dang nying lag tu rgya ba'i rlung dang/ 'dan

nang gi rlung rnams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol tu yang dag par sgruba'i rlung dang/ rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang/ rgyun du rgyu ba dang/ grang ba dang/ driba'i dmu rlung phyadapa

mang po dang/ sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang/ phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di/ snod kyi 'jig
rten zhes bya'o// 'di gang gi snod ce na/ nye bar len pa phung po lnga'i stong do// dge slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa 'am// dga' ba 'am/ byams pa 'am/
chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga par bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor bslab par ba'o// gang la la 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
@#// phyi dang nang ga 'am/ chab bam/ phra ba 'am/ napa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang yang da bam/ gang nyeb 'am/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thamasu cad de bzhin du sosar
bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag na bdag gam yan/ bdag kyang debs yin deya nga bdagagam yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin dul ngo dag pa 'di shes rab kyis ji lta bu
bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis 'gan tu brtan par byed do// shin tuya da 'khas pa'i dge
slong de srid pa dang/ rgyud pa dang/ lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag 'don snod kyi 'jig rtenano// dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang
zhen bar lenang 'i phung po lnga'i 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs bar 'a napa'i phung po dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa
nye bar lenapa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'don 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag sems can tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag pa rab sdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag
gas bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa ban/ dga' kha 'am byams pa 'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya
che ba 'am/ pa ya rubya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gang chung zad 'das pa dang/ ma 'os pa dang/ daltar byung ba 'am/ phyi ban nang gi 'am/
chob 'am/ phrab 'am/ na pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ngab 'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i na yan/ deb ngo bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de
bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// gang la la 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi ma/ chab 'am/ phrab 'am ngan
ba ma/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nyeba'i tshor ba dang/ gang la la 'du shes dang/ gang la la 'du byed dang/ gang zhung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gam yAn bdag
kyang de ma yan dbadag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa 'di shesa'ab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni/ dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes
bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug par gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dba' lung ngo rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa// tshe dang
ldan pa phung bo rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang/ tshor ba'i phung po dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/
rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// tshe dang ldan pa phung bo lnga po de dag ni dza lta bu/ gzugs kyi phung po naging/ 'dod pa'i khams mag dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
yang dag par gzhola'adang/ d bzhi nangu rnab dang/ dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yod kyang ma dang/ gzugs kyi 'gog bal nga dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i
khams kyi mig dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ de bzhin du nab dang/ sna dang/ dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi mig dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol ba ni gang ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/
lus dang/ yang kyang mig dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol khadang/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khamasamag dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
yang dag par gzhol ba'am/ 'on te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mag dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol
ba dang/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khamasanag dang/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ tsa'adasad gzugs kyi phung po ban/ mig dang gzugs kyi
'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yidi nas mgag bar du'am/ gzugs dang gzugasamadapa' khams mag dang/ gzugs
kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'dubyed dang/ rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te da ltar
byung ba gzugs kyi phung bo 'am/ mag dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mig nas
yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du 'am/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
dang/ de rnab nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yod kyi bar du'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas/
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smasaso// rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/ mig gi bu garagazugs kyi phung po dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'a pos pa'i ngam
yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/ skyamachod nam rtog rnam par ma rtog cing
gru@#// ldang bab ma yin/ phung pon rigag lam dang/ dbyas dang/ sgradang/ brjod pa las yang dag par shanatu 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad
niskad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad nadabyas med pa'o// dbyangs dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lam ste mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad na yaM
ga med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o// chos thams cad n skye bamed pa// stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o// tshig med pa'o// chos thams cad na rtog pa dang bral ba'o// ma khom
[%]pa'o// chos thams capanachags pa dang bral ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad na spyir ba dang bral ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'o// chos thams cad na lta ba dang bral ba'o// mtshan
nyid dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad na bdag dang bral ba'o// brjod med pa'o// chos thams ni yab dang bral ba'o// rab tu
N+NaM zhiba'o// chos thams cad na chos nyid ma thob pa'o// ma snang ba thob pa'o// chos thams cad nasnang ba dang bral ba'o// shan tu yul med pa'o// chos thams cad n yul dang bral ba'o// shAn/
tu rtsakhamadapa'o// chos thams cad ni dbang po med pa'o// shan tu rang bzhin med pa'o// chos thams cad naspyodang rnam par dag pa 'o// gnyen po med pa'o// chos thams cad nas nas/
tshad pa'o// gas pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phros pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bgo/ chos thamasacad na 'jus pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa'o// chos
thams cad ni shanatu bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// g.yo ba dang bral ba'o// sa thams cad ni kun tu sgrib pa med pa'o// rdul dang bral ba'o// nyanatu bral ba'o// chos thams cad n nyon
mongs pa dang bral ba'o// stobs chung ba'o// chos thams cad na rtsom pa dang bral ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// chos thams cad na dngos po dang bral ba'o// byed pa med pa'o// chos thams
cad ni las ma ston pa'o/ tshor ba med pa'o// chos thams cad nam mkha' dang ldan pa 'o// thos pa med pa go/ chos thams cad na dbus dang bral ba'o// gzung du med pa 'o//
chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stug pa'o// shes pamed pa'o// chos thams cad nitshor bachagasapa med pa'o// smig rgyu lta bu 'o// chos thams cad ni 'dushes dang bral ba'o// brag cha
lta bu 'o// chos thams cad ni ngobo nying med pa'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu 'o// chos thams cad na rab tu snang ba' 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu 'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs bar n dang bral
ba'o// gzugs brnyan la rten pa'o// chos thams cad na snganim ngamigs pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyano// bstan du med pa'o/[}]
u@#// dngos po med pa 'o// das po dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyidamadang dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang/ mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan
nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad nabadagamed pa'o// chos thams cad n bdag dun dmags pa// ngan sams pa med pa'o// rtan med pa'o/
brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad niya gamed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad ni skad cig ma zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med bar bya
ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa mad pa dang/ spros pa med nga 'i bzod pa bsgom nga ra bya'o// 'di la gas kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gibazod pa bsgom pa na yang
dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// bzod pa 'di thob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cigamakha cig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdulangashin tuphrab snyad las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdu'ang shin tu phrab snyad kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang/ rtog pa lngayasangs rgyas kyi zhing du
song sta/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing derar yang rdul shan tu phrab skyed kyi rnam pa sna tshog sakyicharagatoban 'di lta ste/ zas kyichara'am/ sol gyi chara'am/ gos sam/ lhab lhub bam/
bri'amame tog gam/ na bocha snyatshogs kyi char kyang rab tu 'ong ngo// gang sems can zas dang skom de yongs su zos pas/ zang zang med pa'i dga' ba dang/ bdeb thob pa'i sems can de
'du byed thams cad na ma rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi nam dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyis btsas pa thams cad dang/ 'dod pa 'i yon tan lnga spyas
te byung nas/ ri'i sul dang/ a mod pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srongag cha byad kyis rtswa dang rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// lto bar
len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la ma bzad par mosangasha/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la so bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rig la nad dang/ shu ba dang/ zug rngu dang/ martag pa dang
sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med par yid labyed do// mngon pa shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gosanas ni po che yongs su
sbyang ba'i bar du yongs su spyod par byed do// de shes pas zang zing mad pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang 'a de
ltar de bzhin dung yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam ma kha'amadog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyam pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'am tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul

za0 @#/ shin tu phrab snyad kyi stong pa dang/ rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gar song ba'i mi togale re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdu28'an tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sgo
brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyangs dpa'o// bdudabazhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos thams cad nanam mkha' lam mo// gnas yang dag par spong ba'o// yi ge
med pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma skye ba'o// chos thams cad na nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad na sngon gyi dam
tshig ma gtong ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad na kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// gnas med
pa'o// chos thams cad na rtsom pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag gir bya ba dang/ ngayir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// chos thams cad na deban pa'o// 'du 'dzi yAng dag par gtong ba'o
bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du/ rab tu zhi ba'o// ma snang ba thob pa'o// ma gnas pa'o// ka'an tuyul med pa'o// shin tu rtsa ba na da pa'o//
bshin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// kha zas med pa'o// shan tu 'thor ba'o// 'jungs pa mang ba'o// ka'an tu bsam gtan byed pa'o// shan tu slobs pa me da nga/
kashan tu 'ong ba med pa'o// nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed pa med pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// zag pa med pa'o// 'dzin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa mdar 'o// snyag/
rgya lta bu 'o// brag cha lta bu 'o// mig yor lta bu 'o// chu zla lta bu 'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu 'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid
med pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang/ mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan nyid gcig pa dang/ mtshan nyid med pa 'bar du'o// chos thams cad n bag med pa'o// nga' sems
pa med pa'o// gzungs du med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni skad cige ma'o// 'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o zhes bzod nga 'i sems bsgom par bya 'o// sa
thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'asems bsgom par bya'o// mnyam pa'i sems dang rnam par zhiba'i sems dang/ 'dzin pa med pa 'a nyid nas dang/ 'byung ba med pa 'asems
dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang/ chodapa med pa'i sims dang/ phyin ci ma log pa'i si mas dang/ rten med pa'i sa mas dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang/ sdug
bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du nye bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgodang/ tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo na tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur
ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos sa/ zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang/ bab thob pa des 'du byed thams cad n ma rtag nga// sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med
ba stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcing pa thams cad dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang/ khyim med po stong pa'i nags tshal/
stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dang/ rtsa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// bar 'an pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mkhazad pa ra mosangashang/

rgyu brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar 'a nang 'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang/ shu ba dang/ zug rngu dang/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa ra yade
la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyabu byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de na ma dmags/ sems
can m dmigs/ srog ma dmigs gsob ma dmigs/ gang brag m dmags/ gzugs ma dmigs/ tshor bam yan/ 'dushes na yani/ 'du byed m yan/ rnam par shes pa'i ng ma
dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/ rnab ya nga ma yin/ sna yang ma yan/ lce yang ma yan/ lus kyang ma dmags/ yod kyang ma dmigs so// gzugs ma dmags/ sgra ma dan gas/ dri mi
dmags/ ro ma demags/ reg na dmagis/ chos mdamags/ yaden dmags/ lus mdamags/ tshig mdamags/ sems ma dmags so// stong pa nyid ma sogs pa// mtshan
ma med pa/ thug pa khams gsum gtong ba medang/ mngon par 'du ma byed pa ma skyes pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ mkhyang ba'i bzod pa 'dasmras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba mad pa/ de sngon gyi
mtha' la bya ba med pa// phyi ma'i mtha' la bas nga med nga/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa// ma gnas pa ma dmags pa/ yad lami byed pa 'i bzod pa bsgom pa na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par sprod pa'i tshul nam mkha' mdog gis 'dul ba zhes baba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dang 'bazod pa 'di thob pas/ ji lta
bur gong du bshad nga 'a rtsal 'di 'drab byabar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig ngas 'di bstanang ston cing brjod pa na/ byang chub sanas dang 'a rnam par sa rtog nga zhes
bya bas legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ [“]byang chub sems dpa' nang po dag rungs skya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang na gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur nga dang/ de
nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'disAn du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ci la bsams te/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyum 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs
bdag med pa ma snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba med po/ yid la mkhyid// ma rtog pa/ rnam par m rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa// rgyu ba med pa bas/ 'on te 'di lta bu
casems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ gang zag gam/ shad las skyes pa 'amashad can nam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po ma/ tshor bgazhanas/ skyob
ma/ yang dag par skye ba bam/ gangam dga' ba 'am/ ma 'byung bamang par 'gyur ba 'am/ de bshanagshegs pa na gang du byung/ snying rje chen po ni gang na/ chos 'chad pa na su zhig/
chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pan gangan gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dgo ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par/
ma 'gyuran/ legs par byas pa dang/ nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu na gang du smin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na legang du 'byung/
nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba rnams dang/ lha dang ma rnams dang/ gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ban gang du 'byung bdagan stan las langs te 'gro bar bya
de nas dge slong drug cu tsam stan las langs te dong nas/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smabar gyur pa dang/ donas byang chub sems dpa'i phung po rnam par
'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing ma spobs pa dang gnong bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a laganamar me/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des// byang chub sems dpa' phung
po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na 'khor sgrub dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis
mdo sde gzhan las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang/ gtam ngan pa dang/ dad pa mad pa la dad pa'i gtam dang/ gtam ngan pa dang/ 'jungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang/ gtan na
pa dang tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ gtam nganang dang/ le lo can la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang/ gtam ngan pa dang/ 'chal pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang/
gtam ngan pa'o zhes 'daltar gasungs so/ lung bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan// mtshams med par byed pa rnams la stong pa 'gatamanabar bya'o/ log par lta ba'i
lus can rnams la lus dran b nye bar gzhag pa ma smra bar bya'o/ brkam pa rnams latshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma smra ba'abya'o// nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang khe zas la chags pa rnams la
sams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma smra bar bya'o// tshaba'i chos kyi rtsa ba song ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma sa bar bya'o// ma thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan
'a@#// mi smra bar bya'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan ma sba bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod
pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa'i spyod nga 'i lha dang dpal ma sna bar bya'o// gzugs med nga 'a khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs 'a spyod pa 'i yon tanan
smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung brnan sa la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde bam smra bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi
yon tan ma skya bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag ma smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs

rgyus kyi yon tan ma skyabar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' nga rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnamang bsha mi smra bar bya// byang chub sems dang 'a tshangs pa'i rnam

par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi ma sa bcu bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor skya ba med pa la rnam pa 'du lta bu zabamo zha ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam/

ma smra bar bya'o/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus kyi thegang pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di ltabu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i na dun du yang dag par spyod pa 'tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i brjod pa zab mo
'di ma sna bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po nga thams cad dang ldan pas mgranagacig tu legs so zhes bya ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub
sems dpa' lag na mar me la legs so zhes byang 'i tshig gis spro bas nga dag par bskyed do// legs so legs so shes rab che// rnam pa rangashes pas mchog gcod pa/// mtshan nyid thabs dang
chos rnams kyi// dus nu khyod kyis rab tu shes// 'khor rnams shes pa ca'adrab// de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa la// chos 'di brjod par ma byed do// nam mkha' mtshungs
gshang mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dgatu// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// tshul 'di rab tu shes par 'gyur// nam mkha' ji ltar na bro byed la// dma' nga med cing gzugs mang/
pa 'a shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med// bskal pa grangs med pa dag gi/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar na// snang med nga 'a 'khor rnams la/
khyod kyi chos 'di thos pa dang// ji ltar rgyal ba des bstan nga gi/ grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la// 'jigs med pa 'di rab tu bstan// byang chub
sems dpa' rab dag cing// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa// skal ba ldan pa'i mdun du na// chos 'di pir nga ni bar tu bstan// nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang// rang rgyal dgags mngon/
ga' la// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// de nyid 'tshang rgyur ma 'gyur ro// ma shes pas na spong ba dang// mos pa med par skyes da san// bsod nams mang po 'byung med
cing / ngan 'gror ya nga na myur du 'gro// ting 'dzin bazod pa'i gzungs kyisan// gal te 'as dbyas byas te// byang chub 'an la brtson bya'i phyir/ dal 'a thabs dang bral ba la// 'khor dang
gang zag rnams kyis kyang// sems kyis rtog par ma byed do// 'chal pa'i shes rab stod non la// stong pa'i zhib skabar byed// de yang myur du spangs nga sa na// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs
pa dag/ gzhan dgag na gnas bcu la// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song du// lha ma yanadang lus srul po// gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yang// yang dang
yang na 'di'i skye'o// ma gyur dka'abyed thob pa dag/ gal te ji ltar thob naya nga// smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'onapa lang ba zhar ba dang// rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba// sku rang
pa/ 'debasangashing mchod pa med// zas dang skom dang bral ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// phadang ma la bskur sti med// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnams la
snying rje med// ngan 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni rab tusong ba yi// dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang na myur du 'gro/ lus dbang byas/
pa'i sems can 'di// gang gsabazod pa 'dabastan cing// thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa// des na dge slong de song ngo// yengs thabs dang ldan pa dang// pha 'og nas 'a lta ba yin/
'jig rten lan sgron 'dzin pa// sems can kun la phanang ra smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shesang// thog mar yang na 'khor ltos la// tsa 'drar 'gyur ba' 'khor rnams la// de 'drar bar na
chos kyang shod// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' lagan 'an po ches 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji ltabur nyan thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ga' khribashanas
te/ nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyi'i sla bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so// rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon na thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gas 'dul ba'abazod pa
bstan pa na/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bgrod nga yon tan gyis dmags pa sbyor ba
rgya chen pos bshad bar bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing/ bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'aslad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo// de
nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyakhu gang gi dus la bab pa na shes/ dgas pang chub sems dang 'a
lag na mar me stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon nga ra bstod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad ng// ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin// grol dang rig la khyod ni dang
bar mdzad// rdul dang bralaba'achos kyi sgo 'di ston// rgyal ba nyi ma 'gro lamar me mdzad// sems can dum lanasnanga mdzad nga// lam rnams rab ston la man khyod[V]nang// mchog gi
chos kyi sgo 'bastan par mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs// thugs dam ma g.yo ji ltar 'bartan bzhin// thub pa 'jigarten zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// tshul mdog bzod
pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston// snying rje gnas/shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi chog shes nga na mchog tu che// rga shi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad ng// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'ad dang ston/
thub pa seng ge mu stegs 'khrig par mdzad// 'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la ping+ka'i skad// mu stags can gyi 'khor mangs rnam 'jig pa// marama'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod// sa dang
mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs// bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro ma mdzad// mthon pos gnad ltar mthong nan pa// yongs sminagazigs te bzodapa 'di ya nga gsungs// ye shesa mchog
0 gis nga la nga rgyal gyi// rlung la ngas lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor// des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'thob nga// lam gyis yis srid pa'i nuyang bskams// khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred
tshig/ klu lta bur ni chos kyi char gtong ba// des na 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste// yongs su snyan pa gzigs shang bzod bad gsungs// sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed// bzod
pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing// bdag gi bsam pa dran med bzod 'gyur// de thob ba ya yon tan bad mtha' yas// spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba ya// thub pas 'das
pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang// da lta ra gyi' nga bzod pa 'di gsungs pa// thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang ran chan lag
na cang nagasung bas zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'as 'disnyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
de gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'amadog gis 'dul ba 'bazod pa bstan par nga yang dgos so snyam/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ spos kyi ngad ldan pa 'di la ston yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bzod pa 'di bstananas ji lta bu sros kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la ston gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ yang dag par sbyod pa 'tshul nam mkha' mdog gas
'dul ba 'bazodapa ' bshad par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i
bdag kho zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das drang srong ga brtul zhugs dang/ spyod lam dang/ mtshan ma dang/ dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang
srong de yang rgan po dang/ sa pa dang/ 'khogs pa dang/ sla ral pa'i rol pa 'chang ba dang/ ag tshom ring po dang/ dbyug pa dang/ ril ba dang/ gtsang ma 'dzin ma'i sbyin sreg chen
po 'bar ba byed do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang/ kha dog mtha' yas pa dang/ kha dog brgya stong du ma dang/ kha dog rgya chen po shan tu yongs su dag pa dram med pa'i
od 'byung ngo// de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang/ rtog pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa 'askar ma dang/ rin po chedang/ glog dang/ 'od dang/ lha dang klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang ma mngon m snang ngo// sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ yi dgasakyi lta ba yang na mngon mi snang ngo// de'i tshadrang srong thub nga na gtogs par
sems can rnams kyi sgra dang/ brjod pa dang/ dbyangs dang tshig dang/ ya gi dang/ chung du nas dang/ chu dang me dang/ rlungag sgra yang ma grag go/ dab tshin phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas kyi zhing
[j]mtha' yas mu med na/ sems can gangal la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad dang drang srong gabartul zhugs dang/ lus dang mtshan ma dang/ dbyibs kun tu snang ngo/

yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba'i theg pa pa'i drang srong na kun tu m snang ngo// yang theg pa chen de la yang dag par

zhugs pa'i drang srong des/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas mamathobashing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ya nga ma mthong ngo// de'i tshon gang yang nyan thos 'khoraden 'dug pa des de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong zhing de byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag pa ma mthong ngo//gang yang 'dir 'du 'dug pa 'dus par gyur nga gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang pa'i ng yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
snang ba rgya chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par sum mthong ngo// de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes ko'u ba dan la smras pa// gnas brtan ko'u bdun bcom
ldan 'das gang na/ ko'u di rgyas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da lta gang na ba zhes bya ban ma shasaso// ma mthong ngo// de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od su sa chen po 'a snyas pa//
sbyangs ba ba'i nan/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis khyod mchog tubasazha/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bsomasangashago/ 'od sus chen bos smras pa// bcom ldan 'dasad ltar gang na zhes byakha/
mi shes so// ma mthong ngo// de nas nyan thos chen po des/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu la sgras// gnas brtan shAr 'bu shes rab dang ldan ng 'anang na
bcon ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms la ga/ ra'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'thabamed bas/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar
gang na zhes bya ba ma shes so// ma mthong ngo// de nas nyan thos chen po des/ mo'u 'gal ya ne la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal yan rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ng 'anang na bcom ldan
'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tubastanan/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bsoms shig/ mo'u 'gal ya nas smas pa/ gang gi mi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa smras ng/ de nyid na bdag gis stod
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da lta re gang na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba nam na thong ngo// na shes so//
de nas nyan thos chen po nges tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la snyas pa/ lha'i mig gnang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gangan
gnas/ spyod pa ni ci 'dra ci 'dra bar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos// ma 'gags pas smyos pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing+ga nam
@#/par bltasan/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba bdag kyang narishasaso// ma mthong ngo// des smras pa/ yang tha dad par ya nga dag nga ra shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos
ye shes gang la'ang ma 'gag/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yitashas de la ne'ajug go/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang du bzhud/ gangan bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'
la drisnyam pa dang/ de nas nyan thos chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes suma mthong ngo// tshe dang ldan pa kA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan ng 'da'/
rigs kyi bugazhan zhig gas/ phung po bshad par byas pa de na/ dge slong drug cu tsam po stan las langs te dong bas/ tshe dang ldan ng bcom ldan 'das thugs ma dgyes nas btang snyoms shing/
'phags pa sasargyas kyi spyod pas rags budang thabs gcig tu spyod do// bdag cagana'ang rang gi spyil por zhugs shang/ bsam gtan byas m sta/ danas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil
por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe de'i dusan/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems
can de/ bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cagadrang srong du gyur pan/ gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par 'phags pa ste/ bdag cag gin khan por gzung
ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam pa ra blta bar bya'o// snyam pa de dag thams cad ga pa se la ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal n/ drangasrong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa 'khogs pa//
gtugs pa'i rnams pas/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ smanadang/ zas dang/ skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ma la gtor ba thagam ring bar mthong nas de 'disnyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po
'dinus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo// drang srong 'diganganab de logs su tabar 'gro zhing/ drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang/ spyod pa 'di rjes su bslab par bya'i
snyam mo/// bam po gnyis dag/ de nas de'i tsha de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
tabar dong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ bzung dbang du byas pa des ms rtse gcig pa 'i stobs kyisA/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
las kyi phyir/ brtson pa de nyid kyi tsho mamadzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen

bo dang/ ma dang mi ma yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gacha byad kyis/ drang srongashAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dong ngo// 'khor thams cad dang ldan
pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur sros kyi bar ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas/ denayang dag par spyod pa'i tshulanam mkha'i mdog gas 'dul ba 'bazod da 'di ston pa'i phyir/ chos can dang chos kyi
'khor lo gnyis la'ang 'jug bar bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shesaso/ bdag caganabcom ldan 'das kyi don phyir/ 'am brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing/ lan des
drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ des klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ noran dog dang/ 'jog po dang/ ya de 'ong/
la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag ru drug tsam lhan cigatu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi na po che gser dang/ dngul dang/ bo klu dang/ shel dang/ bya ru dang/ a skya gar da dang
mus ragal pa la sogs pa rin po chesna bdun gyi shing ta la'i 'phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ dngul gyi shing la gsar gyi 'an dang/ ma tog dang/

'bras bu nas/ mus ra gal ba 'a'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lam dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par stsal to// 'di nga tAla'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas/

kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam ba snatshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo// lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyigs nas/ spos kyi da ldang ba'i bar du lam gyi zhing dang ga/
tshad bcu pa sbyangs so// lam gyi sku gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gseb nas mu sa 'gal ba'i bar du rin po chesna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to// gser gyi shang ta la dngul gyi

sI po 'phyang ba nas/ mus ragal ba'i bar du sba bar bya'o// 'og logs su bai DUrlabazang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du/ rgya chen pos slobar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha

byad kyis/ lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzong rtog pa med pa rin po chasna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzong de dag la gsarakyi byim gdal ba/ nga de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ kunu
da dang/ puN+Dar ka dang a ti mu tu ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ a sho ka dang/ mu tsu kun da dang/ mnadza sha kadang/ pa da ladang/ pa Tisha ka 'gan da nub ska dang/ sum ra dang/ a mra dang/ 'dzam

bu dang/ sprin la dang/ mchog tu drizhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to// sa bla rnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam sbyor bar byed do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu yang drang srong

gi cha byad kyi lam gyi nu gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dedag la lhardzas kyi gos dang/ dusha dang/ rgyun rab tu 'byung ngo// 'phrul dga' lha 'i

bu yang drang srongagi chabyad kyis lha rdzas rin po chesna bdun gyi ya nga bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to// khang bu brtsigasam de dag gi phyogs bzha kun tu rin po che sna bdun bgyis so// khang bu brtsa gsam de la yang

lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs byung ngo// gos sna tshogs dang/ rgyanasna tshogs mngon par rab tu ba phyung ngo// me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to// khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi mi la mo rgya chen po yadedu 'ong

ba sna tshogs byungango// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rolamo dkrol ba dang/ glu'i sgra bsgrags pa des/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par gyur to// klu'i

bu mobargya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ drang srongag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyananas/ rin po che snyatshogs kyi char phab bo// dga' ldan

lha'i bu ba stong dum yang drang srongagacha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog mnar ba dang/ mnar ba chen podang/ tsam pa ka dang/ pa ra ya ta dang/ 'dzongashadang/ 'dzin ka chen po dang/ rotsa dang/ lo tsakachan

po dang/ bal la dang/ bal la chen po dang/ tsakra dang/ tsakrachen po'i 'od dramamadang/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ 'dab ma stongs/ 'dab ma brgya stong pa// kun nas bod/ kun nas dra kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/
rtag tum tog 'od snang ba/ kha dog mtha' medang/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon nga ra dga' ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i lasakyi phyir lan den/

par byas so// char pa'i sprinagyi lha'i bu bstod dumadag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tshulas skyes pa dang/ thang las skyes pa'i me tog gachar rab tu bab bo// klu'adabang po brgya stong dum yang drang srong gache byad kyis
kuT+Tha/ yang dag par gnas shing 'ad lta// mu tig sngonapo'i char dang/ goshir sha' snying po'achar la sogs te/ chos sna tshogs 'batu phab bo// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha 'om/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i dbang po nas gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen

po dang/ 'degs dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ grul bum gyi dbang po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi khyadakyis me tog sna tshogs dang/ 'phrang
ba sna tshogs dang/ sna tshogs dang/ byug pa sna tshogs dang/ rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang/ brdung ba dang/ glu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ma 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam

par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo 'am/ gnod spyin gyi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'an/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo ban ma 'am ci'i

kyi bu mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong ga cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rol mo brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba dang/ gru yongs su bzung sta/ dmar po dang/ dkar po

dang le brgan dang/ shelakyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis rab tu phab bo// mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong ga cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'dul mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyis phyir brtson no/

tshangs pa'i dbang po sngonabyang chub tusems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gacha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstodacing spyan sngar 'khod do// brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong

ga cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du na yang drang srong gnapyad kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo// dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal

ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par blta'o// klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong ga cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsan danagyi phye ma'i char chen po bab tu 'debs so// lha ma yan kyi dbang po brgya

stong du ma yang drang srong gacha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlunga mchog tu 'jam ngas kun tu reg pa mchog tu drishom pa/ mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad
kyis ma tog gi gdugs 'dzin to// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma drang srong rgan por gyur nas/ gsar gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas legs su 'bod do//
bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin dubalta'o// grul bum brgya stong du ma yang drang srong rganabor byed kyis/ gsar gyi dbyugs nga 'gadugs 'chang zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon legs su 'khod de/ bcom

ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi 'phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang
drang srong gicha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'achara chen po mngon bar rab tu 'bebasaso// klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi dpyadakyis/ mu tig dmar po'i char/
mngon par rab tu 'bebasaso// dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srongagicha byad kyis/ nutig dkarapo'achar mngon par rab tu'adebs so// gnod sbyin gyi bumobargya stong du ma yang drang srong/

gi chabyad kyis tsanadanagyi phyu ma'i char mngon bar rab tu 'bobs so// lha ma yin gyi bumo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgya nagyichara mngon par rab tu 'o babs so// nam mkha' lding gi bu

mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsaragyi char mngon par rab tu 'debs so// lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil

rgyanapar byed do// sa'iganod sbyin brgya stodadum yang drang srong gi cha byadagyes dbyas gtong bar byed go/ bar snang gi gnod ni brgya stong dum yang drung srong gi cha byad kyis namakha' la 'phyon te/

bdud brgya stongadu ma yang drang srong gi cha byadakyag/ lhung lhungaldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jugago/ drangasrong lhabargya stong khrag brgyadacurtsa ba'i rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par song

ba dang/ drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dog lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da ra ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi don gyi phyir//
ma ga pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba rab tu byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis/ me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par 'gyuralo/

lha'i bu nyem dang zla ba brgya stong phrag du ma yang drang srong gi chabyados/ me tog gi chu bo'ichira mngon bar rang tu'adebs so// dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rel mo
dkrol bas/ drang srong thub ba'i sku la 'od gazer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo// de nas lha'i bu yon tan can zhes bya bas kyi ngad ldang ba'i rila gnas pa// lha branabargya stong phrag
brgyudacu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig du drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde lags su thalamo sbyar te/ phyag ba tshal nas/ bcom ldan bodasal mgrin gcig tu tshigasazubacad pa/
'di dag gisa mngon par bastodad// sems can mi bsrun grol byed rkangaganyisamag/ mnyes dag rgyal ba gzugs ngan 'drena mdzad cing// sdug bsngal gzir labade ba'i mchog sbyin pa//
rgyal ba rkang gnyes dmab bdar gshegs gsol// sredaparab sangs rnam thar gsum ston cing// 'gro la dus gsum nan yo shes kyis// bslab ba gsum ston dri ma gsum sungs pa//
khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gasol// 'gro laphyin ci legabazhinal pa grol// 'khor bzhi dgags zhabs lasnyen bkur cing// 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston/
pa zla ba ngas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol// thub pa phungabo lnga 'di rab ston pa// 'dod pa lnga lagaskye bo rnams grol zhing// 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag/
lnga ston pa// 'gro ba lnga yi btsonar rnam par dakrol// dbang po drug tu gnas bskyon med cing// sred lus jug lashin tu rnam grol shes// sum cu rtsa drugadran ston sems can mchog
ses kyi ngad ldangare 'der bshegasasu gsol// rgyal ba mnyam gzhag rab tudul ba'i thugs// shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog/ yashesasems can bye ba rab dul mdzad
kha 'khor sgyur sa 'du re bdir sngon// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa// ye shes kyisani 'jigartenasnanga mdzad nas// khyed nimun ng sa bsgribs la ye shes ston// thub pa dgon
ba'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'dzam bu gling 'dir sangs rgyas byung bdag/ 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing// mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa// mi yi 'dren mkhan
khyod ni 'dir gshegs gasol// sbyin dang bdulab stong zhing dul ba'i thugs// sems can nang nugatso bo stebs bcu'i mchog/ sems can dbul laganyenab 'phags pa khyod// ses kyi
ngad ldangare 'dir gshegs su gsol// bar 'ga' khyed kyis lo drug dka'a mdzad cing// bar 'ga' rgyal ba bdud byir shing la bzhugs// dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa// thub
thab pa 'dir gshegs bzodapa rab tuston ra N+Nasir 'khor le dam ba bskor/ shes rab dam ba dag ga mdzodacig gsungs// 'jig rtenathams cad 'di la khur bar b/ sbes kyi ngad
ldangare 'der bzod pa gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha dums mdunadu bdar cing/ byang chub sems dapa' du mas bskor nas gdan las bzhengasab dang nga 'ad/
kyatshan/ stong gsum gyi stopa chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yosaso// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gangasems can nyan thesasam//
nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'dasangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba kham/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyub bam/ gangasal rgyu ba 'a/
gangaru la rgyu bde thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so ser theb ngo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamA 'di lag mthil du skyes ba snang ba rgya chen pos khyab bar mthong ngo/ mig gis

gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang ngar mi 'gyur ro/ gang yang sems can daka' thub nganaba'i rnal 'byoradang ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po thob pa/ 'di lta ste/ me'i brtul zhugs can dang zla ba'i brtul
zhugs can dang/ nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang/ 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs tsan dang/de lasogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa snatshogs thob pa// leg pal lta nga can/
de thams cad daka' thub ngan paspangs nas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltasaso// ci'i rgyu ce'i rkyen gyisan rnam pa dbu'asagayo ba 'di dang/ snang ba chen po
'de 'jig rtenadu byung bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasadrang srong chen po'i spyan sngan/ gang ma'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de mungasakar gyi 'brutsam du mngon par spel te/ phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang/ rnam par ma dgapa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gangasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag zhugs te 'tsho skyongaba'i
sangs rgyas de dag gi spyanasngar mer snang bde/ me tog mnar ba chen por kun tu gnas pa 'dug bar gyur to// 'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang/ gangaston byang chung dusams bskyadang de thams cad

drang srongagi cha byad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar khodado// shar phyogasakyisangs rgyas kyi zhing bdenas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chub garlag nyes kyi bye ma snyed las yonatu 'das te//
danargyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhinagshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de nade bzhin gshegs/
ba dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khorade las byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po ma shesadapal zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dapa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpalas bya
bde drang srongagigazugs dang/ lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong d// gzhan yang theg ba chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang lus dang//
dbyangs kyisa mthong ang// mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'its+tshaci'i rkyen gyis na/ gang me tog merasnangababezlumu'i
dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarab dug par gyur/ theg pa chen bo 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bude thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/
de nas bcom ldan 'adasade bzhin gshags ba dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyidangul gyis/ rigs kyi bu dedag la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs b dgrabcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya banub phyogs kyi mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasana'adugacing/ rog pa lnga'i 'jig rtenadu bajug pan/ dgeslongadang/ dge slongam da nga/
dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhidag la theg pa gsum gyi tshesaston par byed do// de bzhin gshegs ng de da ltar yongadag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis bdul ba'i 'brong nga
bstan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pasmonam dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par gal to// gsol pa// bsred pa 'di'i thog/
ma bam/ tha ma 'am/ ji ltadu zhig/ bka' stsal ba/ bzodapa 'di ne mu stags can thams cad la 'jug pa go/ de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/
sems can tshu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams las sgrol bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhen/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang/ lta ba'i chu bo dang/ srid pa'i chu bo dang/ ma rig pa ba chu bo 'di
dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o// dad pa mi phyedapa bzhi yang dag par lenadu 'jug pa// 'jug par byed pa// so seradagodapar byed pa'o/ bzhi gang zhen/ sangs rgyas la dad pa
mi phyed pa// sems can rnams yang dag bar len du 'jug pa// 'jug par byed ng/ sosor dgodapar byed pa'o// bsruba'i dngos po rnam bzhi lasems can rnams sbyorlabyed de//
tshul khrims kyi phung pas sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams Mlta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung
bos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ sangs rgyas la dad pa me khyadang sa
sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar pyad pa'o// chos ladadab mi phyadangs/ sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge bdun la dad ba mi phyed ngas
samasacan rnams nyanathos kyi theg pas sgrolabar byed pa go/ 'phagasang med du bong ba'i tshul khrims kyis lta bar songabathamasacad song la ston par byed pa'o/ spenang sa sems na rnamAg
tshi'i rgya mtshol sasgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag snyan pas ltaba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// donabyabasasems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'i// don mthunangs
sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tusgrol bar byed pago byang chub sems dpa' dedag gis gsol pa/ btsunub bcom ldan 'adas bdag cag la bka'astsal du gsol/ de bzhin shes
pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdagacaganyebar mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dbangagi rgyal mtshan gyid la des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la
bab par shes na zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ de nas rigs kyi bu med shes dpal dang/ bcushing gi ra ba'i dbal dganyisadang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu ldan
cigatu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbangagargyal mtshan gyi dpal de la/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyes la spyi bos phyag 'tshalanas/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor bsdus
te 'khod do// skadacigamagacig tsamagyisam mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong 'akya thub ba'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal to/
'khed nga ra gyur to// de la gangs ba byang chub sems dab ba tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang/

rnam par ma dag pa tshad med rgya sa medang ' bshadacig ma gcig gis lhags so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdi nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+ga'i byem snyedalas shin tu 'das/

te/ de marebakyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhinagshegs pas rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing denabyang chub semu
dang 'a mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' klog gi mchog ces bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dabab deb nyis drang srong gi cha byad dang/ lug dang gzugs dang/ dbyakhA
kyis bdag mthong ng// ston ma byungaba'i grubapa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas/ de bzhinagshegs pa ri rab chen bo de la yongs su zhus pa de bzhinadu ji lta bur gong du
bshad panag/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'dasar 'i bar duste/ den 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtenagyi khams de 'de bzhin gshegs padapal snang ba
zhes khyab ba zhugs te/ 'tsho skyongabatshos kyang ston to// den byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen ngon yod par mthong dang/ ku mu da'i glang bo zhas bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gangadu bshad

nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+g+hagasum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ den rgyan pa cig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de
bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ches kyang ston to// de nabyang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang/ tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya
ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong dungashad nga nas/ bog gi phyogs kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing bdenas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du chu bo gang+ga gcig gi bye ma snyidalas ngan du 'das pa 'i bar du ste/ de nas me
tugachen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamagader/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong bachos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' ye/
shisadapal zhes bya bdang/ byang chub sems dapa 'dapalachen bo zhes khu bganyis kyang jiltar gong du bshad panas/ ya nga steng gi phyogs kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing bdinas/ sangs rgyas kyi zheng chu bo
gdadadun gyi byem snyad nas shin tu bdas pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te
ma'o snying pos bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// den byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang/ bdud rtse dbyangs shes bya ba'i byang chub sems dang 'a gnyis kyang ji
ku@#// snyed gong du shadapa bzhin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas/
de bzhinagshegs pa drangasrong chen po shAkya thub bgangan bde legs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalanas 'khodad// mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dirasems can gang la la theg pa chen bo la
yang dag bar ma zhugs pani/ dngasrong gi cha pyad kyis mgyur ba'o// nade dag la nyan thosasam/ nyan thos kyi theg pab bam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bos
kyang mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong dar mo 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen pogadan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros
dang tshangs pa dbang po'i 'grosadang/ tshangs pa drang srongagi 'gros dang/ mnya' shing du bltaba'i 'gros dang/ nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang/
dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang/ lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang/ gnod sbyin dul ba'i 'gros dang/ lha ma yin dga' bar byed ba'i 'gros dang/ klu ngul pa'i 'gros dang/
rgyal ba nyonamos pag med pa'i 'gros dang/ rnam par grol ba'i 'grog ri bdab de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing/ sangs rgyus chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang/ rgya chen po'i
'gros dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyisabarlabs chen bo'i bgros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i re la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'deg pa dang/ 'ar bas bzhud nas srid kyi da
ldang ba'i ril byin te// dka' thubakyi gnas gtsang madri thadad ba med cing/ drim medwapa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres bzhes bya ba gangan bden/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
teglang ro'i rnam par lta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par baltas par gyur pa de'i dusanayang 'di brjod do// la la gang 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la// byang chub dam ba mchog tu sems skyed pa// bdag
gis ang dag spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bdagagi mdun du 'ong// byang chub sems dpa' nyenamongasasngaTas me gang// da dung duyang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing// chos
la bdag med rab tu mi shis pa// bdaganade dag thams cad 'ongan ston// kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gangadagakyang// sgyu ma'i phung ltar ngashin tu sngon mthong zhing// thabs la mkhas par
yang ni mi shesapa// de dag thams cad 'ongan bdagason te// brtson 'grus ldan ba bsod nams mdzod mang// thabis la mkhas pas sems can rnams gdul zhing// shes rab
pha rol phyin mchog rtag sbyodang// bzod nyan thos phyiradedag thams cad 'ong/ gang gis sasargyas du masngon bsnyen bkur// 'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med// chu zla
lta bur ra da tu u ston pa// rang bzhinanam [“] par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong// gang rnams thabs dang yang dag stod phyir zhugs// thams cad dngos 'asams pa rten med cing/
mtshan ma sngangs la rtogag par 'gyur medab// dran bar byed pa dgan 'dir yang 'ong// bab/ gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bastan nas// ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas ba// chos kyi 'khor
la la a nga khyod myur 'jug/ sridamatshelas kyang sems can rab thar byed// phyogs bcur thub ba'i dbangabogadzad g kyang// 'gro ba rnamA la ban phyir 'khor la bskor// dadung theg ba'i
dam tshigs gang bdod pa/ bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dang ba mthong/ lanaganyis su yang 'khor la bdag bskor te// phyir mi ldog bsems can bye bkod pa// rnam par grol ba'i
blo mtshan r ba thogs shing// bdagang dag zhing rnams su yang bgro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gangadag kyang// byang chub mchogagi spyod phyi'i bgrod pa bstan// nyanas rang
rgyab theg pa can mthong ste// de bsamu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyidakyil ba khorade ya de ltar bcom 'das kyi yi ge dang donodang/ tshig brjod
pa'i dbyangs kyidakyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song go/ desems can ga'al theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs bde thams cad nyan cing de phyogs
bcur a nga lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis bltaba'i sems can desems can la dung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dgakhang/ de ltar
bab ceng sems can gyidabugs 'byin// de ltar tshim pade ltar ba kher ba'i ba rolatu bgro ba/ don dang tshig dang yi gebarjod ng 'i dbyang sakyidakyil 'khor de bzhin du smabar bya ba ji lta ba der/ de
phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spes kyang d ldang ba'i ri ladrang srong thub ngadabangapo zhi zhing/ thugs zhi ba dul ba dang/ zhi ba'i mchog thob pa// gsaragyi phung po ji ltar

'ang nga la drang srong bye ba khrug khrig brgya stong mang po sam no sumadu phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang mi ring dar mthong ng// mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang
srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen podang ldan par 'gyur ba zhigasnyam ste/ gal te snyang rje dang ldan bar 'gyur ba zhig rjes su 'grogo/ drang srong gi cha byad dang/ lus dang dbyibs kyis
bdag gi lus su gyurang de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'disnyam dusems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyuran/ drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro 'o/
de dgakyang sams bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshadamedagrangs med pa las/ drang srong gicha byad tshad medagrangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa medacing//
dbag tu med pa chu bo gang+ga'i bye masnyedakyis/ byang chub sems dbabs 'asargyas kyi zhing bder mngon bar lha gso/ byang chu sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna

pa tshogs kyis drang srong byung ba la mchod pa byas nas/ dwangasong thub paganganang de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal nas bstod do ba bodad// la la snyonalam gyi dbang dang/ la la nganadu spyod pa'i

rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthusadrangang so sor thob nas drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khodado// drang srong chen po thub ba'i dbangabo gnabade logs su yang thal go
'awaM sbyar te 'a khodad// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a blo gros kyis tshogs mthub yasapa'i rgyal ngo sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam dusams te/ shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing/ ji lta
bur 'khor angadag par 'ong ba la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshulanam mkha'i mdog gis 'dulababazod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur// danas dedakyi tshan/ shar phyogs kyi namakha'i

lam las khangang brtsegs pa bstan sdug ba rin po chasnabadun gyis gang snatshogs 'di ltastadangan/ brgya byin lha'i dang khra bo zhes bya ba'i khangang btsugs pa ltadu/ byab khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshigs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal bo khang pa brtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'disAmadu sems te/ bdagagis khangapa brtsegs pa 'di lta

stad pa khan/ tshagasapa mi mdakyibadag bo'i khang pa brtsegs padabyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te drang srong thub nga gang na bzhugs ba 'der/ bdag bzodapa 'debastanasnyam pa dang/ de nyed tshanalo phyogs

kyin makha'i lam las khangapa nga rtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che bdun gyis gang bsnatsholo sa 'di lta sta/ da natshas pa'i mdzod kyi bdag po' khang ba brtsegs pa dang sa zhib ltabu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong phrag drug cu lhags ba mthong nas/ byang chung sams/ dpa' blo gros kyitshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal bod 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dbaran/ tshangs pa chen ngo glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang
babartsegs de 'dra par mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de nab zhug ra da keng chos ston to snyam pa dang/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs kyin makha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs da 'di lta
ste dper na/ tshangs ba glog gi 'od cig bya ba'i khang brtse ba gas pa bstan sdug ban bocha sna bdunagyis gang bsnatshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas byang chub sems

dba' blo gros kyi tshog samatha' yas pa'i rgyal po bde snyam du sems te/ ngab khes khangarab rtsegs pa 'di ltaste/ dper na/ tshangs pa'i 'bakyi bodacas byabag khangab brtsegs bde ba dra ba mngon par sngalate
bcom ldan 'das denabazhugs shing chos ston tesnyam bdang/ de nas de nyidakyitshen/ byang phyogs nas nam kha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa bstan du sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
gangab sna tshogs 'di ltastodaperan/ tshangs pa chen po ra rib kyi 'od cas byagale lang pa brtsegs ba/ dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/
des na de'i tshon khapa brtsegs ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma namakha' la' khodado// de nas byang chub sems dbab byams pa 'disnyam du sems te/ khang pa brtsegs bdedag tu/ bcom ldan
'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge 'i khri la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyis phyir seng ge 'i khri bshams ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gaza bdadri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lang ba brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/ sub byin gyis brlabs// byang chub sems dang ba

gzi brjidadris medangs/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa// rigasakyi bu de bsan/ chos kyi sgos chags ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir/da dungamesgrub kyi 'deganyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub
bo rigasakyi bu 'dir nyesani 'grob dang longanga'// 'di gnyis no ba byung dang 'jig ba zhes bya ste/ gangami skye mi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ongaba'i 'du shes kyang modad// de 'jig pa thams smras
nas ma skyaba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcodapa 'di niganyes sumedabab tshes kyi sgogo/ gang bgro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'digs na 'grob dang bong ba'o// rigasakyi bu/
ga nga bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang/ srog dang ba so ba dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shedacan dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med/ 'di ni gzhes su/
med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa// rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa ma/ ma skyes par rtog pa bdin gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gag pa ranam par mi rtog cing/ bgro bdang 'ong bar dmigs
bamedab dang/ tha dad par bya bamed pa dang/ 'gyur ba medwapa dang rnam par byang ba medabab danirigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgol 'jug pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par
byang ba dang/ bungapo skya ba dang/ 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid bde ni gnyis ba'o// gangaphung po yongasasu shes shing/ skya ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyed slangs pa rlom sems thams cad bcom
pa gzugs kyi 'gog par 'groba'i lam bden gnyis su med bab chos kyi sgol 'jug pa'o/ 'gul ba dang ngom zhing sems par reg pa 'dini nyes pa'o// gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rem/
sems med pa// g.yo ba medacing ud la mi byed pa bdeni/ gnyis sumed pa 'chos kyi sgol 'jug ba'o// rig sakyi bu ga tshor bar shes pa dang/ tshor bkun 'byung bar shes pa dang/
tshor ba'i 'gog par shes ba dang/ tshor ba 'gog bar 'gro ba'i lamadu shes ba 'din gnyis pa'o/ gsebu gang yang tshor bkun 'byung ba gog par 'gro bar mi shes ba dang/ gzugs kyi phung po
[f ]u// dang tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyedas+sadad par mi shes pa dang/ mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan nye dmed pa dang/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang/ mtshan nyid gcig pa dang/
mtshan nyed mang por mi shes pa'i di angarigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang rung po dang khams dang/ skye mched la nyanathos dang/ rang byang chub 'dod

pa dang bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis nga 'o// rigs kyi bu gangayang nyanathos dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang/
khams dang/ skye mched rtenang rami shes pa dang/ yi ga'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas med pa yi ge med// spros pa med par rab tu shes pa bdi Angarigs kyi bu gnyis sumedang 'i chos kyi
sgo la 'jugapa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang/ mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shesapa dang/ pha rol dang/ tshu rol dushos pa 'di niganyis bgo/ rigs kyi bu ngadagab dang medage ba 'di yang
mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang/ mi zad pa kun du rtogs pa 'di yang rigs kyi buganyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jugaba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshu rol ni zad pa'o// pha rolan/
byin cileg ste gang tshurel dang/ ba rolan rtog ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ dkrol ba bdeniganyis pa'o// gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dangadakrolabamed pa dang/ ci la'ang brtags
0 bamed pa dang/ btang ba medapa'i din gnyis sumed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ rigs kyi bug zhan ya nga gang phung bo dang/ khoms dang/ skye mched la zag pa dang/ bcas pa dang/ brag pa mad/
pa kham zhes rtag pa 'din gnyes pa'o// gang yang khams dang/ skye mched la khrab pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa medab dang/ zag pa medaba'i 'du shesasu bya ba'angamed pa dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du shes med men thob pa'i ng medab 'di angaganyes su med pa'i chos kyis sgo la 'dzugapa'o// rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched la 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas su
rtog pa 'di ni gnyes pa'// gang yang de 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing/ rnam par mi rtog pa dang/ chos thams cad nam khab dngamanyam par yang dag par rjes su
mthong ngar 'di yang/ rigs kyi buganyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgol 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bugang yang 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la bsnyems pa 'di gnyis
pa'o gang la la 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten lasa'ongs pa'i chos la mi 'jug mi 'gro/ rnam par mi 'gro/ mi rgal zhing/ 'gro ba yang med/ rnam par 'grol ba medapu'ang gnyis su
med pa'i chos kyi sgo la'ajug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang la la ming dang gzugs las phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched 'byung bar rab tu shes pa bden pa zhes pa'o//
khur dang khams dang/ skyemachod dang/ ming dang gzugs bralab laskya ma'i 'bazhin gyis lta banatu 'gro zhing kun tu mi 'gro// yongs sumya ngan las ma 'das pa//
'di yang/ byang chub sems dapa'i gnyis sumadwapabachos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gi kyi bugazhan yang g rnam par shes pa 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'dini gnyis pa'o// gang la
'byung ba med pa skadag ma dang/ skadacigamam inapa la'adus byas thams cad du myur du rab tushesab 'de 'ganyis su med pa'i tshos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bugazhan yang
bdag gir bya ba dang/ rnamakharashes par mosasushes dang/ ngayir bya ba dang/ skye mched la chags pa 'di niganyisaba'o/ gang labadagu dang bralaba'i rnam par shes pa thob ba/
bdagagi rang bzhin ltab gnyis dang bral ba/ spya mched nyams pa med pa// badragag bya bdang/ nga yi bya ba dang bral ba 'deyaganyis sumadaba'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pago/ gang lal
gi pa dang/ rnam par grol bar rtog ba 'den gnyis ba'o// rigs kyi bum rigapani rgyub med cing bdag med go/ ga nga glog gir bzhinacan go/ rnam par grol baanganamakha'o//
namakha' yang mi rtog pa// rtogs 'byed pamedang/ spros pa med pa 'di yang ganyisasumed pa 'chos7go la'ajug bgo/ gang rnam par shes pa dang/ gzugs kun tu spyod pa bde ni

tsa ]gnyis ba'o// gzugasarnyedakyang nam khabazhin du spong sta/ namakha' yang 'jig ba medado// gzugs 'gapa stopa nyidagazugasakyimatshaganyid rab tu rgyu bstongapa nyidakyerang bzhin yang stong pa nyid
do tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed kyang de bzhin// rnam par sa pa rab tu rgyu ba medabani/ namakha'aje lta bur mun bamedacingesnangabu medang// rnam bar shes pa'i ngade bzhin no/
rnam par shes ba'i 'jigs pa stong pa ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyeng khyung stopa'o// de bzhin du nyebangalananga'i phulo lnga yanamakha'i rang bzhin ltar song ngo// namakha'ajikA/
bu 'dod chags med zhe sdang med/pagati mug med/ mi mtho'i dma'/mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro bar/ de ltar sems ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad ji ltab bzhin du
rab tu shesaso// thung bodang/ khams dang/ skyemachadal yang 'dod chags med/ zhesdang mad gtumug med/ mi mtho mi dma'/ mi rtogo rnam par mi rtog/ mi 'gro rnam par mi
'gro zhing/ nyan thos dang rangs sasadang/ blun med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog/ mi 'gro rnam par mi 'grob bdeni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
sams dba'i gnyis su med pa 'chos kyi sgo la'ajug bgo byang chub sems dang 'gabri brjidadrima med bas/ 'di bstan pa ston pa na/ byang chub sems dang ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsaganyi
ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dapa bkrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyegagu med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa/thob par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das kyang sngon ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tingenge 'dzin las bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kye drangasrong gi cha byadaji tsamapami snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spus tshanarabs sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyan bzhugs so// de ltar de bzhinadugagazhan la la dag kyang drangasrogi cha byadamisnang bar gyur te/ sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis ya nga byang chubs mas dang 'gatre brjidadram med pa la legs sozhes bya ba byin te/ rigasakyi bu khyod kyisajeltabur bstan bde bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sgo bdebastan
par bya ba legs lags so// rigs kyibu khyod ni chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dapang du btsugasate/ de ltar khyodakyisatshadamadaba'i sems can rnams blanan dang a ngadag nga rardzogs pa'i byang
chub tu bkod de// gzhan yang lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ namakha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ mi dang mim inab rnams/ bcom ldan 'adas la mchodapa/
tshogs byas so// ga bam bo gsum/ de nas de'i tshabarngamadapala gzhon nur gyurapa bla gos phrag pa gcig du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba
de legs suT+Tal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la chos bstan du gsolaba'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa'i yon tan 'di dag gis bstodado/
mnyam zhing mdangs dag khyab pa// nyon mongs dgra zhi 'dul mngon par gnas// thub pa shin tu rnam grol 'dir bzhugs shing// khyod kyis 'gro la bzodapa'i mchog 'di ston// rab tu zhi
thugs brtul zhugs yongasasu dag/ thub pa mchod byin bgyis pa bzodadag gsungs// 'gro la bad byin drang srong shes rab 'chang/// gdumuga'ajig mdzad 'di la bdud rtse char/
'dal lha klusems can ma mang bo// na tu pagasal yid myur du zhing gangapa// 'gro ba thams cad khyod zhal lta zhing 'dug/ nyon mongs yongs susdus te dam ches gsungs// sngon
chad rgyal ba khyod kyang kun spyod brtan// mig gnyis rkangapa log pa lce byen zhing// pags pa mgo khrag yan lag dam 'bu nog/ glangarta bu grongangashing rtayin chen rnam mang byin// zas skom mal
dang dran po branaso byin// gnyanadad 'gro la sdug bsngal rtag shar byed// bsam pa rdzogs shing sems can dagu'a mdzad pa// khyod kyis mchod sbyin brgya byas sems can phyir// sangs rgyas mang
lasngonachad dge mchod byas// byamasasems rtag pas ther zugasbyin la dga'// brtul zhugs brtan pas ri rab ji bzhin 'bar// 'gro la bstanaphyir bzod pa 'di bstanagasol// ngan song
gsum slangasasems can matho ris khrid// khyod kyis brtan pa'i smon lamasngon rtagabyas// bgrobabyang chub sdug bsngal zhi mchogareg/ rgyal ba sngon chada ji bzhin byang
chub de thobab// snying rjedapalachusasa rnams ma lus gang// nyon mongs dregasum thatshom thams cad zhi// lam gang zhibs byang chub thob ston pa// ji ltar tshos rtogs bad la khyod kyi dus//
shin tu skom yod 'grol chos char phob// bdud rtsi bsangoms yang dagayon tanagasungs// lamagang zhe des 'gro ba byang chub leg zhingamangs bde la sems can yang dga'ongs// rga shi
dag las rnam thar gang yong nga// thub pa chen posachos 'di gsungs dugasal// namakha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i brjod bakon// de nas sgyu ma smigargyasngos par 'gro// 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungasaM bas zhal gyis bzhes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di gamadudagengs te [“]bdag rnam pe di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
a bar zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang ges khang brtsegs pa jisnyadang de snyed du lus mngon par sprul nas/ khang pa brtsigs pa thamasacad n 'dug ste/ bakhar di/
