dag kyang yang dag par dga' zhing skyobar bya'o sAmab dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od shin tu rnamangar ba kodong zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyomA bar zhugs te/ mnyam bgazhag
pa'i thugs kyis khang brtsegs bde snyadang de snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das darang zhugs tebazhugs so/// de nas byang chub sems dang/ 'domatshar dang ldan pas/
byang chub sems dang 'dagra rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces sa so// rigs kyi du khang pa brtsegs pa tshadamad ba 'di dagazhi gan/ rigs kyibu de bzhinagshegs pa bdagakhang pa
brtsegs pa na bzhugs panigang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis khang pa brtsegs par sas rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par yang dag bar mthodrang ni gang/ de nas byang
chung sems dba' dag rnam par 'grel ngas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bab tshig 'di ni smra
ba med bkogo/ ma rigs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spros pa med do// gegs kyi bcibadas pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/ sa pa rigs kyi bu ma yin no// smras pa ci
ma 'os pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/ sa pa rigs kyi bu ma yin no// smos pa red ltar byung ba'i soms dang bsam pa'i gnas yod dam/ snyas b.rigs kyi bu med de//
snyas pagal tereshige sems dang bsam pa'i gnas pa medan/ rnam pa dmi gnas pa'i dngos po la ji lta byang chub thob/ sa parigs kyi bu ci dus gsum gyi chos thams cad spangs pas
de'i tshe cis kyang mos khong du chudang mdadam/ sas nga rtag pa dang/ chad pa yongs su spangs ba/ mi 'gro ba me skyobami 'gog pa mi'i ga ba/ 'dus byas dang 'dus/
mkhyus la gnas pa med pa'o// dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa labyang chub 'grob mdago/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byang ba med cing//
snyams pamed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang bdas pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba mdad// ji ltar nam mkha' la rtog pa mdacing/ rnam pa dang rtog pa med pa dang zhin du/
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa mdad ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pamed cing/ snangab med pa de bzhinadu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mun pamed cing
snang ba'ang med do// ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs medatsebastan du ca da pa dengazhin du/ sas rgyas kyi tshes rnams kyang gzugasand cing bstan du yang m dado// jiltar nam mkha'o ma skyes
ma 'gags pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang maskyes ma 'gagasaso// jiltar nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyichos rnamA kyang 'grobar dmags pamed do//
ji ltar nam mkha'i ' gnas pa med pa de bzhinadu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gnas pa med do// ji ltar nam mkha' la reg pa med pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyichos rnams kyang regab/
med do// ji ltar nam mkha' la lamadudamigs pa med pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kya ce la yang lam du dmigs pa me dad// ji ltanamamakhab la dngos po medaceng mtshan nyed/
medang deb 'an du/ sangagargyus kyi chos rnams kyang dngos po medacing mtshan nyid med/ ji ltar namamakhabalabarjod dumad cing yig mdab de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang brjod
du mdacing yi ge medado// ji ltar nam mkha' la rtag pa medacing chad pa med pa de bzhinedu/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes rnams kyang rtag pa med cing tshad bumedad// jilta nam mkha' la lus med cing 'byung
ba medubadabazhinadu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang lusumed cing 'byungab med do// ji ltar nam mkha' la gzung du medacing gnas pa med pa de bzhin du/ sas rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzung
ba medacing gnas pa med do// ji ltar nam ma khab la rtenab med pa gnas po med pa dmigs pa med rnam pa brtog pa med pa// 'degapa medang rnam pa ragapa medang// 'grob med pa 'ongab med pa rtsa
ba med// mtha' med pa'i khrug pa medab/ o/sugadung ba med pa brtags pa medang dgrol ba med ba/ mthong ba medang rtog pa med pa mun pa med ba dngos po med pa mtshan ma med pa/ sprul pa
med ba de bzhin du/ gi kyi bu sang sa rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rten pa med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du'o// rigasakyi busangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skye bar bsgrags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
chag @#// chos rnams ni gnyis su med pa'i cha shasaso// chos kyi dbyings la kha nas bgo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sems can gyi khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs
s+sa rgyas kyi chos rnams ninam mkha'i khams su angadag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyibu sangs rgyas kyichos rnams n rtog pa dang kun du rtog pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/
gnas dang/ rnam pa'i gnas dang/ rab kyi gnas su yang dag par 'dus pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams re shes pa dang/ mi shes pa dang/ rang du shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/
nye bar ng shes pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nimtshan khyed medang yang dag pa'i mtshan nyed dang/ rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ nye ba'i mtshan shed dang/ rjes su yi
kyi rang ba'i mtshan nyid la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyichos rnams ni 'dasapamed pa dang/ rnam par 'das pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ rjesasu 'das pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o//
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams byung ba dang dor ba dang/ kun du blang dang/ nye bar blang ba la yang dag pa'i dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni snang ba dang/ kun tu snangab dang/ rjesasu snang
ba dang/ yang dag par snang ba med pa dang/ rab tu snang ba med pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams niyang dgab dang/ shin tu yang dag pa dang/ rjesasu yang dag
0ba dang/ kun tu mang ma yin pa dang/ rab tu yang dag pa ma yin pal yang dag pa ra'adus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni kun du smra ba dang/ rnam par s+ya pa dang/ shin tu sa ba dang/
rjesasu slab dang/ rab tus bdang/ nye bar sbyab la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni kun tu rig pa dang/ rnam par rig pa dang/ mtshungs par rigs pa dang/
rjes su rago ba la yang dag paro'adus kha'o// sangs rgyas kyis rnams ni kunutu gzugs dang/ rnam par gzugs dang/ mtshungs par gzugs dang/ yang dag par gzugs dang/
nyeba'i gzugs la angadag par 'dus pa// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chung ni kun du spyod pa dang/ rnam par spyod pa dang/ mtshungs par spyod pa dang/ rjesasu spyod pa dang/ nye
bar spyod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni kun dubarjod pa dang/ rnam par brjod pa dang/ rjes su brjod pa dang/ mtshungs por brjod ba dang/ nye bar ba rjod pa la yang
dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub nebagrangab dang rnam par bgrang ba dnga mtshungs par bgrangab dang/ rjes su bgrangab dang/ nye rab grangabal yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ byang
chub kun tu yod pa dang/ rnam par yodapa dang/ rjes su yod pa dang/ nye bar yodapal yang dag par 'dus pa'o//rigasakyi bu byang chub ni sngos ba med pa dang/ rnam par spos pa dang/ ]
sngos pa dang bral ba dang/ rjes su spos nga dang/ nye bar skyes pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji ltar nam ma ba'ikhams la gzung du med pa de ltar sangs
rgyus kyi byang chub blta bar bya// rigasakyi bu la lanam mkha'asbos pa khyab dang/ tshad du bya ba dang/ rnam par bagrang bar bya ba dang/ brgyan par bya ba dang/ ri mor bya bar nus sam/
hikA kyi bu minusaso// smras panam mkha'ajilta ba ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ces kyang sngos par menus pa ji ltab ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhinaducis kyang
sprosapar minus so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtse gas par bcom ldan 'das bdagab zhugs panegang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs pa ni gang na zhes bya ba khyod ci'i phyired skudasna/ de ltar sa der
byed ces byang nubasems dpa' dgra rnam par brdzig ngas/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub samos dba' khrug khrug brag lnga bcu tsubadunami skyaba'i chos kyi bzodapa thob par/
gyur to// byang chub sems dang 'khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis de bzhinagshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyesasu med pa'i chos kyi sgos sa'athebacing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad kyang rgyas par gyur to// sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can gyis legasaso zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pade bzhin gshegs ba'i gsangaba'i rjes su 'jug ba gnyis su med pa'i
chos kyi sgo 'di ston pa bstan pa legs par bshad pa legs so legs so// de nas de nyidakyi tshen/ dngom ldan s 'od zer 'byungaba'i bdag po zhes bya ba'iting nge 'dzin la
bzhes te/ khang pa brtse gas pa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par yang dgaparan theng ba mgatogs par sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang misnang par
gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de rematshar thob par gyurato// de nas byung chub sems dpa' rgyal bo mang po'i mtshog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' drang sronganam par '
pa lu'ade skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag ni gang nas shes// yang gang du 'gro/ de nas byang nubasems dpa' dang sronganam nga ra'agrel pas//
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal pomang po'i mchog la 'deskad ces smasaso// rigs kyi bu khyod da dung 'gro ba dang/ bong bu'i 'du shesasu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bo mang po'i mchog/
gis smas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'os so zhes bya ba 'di na glo bur gyi tshig go/ rigs kyi bu bgro'i zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag med pa'i tshigago/ byang chub sems dpa' dga rnam par ba gel
pas skyes pa// rigs kyi bu glo bur gyi tshig dang// rigs kyi bubadag med pa'i tshig gis kyang rigs kyi bu nga yi khyab dang/ bdagagir bya ba'i tshig go/ skyes bu gang zag nga yir bya ba dang/ bdug/
gir bya ba lachags pas khyedici logabazhes mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dug pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa rnal 'byor gyi rjes su ldan pa dang/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'ad
shes pa dang/ bdagamed palabadag tu 'du shesabar rnal 'byor gyi rjesasu ldan ng la zhugs pa'o// skyes bu gang zagasems phyin ce log la zhugs bas sgrib pa ltar bgyur ro// lngagang zhe na/
bdi lta ste/ 'dod sredapa'i sgrib pa dang/ gsasems dang/ rmugs pa dang gnyid dang/ la ladang rgod pa dang/ 'gyodang dang/ the tshom gyi sgrib bslas pa med par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi

/ bu gangal la sgrib bltapo bdedag du bgyur bde mtshams med lnga yang dag par spyod do// mtshams med ba ma spangs pa'i rgyas bu gang zag lha dang me 'inang du bgro bar yang dag par rjesasu mi mthong na/

nyan thos kyi byang chub ltaci smos// gang la nyan thos kyi byang chub med de larangasangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lta yang cesmos/ gang lang yir bya ba dang/ bdag gi khyab
mgras pa de lartagapa dang/ chadapa angasangs pa med do// gangagang zag chad par lta ba can du gyurab de/ dedagaba'i lasadang/ dge ba laspyod pa mtshungs par spyod pa lta ga la 'gyur/ gang
gang ga bar ltab can du 'gyurang da tharab la bsngos pa mtshus bar spyod pa dang/ dge ba la spyod par ltagal 'gyur/ rtagapar lta ba dang/ chadababaltaba'i skyes bugang zagani lha dang mi'inangadaskye

bar yang dag par rjes sumi mthong na/ nyan thos dang rang byang chub lta ci smos te/ blonamadapa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ga la mthong/ nga yir bya ba dang/ bdag ba der bya ba lta bang
so ngag/ gnas pa med pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ma 'dres pa 'i bakhor ji lta bur yang dag par 'ongasang skya ba med bde dang/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang stsab med pas
mthong ngo// byang chub sems dang kha lag bzungs kyis smas pa// rigs kyi bu ci 'gro bdang/ bong bar 'du shesapa yid la mi bya 'am gal te yid la mi byon/ byang chub sems dang da' sbyin
ba'i gnas rnams la byin len dang/ yo byad kyi ji ltar bsnyen bkung bya/ pha dang ma rnams rim gro' gnas dang/ nadapa rnams ladzaltar bsnyen par bya/ rgyas par gase bu spresapa mang
bane 'de lta ste/ gnas dang nyeba'i gnas dang/ rang kyi gnas dang/ gnas gzhan dang/ rim gro'i gnas dang/ kun tu bgro ba dang/ lhag par 'grob dang/ 'bar 'gro ba dang/ rjes su
'gro ba dang/ gzhan du 'grob bde'i tshegadadag thams canganesngos pamed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rtog bdang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ rjes su rtog pa dang/ nya bar rtog ga nga dang//
rab tu rtog pa 'di dag gagis 'khor ba 'dren no// gzhog go/ sgrubab// me tog ni lha dang mir skye ba'o// 'brasabun ngan song gsum du 'gro ba layang dang yang du 'chi 'pho skye ba dang/ skadapalam kaM
chos brgyud la yang dag par g zhol ba dang/ 'di dgane nyes pa'o// gang sdod pa dang/ rnam par spyod pa dang/ nye bar spyod nga dang/ rjes su spyod pa 'dedagage dngos po
thams cad ni b.lags pa'i bzodapa sbyangs pa'i phyir sgrub bo// skyes pa reg sakyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i spyod dece bshags pa'i bgrod pa 'khrug par
'gyuram/ smos pa rigs kyi bu gangadage ba'i chos 'anyung du 'dod cingasIg nga la mang du 'dod pane'abags pa'i ba drodapa la 'khrug pa'o// rnam par bajig pa'o// 'khor ba'o// gti mug pa'o//
gangade dag ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa de 'dod pa'i rtog pa zhes smras so// gang 'dod pa'i rtog bde kun tu spyodang bi bzodapa la 'khrug bdang/ 'dzeg ba'o// de bgrod pa'i tshogs medar 'di ni yong
su spong pa'o// rigasakyi bu dag dang yudadang drugagi skye mchadakyisdom pa dang/ mngon nga' bdu me byed pa dang/ brjod du med pa dang/ rtsol ba mad pa dang/ rtog pa mdab dang/ rnam par rtog pa
tsho med pa dang/ dmigasapa med pa dang/ sams dang yid kyis dmigs pa medabaste/ dana'aphags pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs so// gang yang samasakyi rnam par las dang/ lus kyi rnam par 'a
dang ngag gi rnam par las de thams cad 'phags pa'i bod pa lagati mug dang yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir sgrub bo// gzhan yang chos kyi bya ba bam/ mi 'gul ba 'am mtshan nyed dom/ rtog pad
'a gas nga 'i bgrod pa la gte mug dang/ yosasustangs nga 'i phyir sgrub bo// gang yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba med pa dang/ 'gyur ba med pa dang/ mtshan nyidamadang dang/ reg dang/
nad pa de la phags pa'i brjod pa'i tshogs sgom pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i chos kyematha'i jas su zhugs shing yang dag pa'i mtha'adang ldan no// cung zad du na nyanamo sa pa thamasukyim thar dang/
chos thams cad kyi yang mtha'// gangade ltar rab tu shes pa de babodapa bsgom pa'o/ gang yi ge la 'khrug pa med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad thul ba dang/ brjod du med pa la g.yeng
med pa dang/ snang thams cad la chags pa med pa dang/ gang mi skya mi 'byung bar bsgrags pa'i chos rab tu shes bde brod pa bsgom pa bo// gang chos kyi khams la gnas pa dang/ sems
can gyi khams la yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ sems can gyi khams kyada mtshungs pa'i khams su bzung// tha dad par mi byed pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyi khams kyang lo drug par
mibyed pad bzod pa ngagom pa'o// gangachos thamasacad migs pa med cing bdag dang gzhan med pa mi skyaba'i phyir snang ba med pa// gzung rumadang/ kun nas ldangab med ba/ lus med pa bsgomapaskye ba
mi 'byung ba/ 'chi kha pho med pa rtenapa mngapa 'gyur ba mang pa/ yod par rtog pa dngamed par rtog pa dang bral ba/ snod ma yin pa yongs su rtog pa med pa// 'dod chags dang bral ngo/ chu' dang
[j]@#/ bral ba/ rigs pas nga/ rang bzhinalos su dag pa/ drima med pa/ nyon mongs pa med paslobags bamed pa/ kun nas langs pa med pa/ 'khrug pa med pa'i
chos thams cad med bar ji lta ba bzhin du'ang tushog pa de bgrod babasgom mo// gang rkyen dang bral ba dang/ rab tu rgyu ba nye bar zhe ba dang/ lam ma rungs ba las yang dag par shin tu bdas pa dang/
'byung bamed pa dang/ 'jugapa med dang/ rings pa med pa dang/ yul thams cad la rnam dang dmigs pa med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i lam las shin tu yang dag par bo das pa dang/
brtagasapa med pa dang/ bkrol ba med pa dang 'ong ba med pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ sa bonamed pa dang/ rtsa ba med pa dang/ yid brtan pa nye bar zhi zhing rab du
zla zhi ba dang/ yongs sugadungs pa med pa dang/ shin tu mthar thug pa dang/ yang srid nga kun nas ldang ba med pa dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la mngon par dga' ba dang/ 'debadrab r yid la
byed pas bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtog bdang rnam par rtog bdang/ kun tu rtog pa dang/ yang dag bar rtog pa dang/ nyabar rtogapa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ kun tu 'gro ba dang/
mngon du 'gro ba dang/ nye bar 'gro bar yid la byed ngs/ bzod pa bsgom par mi 'gyur ro// rigasakyi bu 'ongasab zhes bya ba bdini yang dag par 'drenanga'i tshig go rigs kyi bu gang la badren pa/
medacing da dgang la badren pa ma bde la 'grob med cing bong ba yang med de// 'gro ba med pa dang 'ong ba med pa'i kun g zhi kun tu gzhom pa'i bying gnyis su med pa'i tshes kyi sgo'i ngabrod pa smras
mo/ rigs kyi bu khongang zhogar+ya ba las kyi mtshan nyid la dmigs pa 'di ni/ bgrod pa bsgol ba yongs su spangaba'i phyir yang dag par bsgrub bo/ rigs kyi bu 'gro'i zhig byaba'i lasakyi mtshan

nyid kyi rgyu 'din/ mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyidadang bral ba'i bzod ba bsgom pa zhes bya ba'o// khong ngo zhes bya ba'i sA lam gyi mtshan nyidakyi rgyu 'di ne/ babodang bsgom ba'i phyir shangadag par
sgrub kyi 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no/ rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di nison lam zad pa dang/ med pa dang zhi ba'i bzod ba bsgol ba zhes bya'o// rigasakyi bu 'ong zhes bya ba 'byung
ba'i mtshan nyid bden bzod pa la gte mugapa inagyebazod nga mi sgom pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu bgro'i zhig bya ba dmigs pa med pa dang/ 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid bdenibazodapa bsgom pa zhes smras
so rigaseb bong ngo zhes bya ba rnam par dmigs pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyed 'dini bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ bzodapa la 'khrug pa yin no/ 'gro 'o zhes bya ba rnam pa dmigs ba zad pa'i mtshan
nyid dang/ nye bar zhi ba bdeni bzod ba bsgom pa zhes ba so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid bdini bzod ba la 'jog pa yin gyi/ dbodang gom pa ma yin no// rigs kyi gu
'gro'izhas bya ba'i kun gzhinub nga dang/ zhi ba 'din bakhrodapa bsgom pa zhes sa so// shes kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes byab babyung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di'i khrodang lo rjes su sbyang ba yin gyi//

bzod ba bsgom pa ma gzhin// 'gro 'ozhes bya ba rgyu zad ba'imtshan nyid 'di dang/ rnam par zhi ba 'di nib khrod pa bsgomapa'o zhes smras so/ rigs kyi bu bongad zhes bya ba brda dang tha snyad kyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di

ni bzod pa bsgom pa la lanano// 'gro'i zhes bya ba tha snyada rnam par zhi ba'i gnas bden paakhrod pa bsgom pa 'o zhes saso// gas kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi'i ma bla bami shes pa'i
chu bor bying ba 'din babrod ba lagatinug ba yin gyi/ bzod pa bsgom bzhin yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha'adang/ phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang/ mishes pa rab tu spangs te/ rgya chen po na

lho bar zhi ba 'dine/ bzod pa bsgom pa 'o zhes smras so/ rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba lus dngangag dang/ yid kun srong ba'i mtshan nyid bden bzod pa bsgom bam yin no// 'gro'e zhes bya ba srid pa'i

sgyu bdu byed lte bar zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ongang zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang/ rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa tsheg gi mtshan nyid bad nibagrodang
bsgomapa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa rnam der dgegs pa dang/ rnam par sbyodang nub pa bden/ bzodapa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so'ang ngo zhes bya ba ming dang gzugs kun nas ldangaba'i
tshig gimtshan nyid bden/ bgrod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro 'o zhis byabamangadang gzugs nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa'i zhas snyasaso// 'ong ngo las bya ba 'dul ba dang/ kun nas
ldang zhing 'dod nga'i yon tan gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid bdeni/ nga brod pa bsgom pa ma yin no/ 'gro'o zhes bya ba dbang po drug nya bar zhe zhing nub pa 'den/ bgrodang bsgom dko 'gasAsaso// 'ong pa/
zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bo bsgom pa gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin na// 'gro'o zhes bya b.reg pa'i chu bor nye bar 'gro ba 'dani/ bzod pa bgron da khe las
sa so// 'gro'o zhes byab tshorab gsum gyi rgyun gcod pa 'di ni bzodang bsgom pa'o zhes stangs so// 'ong ngo zhes bya bsred nga'i kun gazhi la 'jugapa 'di ni/ bgrod pa bsgom pa ma yin no/
'gro'o zhes bya ba srid pa gtong ba dang/ nub pa'i di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes saso// rigs kyibu bong zhes bya ba nyabar lenab la 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyeng bde ni bzodapa' bsgom ba ma
sazheno// 'gro 'a zhas byab nye bar len sa'ab 'deni/ bzod pa bsgom pa 'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngezhes bya babasgom pa mngon par 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyeda'adeni/ bgro dang bsgom ba ma ko
no 'gro'i las byang khong du chud pa chags pa'i lam 'deni/ bzod pa bsgom pa bo zhes sasaso// legasakyi bu 'ongang zhes bya ba yang dang yang snying bor 'jugaba'itshig gi mtshan nyid bdeni
badrodapa bsgom ba ma ne no// bgro 'o zhes byang skye ba zad ba 'den bzod pa bsgom ba'o zhes smras so// bong ngo zhes byab yang dang yang g bar bajug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di
ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba rga ba zad paspangab spang ba'i phyir bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ongazhas byab yang dang yang shiba'i chu'i chu bor lhung ba'i

gnas kyi mtshan nyid bde ni/ bzedang bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro 'a zhes bya ba shiba'i chu bo las rgyal ba bden babrod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so/ rigs kyi ru 'ong ngo zhes bya ba mya ngan dang/ sngag
'don pa dang/ yid mi bde ba dung/ 'khrug par 'ajugapa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid bdenaM/ bgrod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// bgro re zhes bya bsdug bsngal dang 'khrugapa thams cad nye bar zhib
bdi ni/ bgrod pa bsgom ba'o zhes pas so// gsakyi bubong nga zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad skye ba dang rgya she dung/ 'chi 'pho skye ba dang phrad pa dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal skye
ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid bden nga brod pa bsgom pa ma yazhe no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhib 'dini/ bzod pa bsgom pa'o// rigs kyibu 'ong zhes bya ba ni
sdug bsngal thams cang skye zhing phyin ci log bzhi kun nas ldang ba'i rang bzhin no// dge ba thams cad sgom pa la gegs byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu bgro'i las bya banethams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// sdug

[4]bsngal gyi phun 'ogagi gnyen pago/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khong ngazhasazhes byaba'i tshigani nyon mongs pathams cad kun tu 'adrenapa'o// zhes smras pa yin no// 'gro 'o zhes bya banenyon mongs pa de ngag
chag gakyi rjes su 'bra' ba thams cad 'drenapamed pa'o zhes sas pa yine ne// rigs kyi bu de bsanabarjod du med pa la g.yo ba medade// brjod pa thams cad la yang chags pame dado// ye 'ches
kyi dbyangs la 'khrug pa med de// gzungab med pa dang 2 kun zhes ldang ba med pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ 'byung ba med ba dang/ 'du byed thams cad la dmigs pa'i rgyun chad pa dang/ se da ra la
rtog pa dang/ mad bar rtog pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dapa'i bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed// byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel bas 'di stan pabastan pa na/ sngon du

'grob la lag bzangs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa/ sadadza nam
mkha' khyab pa 'di la gnas pas/ mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba bu'e te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur khyodakyang chos zab mo'i tshul gyi su zhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun nas ye
tan par rol pa mngon pa shes ba chags pa med pa 'i spobs pa dang ldan ng/ gangagi phyi'i khyod kyis bdag cag la 'di 'dra ba'i tshes kyi char rab tu phab pa legs so legs so// de zhed kyi dza na/
phyogs bcunas 'dus ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen pomang po lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/
'phrang bang badzradang/ byug pas byang chub sems dpa' dagra rnam par 'grel bamatshod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dun cing brtsonano/ de'i lus la me tog dang/ 'breng ba dang/ dri dang/ byug pas gtor bas

gas kyabu yang d ltar ting nge 'dzin kyi stobs kyis/ rin po che sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te phung bo rtogs gcig tu bzhugs bcom ldan 'das kyislad du rin po che sna bdun gyi song ge'i khri 'phang du

dpag tshad stong zhang du dpag tshad bcu ba lhardzas kyi gos kyis bting ba/bstan smug pa rnam pa sna tshogs khyung ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde nga mu stegs can g zhanadaka' thub dang/ brtul zhugs dang/
sdod pa dang/ spyod lam la brtson dngabyin gyis brlabs pa ji snyed pa dang/ g.yang phyogs bcu'i stongapa dang/ rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med ngan/ mu stegs can gzhan/
dko' thub dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ spyod pa dang/ spyod lam la brtson par byin gyisabarlabs pa dkab thub ba ngan pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyisang ga'i khri yang dag pa ra mthong nga/
la la dka' thub lnga nga dganye ma dang zla ba la phyag 'tshal bar yang dag par mthong ngo/ la la chu 'dzin pa dang/ la la 'dam 'dzin pa dang/ chu dang bdama'adzin pa dang/ la lasku 'dzin pa dang/
/ ag tshom 'dzin pa dang/ sku dang agam 'dzin pa dang/ lal rkangang 'degs ba dang/ lag pa 'degs pa dang/ la la nags tshal gyi rtsa ba dang/ 'dab ma zab dang/ tshiram/
dang 'ol rus pa'i phye mas lus bskus pa dang/ mi'i mge'i 'phreng ba dang/ mgo lag ma thalan 'chang ba yang dag bar mthong ngo// la la phyugs kyi brtul zhugs can dang/ khyi'i bawug
can dang/ phag gi brtul zhugs can dang/ ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs can dang/ bya'i brtul zhugs can dang/ mi'i brtul zhugs can dang/ zla ba'i brtul zhugs can pa nga/ 2/
zhugs can dang/ chu'i brtul zhugs can dang/ 'jig pa'i brtul zhugs can dang/ dka' thub rnam pa snatshogs kyi nad pa dgas/ de lasogab bamu stegs can gzhan la dka' rdzong
brtul zhugs dang/ spyod pa dang/ spyod lam la brtson par byin gyis brlabs pa dka' thub na pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad de'i tshe sangaga'i khri yang dag par mthong ng// seng ge ga naM
stang gi bar snangal/ rin po che sna bdunagyi gdugs zheng du dbag tshad stong phrag bcu par byin gyis brlabs so// gdugs de la lha rdzas kyi ma ni po che'i rgyan sna tshogs su ngag pa la/
rgyun de do ba las logs pa'i tshig gi tha snyad sna tshogs khyung bani bde lta/ chad pa ralta ba dang/ rtag par lta bdang/ 'jigs tshogs kyi lta ba dang/ mthar 'dzin pa'i lta bdang tshul khri'i
dad brtul zhugs snyams pa'i ltab dang/ 'dod pa la bde ba skyeba'i lta ba 'byung ngo// 'thab cing gcig la gcig 'tshog pa dang/ mgo gcod pa dang mig 'byin pa'i/
lta ba nga/ dge babcu'i las kyi lam lta bsngos pas lta bar song ba drug curtsa gnyis kyi lta ba'i tshig gi tha snyad kyi dbubyung ngo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
ba tshad med grasamadab dag nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'der lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sgra de nyan to// seng ge 'i khri lasems can tshul khrims dang brtulazhugs ngan ba sna
zlo tshogs sbyorab birjes su ldan bde dgakyang lta'o// kye ma kyi hud lta ba nyon mongs pa thob pa 'di dag rtog pa lnga'i mi mjed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par mthong ba gang zhag ces de
mchog du skyo ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// bdag cag rang rang gisas rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o snyam ste/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las 'gro bar 'dod kyang/ dedag rang
tse rang gi phyogasagang du 'gro bar mi shes nas/ de dag gis byang chub sems dapa' dag rnam par 'grel ba gang na ba de logasasu thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalas 'di skad ces saso// rigs
kyi bu bdag cag nesas rgyas kyi zhing bdinas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'dod pa ni/ rigasakyibu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bad shin tu lta ba stug pos bsgribs shing dgo pa thob pas/
bdag cag kyachung bod lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyis 'khrul bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag cag myur du go bar 'dod do// ngadagacig kyang phyogs thams cad mago' bor ngar gyur nas/ sa bdag cag
rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro bami shesan/ de'i phyir rigs bu khyod bdag cag rad rang gisangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i nus ba nyams su longu'age/ de nas byang chub sems dang bdag
rnam par 'grel ngas phyogasabcu'isas rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dang kho yang dag par lhags pa de dag la smras pa rigs kyi bu rtse khyed cag theg ba chen po la yang dag pa ram zhugs sam/
smras pa'igs kyi'u bdagacagani blan mdang yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas yun ringang// rigs kyibu byang chub 'dod pa'i rnams 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su snyan

par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dang gis sems can dmyal bar skye bar la brtson pa'i gor ma chags/ dngazhin du byol song dang yi dgasang/ ga ba lngazhes ngs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ gnod sbyin dngul ngo/
dang / me dbul po dang/ gshed po dang/ debazhen du lta ba thadadad song zhing dogang redapa'i mu stegs can gzhan lasems can yongs susmin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gisader skyeb blangs

pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsal chen po zhes saso// jiltabu gnas dadang de dag tu brtson 'grus bstan pa pha rol gnon pas nye bar phyine to// sems can rnams ni mi shes ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba dang gcig tu 'grogs pa/ tshe'i dgon par yang dag par rdzogs pa zhi dbyi 'am rang du nyams pa'o// bsems can rnams ni srogs chags su gyur pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las la brtson
pabo lta ba ngan pa rdzogs pa dang/ badzeg rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa med par lta ba dang rtag pa dang/ chadang ra ltab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sems can lasnyingang rtse ba'i phyir/ bdag gi lus dang
sems kyi sdug bsngal la no/saso//sems can thams cad lo gsusminang du bya ba'i phyir sems can gcig kyang dare'aphyin pa drug la 'batumos bar nus pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamal las lam gcig

zla gis kyang bon bskyedacing 'dug pa dang/ legs par sa pa gcig gis kyang rna bar go bar nus ngas/ bsems ca' re'i byare yang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang bo bskalab byub khrag khrig brgya songamang po zhan
pa du ma sna tshogs su mngon par brtsonano// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go chaganyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gochagang gis bgos banibastabazhi 'dzin cing/ byang chub sems dbab
zhes kyang bya'i// gnyesagang zhen/ sems can gyego chadang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhige yon tanagyi go cha'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyisems can gyig cha gan gzhon/ rigs
kyi bu ga dbyang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis mos shing/ pha rol gnon bar 'gyur ba dang/ pha rol tuphyin badrug labartsonazhing las pa bsgoms ngas 'phongs pa
thams cad dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa dang/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos sbyong ba dang/ 'bags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang/ yojagasudag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thamA
cad las dkar ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed do// snying rjechen pos lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las yongasasu grol bar byed nga/ bdag gi da yod de bzhin du sems can nyon mo ngas pa'i
skyabs sung rlab par bya'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi ste/ sbyin pa dang/ ngag snyan pa dang/ don byab dang/ donamathunang sasems can magu bar bya'o// sbyin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos bos
gnas can mgu bar byed pa 'dilta ste/ sa dang skoman/mgo'i bar du byin pas/ gangasbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' den thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngos te/ pha rol tu phyin

badrug yongs su rdzogs par byed// gangasbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nemtshan ma yongs su byin pa 'din sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang de nedangos po ladamigs pa rab tu zhi ba 'di
ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'o// dngos po thams cad med pa 'din byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang dngos po yongs su btang ste/ dben par spyod pa'i phyi
'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dang brtson 'grus kyi pharel tu phyin ng bo// gangadangos bo sos su btang ste las thams cad l kun tu me skyod pa 'daang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang dngos pa yongs su sbyin pa'i phyir bdag gi yid la mi byed che sanag shingedangos po de la dben par sems pa la// rnam par smin par mi 'dod
pasalenang dang/ sbyin pa gnyis ma byung rnam par mi rtog kun nas mi ldangadangos po mda rnamadar bas 'bam dpa bde yang/ byang chubs mas dba'i rangabazhin me ba'ichos kyi bzodapa'i shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dang byang chub sems dang ba thabs la mkhas ngasadong tsagacig byin nga sakyang/ tharo' duphyin pa drug ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chung sems dbal

mtshan ma dang lhan ge bas 'di ltar slob ste/ lus med pa'i phyi'i lo sa srong chen po'i sbyin pa rnam par mi sgrub/ longs spyodachen po'i rgyur smin nga rnam par mi stong// mes srong chen po'any+dzane pa yang ga

par mi shes te/ rang bzhin gyis stobs 'dzin m 'di yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa sbyin pa byin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang/ de bzhin du ga zug
dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par nang mi 'dod pas sbyin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid la mi'ajugapa dang/ dran pa'i stobasakyi mi skyo ma 'gog pa la dmigs bsasbyin pa byin pa

'di ya nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin bab// gangasbyin nagayeng ba'i mtshan nyid dang dran pa'o yulal yang dag par rgyas pa dang/ len pa dang dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yul la mi khom pa dmig
0 shingesnyams pa med pa 'deni/ bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang yang sbyin pa de dmigs pa thams cad kun ldang ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ye shes dang/ rnam par spyod pas lam mthunang yod/
su sbas pa'i shes dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la reg pa med pa'i ye shes dang/ dma' zhing rab tu nyams pa'i lamadang/ tshig pas gdungs pa'i rnams snying rje
thams cad kyis o sa su bskyabs te zhi ba'i lam du bzhag pa dang/ dben par spyod pa la bdag bde ba skyedacinge/ theg pa chen po yojusasugazungaba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa 'dini/ byang chub semA
dnga'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang sbyin pa de las thams cad la mtshan nyid mtshungs shing yul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas stong ba'i grong bzhin du rtog pa dang/
mtshan ma thams cad blo med cing dngos po med par rtogapa dang/ 'dod chags thams cad rkyen la rag las shing bla na med pa dang/ rtog pa thams tsod lus medatsing mtshan nyid skad cig du 'jig pa dang/
gnas thams cad yodapa ma yin zhingami 'go rnamang ra mi'agro/ kun nas mi ldadaba'i mtshani dad rtog pa dini/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ng bo// gangasbyino nga debadag 'a/
sems pa med pa dang/ dben par sems pa dang/ rnam par san pa 'dod ngar sams pa dang/ len pa rnam par rtog par sems pa de 'as 'dod pa'i khamasakyi phung po la mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa dang/
sab khamasal lenang dang/ dor ba medang 'i smin pa dang/ chu dngame dang rlung dang/ nam mkha ba dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlung bdang/ rab mad pa'i sbyin
sa bdang/ nyanathog dang/ rangs nga sgyus 'dul ba'i phyir mi rtogs cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyin ba dang/ phung po dang khams lanam mkha'i kun nas ldang ba dang/ gzugs kyi rang bzhinal rnam par
mi dmigs pa dang/ rnab dang sna dang lce dang/ lus dang/ yod dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ chos larang bzhin rnam par midamigs pa'i sbyin pa dang/ dran pa'i stobs kyisnyenub dang brtson 'grus/

kyi stobs kyis rnam par ma rtog pa'i phyir mtshan margyuname bcad par sbyin pa byin pa dang/ spyanang de sgol ba rnam par mi dmigs ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir 'dus pa medaceng 'chi 'pho dang/ skyaba'i sngon nga
'dini/ byang chub samasadapa'i shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zhes pas so// gzhan yang sbyin pa de bdagami shesashing/ longs spyod thams cad gdon mi za bar 'agrub pa/ bad ba thams cad skye ba la
bzod ba 'drenang dang/ brtson 'grus kyis re/mas can la mthar thug pa med cing/ rnam par mi rtog ba dang/ mtshan ma thamasacod la blangab dang/ dor ba med pa dang/ bsam gtan la bdug pa/
med ba dang/ khams gsum l shes rab dang/ gnyis pa thams cad dang bral dedag gi thabs kyis/ byang chub samasadapa' dang rtsa gcig sprin pa byin te/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yongs
subasngos pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drugabo bde thams cad la gnas bar brgyud go/ nyan thos dang/ gsas rgyug 'dul ba'i phyir shin tu brtan par mos par 'gyur// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs

rgyusakyi theg pa la regababaskyadang ra byed do// mu stegs can bdul ba'i phyi'i bgro ba thams cad la 'jug gi lta ba la log par ni mi 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyiraspenang ba

las thams cad dang/ thams cad mkhyenang bslabapa'i dge ba bcu'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdobar byed d// bdag gir bya ba'i ltabathobang de tshul khrims lanan tan du byed cing/ dkabardungadang brtul zhugs yang
dag par sbyod par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bo dang/ byol songagi gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pabasems can yongs su smanepar bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyi'o/
dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar byed// bdag sems can dmyal bdang/ byol songagi skye gnas dang/ gshen rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyi badregs bas smagangarami bgyur ro// bdag kyang de

bzhin du snyaderje chen po ba brtson 'grusabartanupa pha rol gnon pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis derab sams bzhin du skye ba mtshungs par 'dzin te// sems can sos su smin par bya ba'i phyir// bgrodapa thams/
cad dang ldan ngar 'gyul// skadacigama'i 'du byed thams cad brtag par bya'o// yulagaces pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ngo// sems can thams cad yongs su smane par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad la brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol la gnon par bgyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byaba'i phyi'i slob dpond slob dpon ma yin ng thams cad la 'jugacing/
bsam gtan dngating nge 'dzin lasnyomasang ra zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor lam na nga rang rtson bar 'gyur ro/ mngon par 'du mi byed par brtags naas tshul thams cad kyi bdud kyi la go ba da pas bdag tu//
lta bar byed do/ sems can 'dul ba'i phyir shes rab 'byung da ra 'gyur ro// byas pa'i tshul la sod pa thams cad la'ang bdag tu lta bar byed do// sems can yongs su gAn par bya ba'i phyir/
zla 'jig rten thams cad kyi yul las shin tu 'das shing/ bsam gtan byed do// 'jig rtenathams cad kyi ul gyi lam dang la yang yang dag par mthong ngo// sems can thams cad yongs su
An par bya ba'i phyi'i/ dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su mgu bar bya ba'i phyi'i/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i sems can gyi gocha dang/
sems can yongs su sminapa'i rgyan dang/ byang nubasems dpa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can dabul po dbul ba las yongs su thar bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni sems
can yongs su sAnibar byed cing/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'dini/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ji lta burasamasangasasems can yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang/
yang nanibangaze bsan bsems can rnams zang zingagis o sa su smin par byed pa dang/ chos 'dod ba'i sems can rnams ji lta bur sems can rnams la gzugs dang mthun par ches
bstan pas/ sems can rnams yongs su mgu bar byed cing yongs su smin par byed pa 'diyAng/ bad chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa te/ reb sa kyi bu gzhan yangs mas
can es su smin pas zang zing gi sbyin pa yadabyin pa'i len pa de dag la byams pa dang mthun po sems bskyed par bya ba de nyid kyis dodag los su sman nga rabyed do// rab tu dga' ba skya ba'i blo dang
ldan pa'i sems skyo bar 'gyur bde nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do// snying rjesaci bya'o gabyed pal brtson pa dag ba'i sems skyo ba dang ldan par 'gyur// btang snyoms shing sdig pa
mi byed// dge ba'i sems bar bgyur pa de nyidakyig de dag gos su smineng 'byed do// ting nge 'dzin dngamathunang dang ldan ng sems skyo bar 'gyur ba de nyidakyisade dag yongasasu smin par byed do//

don la rten pa bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sems skyo bar 'gyur pa de nyid kyis dedag yongs su smane bar byed do// de yang sbyin pa byin pa'i len pa rnams kyis ma dang bgam pa la dang por byang chub tu sems

bskyod pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do// la la len ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodab de dag skyob skyed nga ra byed de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do// la yang yun
yid bonas byang chub semag dang 'i spyad ng khrod pa rnams laji ltar byung chub sems dpa' de dag gis nyan thos dang/ rangs sa rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod pa'i rgyun gcod cing/ bla na

ba med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa denyid kyis de dag yongasaun par byed/ bal yang phyir mi ldog pa rnams la ji lta bur skyes bu
dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod ba'i gzus zlob bas/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ ngarag medabadang ldan pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de nyid kyis
de dag yongs su smin par byed do// la la gdubyang chub sems dang ba rnams la ji ltar bya chub sems dpa' de dag gis sa sargyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams rgyun gcad cinganyon mongs pa dang/

rog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snying rje chen po skyod ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing/ rab tu ston ba da nasmona' mkhyed do// de nablan med nga adzad gad rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhengalta ba ngan
nga dog pareg pa'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do// yongs su mya nganalas 'dab bar byed/ thabs des sems can bye ba khrag khrigabargya stongamang po smanepar byed do// rigs kyabu

byang chub sams dpa'ib skya'i khung bu ji snyed pa desnyadakyi spyani pa ba dngos po rnams yang na ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'i m/ yang na nichog spyin pa'i thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed do//
bam po bzhi/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang khong gsan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed de// ga kye'u des/
gang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i mge ba de blta ba dang 2 tshig snyan pas dga' bar bya ba dang/ ngag 'jam bas slob de bo dang/ chos nyan pa'i rnams stan pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems
can yongs su spyad pas/ sduge ba las phyir ldog par byed do// lta bar songang thams cad las phyir zlog par byed do/ khrul ba bzhi'i sems can rnams bzhi la dgod ngor byed do// la'i ga nga zhe
na/ tshul khrims dang bral ba'i sems can rnams ngag snyan pa dang 'jam dos tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa dang/ sems can lta ba dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par byed/
pa dang/ sems can basam pa dngabral ba rnams bsam pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ sems can tshog dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i chog la dgo dngar byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu/
de na sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos ngos/ 'bags pa'i tshul khrims la ji ltar dgod par byed/ yang byang chub sems dpa' bden
ba tshig mirtsub pa// de'i drung du slong ba po nye bar phyin pa'i sems can de dag kyang bsams pa shin tu yongs su mgu bar byed do// dedag la mtshungs par ngag snyan pas gtam smra bar byed do/
de dag kyang 'du bar byed do// sems can gang dgu ba dacu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag khrams cad ngag snyan pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par gzhog pa'
byad/ dgod nga 'byed pa// 'dzud par byed ba/ tshul khrims ngan pa khegamag can rnams tshul khrims la yud dag par gzhog par byed/ dgod par byed ba dzud par byed do// sems can 'i lo
can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par gazhog par byed/ dgod par byed/ 'dzud par byed do samasacan badag bde bar 'dod pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag nga ragazhog/
par byed dagod par byed/ 'dzudang 'byed do// gzhan yang sems can la lo can rnams brtson 'grus rtson ba la dgod par byed do// khadzud par byed do// ma dad pa'i rnams dad pa'i brtson 'grus la
dgod bdabyed de// thos nga nyungababe rnams mang du thos pa dang/ 'chal pa'i shesa'ab can rnams shes rab phun sumatshigs ba dang mi 'grogs pa'i samasacan rnams 'grogs pa la sbyor bar byed do//
gzhan yang sems can phar mi shesashinge maramishes te/ mgus pa rnams pha ma la gus shing nd pa labastan bkur ba dang/ drangasrong 'gro bar byed/ dgod nga ra byed/ sams rtsub po rnams
byams pa la sbyor bar byed/ snying rje med pa'i sems can rnams snying rjel sbyor bar byed/ sems dma' ba can rnams dga' ba la sbyor bar byed/soms kyis chags pa rnams btang snyoms la sbyor bar byed//
sems can ngan song gsum du 'gro ba rnams tshul khrims la bkod pas/ lha'i bde ba skyob la sbyor bar byed de// 'dod pa la stod pa'i sems can gyi nangan ltar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams
bsam gtan la bkod pas/ gzugs la skyed nga 'i lha'ibasam gtanabade ba la sbyor bar byed de// sems can bsam gtan la chags nag rnams gzugs la 'jug pa snyoms par sbyor bar
pyad gzugs med pa'i khams su soms nga ra 'jug pa la mngon par chagasapa'i sems can rnams mertag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stod pa dang/ bdag med pa la sbyor bar byed
do// sems can bdag tu 'du shes pa mngon ngar chags pa rnams nye bar len pa'i phung bo 'phyong lami 'jigs shing/ dbu bdang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ mdabo dang ral gri sa 'phangs te gsod
pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i sems can rnams la ston par byed do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yodagod par byed ba nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar dud dpar khyed do// gzhan yang sems can bstan
pa ngan pa la rab tu mos shing/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par mos pa meduba'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ston par byed/ sangs rgyas lame phyadapar rab tu ni sang
la rab tu gzhag par byed/ rab tudagod par bye dang nas chos dang dge 'dun gyi bar du'o/ gang log pa la lta ba'isams na log par ston cing/ phyi rol gyi mu stegs can gyatshul khrims la yang
@#// dgang zhugs pa'i sems can de dag skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la sbra'abar byed/ dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa dang/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pa dang/ 'phags pa'i 'jig rtenang
dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byad bgod par byed de// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamana' dreg rten pa'i tshul khrims/ 'obags bzos pa la sdom pa ni 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i tshul khrims te/ musags can gazhan gyi tshulakhrims kyis ngan song gsum du bgrab 'i sems can dag/ gang gis lha dang mir skyo bathob pa 'jig rten pa'i sems can la mngon par dagong nga ra byed d
'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la'ang nged kyis de dag yongs sasu smin par byed do// sems can 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims la zhugs pa'i rnams 'phags pa'i slob nga sdom pa'i tshul khrims/ dgod

par byed de/ gangagis brag nga med pa'i 'a mgyi 'brasabu thob pa da nyid kyis/ dadag yongs su snyan par byed do// sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams gangasas rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyorab byadang de nyid

kyis de dag yang sasu smin par byang d// gangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi ul pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshul khrimU la sbyor bar byed/ dgod par byungapad nyid kyis
de dag yongs su smin par byed de// byang chub sems dapa' thabs lamakhasangasasems can nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams 'phags pa byang chub sams dpa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar
byed de// lags kyi bu de la 'phags pa byang chub sems dang/ 'i tshul khrims gang zhen sems can pha rol la gnand can gyi nangan byang chub sems dang ba sems can thams cad la gnod pa mer
par gnas pa dang/ sems can ma byan bar len pa can rnams kyin ng na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi nor la mi rku ba'i sems kyis gnas pa nas/ pha rol gyi chung ma lami g.yem pa dang/ brdzun/
ruslab la mi slu ba'i bar dub// sems can thams cad la phra ma ma zer ba nas gami rtsub pa'i bar du ste tshig bakhyal pa zer ba spangs pa dang/ gnod sems 'dod pa spangs pa dang/ chagasasems
spangs pa dang/ sems kyi rig pa sangs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi bstan pa sngangs pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi yon tan la gus par bya ba lami bzad par mos shing nyan par 'dod pa/
dang bslab pa lame bzad par gus pa dar dang/ kha na ma thob cung brad tsama'a'ajigs rar lta ba dang/ theg pa gzhan me 'dod ngas tshul khrims ma zhigapa dang/ ma rus par skya ba 28yang dag
ngar gnas ba rnams skyo bas tshul khrims mar po dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pas/ tshul khrims 'dres ma dang dang/ chos dkarapo 'phel bas mkhas pas mi sodapa dang/ dren
pas snya ba dang/ tinganga'adzin kha namatho ba med pa ngang/ dadangapo dug srungab dang/ 'dod pa dang chags sems kyi bdod pa rab tu sbyang de bas bsam pa bsngags pa'o// lha dang mi mngon par mos
@#// nga bya ba'i phyir/ rtsod pa dang 'thab mo'i 'du 'dzecan yongs su sbyangs pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do// sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ sems
[! ]can sAde rje med pa'i nangan 'dug pa la byams pa spyod la 'gyuro// sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa'i sims dang/ ngan 'grora'agro ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang/ bdag 'khrul pa phyir

byin pa dang/ gzhan 'akhrulab lani rtsod cing bdor ngadi nyid kyis dengag yongosasu sAneng ra byed d// nyonamosapa dang/ rnyog balnga'isangs rgyas kyi zhinga'adingasam can matha'amed par byed pa dang/
dam pa'i chos skyong ba dang/ ba su ba la sbyar ba bdebs pa dang le lo can dang/ midage ba'i rtsa ba dang/ lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i nang na/ byang chub sema'i dpa' dge ba'i brtson 'grus brtsamakha
[£ ]par bgyur ro// lus dang ngag dang yid o sa su sbyang ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims dang/ thos ba dang/ gtong b dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med ba'i las dang/ gzugasamedad 'ikhams kyidape'i
rtsub la brtson 'grus brtson sangar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs dang gzugasamed pa'i bungapo nyenamos pa'i bgachagasakyiltaba kun tu sbyor ba dang/ tshulachos pa dang/ kha gar gag

mtshan ma dang/ 'jig tshogs kyi mtshan ma dang/ mar 'dzin pa'i lta ba yongasasu sbyang ba dang/ rab tu spang ba'i phyir rtsol bde dang de dgage dge ba'i rtsa ba la angasems can sbyor bar byed/ dadabang byed

za pa de nyid kyis// sems can yongs su smin nga ra byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus dang tshul khrims kyi sems kyige cha la
brtson pa 'di yang 'jig rten pa'i gsAn pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po go// gang gisagocha'i thabs la mkhas pas/ nyon mongs pa dang rtog balnga'isangs rgyas kyi zhing bder byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu chen
po'i rtsal gyi sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'bo gas pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig bgrogs pa dag longs su skye par 'gyur

bo (ji ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu'i rtsal yodado// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe gzhung 'dis gang nyamongs pa dang/ ga pa lnga'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ byang chub sems dapa' tharol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyodatsang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar de ltar reg bar bya'o//byang chubs mas dpa'i

kha spu'i khung buji skadang desnyad kyi ngag snyan pa'i ba 'dangos pos/ sems can yongs su sman par byed do/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bajig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang/
sems can yongasasu smanu bdang/ don bya ba'i bsduba'i dngos po gang zhen/ rigasakyi bu nyonamos pa dang/ rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub sems dang ba brtan
dkya/ pa'i snying rjechen posacinges pa dang/ bdag gi smon lamagyi khyad par gyis cings bani/ 'di lta ste dper na/ phyugs shing la brtags pa ltar/ sdug bsngal myongabasan/
sems dang bsam pa la 'jigs pa 'am skyag pa ba ma/ yongasasub sdigs bskye bar mi 'gyur ro// de chung ngu na sams kyi skad gi ma gcig gis kyang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
snying rje chen bo 'dibasgomapa na de ltar bslab bo// da'adi snyam du sems tasamangs can 'di gang sems can bde mang tsam zhig gam/ sems can bde phyin te 'a ga tsam 'gagam/ gti mug pa tsam
mam gasnyad tsamamam/ thog mam dag pa 'di sems can zhes bya ba 'am/ yang dag pa ma yin par gti mug pa mgatogs par shin tu mngon par mi sgrub pa dang/ 'du byed statshogs kyi phyin
ci log kun nas ldang ba rnams mngon par 'du byab na/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde myongab dang/ 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos ngo gara mkhan gyisaM tshon 'dra dang/ rmi lam ltadu dang/

rangabazhin gyi smig rgyu lta bu dang/ 'khor la chags pa rnams bde bar ba dod cing mngon par 'du bya ba des/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang/ chos thams cad nam mkhArangabazhin du mi shes
pan/ kun tu sbyor bas 'khrul ba dang/ myos pa'i sdugagasabasngal sna tshogs kyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gangags 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba la 'khor lostug po lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su

00 'khor ba de dag kyang/ bdag cag gis phyin ce 'pheg bzhes ngs toji ltab ngazhin du zhi ba'i lam la dgod par bya zhing/ yang dag pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis yongs su s+senepar du ba zhig snyam pa dang/
de sa mas can rnams la tshul bzhin du rtog ste/ sems can rnams la dmigs babang med do// srog dang gso ba dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shed can dungamigs par/
med do// sems can yongs su ne par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rjechen po yang rnam par mi spong ngo// bstan pa la mos pa dang/ sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrin sa la
sbyor bar byed/thabs la mkhas pas dgong bar byed/ dgon pa dang/ nags 'dab du 'dug pa'i phyir spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs shing/ brtsona'agrus brtsams pa nye
bar lenapa'i phung po lnga la lha dang mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir/ mde la byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang yang phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsan bkur ba dang/ 'du
'dzi spang ba'i phyir/ sems can de dag gidrung du zhu bar phyin nas chos ston te/ bag la nyal ba spang ba'i phyire/ 'gro ba lngal mngon par chagasapa rjes su smon pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la/
sbyor bar byed do// nyes pa mang po'i ltab dang/ nga yange bya ba dang/ bdag gir bya ba dang rtag pa dang/ chags pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir dgon pa'i gnas dang/ sbyas pa'i yon tan bcu
gnyis la rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag gi gan du gus pa skye bar 'gyur go/ dedag la 'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims ston par byed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis
gnang ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims 'di'o// gang dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'jig par byed do// gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags
thams cad 'jig par byed d// bag la nyal ba dang/ nga yir bya ba dang/ bdag gir bya ba thams cad 'jig par byed d// myur du chos zab chogateng dung ga dka' ba'i dbodang thob bo// myur

du glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgyagasems can 'ajage rtenang 'tshul khrim can yang dang yang du sdug bsngal gyisazil gyisanon cing/ 'grobalnga'i 'kher la la yang dag
para gnas pa// nga yir bya ba dang/ bdagagir bya ba la rten pa dag byang chub kyi lamarab tu mi shes so// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rtenalas 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyis sems can
tshe rnam dgas pamed pa nigang nabadag gis gnas medasung/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zag dang/ shid las skyes pa dang/ shed can gyi gnasamed pa dang/ gzugs kyi
gnas med pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shosang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas med bdang/ sa'i khams kyi gnasamed pa dang/ chudang rlung dang mo dang/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas
za shing/ rna bdang sku'i mtshan ma lami gnas/ lcad ngaro'i mtshan ma' mi gnas/ lus dang gdu'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtshan/
ma la miganag nga yir bya ba'i rang bzhinagyis mtshan ma la me gnas / rtag pa dang chadad 'i mtshan ma la cha ga nas 'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang/ ra rdar 'dzin pa'i lta ba la mi gnas/ rtog pa
dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa dang/ rab tu rtog pa dang/ 'bar rtog pa la mi gnas/ mya ngan dang nyeba'i mya ngan dang/ rjes ma nadang/ bod pa'i mya ngan dang/ gnyis pa'i mu
nganalami gnas/ stong pa nyid dang/ smon pa med ba dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ khams gsum gyi rgyud la mi gnas mngon par du mi byed/ ma skyesem byung/ ma byas mngon pa ram byas ra la mi
gnas/ dus gsum la me gnas/ sems dang yid kyi mtshan nyid lami gnas/ nyonams pa dang/ ma par byang ba dang/ tshig pa dang/ rjes su tshigapa dang/ skad cig tu 'jig pa'in tha'i rdul
lami gnas/ man par mi shes pa dang ma thunapa lami gnas / nyan thos kyithegapa sdom pa la mi gnas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lami gnas / mtshan ma la mi gnas pa shing/ pha ro2
phyan pa drug lasems par mi gnas kyi/ sems dang yid kyi rnam porashes pa'i rnam par spyod pa nam mkha' bzhin dug nas shing la nga dag pa dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnamapar sbyong ra la mtshungs
par gnas so zhan pags su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang/ chags pa gnyis su medang rnam par dapyod nga dang/ ye shesaganyis su medang rnam par dpyod pa dang/ rnal

'byoraganyis su med pa rnamar ra dpyod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su medang rnam par dpyod pa dang/ rtog pa gnyis su med ba rnam bar dpyod pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa gnyis su medang rnam ra'
dpyod pa dang/ lam gnyis su med rnam ngor dpyod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'i 'dren pa gnyen sumed pa rnam par dpyod ga ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan ng sa/ rigs kyi

sgyu bu ches zab mo'i bzod pa thob bo// thog ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rab tu byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro// shes rab snang bas byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong bar byed// 'jig rten gyi chos kyis/
gos nga/bang med do// bdud kyi las kyis gos pa'i ng med do// bag chagasakyirjes su 'brel pa'i nyon mongs nga sa gos pa'i ng med do// phyogs bcur shes rab kyi snang bas ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes
rab kyi stobs rgyas pa sa yul thams cad yongs su shesang ra 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang/
dngos po dang/ dngos po med pa thams cad kyis nyon mas nga dang rnam par byang ba yongs su shes pa dang/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das rigar 'gro
ba'isprong yuladu 'gyur zhing/ 'khor ba'i yul du yang yang dag par mthong// dngan ba'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing/ bdu 'dzi thams cad la mno par chags par yang yang dag par mthong ng
bsam gtan gyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyurazhing/ btsunamo'i 'khor du yang yang dag par mthong// mngon par 'dumabyed ba'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing/ 'du byed thams cad kyi yul du yang yang d/ ngas
mthong ng// ma skyes pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing/ bdud bzhi'i yul gyi sladazhu la du'ang yang dag par mthong ng// 'bags pa'i skya bo'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing/ 'phags pa'i skyengs/
yul maya napar yang dag par mthong ngo// 'jig rtenagyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'das par yang 'gyur zhing/ bajig rten thams cad kyi yul gyi sdod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo/ [s]

shes kyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing/ byisapa'ilul gyisdod yul rang yang dag par mthong ngo// yang dgapa'i mtha'i shul la sa ngon sum du'agruzhing nyan thos dang rang sa rgyas kyi yul spyod pa la yang dag pa

dga' bas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad ng ngod// yul thams cad mtshan nyidamadapa'i spyod yulal shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa sgon dar byed do// spyodang dngamtshan 'idadang/ dang byang

sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gzholaba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson bas/ bdudangazhi'i yul la dbye bar 'jug pa shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cingerim gro ba'i bya ba'i phyig dras rgyas ]
kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la brtson par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstanapa 'du byed do// sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/
cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la'ang 'jug par byed do// dmigs pa thams cad kyi dge ba spyod pa lasems can yongs su smin par byed do nyon mongs pa 'iri rnam par phye mang byed do// sa pa
thamasacad rab tu dedabang byed do// ltab thams cad rnamapar 'jigs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dgod par byed do/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang/ drug pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi

(zhing na/ sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams kyenangan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad ng spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pade ltabu'idon bya ba bsdu ba'i
dngosangos/ sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed de// dgod par byed do// yon tan gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan don bya ba la sems can rnams dgod pa
byed pa 'di dgakyang/ byang nubasems dpa'i skyes bu chen po'i khur to// sems can gyi bstaba'o// sems can gyi tshog saso// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o// gang sems can shin tu dbulapa

las yongs su thar bar byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum l dgod par byed pa'o// ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi shing rnam ba'am dag par byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam bde lta bu'i rtsa la byed cing/

byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa desnyad kyi don la sems can yongs su sman dar ba gyurar// rigs kyang gzhan yang byang chung sems dpa'i donamathun nga ba sems can yongs su smin pa'i rtsal//
chen bo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang/ tsho pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub sams dpa' b.rol tu phyin ba drug la spyad pa spyod pan/ gang gi tshe bdag brtson par 'gyur
ba anganane sbyin pa'i pha rol tu na ba/ yang nane tshul khrims dang/ bzodapa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtanadang/ shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la brtson bar 'gyur ba de dang de sems can rnamA
sbyor bar byed do/ gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sprinab byin pas/ zas sam/ skomanas yan lag gi dam nga mgo'i bar du gtong bar 'gyur bde/ de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i parol tu phyin pa'i
yon tan ston de la sbyor bar byed do// gangagi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srog gcodapa sbas shing sems can rnams la snying rje ba de/ de ltar srog gcod pazlog par byed/ sems can thams cad la snying
rjeba' sbyor bar byed de/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la dgod par byed pa nas/ angadag par lta ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// rjeltar yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag brjod pa'i yon tan/

dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ nga la nyal ba spang ba'i phyir bzodang bsgom bar byed ba nas mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzodapa thob pa'i bar du/ de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed cing/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi
bzod pa'i dar du dgod par byed do// ji ltar byang chub sems dang kha ba dgo brtson 'grus brtsams nas/ sems can yongs su sAn nga ra bya ba'i phyir/ dgeba'i lus kyi las byan
gyis brlabs pa dang/ dge ba'i dmag gis 'asadang/ yid kyi las byin gyis brlabs gnas// dge ba'i rgyu 'du shes pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ snying rjechen po'i rgyur 'dus byas rnams rnam par mi
phrengs pa de lasems can rnams sbyorab r byed/ dgod par byed do/ de lta bur byang chub sems dpa 'a nyanathos dang/ radag rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir/ nyanathag dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan la bsam gtanadu byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos rang/ rang rgyal ba dang bral ba'i bsamag rtan l/
bsam gtan du byed do// byang chub sems dpab bdag med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas/ 'khyil ba dang ldog pa'i bsam nathob pa'i bar dud lasems can rnams de dang de dgagayon
tan la sbyor bar byed/ dgodang ra byed do// ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par brtsonapa/ thabs sna tshogs kyi shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do//
ji ltar bdaga mngon sum du'agyur bde ltar sems can nan+tasbyor bar byed do// ji lta bur chos thamasacad la ye shes thob cing/ pha rolam yin pa'i rkyen mngon par shes pa de ltar sems can gyi rgyu'i
phyi'i chos ba de dag 'byung ba bden/ sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te/ gang gis las kyis sa mas can rnams r ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par nus pa de'i
bar du sbyor ba'i byin gyisabarlabs pa'i phyir chagasapa yang sad do// sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba

rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar nged do// sems can ji lta bur phra ba'i tshes la ye shes mngon sumadu'abyung bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa zab mo la sbyor ra bye da do// 'as kyi
rnamar gasminapa la mkhas pa'i ya shes dang ldan pa'i dran pa rnam par mi srongab 'di yang byang chung sams dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa sar tu byed pa'i lagle mngonopar bsgrub pa'o ga nga byang chub sems
dpa'i chos dang/ soms dbang byed par rab tu shes shing/ skad cig mar 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la yang rtag pa dang/ sems can lasnying rje chen po rnam par mi slong ba 'di yang/ byang chub sam/
dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smida mngon par basbyab pa'og gang byang chub sams dpa' sems can stong nyid dang/ donadam pa stong pa nyid la grod pa thams cad kyimtshan nyid du
dmegs pa yang med cing/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smane par sbyor ba'i rgyun ma bcad pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa/
spu/ sems can so sasu sminang ra mngon rar bsgrubs pa'o// ga nga byang chub sems dang/ 'a lus dang ngag dang/ 'dakyi 'du byed bdag med pa dang ldan ngag chos ston pa la dmigs pa
med ba dang/ nyan pa dang sgradang/ dbyangs la dmags pa med pa dang/ 'as kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'a dmanges pa med pa dang/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sems can phyin
ci 'gal yang dag bar bdub med pa rnams la sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel ba ston pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su sbyang
bu mngon par bsgrub pa'o/ byang chub sems dapa' rang bzhin gyis 'du byed bar mi dmigs shing/ gtong bar yang mi dmigs pa dang/ len pa dang/ rnam par sbar ba'i 'bras bu yang m yon

sems can la sAng rjeba'i phyir/ yang sbyin pa byin bar 'gyur la sems can rnams la sbyin nga 'i babras bu rnam par smin par yang ston par byed pa dang/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyor ba'
byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sangs dang 'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can longasasu ne pa mngon par bsgrub pa'o// yang byang chub sems dang 'a ji ltar sems can gyis lus brjod pa med
pa dang/ 'gyur ba med pa dang/ mi gtsang ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur rab tu shesab dang/ sems brag cha lta bur rtag pa dang/ 'du byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhane ltar rab tu shes pa dang/ sems can

rnams la snying rjechen po rab tu sbyor ba rnam par ma song ba dang/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyi 'du byed la sbyor bar byed ba dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed pa 'di yang byang
chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smin pa mnapar bsgribs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur bdag mdacing mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshul khrims

la rtog par byed pa dang/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang radatushes ba dang/ 'di lasems canigyi btang snyoms su'ang tu sbyor ba mi 'gyurab dang/ sems can rnams la nga phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa//
na lhag pa'i tshul khrims su slob pa dang/ lhag pa'i sems dang/ lhag pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ soms can yongasasu smin pa
mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'adi ltar lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyi 'du byed skadacig tu 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du shes te/ 'dus ma byas kyi gnas dang bral bar yang dag par rjes
su mthong zhing/ sems can rnams la ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa'i rgyu dang/ 'bras bu mtshungs par ston ba de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
mkhas pas/ sems can yo gsusnyen ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dba'aji ltar yang blang bo med pa dang/ dor ba med pa'i 'du byed thams cad shes shang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu
yang rtog pa dang/ chos thams cad skya ba dang/ 'gog par dmagos pa med ba dang/ rgyudang rkyen gyi 'bras bu rnam bar snyan pa dang/ bral bar rab tu mi zhes pa dang/ sems can
rnams yongs su smineng ra byed pa dang/ sAde rje chen po 'argyun mi gcod pa dang/ ang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu slangs pa dang/ phung po yongs su shes pa dang/ ye shes mngon sum

du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ rgyu'i babras bu ston pa ra byed pa dang/ sems can le lo can rnams da na 'grus ladamigs ba'i sngagabasngal 'dzin pa la sbyor ba 'di yang byang chub sems/
dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongasasusnyan pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang bsam gtan labasaMmagatan du byed cing/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag/
par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdagamado pa dang/ myong ba med pa dang/ byas pa med pa dang/ bya ba med pa dang/ kun nas ldang ba med pa dang/ skad cig
tu zad ba med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i 'du byed rnams yang dag pa rjesasu mthong ba dang/ sems can rnamal yang phung po la rten pa'i bsam gtan tshangs par spyod pa mngon par shes pa thob ba'i
rgyu dang 'brasabu ston ba dang/ bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa spangs par byos shig ces de ltar lasazhanam enangs/ sems can rnams bsam po/tan la sbyor bar byed pa dang/ thob pa chen po thob
0par byos shig/ cesabasam gna'asems sbyor ba byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub
sems dpa' ji ltar blang med cing/ dor ba med pa dang/ chags pa dang/ khong khrobaganyisaka dang bral bas/ thams cad btang snyoms thob ba dang/ rnanatan dang/ bodag tu shas ba dngami skyeba'i
chos kyi bzodapa dang/ bsam gtan gyi dbang po la skyid kyi 'du byed rnams rtogs bar mi byed/ rnam par rtog bar mi byed pa dang/ sems can rnams la snying chen borab tu sbyor ba yongs su 'dzul
pa rab tumi spong ba dang/ shes rab bsgom pa la brtson pas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra las rab tu thar ngar ston pa dang/ sems na rnams thos pa dang/ bsam gtan la brtson zhing

tsho la kha sgomaba' sbyor bar byed pa dang/ yang byang chub sems dba' ji ltaji lta bu'i dge ba'isakyi khyadangor khong du chud bas 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ba de ltade lta bur sems can rnams
ches dengang de dag la yang dag par gzhog da ra byed/ sbyor ba byed/ dgod par byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can longs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir na

'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dba'i ba spu'i khung bu jisnyad pa de sud kyi sems can yo ngas su snyan ba don 'thun pa'ibasdu ba'i dngos po 'o// gzhan yang
[z ]@#// nyon mongs pag pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song gsum dang/ ngan song du sdod pa'i nyes pa dang/ sems can nyon mongs pa dang tshodang lta ba dang bskal pa'i rig pas byang chub
ga mas dpa' rog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'debs smon lam gyi rgyun migacod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingag yon tan gyi tshogs la mngon pa ram 'dod pas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgapar
smon lamami byed re// yang nyon mongs pa dang/ ga pa lta'isangs rgyas kyi zhing du pha rol du phyin ba drug gis byang chub kyi spyad pa sprodapan/ sems can mtshams med pa byed bdang/ dam pa'i chos
pengs pa dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ mi dgeba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'a grogasapa rnams/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi po de de dag gas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin pa skyed

par byed ng// theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do//pha rol tu phyin ba drugal dgod par byadado// de yang 'dir de tsam gyi byang chub kyi spyad pa spyodacing/ sems can yongs su smin pa skyed par byed do// 'dir yang

'dul ba 'dzin pas nas/ bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rer du'o khyang chub thob panayang sems can mtshams med par byed pa nas/ midage ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig
du 'grogs pa'i bar du yongs sun par 'gro zhing/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa// nyon mongs pa'i lta bathams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa 'di'ang rags
bu nyen mongs pa dang/ reg pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bder/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen pos yongs su smin pa'i go cha'o// gdu byang chub sems dang 'a ra las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
su dag par sems can gyi go cha rnam pa de lta bu s/ sems can yongs su smane par bya bar mi nus nga 'di yang/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang ' chen ng chade lta bu dang ldan ngo sa/ sems can
yongs su snyan pa'o// yang dag par sbyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ le'u gsum pa'o/// rigs kyi bu de la
byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ge yon tanagyi tshogs gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang/ rogasapa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ byang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' che nango snying rje chen podang ldan pa// bar 'agab je zhig du skyes pa na/ sems can mtshan s med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'bagos ba rnams la skur ba 'debs
pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams yongasasu smin par byed/ dge ba'ichos thams cad la sbyor bar byed/ nyon mongs pa dang/ ltaba'i bag chags thamasarud las
sems can yongs su smin par byed cing sems can re re'i don gyi phyir/ bskal ba'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa nas/ samasacan de 'khorab 'i 'dam las sgrol ba dang/ sangs rgyas gcig gi thang du
yul n gnas / sangs rgyas bye bakhrag khrig brgya stongagi thad kyi bar du lul lo// gang gi tsha gam tshan dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtenang ra bgyur ba de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba

byas pa dang/ rnam pa ral pa mngon pa'i ng shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi pha rol thob pas/ gos bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+ga'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro
bar nus par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 2 bsen nga khur go/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar rtogs so// dan sa

yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyis tshogs chen po yang ji 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su ma 'ong go/de na yang rigs kyi bu de'i shin tu srid pa dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur go/ rigs kyi bu de yang de ba zhin
ga 'gas nga de dag la yongs su zhus pas/ las cis na byang chub sems dpabs sa rgyus kyi zhing yongs sudag par skyo bar 'gyur ro/ sa sa rgyus la blta ba dang/ chos mnyan pa dang dge 'dun
la bsnyan bakur bas 'bral ba med par 'gyur go/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nga sa 'dres pa medang 'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'dres pa medang bo// ting nge 'dzin dang/

gzungs kyi thams cad kyis 'bral ba med par 'gyurar// nyon mongs pa dang/ yang rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi skya baji tsam pa/ ba na mdabayang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu latshang ma

rgyabo byang chub thob pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'agyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po dag la yang ngag par zhugs pas/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing dekhyab par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang/ gangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyiso/ sangs rgyas kyi zhinge pral bar 'gyura'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgags/

gas kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/ las gang dang gang spyod pa dang/ nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ba de yang rigs kyi bu de tshatshe rabs rabs su yon tan dang spyod pa'i na
tan la brtson par bgyur banas/ der skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o// yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogasapa nga/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tanagyi tshogs rgya chen po thams cad kyis//

sangs rgyas kyi zharedu khyab par 'gyur ro// gang na rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de/ nyan so da'angs rgyas kyi theg ba pas rnam par sangs te/ byang
chub sems dang ba sems dapa' chen po dag pa rnams la theg pachen po dag pa'i gtam sna u0fb1bar byed kyi/ nyan thos dngasangs rgyas kyigatamanI ma yin no/// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dang
yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tanamang po dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa la'ajug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston nga ra byed do//
gang dag la chos ston pa de dag thamasacad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar bya ba'i phyi'i ston kyi yongs su ma dag par ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
par bya ba'i re/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi sbyadar bsngags par byed kyi 2 yongs su ma dag pa ni bsngags par mi byed do// sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas
dge ba'i bshes gnyenade dgadang 'grogs shang/ sten pa dang/ ston pa la dgod pa dang/ yon sbyong babasngags par byed kyi yongs su ma dag par ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis snon gang lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su dgapar thog mar sa bon du/dan/ blanamed/ a ngag bang rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyang// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgapa tshad med grangs mad par da lta
gyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thegapa chen po dag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtams ba'i de bzhin gshegs/
pa de dag thams cad kyisasdomanyonamos ba dang/ rtog pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdir/ thog mar sa bonabaskyed nas/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bstodado// 'di yang sdon

dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtenang da gyur to// mngond ngashes pa ba/nga gisasas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas/ ga sa rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'grob 'a mngon pa ngashes pa thob pa'i 'agyur to// gang na sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshad bzung ba dang/ brtags pa der phyin chad kyang skya bar sonalam byas pas/ der bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgyago// yang

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag bar phyes bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad kyis/ ga pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par

thams cad kyi thogamar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// gang gi tshe sems skyed bas mngon par shes pa khro ba ni ngang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su

dgangang bla na med da yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag da ltar chos kyi sgra sna
tshogs kyis/ nyon mongs pa sAtshogs dang bral zhing chos zab mo tshulal 'jug pa'i ang shes la mkhas pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ gang yang chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob pa// dga' ba

dang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// gong yang da ltar khyad cagasas rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su dag pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhangami mjed kyi regang lta'i sangs rgyas kyizhing/
'dir mngon par lhags par khyed cag thams cad kyis sngon thams cad kyi thog mar nyon mongs pa dang/ rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas//
glanamed pa yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems baspyodado// thams cad kyi thogamar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par byas ba de la yang/ mngon par shes pa gang gis phyis phyogasabcu'i sang
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgapa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to// gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhingag yon tan gyi tshogs kun tu shes shing rtogs pader/ phyis skye ba mngon par
shigang 'i smon lam byas pas de dag de nyid kyi nan tanagyis zhugs pas/ bsam pa je snyad pa yongs su rdzogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der skyes ba rnams sangs rgyas/
gzhan 'phel ba'i phyir yang gang lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi 'dre yongs sumadag ba 'di nimi 'dod d// nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa dang/ lta bdog par thob pa 'dedang snod cing/ 'di la sIb
rje chen po ma dpade dag byang chub sems dapa' zhes bya'i/ sems dpu chen po zhes mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltas dperan gtanga mkhan mkhas pa la la mchog tu dre mi zhim
pa dang ldan pa'inagyi yo byad kyis/ mi zhar dang longab rnams kyimig gind cung zad tsam rab tu zhi bar byadad// zhi bar shi gnas / de dag gcig la gcig snus pa bdag cag gis gzugs/
kyisnang ba la blta bar ba tsalasku/ bdag ga sgron mar gyur pa'i snyan pa'i khyim 'dinas byang la 'gro bar bya'osAm nas/ phyir 'ong ba yang madang mang po de dag kyang smin pa'i khyim de las 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// ji lta bur nad 'dirab tu zhi ba medade de dag migagi nad yunarang por gnas pa po ltas nas yang 'ong ngo// dadag kyang sman ba'i khyim der gnas par 'gyur ro// dedag yunaring bsakyang nd
thams cad grolabara'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhinadu gabyang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang/ rogab lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gangal bdod chags dang zhe snangadang/ gtamug dang
ngargyal dang/ rgyags ba dang/ lta ba ngan pas rtag tugatso ba'i sems can de la/ la la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ji ltar yon tan khong du chud pa de lta//
rtogang lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing las 'byol bar 'dod do// gang yang de las 'das shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yas su dag pa rnam bar spyod pa de nyen mongs pa dang/ gang lnga'isangs rgyas kyi zhing
du gdon mi za bar 'gro bar 'dod de// de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa// rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lasangashin tu 'das pas/ kun ring po sdug bsngal 'dod pa'i
'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dedag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mdag pa ra/ bla namadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ba 'di yang/ byang chub sems dapa' rnams kyi
@#// sangs rgyas kyi zhingagi yon tan gyi tshogs yongasasu dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhen/ nyon mongs pa dang rogapalnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snga dro'i
dus gcig gis kyang/ tshulakhramesabasrungasaso// tshul khrims bsgoms so// sbyin pa byin no// bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do// brtson 'grus btsums so// bzodapa bsgomasaso//
shes rab kyi yon tan brtsamasas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bstsal pa brgya stong du'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtsonapas spyad ba spyod pa yaram yin no// rigasakyi bu de

ci'i phying zhen/ gang yang nyon mongs pa dang/ ga ba lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa bon bskyadad// yang reg pa lnga'i sangs
rgyu da kyi zhing der 'gro zhing 'dir de tsam gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtsonapar gnas so// gangad lta bu'i ya shes snang ba thob
pa de thams cad yul ba rnam par dpyod ba'i yashes g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las 'phags par gyur to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing lta ba snangabar 'gyur ro//
