sems can gyi spyod pa brjod du med pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can lus ma rung ba dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lhan cig tu bgrogs pa rnams la yongs
su gtong ba yang meng/ se mas can lus nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams ci 'dra bar mthong la sems kyind ce pan du rab tu bar bya ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i sems kyi sman gyi yo byad rab tu ston bar byed/
de gangagi nyonamos pas sems can ngan du spyod pa dang ldan par ma thong ba'i nyon mos pa dedag bdag gse sngangs te/ sems can de la sI dza chen po bskyadago/ yon mas nga de ga rang ba'i phyi'i
brtson ngag/ sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa las yongs su thar bar bya zhes 'dod chags spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa la rab tu sbyor pa rang du zhi bar byed de/ zhe

sdang spyod nga rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ gti mugaspyod pa rnams rten cing 'brel bar spyod pa dang/ skal ba dang bcas par sprod pa rnams dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran par ba tu sbyor ba dang/

'dod chags la zhi'i sdodapa rnams byamasapa dang/ mi dge bar robatu sbyor ba dang/ zhe sdang snal khang dang rnams mi mdzes nga dang byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ ba gti mug stsalazhir spyod pa rnamA

mi mdzes pa dang rtenango'abrelabararab tu sbyor ba dang lta ba ngan pa thob pa rnams stong ba nyid rab tu thob pa dang/ rkyen stobs can rnams la rjes su srung ba dang ldan par rab tu sbyor ba dang [0f38 ]ba btugazung du
med cing/ dngos po me dpa dang/ sgrog pa med par shesapa rnams zab mo rnam bar zhi bar rab tu sbyor ba dang/ spresapar shes pa rnams lhag mthong spros pa'i gtam rab tu sbyong la zhibang byed de/
kru/ nges par 'dod ng rnams rags kyi smab dang/ tshig zad pa rnams bsdub rab tu sbyor zhing/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du 'ang tu sbyor ba dang lhag mthenga' gas pa can rnams rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched rab tu sbyor ba dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams cud bdamadapa'i skye mched rab tu sbyor ba dang/ cungabad med ba'i skye mched la gus pa can rnams mtshan
sa med par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ smon lam la gus pa can rnams smonapa medabar sa bar tu sbyor ba dang/ tshul khrims la gus ngad can rnams na song gsum las yongs su thar bar rab tu sbyor ba dang 3

tsho thos pa' ngargyal can rnams srid pa thams cad 'byung ba med dang rab tu sbyor ba dang/ dgon pa la nga rgyal mngon par brtson ba rnams dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dargyal mngon par brtson ra rnams

tshad med par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ phung po la rtag par 'du shes pa rnams 'byung ba dang/ budang la rab tu sbyong ba dang/ khams la bdag gir bya ba longs su spangs pa rnams smig rgyugarab tu sbyor ba dang/
sku mched yongs su sangs pa rnams lbu ba'i phung por rab tu sbyor ba dang/ 'dod ng/ ba khams yongs su spangs pa rnams chu shing gisnying bo med par rab tu sbyorab dang/ gzugs kyi khams yongs su
sangs pa rnams 'du byed mi rtag par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sangs ba rnams 'du byed thams cad tsug pa'i datu sbyor ba dang/ bsam gtan la dga' ba dang/ bde ba yongs
susbyongs pa rnams chos thams cad bdag med par rab tu sbyor bdang/ 'khor ba'isdugabastsal 'dod pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba zhibararab tu sbyor ba dang/ gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su du ngas
pa rnams dge ba bcu'i lasakyi lam rab tu sbyor bas ltab de dag rab tu zhib byang de/ yid du 'ong bskyogongasasu spangs ba rnams me mdzes par rang tu sbyor bdang/ gzugs la chags pa yongs

su spangs ba rnams ro sngon pa'o rab tu sbyor bdang/ sgra la chags pa longasasu spangs pa rnams brag char 'byung ba dang/ zad pa rab tu sbyor ba dang/ dri la chagasapa yongs su sbas pa rnams rlung du ga
bar rab tu sbyor ba dang/ ro la chags pa yongs su sbas pa rnams mi mdzesab snatshogs rab tu sbyor ba dang/ reg ba la chags pa yongs su snga sa ba rnams mi gtsangang beyan lagsum tshu rtsa drug

rab tu sbyor ba dang/ snying rje med pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ gtong ba med pa rnams sbyin pa chen po lnga rab tu sbyor ba dang/ gti mugagis bsgribs pa rnams kha don rab tu sbyor ba dang
'dul ba rnams 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'du ba rnams rim gyis sems gcig tu 'dus par rab tu sbyor ba dang/ 'du byed thamAcad kyis mngon
par spros pa rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sbyor ngas nyonamos pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// bam polnga pa// gzhan yang sams na lha dang ma'i skye/
bar bsam pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i las yongs sudag par sbyor bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg par bsam rnams la/ 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi dang ldan bar de la
byed pa sbyorab r byed do// rangasas rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la/ rten cing 'brel bar smra ba yid la byed pa sbyorab r byed d// sems can theg pa chen ngo la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la
pha ro'o tu phyin pa drug sbyorab r byed do// thog marasamasabaskyed pa rnams la lhag pa'i bsam ba phyir mi ldogang ba sems sbyor bar byed// sems can pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la yang dag par

zhugs pa rnams snying rdzachanango la yongs su me skyobs/ sems can rnams yongs susnyanepar bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed do/u0f38/ byang chub sam sa dang ba phyir mi ldog pa rnams la/ de'i 'og tu sangs/

rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag pa sbyor bar nged do// ji ltabur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan gyi tshogs yo ngas su dag/

ba sbyor bar byed de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsa'o// ji lta burasangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gitshogs mngon par 'dod ba/

dedag de'i 'ogatu mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse bde la skye bar 'dod pa ji snyadapa dar skyab// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa rnam par mi spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs

0 yongs su dag pa bdod pa yang med pa der skye bar 'dod pa de ji tsam pa dar skyabo// yang nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi ded pa de la/ blan med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon nga grwa
'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o// gang lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dusems can lta ba dog pa'i dapa dang/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la sbyarang 'debs pa dang/

medage ba'i rtsa ba dang lcan cig tu bgrogs pa'i rnams rgyun gcod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rasamasacan bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing/ byang chub sems/
dpa' sas rgyas kyi chos tshad med grangs med pa rnams la 'jug pa'i yeshes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do// yang byang chub sems dang 'a rag pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'de/ rnam pa de lta burtsal byed kyang/ gang byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rnam bde ltabu'i rtsa la byed mi nus so// yang rog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di

galate byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa stong phrag nye shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs rab tu sbyor ba stong phraganye shu rtsa gcig gis/ 'gong chags rab tu 'bang

byed pa dang/ gal te sems can gacig gi zhe sdang spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi zhe sdang zhibar byed pa dang/ gal te byang chung
sems dang bsems can gcig gi skal ba dang bcas par dang stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ thabs lam lag pa stong phrag nyeshu rtsa gcig gis

zhibar byed pa dang/ byang chub samasadang kha gang gis sems can pagacig gi skal ba dang bcas par srodapa nyonams bkun nas ldang bar tu zhi bar nus ba de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a rtsal chen po byed do//
gang sems can gag gi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhirang lu shes pa'i byang chub sems dang kha de yang/ sems can gcig gi dgos pas/ brtson 'grus brtan ba la mos
gango ba ko gnon pa la/ thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag brgyad curtsa ba zhi rab tu sbyor ba dang pha rol gnon pas gakhrir ba rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal chen po 'di la ltas shage/ ji ltar sem
can gacig gi nyon mongs pa 'du tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar/ gnyis dang/ gsumedang/ bzhi nas gleng gcig gi sems can yongs su tshas pa'i re khi dgos pas nyon mongs pa'i srid pa'i mtshan nyid

pa/ stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed cing/ glang gnyis pa dang/ gling bzhi pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyus kyi zhing chu bo gang+ga'i bye ma snyedadu semAtsan poAcad nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs

su thar par byed pa de ltar/ byang chub sems dang 'a rog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyizhing du bgrod pa thob ba zhes bya'o// ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems na re re'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang po spyod

pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhiso 'jug bde ltar sems can gcig gis mos ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhirang du shes shing/ bri ba'i mtshan nyidarab tu shes pa dang/ 'phel ba'i mtshan nyid rab tusha
pa dang gnas pa'i mtshan nye de rab tu shasab dang/ rtogs pa'i mtshan nyiderd tu shes pa dang/ mi rtag pa'i mtshan 'di rab tu shes pa dang/ phyug pasngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa
dang [0f10 ]bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang/ sems can gyi mtshan nyid rab tungashes pa dang/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa nas/
de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du bdatu shes pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes pa dang/ sems can ra'i chags pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs brgyad cu rtsa bzhirab tu
shog pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par shes par 'gyur do/ bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems can nyon mongs pa dam po sa bcings pa las
yongs su thar par nusaso// de bzhin dubyang chub sems dpab nyon mongs pa dang/ rog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can yongs su smin par byed do// byang chub sems dang bsems
nami dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu bgrogasapa rnams la snying rje chen po rgyun mi gcod cing/ yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir 'dug ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal chen po'i// yang
byang chub sems dang/ 'a dag rnam par 'grel bas 'di bstan pa ston pan/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhinge tshad medang nas/ byang chub sam dang/ 'a yang dag par lhag pa dang/ byang chub

sems dang ba chu bo ga sumacu'e byamasnyedami ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur te// byang chub sems dba'achu bo gang+ga'i bye ma snyad kyis dga' bar byed pa zhes byaba'itingeng 'dzin thob pa de dag/ de bzhinagasheg

pa shAkya thub pa ganganang da logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas mgrin gcig tu 'demed du brjod ng/ ched du brjod do// chu bo gang rnams blta dga' chu bos khyer// nga rgyab mngon nga khengargyal yul 'ashes// nyon

lce mosargya mtsho las ni mthar phyin med// lam gyi bdag cag kyang ne rnam par gnas// sems can gang rnams nyon mongs gdum pas gdungs// nyonamasas pas rgyas zhangedu rtaganamu myos// ngan song 'go brtag dusdug/
bsngal basags// 'chad mkhanadam pa'idonagyi thig pa ston// bdagacaganyonamongasasems can rnams dgos pas// sangs rgyas zhidar smon lam byed bgyurang// nyon mongs zhingadu bdag cag srid pa spyod/ goms

[$ ]con nyon mongs dam bcades grol bar byed// gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang dra rgya'adrogs/ gti mug lamastor sdig pa rab byed ba// sdig bathams cad las ni bdag cagazlog/ 'khor ba'i dgon pa 'jigs las rab tu sgrol//

gangadmyal ba byol song yi dgas 'jig rtenadu// rtag tu bdod medasdug bsngal myong ba dag/ bdagacag sdug bsngal thams cad las sgrol byed// nyon mongs sasargyas zhing du byang chub sbyong// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus

bar khyab pa'i 'khor thamasacadudang ldan pa des kyang legs so// zhe byab byin te/ skyes bu dmapa legs par slebs shing mchog tu rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus rtan pa la brtson pa// pha rol gnon pa/ sems can yongs su/

sminapa'i chos kyisgobastan pa legs so la gsaso// ganganu bo gang+ga'i bye ma snyed kyi byas dudam pa 'dis// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya nus kyi spyod pa bor te/ rob pa lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyod pa la brtson

no/ sems can mtshams med par byed de dang/ dam pa'i chos snang ba dang/ 'bags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ malus tshig pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsib dang lhan tsagi 'grogs pa rnams yongs susmin bar bya ba'i

snying rje chen po bskyed do// nyonamajab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zheng bun med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston to// lus med pa phung po phreng ba'i mtha' ston to// tshig tsam gyis sa bu de dgabartson par bgyur ba de dag la//

gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog durgya chen pa byed na/ dedag gi brtan pa'i dartson 'grus b.rolaganon pa 'dil brtson pa ltacisnyes te/ ji ltar tshig gsedam bcas pa de ltar/ dgos nga thamA
cad yolasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// danas de nyid kyi tshon/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'ag so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// rigs
kyi bu ji ltar snaba'i tshig tsam gyis rtson par 'gyurab de de bzhinate/ de dag la gang lhadang 'jigarten du bcas pa ramachod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na/ de'i shes ngasanyon mongs pa dang/ dog
pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam pa de ltabud dag gi rtsal chen po bya bar 'gyur ba ltacis te/ mtshams med par byed ngs/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu bgrogs pa'i bar/
du rnam pa de lta bu'i brtan pa'i brtsonabagrus pha rolaganonapa'i thabs lamakhasapas yosasusmin par 'gyur ro// ji ltar byang chub samasadapa'i dag rnam par bagrel bas/ daltar sems can yongs
su sminang// shes rab kyi thabs lamakhas pas chos kyi slobastan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di brjod m thagatu/ de nas de nyidakyi tshan/ stong gsum gyi stong chen posang

lha rgyas kyi zhing ga sa chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos/// lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char a nga rab duphab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo aparab tudakrol to// ltudang debradang/ miba 'khorathamasacud dang ldan ba de dag

kyang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel ba dang/ byang chub sems dba' chu bo gang+ga'i byamasnyad dod dag la mchog tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson no// ji snyed sengashes madzrang 'di
bstan du gsol// ye shes phyir yang ston pa 'di nyid ston// mkhyen pa'i khyad kyis gang gi slob ston pa// thub shes ba yiskya ba 'di la 'jug/ mkhyen pa can gyis zhingamangs bya ba la// thob pa ya
kas ston ba 'di la 'jug/ bdag ni yod shes 'brog sa myur gnas shing// tshul 'di la yang ye shes lam yang ston// ji ltar byang chub sbyang phyi'i shes 'gyur ba// rgyal ba ye shes rgyal mtshan
'di la 'jug/ ji ltar nam mkha'adri medastong pa'i chos// bdag dang 'thunanga'i gtam dag bstan du gsol// ston mkhan mi yi gtsob 'di la mchog/ mchog tu yid du 'ong zhing mdzes ba ston//
ston pa nyid kyis nyon mongs dgra zil mnan// rtag pa dang chad pa thal bar byas// dang ba dang rtul phodagangabrag dam pa mchog/ sred nga zhi bgang zag dam pa mchog/ srid pa zhizhing zhi gnas rab tu
ston rgyal ba rang du zhib 'di la 'jug rgyal bstong ba nyid zhe rab bstan gsol// rgyal pa stongang nyid bde la yang 'jug/ kha dog dung dang khab badrab ya/ zhib mdzes pa'i stong pa nyid bstanagasol/
nyan thos kyisani 'di la tshogs rnams sbyangs// ston kyi nyi ma zlaba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// gtsobo dag gis shin tu gsal zhing mdzas// 'dir ne lam zhi stong banyid bstan gsol// brgya byin tshangs pa

nyide ltar sgradabyangs snyan// sems can dma' la thugs brtse thugs rjes is// thub pa bden stong pa nyid la 'jug/ mya ngan dang bral 'gro ba 'di latshem// dma' ba spyod pa rtag tu byin rlabs pa// shes/
rab mang gzages stong pa nyid zhi gsungs// sdig pa bcom zhing nyes tshog sadri ma med// 'dir ni 'gro la thegang ngan pa spangs// dge ba'i mtshan nyid byed yularab nyams pas/ kye'a'o da ltar stong ba
nyid zhi gsungs// rma bya dang pan tshoskag ga dbyas// nyams pa'i phyogs ma can gyis dgra rnams 'jig/ tshigs subacad pa 'di dag gis mngon par baston gnas / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang/
pad+modang/ ku mud dang/ nganArIkasa mngon ng ragatodo// 'bags ba yang dag par spong ba'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gsa'adul ba'i bzodapa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo le'u/
bzhi pa'o/// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a blo gros mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyirgyal pos bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du khangapa brtsa gas pan mibazhugs pade tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das

kyidanagyi sadadu/ lcardzas kyi gsadang/ lha rdzas kyi bezlumasngonapa'i skas mngon par sal te/ skasade dgagings gnyis la bram ze'i byis pa tshe le sumacu pa lta bu tshangs dbyangs dang ldan pa gsar gyi dbyig
pa dang/ gdugasa' dzin pa tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa steng phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mnong la stsal to// de nas bram ze'i byas pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyarato
( phyag 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad ng 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod ni reb nyon mongs la sngon thugs bskyed// nyon mongs thagang byang chub phan pa'i rgyu//
nyon mongs zhing phyi rgyal ba bsunakyang bkur// nyon mongs thabs mdzad rgyal ba 'dir shags gsol// nyonamos spyod pa thams cad khyodakyis sbyangs// sems can nyon mongs la ni rtag tu gnyan
khyodani nyon mos lam las 'grob zlog/ nyon mosargal ba'i rgyusane rtagatumos// nyanamasamarusakhyod kyis rab tu zhi// bdag gi blosani nyon mongasadrab bcad// 'gro brtag tu nyon mongs chu las
sgrol/ nyon mongs kun banargyal ba bder gshegs gsol// nyonams zhing du byang chub dam pa'i ga/ shes sgron 'chang bgro ba shes nyams pa'i// sems can thams cad la ni tharaston pa// nyon mongs
snyan smongs zhe phyir 'dir gshog gsugasol// ashes 'od zer gyisani rnam thar bstan// khyod thugs brtse bas 'gro ba shes nyams khyab// ye shes kyisan bgro la mchog ldan bs// rgyal ba ye shes nyem 'deg
gshegs gsol// mkhyen pas lha dang memang thar par mdzad// khyod kyis ye shes srog dngagang zag med// thub pa ye shes dpa' ba 'de la 'jug nyon mongs nga la sbyin mdzad dran pa gsungs//
nyim sgrub mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan// rgyal bsems can thal mo sbyar la gsungs// thub ba byang chub mchog phyir bstan du gsol// 'phags pa thub pa 'di la 'jug pa gsungs// rgyal babyang chud rgyu/
can madzas gzigs la// phyogs bzhibader ni yang dag lhags mang la// stong pa nyid dang ba khrodo sad shes 'gyur gsungs/ rgyal po dpa' stong bde 'ashin tu 'dug/ bram dre'i byis pa de dag
gse bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan bde sas ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de nas drang srong thub pa gdan de las bzhengs pa dang/ 'di khyed kyi chen/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos so// lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dumasakyang/ me mdzad kyis/
[j ]/ rgyas kyizhing ma lus pa lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngan par phab bo/ lhardzas kyi a ga ru dang/ ta ga ra dang/ dus dang 'thun pa btsan dan gyi char mngon par 'bab go/ lhardzas

kyi gos dang rgyan dang/ yade bzhen gyis gos dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig gi semod dang/ rinapo cho cha mngon bar phab bo// lhardzas kyi rol mo brdung ba man ngaradakrol to// dbyangs kyis lhung lhung ldeg kyi
sgra phyung nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag ston m bstan pa'i chos mnyan par bgyi'o// bdudakyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// nyon mos pa'i tshul gzhom par

bgyi'o// e shes kyi yul khengadu chud nga ra bgyi'o// zab mo steng banyidakyi lam khong du chud pa/ra bgyi'o// zhes gsol pa dang de nas bcom ldan 'das khadang brtse sogs pa de dag la 'dzegs te sangare 'i khri

bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs nas/ mi mjed kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan ba/ sa dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor kun cangamasla bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar tesems rtse gcig tu drang srong thub pa la la/
par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ldanupa ma lus par/ sa dang nam mkha'akhyab pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzagesanas/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad ng bdedag
gsungs so// sems can jesnyada'adir ni kun lhags pa// byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su chos tshol na// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa rab bstan gyis// de dag thams cad rtse gcig sems su nyon// sems

0can la la btedug srid pas bsgrengs// phung bo dag la 'ang lta ba rnam kyi myong/ gang dag da dung byang chub mchog skyed brtson// yang yang 'di la yon tan cung zad spyod// dbang po drug la stong pa mi lta ste// mtshan

med pa'i 'dzin pa bdag la zung// byang chub phyir ni chung zad nga rtson spyod kyi/ shes rab yon tan thams cad spyod pa med// jiltar m 'dod la la khyim gyenang// btsal bas kyang n medagared ma gyur// de lta

sems can la la byang chub 'dod// stong pa nyed mabasgoms pa/ngashesathabamed// de ngas gang dag byang chub sduga'adodapa// phung po khams dang skye mched mtshan madag/ rmi lamagargyu lta bu thams cad ltos
bdi ni byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong labaka' stsalapa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog
gis 'dul ba'i bgrod pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dba'abadudakyi yul thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das te/ nga yir byab dang/ bdag gir bya ba thams cad kyi sridapa'i bag la nyal ba dang/
mtshan ma med pa dang/ mareg pa lta bathamasacad sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dres pamed pa dang/ sems can gyi go cha dang/ sams sgyu ma lta bu dang/ tsher bdu ba dang/
rdul dang/ nam mkha'adang/ sngonalta bur radatu shosaso// mtshan me dang/ mtshan nyid thams cad nam mkha'i spros pa lta burarab shes// dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacod las 'das bar 'gyur ro
las yongs su zad desems can nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ ma skyod pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ston/

par 'gyur go/pha rol gyi sgo'ab thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par thul ba me dar ra 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa song ge ltabu dang/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i ches chen po'i char
gyi chu bo rab tu bgatong ba dang/ 'khrul ba med pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang/ bstod pa dang rang dubasngags par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'dabasgoms pa nas/
lus dang/da dung tshugs pa'i bar du 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// ngags kyi bu da la bde ba 'di rnam pa gnyis te/ gang dag bar sdod pa'i tshul gyi bzod

ba dang/ nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de la yang dag par sbyong ba'i tshul gyi ba khrod pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa lnga ste/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par sprodapa 'i tshul gyi bzod pa
rnam pa lnga gang zhen 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes byago/ rigs kyi bu de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa
brgyadade/ byang chub sems dang sa tshulang na yid la byed pa/ brtags pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o// gzugs zhes

bya ba ni nadade// 'dod chags zhes bya ban rnam par 'jigs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do// gang rnam par 'jig pa'i rang bzhin donami rtagapa'o// de'i ranga bzhi nen dngos pamed pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su chad pa'o//

phyi dang nangagi rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyunabacad pa'o// nam mkha'aji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ mi rtag padad/ sdugabasngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid nga
ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byadad// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smanang nyebar 'tsho ba'i thod par bltader byab// rigs kyi bugazhanayang gzugasad yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi//
rigs kyi bu 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag nangag bam/ gyi bgyi bam/ chab bam/ phra ba 'am/ dma'ab bam/ bdeb bam/ gal te ring ba 'am/ gal te nya ba de dag thams cad mi 'gro rnam da bar

bgromi skyomi 'byung/ bdag med bdag gi med pa brtagapar bya'o// zad pa'i tshuladang/ zhi gnasakyimtshan nyidakyitshul dang/ rtog pa med ba dang/ smon pa med pa'i tshul dang 'byungab medacingamtshan ma

med pa'i tshul gyis brtag par bya'o// ji ltar rdul shin tu phra bkum 'byungab dang/ lus kun 'byung ba'i phyir 2 nangagisa'i khams sra bar brtag par bya'o// shin tu phra ba'i rdul gcig pod 'oji ltar lcaga mthong thucho ga

brtag/ rdul phramagacig po de la ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi srid lam du gyur par rab tu shes/ bdag med pa dang/ rnam pa dang bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po med pa dang/ tshe ge kha
dang bral ba dang/ dmigs pa med nga dang/ sgradabyas thams cad dang bral bar ra da tu shes/ bdag med pa dang bral ba dang/ bdudakyemtshan nyid rab tu shes/ yi ge med ba dang/ rgyu dang/

rkyen dang bral bar rang dushes/ dngos po med pa/ rgyudang rkyen dang srolang ra rab tu shes/ mtshan ma med pa lasardul shin tu phrab rarab du shes/ ji ltar 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhe ba la rnam pa brgyad ngo/
de dag gis/ rdul shin tu phra mo gcig dubartag go/ de bzhin duganyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum nas/ nang gi lus thams cad kyi bar du gcig la ya nga so sor rnam pa brgyad po dadag gis/ rdul shin

tubramogacig tu brtag go/ nang gsalus ji lta ba de bzhin du/ phyi rol gyi lus kyi sa'i khams kyang rnam pa brgyud po 'di dag gis/ sosongajulangashin tu phra bar ng rtagago/ mtshan nyidamed pa nasamtshan ma med
ba'i bar du sa'i khams thams cad nang gi bas/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ chab 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dmab ba bam/ bad ba'am/ gangar nge ba 'am/ gang 'badudag thams cad rbadang 'i chos su yang

dag par rdzasasu mthong ngo// gang zagapa 'dinami brtagapa'o// gang mi rtag pa 'di yang sngagabasngal ba'o// gangami 'byung ba de bdag med pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de angasAngapa sta/

ji ltar phyi dang nang gisa'i khamasaji lta ba bzhin du stongangar rab du shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang than 'anyon mongs pa ltabar zhibar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' ji ltar 'du shesamed cing/ tshar ba mdang de bzhinadu/

sa'i khams kyang 'du shes medacing/ tshor ba med pa dang/ mi rtag dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bgrodang sgom par byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub samang/

dpa'i sems can thams cad yongs su snyaned nyeb/ tshoba'i bzod pa lta bar bya'o// gigs kyi bugazhanas lus 'di 'akashor ba'i mtshan nyid nenu sko/ chu'imtshan nyid phran tshog sasun skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam
du nang gi lus chu'i khams thams ca sor thiges patsa du lhagagong gi tshul gyis brtag go/ chab 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba'am/ bde ba'i mtshan nyed med pa// nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i

lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas mtshan mchedapa'i bar dud dag thigs datsam du 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pajit+taMburathagus pa gcig la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gisaji lta ba bzhin du

brtag go/ de bzhin duganyisapa dang/ de bzhin du gsum panas/ nang gi lus kyi chu'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po dedag gis soso re re la thagos pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du ba rtag go/ ma na nyid
med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar dunang gi'ikhamasaji ltang bzhinedu/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams che ba'am/ phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba bon/ gangaring ba'am/ gang nyebade dag thamasanang

zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo// gang 'dapa'i chos de yang mi rtag pa'o// de yang rtog pa med pa'o//gangartog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba me dang de'ang bdag med pa'o//
gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral bde yang stong pa ste// ji ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang/ tha ma'i nyin
mongs pa zhe bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i ji ltar gnas mad cing nges pa med pa de bzhin du/ phyi dang nang gichu'i khams kyang spros pa med cing/ gnas mdo ba dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/

stong pa dang/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang/ byang chu sems dang ba sems can yongs su snyan ngag nye bar 'tsho ba ste/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams ji lta/

ba de bzhin du/ ma'i khams dang// rlung gi khams rgya chen bos byas so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni thatshom gyi rgyu lta bu ste/ nang ga 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ che ba 'am/
phru ba bam/ dma'ang 'am 2 bdeba'am// gungaring ba 'am/ gang nyebade dag thams cad dngos po med cing/ gzugs brnyan lta bu dang/ drug gi skya mchod dbang du rgyur nga/ sa'i khams dang/ rnam pa

shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o// gang skad cigaskad cig tu 'byung ba zad pa'i chos nyid dbang po dalazagapa dang/ 'gog pa deni'abyung ba zad nyid du brtagage/ dngos po med pa dang/ bdagamed par dmigs patshig

ga lam med pa dang/ rnam par mi 'aglobadang/ ma skyes pa dang/ mkhyungab dang/ bdag med ba bdag gi med pa dang/ zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang/ rtog ba med cing smon pa med pa'i tshul dang/ mtshan ma

med pa'i tshul dang/ lhag mthongogi tshul gyis partag par bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ rnam pa dang bral ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ yid kyi 'du byed dang/

bral ba dang/ yig med pa dang/ rgyu dang rkyenadang bralabarar datu shasaso// dngosang med pa shin du skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu shes so// 'du byed thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang/ tshulargyun 'chad
pa med par rab tu shesaso// 'du byad thams cad gnas med cing/ ltabar zhi bar rab tu shesaso// rnam pa 'di dag gsagazugs dngos po med pa dbu ba'i phung po ltar brtagago mtshan nyid med nas/

mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thams cad bod pa'i chos su yang dag par rdzas su mthong ngo// gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o// gang mi rtag pa de ni rtog pa med pa'o// gang rtog pa med bdebang sdug bsngal/

ba'o gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa'o// gang nang dang/ phyi rol gyi gzugs de dag lta ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po medacing/ gzugs

brnyan lta bur stongang ji lta ba bzhin dung bu chu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang/ tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nyengar zhi bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' ji ltar dmigs pa med cing 'dus byas medang de bzhin du/ gzugs

kyang lbu ba lta bur 'du shes med cinga'agyur ba med pa dang/ tshorab med pa dang mi brtag pa dang sdug bsngal b dang/ bdag med pa dang/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di
[© ]/dang/ byang chub sems dang ' gnas can yongasasu sminab nye ra 'tshapa'i bgrod ngas blta bar bya'o// ngags kyi bugazhan yang gzugs phyi rol dang/ nang gi gnas gang nye ba'i bar du rang
[Z ]bzhin gyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba mngon par mi 'gyur ba dang/ sbyam lta bu dang/ lus mngon par mtshan nyid du brtag go/ gzugasan cil angachags pa med/ sems pa'i ng med/ blang ba
dang dor ba med par shos te/ gzugs nag nyes su ma byed do// chos thams cad chos kyi dbyangs la ang dag par gzhol bar shes pas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad chung zad kyang
dbyer med do// tshig gi lam thams cad gnas med par yang dag par shes so// gzugs ni gzhan du song ba'angamedatsang/ yul med pa dang/ glo bur gyi sdug bsngal rang/ rgyun bcad pa dang/
rgyunam bcad pa'i mdud pa gnyis dang bralab dang/ gzugs bar n lta bu dang/ med par brtag go/ gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan don lhuba'i phungabo ltabur dmigs pa med pa dang/ kun 'byung ba med pa dang/
shin tu rang bzhin mdangor pa rtag go/ 'byung chen po ba'i rnam par dag pa// rnam par mi rtog pa mi 'byungab/ mngon par mi sgrub pa/ chos thams cad spros pa'i rgyun bcad pa thams cad du zhugs par/
mad par brtag go/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gabrugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/ bsnyems pa med pa dang/ gtong ba med pa dang/ mun pa med pa dang/ snang bamod pa dang/ yid la mi byed pa dang/
gas su med pa dang/ sogs pa medar dang/ slobs med pa dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu dabyer med pa dang/ dngos bo med pa brtag go/ gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ shin tu rnam par mi rtog
pa dang/ zad pa dang/ lhub ltabur blta'o// rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs la dngos po medabar gzugs brnyan lta bur brtag go/ mtshaning mad pas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du 'du byed thams cad

brad pa'i chos su yang dag pa'i rjes mthong ngo// gang bdape chos da mi rtag pa'o// gangami rtag pa de rtog pa med pago gang rtog pa med pa de sdug bsngal bgo/ gang 'byung ba med bdebang bdag med 'o// gang 'du/

byed thamasacad kyitshig gi lam dang bral ba dbang stong ste/ ji ltar phye dang nanganagazugs lbu ba 'dabastong paji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 'di ltar ba 'bring dang/ tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'i ng[︽]bar zhi bar
'gyur ro// nam mkha' ji ltar ba d pa med cingagabrugs med pa dang bstan dumed dngazhinadu khrudang med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ bstan du med pa dang/ lbu ba lta bur ma rtog
ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmigs ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bgrodang bsgom par byed pa bde yang/ byang chub sanas dba'asems can yongs su smin

ba nye bar 'tsho balta'o// gas kyi bu gzhan sangag khrugs/ 'byung bachanapo bzhi'i mtshan nyid nang gin// nye ba'i bar du gang smras pa de'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang mib sor lta bu dang/ grib ma lta bu dang/
kru/ sbu ba lta bu gnas med pa dang/ nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa dang/ brjod du med pa dang/ sogasapa med pa nas/ khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag med pa lta bu dang/ dus
gsum gyi mtshan nyid thobapa dang/ dmib sapa med pa dang/ yi ga med pa dang/ gnyis su med bab mtha' dang/ rtag pa'i mthab dang/ kun tu bzung ba'i mtha' dang/ zlad pa med par sngadapalimathal/
dang / nyon mos pa med pa'i mthub dang/ ul med nga ba mthabadang/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i mthabadang/ slab mad pa'i mtha' dang/ gzugs brnyanaltabur gzugasada'i mtshan nyed du rab tu shes so/
zla bdod ba'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams de gnyis kyi gzugasakyi snangabanam ma/bab ltabu brtag go/ mig yer gyi mtshan nyidanam ma khab lta bur dngos por dmigasapas/ namamakhab ji lta bur bzung

du med cing/ kun nas ldang ba med pa dang/ dngos po med pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang mge or lta bu dang/ tshurob dang ba rel bral ba'i nas medaba'o// gzugs kyi mtshan nyed ne mnyam pa'i

mtshan nyid dang/ sgrubarnyan lta bu dang lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi sgrab rnyanani/ khams med pa dang/ thadadapa med pa dang/ mtshungs pa med pa dang 'khrug
ba med pa'o/ de ltar de bzhinadu chos bdarig nam mkha' ltakhubo// gzugs kyisnangabadebang med pa dang/ bsags ba yod pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ g.yo ba med pa dang/ 'gyur ba

med pa dang/ 'chi ba'o medab dang/ mi gnas ba dang/ bdag dngagazhan gyi la mi lenang dang/ yos su mi rtog pa dang/ chags pa med pa dang/ byas pa med pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o// de ltar de bzhin//

du bdu byed thams cad kyi lam lashAn tu 'das shing/ mag ge rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba dbu ba'i phung po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa de yang mig 'byung ba chen po bzhib/

rgyu'o// bdag med pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen pod dag kyang stongapa ste/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du bdag tu dmagos pa'i ng med do// mig gnyis nidagun 'bum tsamalta/ migarere la yang tshad med brdul shin tu
brab bo// rdul shin tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba chen ngo bzhib sog gas so// 'byung ba chen po bzhi re re la'ang bdag tu midamigs shing/ sems can du mi dmigasan/ de la rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam/
kun nas ldang ba'ang lam dushes paltaci smos/ rdulashin tuphrub de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du/mag 'byung chen po bsags pa dang/ dguna'abrum tsam du yongs su brtag go/ yongs su brtags pa des de
la mgage rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang 'am yang madad// des yang dgapar yongs su ma brtags pas/ soms can mag yongs su brtags par 'gyur// gang mag gi rnam par shes pa stong dang ji lta ba

bzhin du shes pade dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro// jir yang mig gi rnam bar shes pa stong pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi mgo gi rnam par shesang/sa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du
ka/ shes par bya'o// ji ltar yang mig gis gzugs kyi snangang wu ba'i phung po ltabuni/ phyi dang nang gigazugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye 'bar du/ de thams cad lcaba'i thung nga gzugs kyi snang

ba 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' la mi rten par 'gyur// nam mkha' ji ltar dngos po medacing/ mtshan nyid med pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyis stong ltar gazugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba lhu ba'i phung po lta bu de dag

thamasaMcad kyang snyingaba'o// ji ltar gzugasagazhanagyis nam mkha' stong pa ltar/ nang dang phyi'i lus kyimtshan nyid lhu ba lta bur snang ba nas nyub bar dude dag thams cad gazugasakyi mtshan nyid snang ba yang
stong bgo/ ji ltar mig gis rnam par shes bas stong pa nyid de bzhin du/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo// 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi
khams thamasacad kyi mig kyang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pas stong pa ji ltab bzhin dung ba tu shesaso// de bzhinedu rna ba dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ lus kyi rnam pangashar pa

stongang nyid kyis stong bu ji ltab bzhin du rab tu shes so/'byung ba chen po lta bu mi rtog rnam par mi rtogatsang/ dmags dang A ngadag par rjes su mi mthong sems can dang srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang
zag dang/ shes los skyes pa dang/ shadacan dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa dang/ tshor ba de dang/ tshor bar 'jug pa dang/ skyo bdang/ kun tu s bdang kun nas ldang ngor yang yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong ng// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtshan ma la mtshan ms mtshan ma las dmigs pa 'ama medago/ samasakyigazung ba dang/ btangab dang/ mnasum dubyab dang/ khongadu chud
pa dang/ gnas dang/ kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang/ yid la byed pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyidasnangab dmigasab med pa dang/ stongang nyidakyis stong pajilta babazhin du rab tu shesaso// gzugs kyi phung po

dang nam mkha'adang/ sams kyi rnam bar shes pa tha dad par rab tuse shesaso// khamasagasum thams cad stongang nyid kyis stong bar rab tu shes gog dpal dang nang gi nas nye ba'i ngang dugazugs kyi mtshan nyid

snang ba thams cad lhuba'i phung bo ltakhur stong pa nyid dang/ zad pa'itshuladang/ zhi gnas tshab med pa'i tshul dang/ rtog ba mdang khe tshul dang/ mi skyor dang/ mi 'gogapa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/

mtshan ma med pa'i tshulagyis rtog ge/ nam mkha' dang bral zhinga gnas umadapa dang/ gagi lam la bral bar rab tu bas so// nang dngaphyi rol gyi 'dubyed nas nyaba'i bar dugazugs kyimtshan nyid thams cad 'go

ba'i chos dang/ zad pa'i chos dang/ dngos borgyun 'chad pa stongab dang/ 'khrug pa rgyun chad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad ba'asade yang mi rtag pa'o// gang

rtag pa med pa de yang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba med pa de yang bdag med bgo/ gang du byed thams cad kyi tshig gamtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de yang stong pa lta/ gangaphyi dang nang gnas niyeba'i bar du gzugs

dkyimtshan nyid snang ba thams cad ngi lta ba bzhinadu rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang/ tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dinemkhyen ng 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcodapar med pa'i

bzod pa/ nam mkha' ji ltar rlung mdab de bzhin du bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhinadu/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha'

ji ltar gtsasapa mdatsangagand pa mdo padabazhin du/ sams dang rnam par rtogab dang/ rnam par dpyod pas gtsas pa med cing gnod pa med cing brjod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar bag la nyal ba thams cad dang bralang
de bzhin du/ tshig gelam thams cad bag la nyal bdangabral ba'i bgrod pa'o// nam mkha' je ltar ma sama'abyungabade bzhin du/ mtshan nyid thams cad sngangs skyes ma 'byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o//
nam mkha' ji ltar spos pa med pa da ba[@]na du/ khams gsum gi bag la nyalab thams cad skyes pa med pa'i baphrod pa'o// namamakhab ji ltar khams gsum par gatogs pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyimtshan de
snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa yang mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stongapa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyed dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nyebar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o// yang dag par sbyodang 'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo le'u lnga pa'o//
rags kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang sa tsher ba'i phung po yang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de la tshor ba'i phung bo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba'i tshog sa rnam ba drug ste/

mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang lus dang/ mdekyi rnam par shes ba 'dus te reg pa las skye ba'i tshor bste/ 'di dag ni tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o// tshor ba'i

bud bod la tshor ba rnam gsum dushes par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe nabade bar tshor ba dang/ sdug bsngal bar tshorab dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal du yang mi shes par tshor ba ste/ 'di dag rnam gsum nitshor

ba'i phung po zhes bya'o// rige sa kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis/ tshor ba'i phung bo tshul bzhin du brtagator bya// de la ba rgyud gang zhan/ rigs kyabu nyonamos pa'i rtsa ba
gsum ste/ 'dod chagasadang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug ces bya'o// nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'dedagags/ sems can nyon mongs pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba/ brag ba zad pa dang
bcas par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mos pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dgatshor ba rnam gsum la zhugs pa/de la nyon mongs ba rnam par thar par 'gyur ro// de 'tsher ba'i tshogs drugagis/ tshor ba rnam gsum

tshul ba zhin du ba rtag par bya'o/ tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs ba'i rtsa ba byungab dang/ lasakyirtsa ba dang/ rbad pa'i rtsa banub pa tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid
snangang dma' po bam/ bde ba 'am/ che ba ba ma/ gra ba 'om/ gang nyeb bam/ garing bar mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo/ gangagazugs bdeb 'am/ che ba 'am phra ba'am/

gangaring ba bam/ nyi bar mthong ba de la/ tshor ba bsled pa'i gnas su chu'i chu bur lta bu dang/ mngon par dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la yang tshul bzhinadubartag par bya'o// ji ltar yang mig mig gis
stod pa nas/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du de glo bur dang/ lus ma yin pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ gzugs med ba dang/ bstan dumadab dang ( das bo mdab dang/ yi ge med pa tsher ba chu'i
chu bur lta bur 'byung ngo// 'dod chags kyis kun tu basgribs pa 'byung ngo// slong ba po 'am/ dgod pa po 'am/ kun du rgyu ba po 'am/ bsogs par yang mi shes so// 'byung ba'imtshan nyid bdag po med
pa dang/ 'gog nga yang badag po med pa dang/ mtshan nyid tshar da lo yang badag po med pa lta/ mtshan nyid med ba'i chos 'di dag thams cad la yang srog med pa dang/ grogo dang bral bdang/ sems can
med pa dang/ sems can dang bral ba dang/ gso ba med ba dang/ gso ba dang bral bdang/ gang zag med pa dang/ gang zag dang bral bdang/ 'dod ba med pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ mtshan nyid med
pa dang/ bdag po med pa dang/ mtshan nyid 'jig ba dang/ zad pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dngos po med par/ dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la gdedag stong ngo// brjod du med pa 'dod

[ss]chags kyi mtha' la des dengagastongang// gnyis su med pa 'i 'dod chags kyimatha' lade de dag stongang// rgyun chad pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' 'a des de dag stong de// rtag pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des/

de dgagongango// mtshan ma med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la de dedag stod/ smonapa med pa bdedachags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo// tshor ba med ba 'dod chags kyim thab la des de dag stong ngo// byed pa

po'i rnam pa med pa kha dodachags kyi mtha' lades de dgastongang// shes ba med pa 'dod chagasakyimatha' la deb de dag stongang// lenab med pa 'dod chags kyi mthob la des de dag stong ngo// grol ba med pa 'dod

chags kyi mtha' la des de dag steng ngo// dngos po med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' las res de dag stongang// kun bamed pa/'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stod nga// snang ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la
des de dag stongang// dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmigs ba rnam par bstsogs so// gnas gsam/ byed du 'jug pa 'am/ bstsogs par bya ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ang// sems sgyu ma lta bu dang//
dug gsum 'dod chags dngos po dang/ dngos po med pa yongs su chad par ang rnam par mi rtog go/ ji lta ba bzhin du shes pasil yang chags pa med do// thams cad la mi rten pa dang/ mi gnas pa dang len/
ba med pa dang/ 'phos pa med pa las gnyis su mi byed de// chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas cung zad kyang dbye bar mi byed de// chags pa'i gzugs lasams lag pa dang
gzugasadang tshor ba gnyis bral ba'o// gang chags pa'i gzugs la tshor ba gang chu'i chu bur lta bu dang/ gang 'byung bzed nga 'jig por brtag pa 'di dag ni 'du byed rtag pa med pa'o//

khams gsum las 'byungab 'de yang smon pa med pa rnam par thar ba'i sgo'o// gang 'dod chags de la brjod du med pa'i tshor ba dang dus gsum gyi bsgom pa thob pa 'di yang 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu byed pa'i re'o/

khams gsum rgya'adod chags kyi kun gazhi tshor ba po med pa dang/ nyon mongs pamed nga 'di yang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i bo// gang 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba blangab med cing der ba med pa dang//
klu tshig gi lam bdag med pa dang/ yi ger dmigs pa med pa dang/ khams gsum gyi tshor ba ulamed cing/ mig yor med pa 'di yang 'du byed rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro// bdag med pa stong pa nyid rnam par
zla thar pa'i sgo'o// gang khams gsum thams cad latshor ba dngos po med ba dang/ snangab med pa dang/ yi ga med pa dang/ brjod du med pa dang/ zad pa med pa dang/ ci la yang chags ba mad pa de ltar

rab 'abangedang/ tha ma'i nyon mongs ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' jiltar sbyor ba med de bzhin du/ 'dod chags kun nas ldang ba dang/ tshor ba sbyor ba med cing brjod du med pa dang/ gnyis su med
padong/ sems dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la khams gsum gyi tsher ba la yang chags nag med pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ snying pa dang/ bdag med bang/ 'dod chags
kyi kun gzhi tshor ba mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa dang/ mtshan nyidadang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i brjod par lta bar bya'o//
de bzhin du rna ba la// sna ladri/ lce la re// lus la reg/ ed lachogate/ gang yid kyis 'das pa dang/ ma 'os pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba yade du
bos nga'i chos rnam par shesashing/ gzugasadang/ sgra dang/ dridang/ ro dang/ rigapa mngon par dgab brjesasu dran pa de la yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo// tsher ba 'dod chags kyi

kun gzhis bskyed do// de la ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshul bzhin du rtog go/ gzugs kyi dngos po rang bzhin gyis sgyum lta bu
sems dang/ yad kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di sems dang yid kyi sgras brjod de// gang 'das pa'i sems de 'gag pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i ma 'byungab dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sems dang po/ yid kyi
rnam par shes pa gnas pa yang mdad// skad cig du 'jug pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ ngobe nyidamed ba dang/ yi ge med pa dang// mtshan nyidamed pa dang/ bya ba med pa dang/ 'gyur
ba med pa dang/ gzung du med ba dang/ gtong ba med pa dang/ mun pa mdang dang snangab med pa dang/ gcig pu ma yin pa dang/ tha mi dad pa dang/ gnyis su med pa dang gnyis lta bu med pa dang/
dngos po med pa dang/ sems pa med pa dang/ spros pa med bdang/ phul ba med pa dang/ selabamedub dang/ kun gzhithams cad dang bral ba dang/ chu T+Thalta bur dang/ 'das pa// dngos pa med pa dang/ nyag
dngam 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i cha'igan mngon par dgab ba'i phyi rol gyi dngos posems dang/ yid kyi rnamapar shes pa rkyen ji lta bzhin dusbyang bar 'gyur ro/ nam mkha'i nga ltar nye mdang//

zla ba la snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' dang/ snang ba gnyis kyis mtshan nyid med de mang tsam gyis brjod pa de bzhin du/ sems dang ba dkyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags kyi gnas snang ba dang/ brjod du

yaM med pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid kyang ming tsamagyisabarjod pa yang gnyis su med pa dang/ gnas bamed ba dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ bstan du med pa dang/ ngobazod med pa dang/ lig med pa dang/ slongapa bo

mdabanas stonub 'ibaradu 'dod chags kyi mtha' ladas de dag stongang// dus gsum gyi 'dod chags la kun gzhi rnam par ba sogasaso// 'di la gnas med pa/saci yang chags pamadaba'i bar ngu de ltar rab tu 'bring

dang/ tha ma'i nyon mongs pa 'bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'aji ltar mun pamed cing snang ba med ba dang/ mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi yang mun pa med

cing snangabamed pa dang/ mtshan nyidemed pa ngo bo nyidemed pa dang/ sems dang yid kyi rnam bar shes pa ci la yang m chags pa dang/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi kun gzhitshor ba mi rtagapa dang/ sdug bsngal

0 ]bdang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bralaba'i brjod babasgom par bya ba 'di la yang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can me/ngas su smineb nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa yongs subalta bar bgo/ de/

bzhin du 'dod chagasakyi rgyun gcod par yang 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bub zhan yang byang chub sems dpas zhe sdang skye ba nyon mkhas pa'i rtsa ba las zad panub batshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o// gang migagis gzugs

kyi mtshan nyid snang ba yadedu 'ongs pa dma' banas 2 nyuba'ibadudalatshor bachu'i chu bur lta bu mi sdug pa mngon par dga' ba med par 'byung ba'i tshor ba ste/ de la yang byang chub sems dpas tshul bzhinadu rtog go/ ji

ltar mgi mig gis stong ba dang mig gzugs rnam par shes pas stong panas/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du'o// skad cig tu 'jig pazodapa'i 'du byed dus gsum gyi zhe sdang gimatha' la des de stong ba nas/

snangab med pa'i bar ngu zhe sdangagimathub la des de stong ste/ dus gsum gyi zhe sdangadamigs pa rnam par ba sogs so// zhe sdang gi gnasamed nas/ zhe sdang can gyi gzugs snang ba lasems gazhog bdang/ zhe sdang

gi tshong ba dang gnyis bral bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o// gang zhe sdang can gyi gzugs la zhe sdang gi kun gzhi 'byung ba dang/ tshorab chu'i chubur lta bur 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par rtag pa 'di dgakyang 'du byed ma rtagapa

zhes bya ba'i bar dubazod pabaltab bgo/ de bzhin du rlabs sgranas mi dekyi tshis kyi bar du yid kyis gang mosdug pa dang/ mi mdzes pa'itshes rnam par shes pa de la yang zhe sdang gi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba'itshor ba
kun s 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la yang byang chub sems dba' zhe sdangagi kun gzhi yade bzhinagyi tshul kun du rtog par byaste/ 'di daganagazugs med pa las ji lta bur gong ma bshad pa'i bar

du'o/ nam mkha' ji ltar khro ba medatsang gshe bamed pa ltar/ zhesdangagi kun gzhi'angade bzhinano/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi ba de la zhe sdang medacingagashe ba med pa dang/ ci la ya chags pa med pa dang/ khams
gsum thams cad kyi zhe sdang gi kun gzhitsher ba mirtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bakhrodang sgom par byed pa 'di yang byang chub
sams dang sems can thams cad yongs su sminabanyabar 'tsho ba'i bzodapa o grasu smin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a mig gis nang gi 'am/ gzugs gang jisnyad yong ba
dag mthongs/ gangayang bde la 'dasabadang/ ma'ongs ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs yang dag par ma yin par kun tu rtogab mun bar gyur pa// 'dod chags kyi gnas/ zhe sdang gi gnasal
rtag ba dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba razug pa dang/ bdag dang mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed du dmigs la/ khams gsum la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rkun po skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ khams gsum po

thams cad bsdus nas/ rnam pa gnyis su nye bar 'gro/ tabar lenaba'i byin gyis brlab/ mngon bar chags shing/ rgyu dang rkyen grangasamed/ dpag du med pa la dmigs shang nyibar 'dzin te/ de la rang bzhin gyiso
mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong ba dang bdag med par mi ston/ skye ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ 'dreg par yang zhung rami ga gi/ bdag dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zab tu dmagon//

shing rtag pa dang/ chad nga ra sems te/ nang dang phyi'i rkyen la dmigasanas bung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso/ rgyudang 'bras bu dang/ las

dang rnam bar sminabab kun nas ldang ba la dmigs pa dang/ rnam par dpyod ba dang/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa dang/ 'khrug ba dang ma 'khrugs pa dang/ nye bar zhi dang/ yang dag par rtog pa angaang dag pa/

ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes gange/ bdeb dang/ sdug bsngal gyitshor ba dang bral nga/ shes rab kyi dbang po ma skyes pas/ chos la rnam par rtog ba'adi yang sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba yang med pa'i tshor

ba'o da labyang chub sems dpa' nang dang/ phyi'i mtshan nyid du snang ba dang/ gzugasakyi mtshan nyid du snang ba gang je snyadayod pa dag la yang dag pa nyid dang/ de khon nyid du brtag bar bya'o// gang ji ltar
sngar bstan pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas dang/ zhe sdang gi gnasal 'di ltar brtag pa na// dacig gas 'jig pa'i tshul dang/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtog pa'i tshul dang/ bde ba 'am/ sdugabasngal gyi tshul
dang bdag gam bdag medanga'i tshuladang/ khams gsum po thams cad kyi bdu byed dang/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang/ rgyu med pa dang/ bdag po med pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang/ gnyis dang
bral ba dang/ mi skye ba la mngon par mi chags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog ba dang/ khams gsum po thams cad dang/ dus gsum gyi sdug bsngal yang med/ bdag la nga med

pa'i tshor ba mi skya bani tshor ba gnyis mi skye ba'i mthar khong du chud par byago/ dedag ni rtag pa'i mtha' dang/ chad pa med pa 'i 'thabadang/ brjod du med 'i rjes kyi rgyun gyi mtha' dang/ lus med pa'i
mtha' dang/ gnasamed pa'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i bag la nyal gyi sems dang/ yid dang/ rnamud/nga shes pa la sdug bsngal yang med/ bdabu yang med pa'i tshor ba me/
dmigs par so sor brtag par bya'o// yang de ltar zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis rgyu dang/ rkyen dang/ rgyumed pa dang/ rkyen med pa'i lhag mthong rnam pabcuganyisani/ yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gtilug gi
mun ngar blta'o// 'di la ma gi pa'i gnas tshul bzhinam in pa yid la byed panigang/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed ni gang la dmigs/ lus dangangs dang/ yid kyi 'du byed la dmig
nAn lus de yang 'byung ba chen po bzhila gnas pa/ 'byungab chen po bzhi bod dgakyang gayo ba med// 'gyur bamed pa/ bdagamed nga// bdag gi mdab sta/jiltar sngar bstanub bzhin no// tshig
gi lam yang damagasasu med// yi ge med pasta/ bdagami dmigs pa'i phyi gnasamed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gnas med pa// mi gnas pa/ tshigagi lam tsam dubarjod pa ste
'di 'a bdag dang yan lag can dang/ gang zag medad// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi dmages bganyis ga angastong pa sta/ dasan ma rig pa yang stong pa'o// lung du ma bstan pa'i sems
kyi rgyud kyang 'gro ba med pa'o// mtshan nyid du snang yang brjod du med ba'o// ma rig pa dang/ srid pa'i sredapa dang/ sams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ khams gsum dang/ dus
gsum la dmigs pa yang yang dag pa'i mthus mi dmigs la/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yang dag ba'i mtshan nyid kyis med de/ des nam rig ba ni stong pa 'o/ angam ga ba shin tu byang nas/ 'du byed la
rtog lta/ skad cig ma gang lamarigapa skye ba skad cig ma de nyid la mi gnas shing 'gag sta/ skad cig ma gnyis la gnas so// skad cig ma gcig laganyes gaskya ba'am/ bgag bamed kyi/ mayi/
ba 'gags nas/ skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'du byed skyasde/ des nam rig pa stongab ste/ bdag med bu'i ngo bo'o// yang skad cig ma gang la 'du byed skye ba de la lus kyi 'du byed dang/ ga gi 'du
byed dang/ yid kyi bang byad dang/ 'du byed gsum 'gag go/ yang lus kyi 'du byed skyes nas/ 'dod chags dad bral ba'i mtha'i gnas ni ngag gi 'du byed skya'o/ ang rnam par grol ba'imatha'

yang yid kyi 'du byed kyirjesakyi rgyun gyis ngag gi 'du byed la 'jug go/ lus kyi 'du byed m skyes n/ ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed kyi 'jug pamisogs so// 'du byed nye bar lenab la yang dag par rtog pa dang/
lus kyi 'du byed 'bar 'tsho ba la rnam par dpyodacing chags par yang mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'du byed ma skyes na/ lus dang ngag gi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags/
ba bstsal du yang medad// ngag gi 'du byed ma skyes na/ lus dang yid kyi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags pa bsal du yang medado// yang bdu byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas de
'drangs/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i rnam par shesab gnas dang/ snang ba thob par byed pa yang med/ sol bar byed baangamad de/ de nas dedag stong ba'o// 'du byed kyi mtha' las skyes pa yang
rang bzhin gyis bsal bas rnam par dag pa/ gnyis su med pa'i rjes su song ba/ smon pa med pa// 'du byed rnam par bzhag pa// nam mkha' ltar stong pa'o// lus kyi 'du byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i

rang bzhin bdag med pa sta sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ bar du a nga ma byung ba dang/ gnas med ba'i re stong pa'o// ga gi'adu byed kyang tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i rjes su 'gro ba/ namakha'
ltar sgo btags pa ste/ khams gsum dang/ gnyis dang bral bas stong ba'o// yod kyi 'du byed kyang thob ba med pa// mngon sumadu bya ba medang/ dus gsum thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba//
sems can med panas gang zag gi bar du med pa/ med pa la rnam par rtog ba/ gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa// mun pa med pa dang snang ba med pa// sos pa med pa// yi gemed pa

stong pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa la la yongs su rtog par byed/ 'du byed rnams ni skyes nas 'gag pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i rgyun nib kri bar bya ba med
pa ste rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug bo 'di dag kyang 'dri ba dang/ mi 'dra ba dang/ bdag po med pa dang/ skad cig ma dang/ 'god pa'i mtshan nyid lamig gnas ba'o// yang rnam ngo shes
bani rnam par dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa dang/ nang dang phyi'i mdamigs pa dang dge ba dang mi dge ba mi dmigasapa dang zug ba dang bcas pa dang/ khragab med pa khri'i dmigs pa dang/
'dus byas dang/ dus ma byas medamigs dang/ rgyu dang rkyen mi dmigs ba dang/ khams gsum dang dus gsum gyi tshor bam dmigs bdang/ 'dod pa lta'i yon tan nyams pa ma dag pa dang/
'byung ba chen po bzhi mi dmigs ba dang/ khams drug mo dgu pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang/ bar chad med pa'i ' gnas phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ phung po'i lhag
ma ma lus pa'i bar gyis rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pas/ gzugs la nye bar ba kribar med pa nas/ yid kyi bar la nye bar bkri ba cha med pa/ skya ma snang ba lta burang bzhin med pa/lus med/
gnas med ba'o// rnam par shes pa ni sngonagyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ bar gyi mtha'i yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byudabamed dadi nas gzug kyi mtshan nyidagang duanganam bar brtag pa'i gnas su snang
khyu/ gab dang/ stod pa shes pa rami nus te/ des na rnam par shes pa ni stong pa'o// yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs lartog par byed de/ skad cig ma cig la
rnam par shes pa skyes shing 'gagasonas/ ming dang gzugs skya'o// ming ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam bar shes ba dang/ gzugs med pa'i bud bo ang 'di dag go/ thung ngo
yangs med ba'i don te// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang/ dbyibs kyi snang bu la mi 'jug pas/ de dag ni ming zhes bya'o// gzugs shes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gzugs shes bya'o/

gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi bo 'di dag kyang dngos po med pa// gnas med pa/ rdzasamed nga/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba des ( tshoraMba'i rnam par sminuba'i mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes
bab rgyu dang rkyen la mi dmigs pa dang/ 'bras bu bgrub par rab tu mi shes pa'o// chos 'di dag ni phan tshun nas bdu po dang/ gnas rnam par dbye ba rab tu mi shes pa'o// 'du byed dang/ rnam par
shes pa'i phung po'i rnam par snyan pa nas/ rnam par phye ba'i bar du rab tu mi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhon/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni khams gsum las grol ba/ dus gsum 'das shin tu 'das
pa/ mnyam pa med pa// yongs su 'dzin ba med pa// kha zas med nga/ dngos po med pa/ chags shing rnam par rtog ba med nga/ sgra med pa/ 'byung ba med ba/ gnyis su med ngag rgyu ba/
00 med pa/ kun gzhi med pa dbang du gyur ba med pa nas/ 'che'abo med pa rkyen med pa// mtshan nyid med pa// byas pa med pa// rgyu med pa// bdag gi med pa/ brjod pa med ba/ chad pa mad/
pa rtag pa med pa/ bya ba med pa// ming med pa 'o// gnas med ngas gzugs med pa'o// bde med pa'o// rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ rnam par smin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa med
pa'o gzhal ba med pa'o// mngon par 'grub pa med pa'o// dus gsum dang khams gsum thams cad kyi gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi bo 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs ba 'o/

mtshan nyid med pa'o// rlung dang mtshungs pa go/ gtogasapa med pa'o// mig gi lam du brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do// dus gsum thadad pa med cing 'gro ba la dacing tshul gyis/ga nga dag pa'i mtha'i rjes su
ma zhugs pago/ 'jug pa med pa'o// mun pa med pago/ snang ba med pa'o// rang bzhinamed pa'o// ngob nyad kyis rtsa ba mang ba'o// yig med pa'o// de dag ni gang du yang bsgom pa dang/ skyes pa
dang ma skyes pa dang/ khong bu dang/ 'gro ba dad/ bsagasab med pa'o// khams gsum thams cad ni gtam gyi dngos por btags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jugu ba med pa'o// blang ba med pa'o//
dor ba med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i lung pa bzhi po 'di dag ni mtshan nyid kyi 'jug ba med pa'o// phung bo 'di dag nimig gi gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas pa nas/ lus kyi gnasakyibar gyi dbyakhe
su gnas pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas sel nga 'i brda dang/ mtshan ma rnamadab/

gzhag bar rnam par gzhag par ma yin no//gzugs med ba'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni gnas kyi dbyibasasu gnas kyang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi bo 'di dag ni gzugs kyi phung po bshes kyadabyingasu gnas
ba ma yin no// khams gsum gyi las kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dpyadaba'i rdzas su 'brelapa// gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi bo 'di dag ni/ gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas ba'o// de dgan bdag medab
nas gang zag gi bar du med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// yi ga medaba'o// gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ne/ stong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis shin tu skad cig gis 'jig pa ther zug ma yin
pa/ gnas mi dmigs pa'i mtshan ma med ba'o// skad cig gi skye zhing 'bri ba'i tshul gyis sman bamed pago/ 'gog pa med pa/sa chags pa med pa'i shes rab log pa stadas na phungad bzhi po 'di

dag nistongapa'o//gzugs kyi phung po 'byung bachen po 'di dag kyang/ ji ltar sngarab stan pa bzhin du stongaba'o//nye bar 'dren pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kyang/ skadacegama'i rgyunagyitshul gyi skye bam in/ban tshun las shin tu 'das shing//
mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phan tshunangu'u ngaraston sbyangs pa ma yin/ ban tshun lasangashin tu 'da' ba ma yin no// skadacigam dang po lagazugs med bar mingaskyob ma yin/ skad cig
mag pa gnang laming med par gzugs skyo ba ma yin gyi/ skad cig ma gagags gnas la nye bar len pa'i thung ba lnga po 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag ste/ skad cig ma lhag ma gas
bo la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ji ltar sems las byung ba'i chos myur du 'gyur ba bzhin du bsgrubs par sla ba min te/ de dag kyang dos de mid pa/ skad cig gis 'a drig
b gnas pa ma yin no// yang mi nga dang ba zugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug la rtog par byed de/ ming dang gzugasaskyes shing 'gagasanas/ skad cig mganyis pa la skye mched drug skye ste/
skye mched drug po 'di dag ni mig dang/ rna ba dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang yid d// mig gi rnam par shes pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ 'drapa dang/ 'bral/
ba las sog pan yin/ gcig la gcig 'brel bar sel pa ma yin/ migagi rnam par shes pa'i las kyi dmigs pa rgyas pa/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skad cig na ra bya bar mi nus
rnaba'i rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gang/ mig gi rnam pa ra shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rgyur mi spyod pa nas/ id kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// mig gi rnam par shesal
ang rtag pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ 'dres te 'byung ba ma na/ khams gsum gyi chad pa dang/ rtag pa'i mtha' dang 'dres te 'byudab ma yin/ chos thams cad dus gsum dang tha mi dad pa'i
mtha nye bar len pa ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi dngos po'i bdag gi mtha'/
dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin/ bdag dang bdag med pa ma yin/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ma yin/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas pa ma yin/ chad pa dang rtag pa ma yin/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma
med pa ma yin/gzhes ma an gnyesasumed pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag bde mtha' nye bar 'dzin pa ma min pa nas// yid kyi rnam par shes ba'i bar dag kyang ngo// migagi rnam par shes pa la
gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa 'am/ mi stong ba zhes chags pa med/ sel ba med/ thadad pa med/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang nang dang phyi'i rnam ba smig rgyu ba lta bu dang 'dres te 'byung ba yin/
theg pa ba sum dad/ mi khom pa'i mtha' dang/ 'jigatshogs kyi mtha' sel ba ma yin/ gsum gyis gus pa'i tshul du byed pa ma yin/ zad mi shes pa'im thab rnam par 'khyam pa ma yin ba sa
med kyi rnam par shes pa latshor ba skad cig ma bden pa dang/ mi bden pa nye bar 'gro ba med skyed pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ sgyu ma lta bu'i mag gi rnam par shes pa
yod pa ma yin pa 'di la skad cig ma'i spyodab nas/ shes pa med pa snang ba med/ yi ge mi dad/ skad ga ma'i mi skye ba dang/ 'god pa dang// chos 'di dagaM ni skad cig ma cig la skye zhing 'badag

ste 'di 'byed pa po dang/ byadadu 'jug pa dang/ tshor ba po dang/ tshor bar byed pa dang/ skyed pa po dang/ skyed pa byed pa dang ldang bar byed pa dang/ ldang bar byed du 'jug pa dang/ byin gyis rlob pa bo dang/ rnam par 'drig pa/

po med do// de dag ni skad cig ma dang po la skyes la/ skadacig ma gnyis ba la gnas par yin/skyes nas phan tshun du tha dad par byed pa ma yin/ rgyumed ba las byung ba ma Arete/ chos 'di dpa ni skad cig gis
'jig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ des n de dag nistong pa'o// yang dgar ma an pa kun tu rtog pa las skye zhing 'gag ste/ san de dag ni stong// skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg ba la rtog par byed de/ rnam
par shes pa drug gi tshog saskyas shing bgags nas/ skad cigam gnyis ba'i gnas la mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dag gi 'dus te rag ba drug gi tshogs skye ba'i rgyu ma da do//
dal mig ga'adus rag pa ni/ mig gi rnamapar shes pasaul la reg pa la gnas pa'i bya ba ste/ chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis pa la'abyungang// don gnyis ka yang das pa med pa ste//
nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'o// mig gi yul gyi reg ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa bya ba chags par bya ba'i don du skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba nam yin no// de bzhin
du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang lus dang/ de kyang brjod par bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rkyenagyis gabrub gas kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs ba la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhidadu chags
par bya ba'i phyir/ skad cig gam gnyis la 'byung bzhin yin no// dane gnyes ka ang dngos ba med pa lta/ nam mkha' labartag pa lta bu 'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang//
'du byed rnamA dang/ rnam par shes pa yang barjod par bya'o// mig nimag gis gnyis su med de/ gnyis ka a nga dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ mig mig gis rnam par shesabs gnyis su med de/ gnyis

ka ya nga dngas pa med da 'i phyire ra/ mig gi rnam nga rangashes pa yang yul gyi 'dusate reg pa dang gnyis su medade/ gnyis ka yang dngos po med pa'i phur ra// de bzhinadu gnas ba'ibya ba ang chags par bya
bas gnyis su med dngos po med de/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'imtshan nyid lta bu'i phyir ro// dngos po 'di dag ni mtshan nyid med par rnam par brtagaste/ bya ba med pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid zhen
bamed pa'o// dus gsum dang khams gsum dedagathams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings rnam pa rami rtag pa/ chos nges par sems dngashes pa med// sbyor ba las rnam par bzlag nag/ dga' bamed nga//
byis pasems can ji lta ba bzhin du ming med pa/ rgyun med pa// kha dog dang mtshan ma med pa/ gnas med pa// rnam par dmigs ba medab/ brjod du med pa yin na/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la sa

chos dang/ chos kyi dbyings tha dad du byed de/ rang gi rgyudakyi yongs su rtog pas/ chos kyidabyangs gcig la tshul sna tshogs kyis de ltar tha dad du 'byed de// ming dang rkyen dang/ kha dgadang/ mtshan dang/
dbyibs su 'dags so// 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan slob med nga/ ldang ba med pa// mtshan nyid med pa// rnam par gzhag pa med pa'o// rnam par thar pa gsum ni dbyangs gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi de
nyid de/ dus gsum thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i lam lta burnam par dpyad pa ste/ de nas mig gi yul dngamig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshul gyi 'dus/
te ras pa dang/ khams gsum thams cad la'ajug pa dang/ mtshan dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibasadang bral ba/ rnam mkha' la brtag ba'i mtshan nyid lta bu la 'drug pa thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyangs so//
de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang lus dang/ yid kyi rnam bar shes pa'i 'dus te reg pa yang gnyis su med ba lta/ gnyis ga yang dngos po med pa'i re re/ de na rnam par shes ba dang/
'dus te reg pa ldang ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang khams gsum ba thams cad khong duchud pa dang/ kha dog dang mtshan dang/ dbyibs khong du chud pa dang/ nam mkha' la brtag pa dang/ 'jug/
pa yang chos kyi dbyings so/ gang reg pa'i skyed mched drug la rnam par dpyod cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/ kun tu gleng ba'i rnam par dpyod pa khong du chud pa chags pa thams cad brjod bsab dang dud

kyidabang du sa babani/ bdud kyi 'dod pa ji ltar bzhin du byed pa'o// gangareg pa'i skye mched drug la mi dpyad cing/ mi skye ba kun tu slong ba dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs thams cad sel ba dang/ skad cige
sa 'jigs pa nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'di ni/'jig rten las 'das pa brjod du med pa'i shes khong du chud pa'o// gang gzugs la ro myang zhing//

regang skya mched drug dang/ 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga la rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud cing/ chags pa thams cad brjod pa'i bar dag kyang bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyed pa'o//
gung ga nga gzugs la ro myang ba dang/ 'dod ng lnga'i yon tan dang/ reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes rnam par dpyod par nus par/ kun tu slong ba'i mtshan nyid 'di la byed pa
dan/ chags pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa// 'jig rten lasa'adas pa brjod du med pa khong du chudapa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong ba po// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du/
byed rnams dang/ gang yang rnam par shes ba dang/ reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtagab 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud pachags pa thams cad brjod pa'i bar de ang bdud kyi 'dod ngaji lta
rgyu ba bzhin du byed pa'o/ gong yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ reg pa'i skye mched drug la'adod pa'i yon tan lnga'iro myang bar mi byed cing/ mun pa yang med/ snang ba yang med de/ nam ma bar
ltar ganyis lta bur bya bar ma yin pa 'di yang 'jig rten las 'das pa/ brjod du med pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyilam rnam par sbyong ba'o// chos 'di dag ni 'du shes dang/ sems pa dang//

skad cig ma'i rgyan gyis 'jug pa ma yin no// reg pa phan tshun 'dras nas kha byang bar byed ba yang ma yin no skad cig ma'i rgyan gyis phan tshun skyed par byed ba yang mi na// bgog da ra byed pa yang
ma yin no/ chos 'di dgan skad cig ma dang de la skyes nas/ skad cig ma 'di nyid la 'jug ste/ skad cig mganyes pa la gnas pa ma yin no// de bab gags te/ reg pa 'i skya mched drug dang/ 'du shes
dang sems ba 'jig pa'i skad cigs gnyis ba la tshor ba skya'o/ de latshor bgang zhe na/ tshor ba'i tshogs drug go/ mig gis reg nas tshor ba skyo ste/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/
mde kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes ba'i tshor ba rgyus te/ de yang skad cig ma gtsug ma yin/ las gcig rnam par dmigs pa'i skad gam ma yin/ tshor ba ba sumane bde ba'i tshor ba dang/ sdug
bsngal gyi tshor ba dang/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal b yang med pa'i tshor ba sku/ dus gsum dang/ khams gsum thams cad kyirig pa'i sku mched drug la tshor ba rnam pa gsum bsang daraM
bod du chud par byas/ ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no// yang la la 'di skad ces yang reg pa'i skyematshad drug las tsher ba rnam gsum ste/ skal ba mnyam pa'i bung bo la rnam par dpyod pa la gnas
pa de lta bu ni rtag par lta ba zhes 'dzar to// yang gong dag 'di skad ces gangarig pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum ste/ phung po med pa'i tshig la gnas pa de lta bu'i chad pa khas
zer te/ gnyis ka yang yo ngasasu slang bar bya'o// deci'i phyir zhen/ phung bo rnam ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ phyir ldog pa la gnas pa de ni bzod pa'o/
'di lta ste dang ran/ 'byung ba chen po'i lus kyi rolasems ma da bde la ne/ brgyad par bya ba'i gzugs dang/ mi bya ba'i gzugs dang glog gi snang bar byed/ lus kyi nang du nisnang ba mi
byed glog nigazugs kyi rkyen las skyes pa ma yin/ gzugs rnam par dmigs bam yin/ gzugs kyi gnas ma yin/ gzugs kyi re myang bar byed pa ma yin/ glog gi gzugs
phan tshun la 'jug pa ma yin/ gzugasamtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin/ gzugs sngangs nas snang bar byed pa ma yin/ glogagi gzugs kyis dang/ 'thun par 'brel te byung ba ma yin/ gzugs
la sogs pa dang/ 'gag pa ma yon bde bzhin du myur ba'i phyire reg pa'i skye mchadadrug la gzugs med pa'i bung ba bzhi snangabar byed de/ 'di la tshor ba gsum dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byang rnam dang
rnam par shes pa 'jugag/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pas/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bskyed panam yin no// tshel ba la gnas ba ma yin no// tshor ba sgrub pa

ma yin no// tshor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin na/ tshor ba la 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i re myang ba'i phyir ma yin no// tshor ba mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyir ma yin no// tshor ba la kun tu

dmas/sa ba'i phyir ma yin no// tshor ba'ire myang ba dang mtshung gi de 'dra ba'i phung pa 'a 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal skyod bam yin no// tshor ba skyes ngan 'du byed 'gag pa mi
yane tshor ba 'gag ba na 'du byeng rnams bsags pa ma yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ glag nai nam mkha' bong nas gzugs rnams lasnang bar byed pa ma yin te/ nam mkha' dang
klog gnyis ka yang rdzas med cing brjod med pa de bzhin du chos rnams dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ tshor ba rnams kyang ban tshun tha dad par mi byung do// khams gsum thams cad kyang rdzas med pas/

brjod du med ba/ yi ge med pa sta/ skad cig ma'i rgyun gyi gnas ma yin/ phan tshun du ga sog gsangashing baphel bas/ chos kyi dbya nges tha dad du byed pa ma yin te/ des na de dag ni stong pa'o/ skad cig
ma gang la skyes pa skad cig ma de nyid la 'gag ste/ skad cig ma'i rgyunal gnas pa ma yin no// des na khams gsum dang/ dus gsum dang/ phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched thams cad byung

ba me da pa/ spradapa med pa// brjod du med pa// stong pa la// ma dag gi glog gis brgyanang 'di ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag brad gi shes pa snang ba'i chos kyi sgo'i gnas kyi tshul zhes bya'o// skad cig ma
dang po la tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas/ skad cig ma gnyis la sred paskya'o// de la sredapa gang zhan/ sred pa'i tshogs drug te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar sred pa/
'byung ngo// gang gzugs la mngon par dga' ba/ gti mug gi drab bsgrub ba/lus dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ regabya la 'jug pa thibs bononem mkha ba
bzhin no// gzugs la yongasasu mi rtog pa'i tshor bani glog dang nam mkha' bzhin no// 'du shos nirlung dang nam mkha' bzhin na// 'dubyang rnams ni u0fa3nemed pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no// rnam par shes
ba ni smig rgyu ba dang// nam mkha' bzhin no// gzug la yongs su mi rtogatsang ther zug tu mos te/mi rtag ba nyid du yod su mi rtog pa 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gzugs la sdug bsngal du
o ngas su mi rtog pa dang/ sgra dang/ dril kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gogapar yongs su mi rtog pa dang/ rol lam du yongs su mi rtog ba dang/ reg bya la skya ba dang/ 'godapa brjod du med par yongs su mi

rtog ba 'di ni srid pa'i gnas la chags ba khams gsum thams cad du 'phro ba dus gsum gyi dngos po la sred pa'i gnas shes bya'o/ byi pa so so'i skye bo ngan pa rnams ni 'khor ba'i chu klung gi rgyunagyi
shugs 'dang pa la mngon par brtson pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpas gzugs la 'diltar tshul bzhin gyis so sor brtag go bar bya ste/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs 'deni/ nad dang 'god
pa'i mtshan nyid de// gang bar du rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid de'i mi rtag pa ste/ ji ltar 'byung ba chen po yongs su rtag pa sngar bstan pa de bzhin du so sor brtag go/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
ni sdong bo tshuladus sor brtag par bya'o/ ji ltar sdong po la gnas bcas te/ mig nas shes la gnas te/ gnas pa de bzhin du gzugs nidabuba'i gong bu lta bu ste/ gzugs dang gzugs/
med pa'i rnam par damigs pas/ gzugasadang gzugs med pa la 'jug/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa mi 'phral/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa'i las dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs

med ba spangs nas dbu ba'i gong bu ltar snying po med par brtags na stong paste/ 'jug pa dngami 'jug pa na ji ltar rlung 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis kha nas sgra 'byung ba yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du//
khams gsum gyi sgra ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o// ji ltar rlung 'dus pa dang/ nam mkha'i rlung dang/ nam ma khab drimadade stong ba de bzhin du/ khams gsum yang dri lta bur khong du chud/
par byago/ ji lta bu m pa char pa'i thigs ngas gang ba mang/ de'i nangadu sus kyang thugs pa blugs pasod/ bsgrubs pa med/ byas pa med/ byed du gcug pa med de/ thams cad yongs su bzu
ba dang/ rna bar spyad pa dang bral ba de bzhin du/ khams gsum bdag dang bcas pa'i lo'i log la nga stong pa khong du chud par bya'o// jiltar bum pa gang anganam mkha' dang 'dres par bsgrubs pa
med do// ji ltar nam mkha' la main/nam mkha' dang bum phan tshun reg pa dang bral ba/ sems med pad bzhinadu khams gsum gyi reg pa ang stong par khongadu chud par bya'o// 'dadapI/
en tan lnga la gti mug gi 'khor las rung me tog gi dri la chags pa bzhin du/ gang yang 'dod nga 'i sred pa dang/ gang yang gzugs kyi sred pa 'di dag ni 'dod pa 'i yon

mi tan lnga'i tshul gyis/ stong par khong du chud par bya'o// gang yang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi la sred pa/ gzugs med pa ni yi ge medang rang bzhin med pa sta/cung zad ma yod ba'i tshul gyis ji ltar
sngar bstan pa bzhinatu stong par khong du chud par bya'o// ji ltar nam mkha'alas brten te/ rlung rgyu ba ninam mkha' las rlung ga gis 'dus par byas shing chags pa yang med de/ nam
mkha' las kyang rlung la yin zhing/ gnyis ka yang brjod du med/ yi gemeng pa/de bzhin du/ gzugs med pa'i phung po ang ban tshun dngos po med par 'grub cing ldan pa ste/ phan tshun gnodapa

dang sbyor ba dang/ 'du ba dang/ chags pa dang/ gnod par byed ba med pa de bzhinadu/ phung po 'di dag kyang chos thams cad mi skye ba'i tshul gyis/ dngos po'i mtshan nyidadu nye bar mi 'gro zhing/ skya ba med

par khong du chud par bya'o// ji ltar nam ma kha' dang/ rlungadang/ glog yi ge ga med cing brjod du med de// ldan cig tu rgyu yang nganatshun chags pa med pa de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa ang bdapa mad do/ ji
ltar mya ngan las 'das pa zer ba yang ma yin/ mi zad ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du/ chos thamang po cad kyang myang n las 'das pa dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa snang med/ mi mnyam yang med la/ gnyan bo mi
dmigs te/ gnyis su bya ba ma yin zhing chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par spyod par shesanas chos kyi dbyings dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la skya bdang/ gag bar rang zad kyang 'i sems

te des nams kyi dbyings ni gnas med pa'i mthub ste/ don yang dag ba'i mthu'o// gang yang dag pa'i m zla'i de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o// de nidakyil ba khoragasum yongs su gcod pa'i na tha'o// de ni
gcod ba med cing 'byed pa med pa'i mtha'o// de ni chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i mtha'o// ji lta ba bzhin gyi mtha' ste/ mtha' des chos thams cad mthar bar gyur pa ste/ mtha' ji snyed dang/ mtha'
med pa ni mi gnyis pa ste/ sred pa'i srid nga mi dam gas pa'i phyir// srog dang 'gro ba dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zag thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha'o// yang dag ba'i mtha' dang/ 'jig
tshogs kyi mtha' dang/ sred sel ba yang mi gnyis pa'i mtha'o// de ltar na 'jig tshogs kyi mthob dang/ 'dod pa gcod pa yod de// deltar rab tu shes na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i cha nyishur 'gyur ro//

yang dag pa'im thabani grad pa'i 'jug ba dang mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no// yang dag pa'i mtha' nasong du med do/nam so nga da na zad pa med bgog bamed de/ shin tu thur gyur ba de bzhin du sred pa yang mi zad/
pa'i sgoste/ chos thams cad kyang mi zad pa'o// ngangabazhin med pa'o// chos thams cad ma skyes par shes nas/ kun nas bskor ba thams cad g cod pani brjod du med pa'i don/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha'
gas pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgyur ba brjod pa'i sgo'i gter gyi gzusarab tu thob bo// gzungs de rab tu thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon

par sgrub bston te/ mig gi mnyam pa nyide las mi g.yo bar sems can rnams la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang ston la/ 'chi'apho ba yang med/ skya pa yang med/ gang du yang 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'jug ba Ang med/
bdu byed rnams la rnams par rtog pa yang med do// de ltar don du gnyer zhing mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skad ga la sred pa la zhugs nas/ skad cig ma gnyis ba la len pa mngon
par 'grub bo// len ba gang zhe na/ len ba bzhi ste/ 'dod pa 'i len pa dang/ lta ba'ilen pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi len pa dang/ bdag tu sA ba'i len pa'o// de la 'dod lhun nga gang
zhe na/'dod pa'i rimyang bar byed pa dang/ bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing mngon nga ra chags zhen pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de lalta ba'i lenang gang zhe na/ chad pa khom/ rtag nga

zhes bya ba nas lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar da ni lta ba'i 'a na nga razhasabya'o// de la tshul khrims kyi lenang gang zhe na/ gong dag 'thabs pa'i bstan ba'i tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs
dang dka' thub dang/ tshangs dang ra stod nga pa'i gnas dang/ sbyangs ba'i yon tan dang/ o byad bsnyungs pa dang/ gang yang zhugs pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs dang
dka' thub dang/ tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ ga byed bsungs pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi len pa'o// gang dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dang sems can dang/
