spyod nga'i yod byad la dragab ba yagyi/ 'jig rten pa'i yo byad la dga' ba ma yaning dang/ 'phags pa'i su job tshul de mngon nga ra dga' ba yin gyi/ 'phags ba ma yin pa'i skye bo'i
tshul la dga' ba ma yin pa dang/ 'phags pa ma in pa bskye bo yongs su smin par byed dag la dga' ba yin gyo/ bya ba ma yin pa dang bya ba ngan pa la dga' ba ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi zos
ny+nyo la mngon par dga' ba yan gyi/ brang bring gi zas la mngon nga 'dagab ba ma yin pa dang dgon ng dwang/ bsamathub la mngon par dga' ba yin gyi/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ tshong dus
zla kyi sdod yul la mngon par dga' ba ma yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bang chub la mngon par dgar ba yin gyi nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mngon pa ra dga' ba ma yin pa dang/
shes bya sgrib pa spong ba la mngon par da bab yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba tsam la mngon pa/ngadag/'a ba ma yin pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang/ gzugs kyi lus yongs
su sgrub ngal mngon par dga' ba yin gyi/ chos kyi sku mngon par rtogs pa tsam la dga' ba ma yin pa dang/ stobs dang mi 'jigs nga dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang dag par
sgrub lam ngon par dga' ba yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa tsam la mngon dang dga' ng ma yin pa dang/ sems can pha rol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa la/
mngon par dga' ba yin gyi/ bdagagi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dga' ba ma yid pa dang/ bgachags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spong ba la mngon par dga' ba yin gyi/
nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa song ba tsam la mngon par dga' ba ma yin bsti/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang ga chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis chos sna ba bo khong du chud par
bya'o// byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang dang ldan pa b.rus tshos sa ba khong du chud par bya ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste 2 par na sa chen po ni mas can thams cad
kyi'atshog r gyur kyang su las kyang lan cung brang kyang mi tshol lo/de bzhin du byang chub sa mgo dang 'chos su ba yang sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te su las kyang lan cung zad
kyang mi tshel lo// 'di lta ste dpe ran/ chu ni rang gi yon tan rnams kyis sems can thams cad bde bar byed kyang su las kyang 'an cung zad kyang mi tshol la// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
chos skya ba yang rang gi yon tan rnams kyis sems can thams cad bde bar byed/ su las kyang lan cung zad kyang mi tshal lo// 'di lta ste ran/ ma'i khams ni rang gi yon tan rnams kyang
gsems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi batshe ba 'a ga thams cad yongs su smin par byed kyang su las kyang lan cung byung ma tshol la// de bzhin du
byang chub sems dang ba chos sdu ba yang rang gi shes rab kyi yon tan rnams kyis sen sa can thabs cad kyi'atshob yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba dge ba'i rtswa ba'i le tog rnams yos

(1 su smin par byed kyang su las kyang lan cung zad kyang mi tshol lo// 'di lta ste dbangan/ rlung khan sa ni rtswa dang shing gel ba dang/ sman gyi tshogs dang/ samang can gyi rgyud rnams rnam pa bskyed

kyang rnam par mi rtogatsangami 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a chos smra ba yong sums can thams cad kyi skye ba'i lus dang/ chos kyi sku rnam par bskyed kyang su las kyang phan cung zad kyang mi
tshol la 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i khan san mtha' yas shing mu nad la rgyabe ba mdang gi rang bzhin te/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe yang rnam par mi rtog cing 'gyur ba med de gang la
kyi ang mi chags so// dengazhin du byang chub sems dang 'chos skya ba yang yon tan mtha' yas shing mumed la/ thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin te// sems can thams cad nye
bar 'tshe yang rnam par mi rtogacing 'gyur ba nad de gang la yang mi chegs so/ bdi lta ste dper// zlab ni thams cad du sems can thams cad la rtag tu nges par snang zhing/ 'jig rten skyong
ang bajig rten gyi chas rnams kyis ma gos so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dar ba tshes sa ba yang thams cad du sam/can ms cad la rtag tu nges par snang zhing/ 'jig rten skyong yang
'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos so// 'di lta ste dngangan/ nyi ma shar bas mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur te/ de'i bod kyis snang bar byas nas sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams
byed kyang nyi man mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ su las kyang lan cung zad kyang mi tshal ba// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos sna ba byung bsasems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun
med par gyur tu/ de'i 'od kyis snang bar byas sa sems can dgar nga rang gi dgaba'i rtsa ba rnams byed kyang chos sna bani mi rtagi rnanaM par mi rtogaste/ su las kyang lan cung phrad kyang mi tshal//
la bad lta sta dpar na/ gru su'ang brtan la legs da' sbaran mi zhig ngang chu chen po lasasems can rnams sgrol nus te/ su las kyang gru pa tsan cung zad kyang mitshol lo// de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' chos sa ba yang shes rab brtan zhing/ pho rol tu phyin pa sa ba snying rje chen pos legs par sbyar ba'i chos can yang sems can rnams 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po las sgrol nus te
mi zhig kyang/ su las kyang gru btsas cung zad kyang mtsho la// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bab chu drag po 'jigs po la zam pa dang stags ni sems can tha ma dang 'bring dang/ mchog rnams la
@#// mtshungs par bde bar bya ba'i phyi'i gnas pa yin te/de gang yang ja 'dzin da na da cing nga yir 'dzin ba med de// de bzhinadu byang chub sems dpa' chos sa ba yong ba bor ba
brgal dka' ba/ mi bzod pa// ma rungs pa// ngan song du gzhon par bdag pa' rtags dang bram du chen por gyur cing de mas can bla ma dang 'bring dang/ mchog rnams la mtshungs par/
bde bar bya ba'i phyir gnas pa An te/ de gang yang dar 'dzin pa med cing nga yir 'dzin pa mad do// 'di lta stadang ran/ sgron ma nimun gagi nang nAsems can tham dang 'bring dong nag rnams
la mtshungs par snang bar de dad/ de gang la yang dar 'dzin pa med cing nga yir 'dzin pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos su ba ya nga marig pa'i mun nag 'khor ba'i khyim gyi nang du
shes rab kyi sgron ma phyung nas sems can tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog rnams mtshungs par snang bar byed kyang de gang la ngar 'dzin pa med cing nga yir 'dzin pa mdad/ byang chub sems ngas
chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang dang ldan pa bcu po dadag gis chos smra ba khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa cus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi 'grogs pa
khongadu chud par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dman pa la sems pa dang/ dman pa la smon pa'i sems can dman pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang/ sems can mi
rtson ba mi 'gus ba le le can na bgusamad pa rnams dang lhan ga mi 'grogs pa dang/ nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang/ ngargyal las kyang nga rgyal dang/ nga 'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang/ cung/
brad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang/ man pa'i nga rgyal dang/ log pa'i nga rgyal dang/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa'i ngargyal can rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang/ sar sna dang/ 'chal pa'i
tshul khrims dang/ gnod sams dang le lo dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba dang/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems can rnams dang lhan Mcig mi 'grogs pa dang/ 'dod pal 'dun pa
dang gnod sems dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams dang lhan cig grogs pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi
bgrogs pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ chod pa dang/ kun nas dkris pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ radar sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed nga thams cad dang lhan
cage mi 'grogs pa dang/ red pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yide la byed pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'gogs pa dang/ ra'adzin pa dang/
nga yir 'dzin pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa ste/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisami 'grogs pa khod du chud par bya'o/
gas kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'ani yal bar 'dor ba bcu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa 'chos yongs su badzin
pa al bar 'dor ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so// dam pa'i chos nyan du al bar 'dor ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so// sems can yongs su yin rar byed pa ya'abar 'dor ba dang/
! lhan cig mi 'grogasaso// dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la/la bar 'dor ba dang lhan cig me 'grogasaso// bla ma thams cad 'a rim gro bya ba yal bar 'dor ba dang lhan yig mi 'grogs so//
bdud kyi las yal bar 'dor ba dang lhan cigamo 'grogs sa// mu stagag can dkrug dog yal bar 'do ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so// dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa yul bar
'dor ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so// pha rol tu phun pa yal bar 'do ba dang lhan cig mi bgrogs so// thung ngo gsum pa'i yongs su bsngob yul bar 'dor ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs/
sgyute byang chub samasadang 'ani u'abar de bar bcu po de dag dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so// byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi 'phrul bachen po rnam pa bcur khong du chud par bya ste/
rnam pa bcugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor la sgyur bar 'phul ba dang/ brgya byin du 'phrul pa dang/ tshos par 'dzul ba dang/ nyan thos su 'phrul ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas su 'phrul
btsa ba dang/ byang chub sems dpar 'phrul ba dang/ sangs rgyas su 'thul bdang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'phrul ba dang byang chub kyi snying por 'thul ba dang/ 'khor chen por 'dul
bste/ bcu po de dag gni byang chub sam dang ba rnams kyi 'phrul pa chen po'i khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phrulab chen po'adi dag thams cad ni gzhan gyi bsam pa
las gyur pa rab lta'o// de la nam 'jig rten 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgya' pa gtso bor byed cing tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang/ srid pa gtso bor byed pa// de ni byang chub sams dang ba
sems dpa' chen po 'khor lnga sbyar ba'i bkod pa rnams spo lanas sems can gyi don byed do// de la 'khor lo rin po tshon rtsabs stong yod pa/ lha dang ni de bas shan tu 'dasab 'dzam bu chu bo'i
gser las grub pa mgarangs mi brdungs pa/ rang gi sono'amadung/ bsod nams kyi rdzu 'khrul gyi mthu las byungababalta bas mi ngoms pa'i gzugs can nam mkhab la 'gro ba ste 'khor 'khos
sgyur ba b.lagazhan rnams kyi lta bu ma yin no// glang po/ni patshani chu zhang phun sum tshogs pa thal kar mchab drug yod pa lta bas mi ngoms pa'i gzugs can nam mkha' la 'gro ba mgyogs pa'i shug
phun sum tshogs pa sa srung gi bu dang/ nam mkha'alding ltar mgyogs pa legs par bskyod pa'i las kyi mthu las byung ba ste// 'khor lo sgyur ba phalagazhan rnams kyi lta bu n yin no
ma/ @#// rta ni bon thams cad gopa cang shes pa rta'i rgyal po skrun gyis shugs can dang mtshungs pA/ rlung ltar mgyogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar ng sam pa tsam gyis
phyin par byed panAm mkha' la 'gror/ khor la sbyang ba phu'agazhan rnamasukyi lta bu ma yin no// nor bu ni po tshon byur brgya pa bzo mkhan gyis ma byas pa/ bodadun sum tshog
pa ma dang nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis non pa/ gang dag 'dogur 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa// 'dod dgu tshun sumatshogs par sbyin pa/ bsam pa thams cad yodas su rdzogs par byed
ste/ 'khor los sbyang ba la gzhan rnams kyi lta bu ma an ni// dmadarin po che ni nga rang yang mi kar/ ha cang yang mi sngo/cad cang yang mi ring/ ha cang yang mi thung/ ha cang
yang mi snyam/ hatsang yang mi spom pa/ bdul ba'i cho ga phun sumatshogs pa bstan bcos dang/ sgyu rtsal sna tshogs mngon par shes pa mnyen zhing zab la snyan par/ ba phun sum
kyi tshogs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mtshungs pa// 'dzum pa dang/ tshul dunasum tshogs pa dang/ chos dpa la 'jug pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs can/ 'khor lo sgyurab phal

gzhan rnams kyi ltabu ma yin no// khyim bdag rin po che ni lag na rdo rjadang 'dra ba chu zheng rnam thos kyi bu dang sred med kyi bu dang 'dra ba rtag tu mnyen zhing snyan la/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'byin
pa sha'i mgesgrib pa med pa dang ldan ng/ byams pa dang snying rje mnga' ba/ 5de bzhin gyi nor bu 'dododagur 'dzud pa/ min po che dge ba'i rtsa bskal ba na nyam nga sa grub pa ste/ 'khor losgyur/
ba phalagazhan rnams kyi lta bu ma yin no// blon po ni po tshani rani pomi rigasamalta'u/ dge ba'irtsa ba rnams kyis gzugs bar nadu gyur ba/ sngar sdang zhing bsam padagi ba bltas pa dngomi/
rig rig byas pas den go bo/ las babrang po dang rgyas pa dang/ rdzogs pa dang masmad pa byed da/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'dod dgur 'gro ba 'byor ba ste// 'khor lo sgyur ba phal gzhan rnams
kyi lta bu ma yin no/ de la so gas pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rin po che bkod pa thams cad skyel nas byang chung sems dang ba sems la dbang ba/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i/
lhag pa'i bsam pa can mirin ngo re/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las zub pa/ snumapa/ dran pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dan pa chos chen po la gzholal/ 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po dge ba
bcu'i las kyi la ma la sten pa// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa// sems can rnams yod pa su smin par byed de/ 'dini byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor le sbyar bar
'dzulab chen po zhes bya'o// nam 'jig rten brgya byani gtso bor byed pa de na/ brgya byin gyi gzugs su sprulanas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang par zhugs te/ bag yod pa'igoSham
gyis lha rnams yongs su smin dang byed da// nam 'jig rten tshangs pa gtso bor byed pa de na/ tshangs pa bag thugs su sprul nas/ rab tu zhi ba'i bamagatan dang/
tshud med pa'i bsam gtan rnams kyisatshangs pa'i mis kyi lha rnams yongs su snyan par byed do// namasems can rnams nyan thos kyis 'dulaM ba yin gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ma
in sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bam in paden/ nyan thos kyi gzugasu sprul nas sdug bsngal zud par bya ba dang/ myang n las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i richos ston to// nam sa
can rnams rangasaargyas kyis 'dul ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyis 'dul ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ma yin pa den/ rang rangs rgyas kyi gzugasasu sprul nas/rangasas/
rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam ang dgapar rab tu ston te/ dbenang 'i gtam dang/ bdod chags dang bral ba'i gtam dang/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ homs par 'jug pa
rgyu dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ rdzu bathul gyi rkang ba'i gtam dang/ sbyine gnas chen por dbang bskur ba'i gtam dang/ rtan ba'i gtam dang/ rnamapar thar pa'i tshul gyis sems can
rnams yongs su snyan bar byed do// nam sems can rnams byang chub sems dpas 'dul bar gyur ba de na/ rang gi gzugs su gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ byin gyis brlabs bzhi
mas ]dang byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ gzungs dang/ dbang dang/ bzod pa dang 2 sa'i gtam gyis sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed do// nam sangs rgyas kyis/
'dul ba'i sems can dbang po dang khams rgya che zhing rgyas par gyur pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyigazugs su sgyur nas/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
gtam rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rdza'aphrul chen po rnams kyis sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed de// nam sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur
ba dan/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam pa// 'jam pa/ tsa lin+ti ka ltar reg na bde ba/ bezlur sngon por gyur ba// shal du gyur pa//
tsan dan sbrul gyi snying por gyurang// badzam bu'ichub 'i gsar du gyur pa// rdo dang g.yag ma dang/ gyo ma mdang/ ma tho dmanand nga/ ngan song 'gi ngang ltang ba tshe dang/ bud med rgyu ba red
pa ra nag po mad pa// rin po ches tshogs kyi ri rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ tshir mdang nga grog dang g.yang mad nga/ rin poma'i baya ljon pa dang/ spos kyi shang sna tshogs
kyis mdzes par byas pa lanas// sa mas can de dag yongs su smin par byang ko// nang ma ba nas can rnams byang chub kyi snying po rgya chen ngos 'dul bar 'gyur bde na byang chub kyi bang
dbag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad du mngon par sprul te rtsa ba shin tu zug pa/ sdong po ni 'dzam bu chu bo gser/ yalanigab ra dang dngul dang ba lharma dang shel dang rin po che/
tha dad pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyi lo mas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i bu mo brgya stongadu gnas par sprul nas len dang/ can de dag longs su smin par byed do// nam sems can rnams 'khor rgya chen pos
bdul bar 'gyur ba den/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lo'abya chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa
dang 'jig rten skyong ba// gabri brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba sprul/ nyan thos so so yang dag par rigapa thob pa/ gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grolob dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu
la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nga 'dzin thob pa rnames lanasasamangacan dadag yongs su smin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu chos kyitshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis/ byang chub
sgyu mas dada' rnams kyis 'phrul pa chen po khong du chud par bya'o/ @/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang sachos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus dgab rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang khong du
chud bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste dang ra na/ chu zlani nam mkha'i zlapa'i gzugs ldan yin mod kyi/ chu zun yod pa ma yin no/ de bzhin du dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i
mas rkyen las rnam par smin pa dge ba sna tshogs yid du bong ba byung ste/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i zla ba chu'i nang du mi 'pho ba de bzhin du/ dge ba'i 'a1 kyi srid pa 'du byed rnam// yang srid pa'i
'du byed rnams su bgopa yang ma yone la/ las kyi srid pa'i skyon las yang srid nga 'i rnam par smine pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo// 'di lta ste dper na/ rma bya'i mdong su gcig las srog
chags rnams lagazugs du mar snang ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dag pa mngon par 'du bya ba gcig las rnam par sAni pa rnam pa du mar snang ste/ 'as kyi srid pa'i
bdu byed de dag rma bya'i ldongasasum 'pha mdakyidab kyin 'a sarma bya'i ljongs kyis rnam par smin pa'i dbangab nyid kyang 'byung ngo// de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid du bsags pa yang srid
ngara'apho ba ma yin ang/ dge ba'i las kyi srid pa las rten nas/ yang srid pa'i rnam par snyan pa'i dbung ba nyid kyadaM 'byungadro/ 'di lta snyadang ngan/ shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed ngs/ nam mkha' las me togagi 'char 'babacingam rtog de dag gzugs dang dri lags ngar dbang ba nyid du 'gyur yang/ gang dge ba'i
rtsa ba ngo mtshar rmad du byung babyas pa de dag nam mkha'i me tog de dag tu badzaste/ ngo mtshar rmad du byungaba'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan la/ ma rtog de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gzhan no//
de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyis ded pa ang/ ang srid pa'i dge ba'i 'pho ba yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i las kyi sridapa'i rnam bar s+sane pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo//
'dit+ta ste dbaran/ shin dutshog srodab rnams lasal sAna rnams ma bskyod par mchod pa'i las kyi ri/ rang sgra 'byung ba yang chos spyodang de sel snyan rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te/ saMspyod/
ba'i mtshan nyid kyang gazhanAl/ sal snyan de dgagi mtshan nyidikyang gazhan mod kyi/ chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis so'i snyan rnams cha bskyod bar rangasgra'abyung ngo// de bzhin du rab tu byas bi'o
dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i 'du byed rnams/ yang srid pa'i'adu byed rnams su 'bo ba ma yin te/ ring du tshes grod pa 'i skyon gyis btuyang sride ba'i rnam par snyan pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang
'byung ngo// 'dilta ste dbang na 'byung ba chen po'i dbang gisanam mkha' la 'ja' 'byud angar 'byung ba chen po rnams 'pho ba yang ma yin la/ 'byung ba chen de'i rkyen gyis 'ja'agazugs

kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyidakyapo'abyung ste/ de la gab kha dogaskya bor snang ba de ni sa'i khams kyi dbang ngo// de la gang kha dogasngon por snyang ba de ni chu'i khams kyi dbang ngo// de lagang kha
dog dmar por snang ba de ni ma'i khams kyidabang ngo// gang gzhu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'am/ zlum por 'dug pa don rlung gi khams kyidabang ngo// de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed
wa ]byas pa rnams kyi dgaba'i las kyi sridang 'i dbang gis/ yang srid nga 'i rnam par sun pa'i dbang banyid 'byang ngo// 'di lta ste dparan/ 'khor le sbyor ba'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lan gyi sdom
pa'i rkyen gyis rin po che sna bdun dang/ 'bras sa bon ma btab ma rjes par 'byung yang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamagyi sdom pa rkyen du gyur ba de/ rin po che de rnams dang 'bras rnams su
ba'osapa ang ma yin la/ go ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa'i rkyen gyis 'khor losgyur ba'idab ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo// de bzhin du dge ba lags bcas pa shin tu thar phyin pa legs pa'i
brtsams pa las/ yang srid pa'idage ba'i rnamar/ra snyaning 'byung yang/ las kyi srid pa yang srid par 'gro bam in te/ de'i bar rnam par gne pa mi 'drab zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper
na lha rab tu drage ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi me togaman+dar bskyod mi dgosang dang/ gzhal med khang bya mi dgos dang/ bdud rtsi'i zas bsgrub mi dgos par 'byung yang dgo ba'i 'du byed kyi las

kyi rnam par sAne ba de dag 'bri ba ma yin te/ dge ba 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis lha'i rnam par gnepa'i dbang ba 'byung ngo// 'di lta ste dngangani/ rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrula'adon par 'du
byed pa'i rkyen gyis sgribs pa med par dbang ba nyid 'byung ba yang/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa sgrib ba mid par 'bo ba angam in la/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed po'irkyen gyis rdzu
baphrul dang ldan pa rnams kyis sgrib pa med pa yang 'byang/ ri 'al sogs pa 'bub yang med pa ine/ bsam pa/can gyis sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang yin// 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyis sgrub
de bzhin du bgayodaba rnams kyi dag ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyenagyis/ yang srid pa'i rnam par snyan pa'i dbang ba nyid du 'byung ngo// 'dilta sted/ ngan/ rlung gyirkyen gyis ma 'byung gi de/
med par mi 'byung// ma 'byung nad tshos bar bya bar snang ba la sogs pa ra rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung yang/ ma'i dbang ba de rlung dang/ shing rnams la ma 'apo lam la ma'i
dbangar nyid dopa yang ma yinono// dang zhin du rkyen thams cad las// skyes pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnamapar/ne pa yang so sor khong du chud par bya'o// 'di ltastadabanarnal 'byor dpa'i
dge slo dge pa zad pa med pa'i tshog sa rnam da/ra dag pa dang rab tu thob pas zad pa nam mkhar bsam pa tsam gyis de bzhin du bgyur te/ srob dang/ gsher bar tsha ba dang/ gaib/
rnams dang/ sngon po dang/ be ra ngo dang dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams kyis sgribs pa med par 'gyur ang sems kyi sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i sgrub ba med pa 'bo ba yang ma yin/
bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med da ra 'gyurab ma yin/ sems kyi sgrib pa medeb de dang mi ldan par spro ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba song ma yin no// de bzhin du rkyen las

00 byung ba'i dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad kyi rnam rasAnepa'i dbangab nyid khong du chud par bya ste// byang chub sems dang sa chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis dge ba rnams kyis rnam par
na ba'i dbangab nyid khong du chud bar bya'o// gas kyi bu byang chub sems dang sa chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus/ zag pa med pa 'dage ba rnams kyis rnam par sA ba thob pa 'i dbang ba nyid
khongadu chud par bya ste bcu gang[Q]na'adit+ta ste/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ rigs pa gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ brel gyi gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang/ zad par
gyi skye mchadangacu dang/ dbang bcu dang/ bden ba bcu dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stobs bcu dang/ shes pa bcu'o// de la mngon par
shes pa drug gang zhen/ lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa shes
pa ste 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa drug go/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mge gang zhe na/ dge ba'itshogs thams cad bsags pa ma nyams pa//
chags pa med pa/ tshad medang// sgrib pa med pa// gnas ba med pa// rma mad pa/ 'khrul pa medang/ bstan du med// kha namathob medal/ 'jig rten ba thams cad dad/ nyan thos//
dngarang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mongam inang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ phyadabar mthong ba/ pa dangar lung ston pa sku
[g]'i migasems can rnams mthong// 'chi'apho dang/ skye ba dang/ kha dog bzu bo dang/ khadog ngan nga dang/ tha ma dang/ mchog dang/ las nye bar 'gro ba jilta ba dang/ rgyudang bcas
pa dang/ rnam par smin pa dngabacas pa yang dag pa ji ltub bzhin du mthong ngo// de'i lha'i mig de nas ngs rgyas kyi shes thob par byed pa ste der nges pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa'i/
lha'i rna bani/ de 'i rna ba sgrib pa med// dag ba'i tshogs thams cad bsags ba/ byis pa so so'i skyabo dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lhadang/ kudang/
gnodaspyan dang/ drizad ng/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha'i lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad las khyad par du ga thags pa chod
pa med pa// 'od gsal bas sgrathams cad thos te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mabamachidang/ lte baphye chen po'i sgra dang/
tha mo nasbrang budang/ grog mo dang/ shasgrung dang/ 'bags pa dang/ 'bags po ma yin pa'i sgra rnams kyang thos te/ gosanas kyang 'phags ngo ma yin pa'i sgra rnams la khong khro ba yang mi
ma ka byed bdagos pa'i sgra rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi byed/ so so'i skyabo'i sgra rnamasul thamar 'du shesang angam yin/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra rnams la dam pa/nga 'a shas
rab yong ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tshul la khong khro bar yang mi byed/ 'phags pa'i tshul la rjes su chags par yang mkhyid/ sgragang la yang yon tan du shes pa 'am/ nyes par 'du
shes bam gte/ gzhan du skye thams cad kyang brag cha lta bu dang stong pa/dad/ g.yo bgad pa dang bdag dang bdag gi mdacing dben par rab tushes kyang/ rna bskye mched 'bad pa yangs
na sgra'i skye mched 'bad pa yang m yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rna ba ni 'di lta bu m Anano// de la byang chub sems dang 'i pha rol gyi sams shes pa'i radago sims yongs su shes
ba dang ldan pa ani te/ derang gi sems yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyisamasakyi spyod nga rab tu shes te/ sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag gi
'dod chags dang dus rab sams kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa jilab bzhin rab tu shog/ 'dod chags dang brel ba'i sams kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sam su
yang dag nga lta bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang gang 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'isamasad la khong khro bar yang mi byed/ gang 'dod chags dang bral ba'isams de la rjes suchags par
wa @#/ yang mi byed/ gzhan du na 'dod chags dang bcas pa rnams la snying rje chen po nyidad// 'dod chags dang bral brnanas byams pa chen porAd do// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang/
bcas ba dang/ zhesdad med pa dang/ gti mug dang bcas ba dang/gti mugamad pa dang/ srid pa dang bcas pa dang/ srid pa ni da pa dang/ len pa dang bcas pa dang/ len pa med pa dang
nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ tshad dang ldan bar/ tshad dang mi ldan ba dang mnyam par gzhag pa dang/ mnyam bar mi gzhug pa dang/ rnam par grolapa'i
sems dang/ rnam par ma grol ba'i sems kyang yang dag badzilta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shesanas kyang sems rnam par ma grol ba rnams la khong khro bar yang mi byed/ sams rnam par
grol ba rnams la rjes su chags ngar angami byed d/ gzhan dunasems rnam par grol ba rnams 'byams pa chen po dadado// dems rnam par grol ba rnams la snying chen po red do//
sems thams cad shes kyang sems de la sanas des snyams yang mad/ rlom sems kyang medudo// de la pha rol gyi bem rangashes ba des sems can thams cad kyisanas dang srid pa rab
tu shes so// sems can de dag gyis nibyang chub sems daba'ades skabs ma phyi'i bar du shes te/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i e shes kyis kyang mi shesan/ phalo ba gzhan
ma/ rnams kyis shes par mi 'gyur ba lta ci sos te/ 'di ni bya chub sems dpa' pha rol gyi sems shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dang banibadag dang sems can gzhan rnams kyi sngon/

gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjesasu na te/ desbyab gcig kyang rjes su dran no// skya bganyis dang/ skye ba brgyang ng/ skye ba brgya phrag stong sa/ de la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang bag tu mad/ gras
mdang rjed su dran no/ 'jig pa'i skal pa ang rjes su dran no chags po'ikhasalapa'i ng rjes su dran no// 'jigang dang tshags pa'i bskal ba yang rjes su dran ba nas/ bsal nga chen
po bar ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i bar du rjes su dran te/ dran pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpangs bcu la rab zhu gnas pa rnams m
gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bdag ge mo zhig tu 'di 'drab r gyur te/ gsani 'di zhes bya/ rusazhi 'di zhes bya/ mdogani 'di ltabu/ ming ni
bdizhes bya/ kha brasani'adi lta bu zhig za3/ tsha gnas pa ni 'disridatsag thub/ mu'angani'adi lta bu/ bdeb dang sdug bsngal nib lta bu zhig myong sku/ bdagadenus shi thos nas ga ge mo
zhig tu skyes// de nas kyashi 'gos nas 'dir skyes te/ shigs 'di zhes bya/ sani'adi zhes bya mdogani 'di lta bu (mingan 'dikas bya/ khazasani 'di lta bu zhig khaza 2 tshani 'ditsam
zhug thub/ chu zheng ni 'dil bu/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni bdilta bu zhig myong ngo zhes rjes su dran te/ bdag gi lta bar ngesems can thams cad kyi yang de bzhin te/ than sbrang bu/
dang grog mo rnams kyi yang rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa donags po mdang/ rgyun mi 'chad nga/ sgrib pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa// dus su bsalab med pa/ byams pa chen bo dang/
sAde rjechen po dang rab tu ldan r/ zab pa/ gting dpag dka' ba/ bag la nyal bamed pa/ bgachags kyis mtshams sbyor ba rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thanag
cad kyis brgyan pa ste/ 'din byang chub sems dpa'i ston gyi gnas rjes su dran babashas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrulabya ba shes pa bsod nams dang ye
shes thams cad kyis brtan ba gling ba mdang// lcan gyis grub pa/ rnam ramabartags nga/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ mi gyurab dang
ang dag par sdom pa dang/ des nga dang/ bsan gtanadang/ ting nge 'dzin dang 2 snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su sbyang bacos pa/ bdag dang/ sa ngas rgyas dang/ lha'i dbang dang/
ldan pa ste/ de rdzu 'phrul mngon du gyur pa mngon par 'du bya bamedang/ sgrib pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa des sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ jiltar
'dod pa de ltar byin gyis brlab bo// jiltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ul rnams ston to// byang chub sems dpa' de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang ni thams cad du thogs ba mad par 'jug ste/ deg la te
sems can gcig la sems can thams cad kyi gzugs kyis 'dul bar 'gyuran/ soms can gcig po de'i mdun du sims can thams cad kyi gzugs snod drilta ba bzhin duston te/
sprul ba de dag thams cad kyang byed pa dang/ kha zas dang/ skya ba dang/ spyod pa tha dad du 'jug go/ de 'dod nasems can thams cad kyi gzugs sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su song na yang
sems can thams cad kyigazugs sangs rgyas kyi gzugasasu 'gyurano// sangs rgyus kyi gzugs bsems can thams cad kyi gzugs su mos na yang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
sems can thams cad kyi gzugasasu 'gyur ro// 'jig pa'i bskal pa chags pa'i bsalar ramosan ang/ 'jig pa'i bsalang chags rab sal par 'gyur te/ sems
can de dag gi kyang chags pa'i bskal par shesaso// chags pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa'ibaskal par mos na ang/ chags pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa'i bskal par gyur to/ sems
can de dag gis kyang 'jig pa'i bskal par shes so// 'jig pa dang chags pa a ngagazhan du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ mos pas de ltar yang 'gyur go de bzhin du bskal pa gcig
kaglu// snga dro tsam du mas naang/ de nas ms cand dag gis bskal pa gcig snga rdo tsamadu shes so// stadrod lab tsam du mang sanayang dedabazhin du 'gyur te/ den sams
[! ]can de dag gis de bzhin du shes te/ 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa las byung ba'i rdzu'aphrul zhes bya'o// de la mngon par du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrulanIgang/ byang chub sems dapa'i
bsam gyis mi khyab ba'ibasodanams dang/ ashosakyi dbang dang/ lhun gyis grub pas bsgrib pa medabar thunasumatshogs pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing 'grub bsta/ 'di ni byang chub
sems daba'i mngon du 'gyur pa'i rdzu 'dzul zhes bya'o// de 'byang chub samasu dba'i mngon ng ra'adu byed ba med pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrulani/ gang byang chub sems dpa' misams mi
'jug cing lhun gyis grub pas/ sems can de dgags mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byung chub sems dba' de gzugs dang/ dalam tha da ngar mthongo kha'i shes te/ 'dinibyang chub semA
tshudanga'i ma na por 'du byed pa med nga la byung ba'iN+Da'agrul zhes bya'o// de 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed sems can rnams sangs rgyas babyung bas bdu'a'a'i 'jig rten gyi khams
de sudadu sangs rgyas 'byungab ston te/dga' ldan gyis gnas nas 'chi'aphob dang/ mngal du 'jug pa dang/ bas pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka'ang sprod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying
0/ ngor 'gro ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyab dang/ chos kyi 'khor lerab tu bskor ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pachen po ston pa rnams kyi sems can
dag yongs su snyaneng ra byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a rdzu 'phrul gyi yulatshadamed pa yin te/ 'dini byang chub sems dang 'i rdzu 'thul bya ba shes pa zhes byago de la byang chub sems
dad 'i zag pa zad pa shes bgang zhan/ 'di dagazhi zagang bzhi ste (bzhig nga zhen/ 'dod ra'i zag pa dang/ srid pa'i zag pa dang/ mngag pa'izagapa dang/ staba'i zagang ste//
byang chub sems dang khan zag pa de dag yongs su spangs ba in/ ma bongs nga nami skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur zhing phyir mis mi bgagaste// 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du soms can rnams la/
thanas cad du skye ba yang ston 'din/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam lhun gyis grub pa so rgyun mi chadang ra 'jug ba zhes bya ste// 'di dagani byang chub sems dang 'i mngon nga ra shes badrug go/ de
la byang chub samasadang 'irig pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig gi rig pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran bab rig pa dang/ zag pa zungapa'i rig pa ste/ rig ni shes pa zhes
bya'o// de la lha'i mig gishes pa ni/ lha'i mig girig pa yin no// lha'i mig gig bgang yin pa de na/ rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mchoga rnams kyiyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'am
gi yi gar dedad ldan pa yan no/ rnam par dag ba'i lhani nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams te de dgan rnam par dag pa'i lha rnam par dag pa'i
dedagaga mchogani/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/ rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mchog rnams zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dang bani rnam par
dag pa'i lha'i tshog sa rnams kyi lha'i mig gi rig pa gang yin bde thob// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltar ma yin ba 'din ngag bdang po'o// de la sngon gyi gnas
rjes su dran pa'i rig pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs ba la ston gyi mtha' mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma rig pa 'am/ ma rtogs pa gang yang mi mnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' nirig pa de thob ste/ nyan
thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltar ma yin 'di nirag pa gnyis ba'// de la zag pa zad ng 'i rig pa gang zhan/ zag ba bzhi// bzhigang zhan/ 'dod pa'i brag pa dang/ srid
ba'i zag pa dang/ ma rig pa'izag pa dang/ ltaba'izagapa ste/ zag pad dag byang chub sems dapasakhagachags dang bcas par slongaba'i lam gyis mngon par rtogasate/ nyan thosang/

rang sangs rgyas rnams ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'ilam gyis ni ma yin no/ de zag pa zad nas sems can yod susminapar bya ba'i phyir skye ba'i gnas thams cad du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa thogs
pa med ba yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa thod pa'i rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dges pa gsum mo// de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can
gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs mdang ra 'dushes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams l ltab 'di ni rnam par tharapa gnyis pa'o// sdug
ngar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam ba thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams 'das yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig/
snatshogs kyi 'du shos rnams yid lamabyed sa/ nam mkha'amatha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skyonachad rdzogs par byas te gnas pa'i dini rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/
de rnam pa thams cad dunam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'jus te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnanashis mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnag
ba 'din rnam par thar pa lnga pa// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mthub sa skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ tsi yang mad dosAm nas/ ci yang mdang 'i skya mched rdzogs par byas
te gnang/ pa 'din rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang mad pa 'i skye mchedalas yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med bdushes mdaman skye mched rdzogs par byas nas/
gnas 'di'i rnam par thar babadun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchedalas yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog
ba rdzogs par byas nas nga 'din rnam par thar pa brgyud pa'o// de lajiltar n gzugs can gzugs la lta zhon/ rten cade'abrel par 'byung ba dang/ stong nga dang g.yo ba med par lta bas
de ltar lta bas rnam par grol te// de'i phyir rnam par thar nga zhes bya'o// nAng gzugs med ngar 'du shes ngas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams lo ltaban stong ba nyid dang/ rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba dang/ g.yo ba med par de ltar lta bas rnam par 'grol te/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o// phyug par mos pa yin te/ sdug pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa'o// mi sdug pani lta bar
gyur pa'o// sdug par mos pa rnam par 'grol te/de'i phyi'i rnam par thar ba zhes bya'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i'adushes
rnams nub par gyur cang/ sna tshogs kyi bdu shes rnams yadi lam byed ngas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkhab mthubayas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes bya
bal nam mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes bya ba'i nam mkha'ani stong pa'o// de ltar mthong bas rnam par grol te/ de'i phyir rnam par thar ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
maTha/skye mched las ang dag bar 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' as skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas zhes bya ba la rnam shesamatha' yas zhes
bya ba'i rnam par shes pa don thog mu mad nga can du bshad de/ gang thog ma med pa can ni stong pa'o// de ltar mthong bas rnanang ra bgrol te/ de'iphyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o// de rnam pa tham
cad du rnam shesamatha' yas skye mchad las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang ma dad snyamun s/ ci nga mod pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gas zhes bya ba'acayazhedwang zhes bya ba ni 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams so/ ci yang med pa zhes bya ban de dgamad pa'o// daltar mthong bas rnam par 'grol te/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o// de rnam pa/
thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las ang dag par bdasato/ 'du+isamed 'du shes med pa'i skyo mchad rdzogs par byas nas/ gnas zhes bya ba la 'dushes med ces bya ban stong pa'i
phyir ro// 'du shesamadamen zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de ltar mthong bsa rnam par 'grol te/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o// de rnamar thunus cad du 'du shes
chod 'du shes med man mchod las a'adag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas zhes bya ban bde re snyam du sems te/ 'du shosan smig rgyu lta bu/
tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ 'dushes nyidi tsho ba/ tshor ba nyid du shes zhan pa/sa/ 'di la shes pa po med/ tshor ba po med do snyam nas/ de ltar mthong bsa rnam ra/
'grol te/ de'i phyi'i rnam par shar pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag nas dar thar pa brgyad do// de la zil gyisaganonang 'iskya mchadabargyud gang zhen/ gzugs can gzugasa rnams la lta shing de dag bral
gyis mnan nas shos/ zalagyisananananAsa mthong ba 'din grol gyis gnon pa'i sku mched dang ngo 'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes bas/ phyi'i rol gyi gzugs khadog bzang po dang/
kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing de dag zil gyis mnananagashes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'din zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugasamed par 'du shes pa ba phyi
grol gyi gzugs tshad chudang dang/ chen por 'gyur ba kha dog bzang po dang/ khadog na pa rnams l lta zhing/ de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'di ni/
thil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nangagazugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyigazugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang/ kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing/ de dag zil gyis
mnan nagashes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'dushes pas phyi rol gyi gzugasasngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po/
sams lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byungab rnanas la lta ste/ dper na zarama'i me tog sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/
phyi la kyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lto bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta zhing/ de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'di ni/ bril
gyis gnon pa'i sku mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'dushes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dogasar po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od sar bo 'byung ba rnams l ltaste//
dparan dong ga'i ma rtogasar po kha dogaser do sar po lta bur ston pa 'dasar do'abyung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'dushes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs sur po kha dog ser po/
sar po lta bur ston pa bod/nga po 'byung ba rnams la lta zhing/ de dag zil gyis mnan nas nigashos/ bral gyis mnananas mthong ba 'di ni/ bril gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o//
nang gzugs med par 'du shes ngaso/ phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston ba 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste/ dngar nuban d+hu dzIb ka'i me tog
nga mar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugasadamarapo kha dog dmar po dmar po lta
[y]@#// dur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung po rnams la lta shing/ de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/ zil gyisamanan nas mthong ba 'di ni/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched/
bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med nga ra 'du shes pasaM/ phyi'il gyi gzugasadakar po kha dog dkar po dkar po ltabur ston pa 'dadakar po 'byung ba rnams la ltaste/ nga ran skar ma pa wa sangs
dkar po kha dogadakar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dakar po'abyung bde bzhin du/ nang gzugs med par bshos pas phyi ro'agyigazugaso dkar po kha dog dkar bodakar po lta bur ston pa 'o//
dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta zhing/ de dag zil gyis mnanaMnas nig shes/ hrilagyis mnan nas mthong ba don/ b.legyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la
bad dar gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zad ng ras dang/ zid par chudang/ zad nga ram dang/ khrod par rlung dang/ zad par nam mkha' dang/ dpar sngon po dang/zad
par sar bodong/ rbad par dmar bo dang zad nga ra dkar po dang/ da ngar rnam par shes pa// 'di dgane zad nga ra gyi skye mched bcu'o// khams thams cad sa'i khams su
mos na yang thams cad khams gcig tu 'di lta ste/ sa'i khamasanyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad chu'i khams su mosan yang thams cad khan cig tu bad lta ste/ chu'i khams nyid tu
'tsham 'gyur ro// thams cad ma'i khams sumogan ang thams cad khams gcig tu 'di lta ste// ma'i khams nyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad rung ba de khams su mos na spang thams cad khams/
cig tu 'di lta sta/ rlung gi khams nyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad m mkha'i khams su mosan yang thams cad khanas cig tu 'di lta ste/ nam ma kha'i gnas nyid du 'gyur ro// thams
cad sngon por mos na yang thams cad sngon po nyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad bar dor mos na ad thams cad sar ngo nyid du 'gyurar// thams cad dmar por mos na yang thams cad dmar
po nyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad dakar par mos na ang thams cad dkar po nyid du 'gyur ro// thams cad rnam par shes par nosan ang/ sa dang/ chu dang 2 ma dang/ rlung dang/
nam mkha' dang/ sngon po dang/ sarapo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po thams cad rnam da shes pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de'i phyir khrudar gyi skye mched ces bya'o// zad par gyi skyab
'phel bar byed pas/ de'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o/ deraang skye mched thams cad du 'gyurabs deb phyir zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o//
bam po gsum pa/// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshe la dbang po dang/ sems la dbang bdang/ yo byad la dbang ba dang
ba/ @#// las la dbang ba dang/ skye ba la dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ mos pa la dbang po dang/ smon lam la dbang ba dang/ ye shes la dbang ba dang///
chos la dbang bste/ de dag ni dbang bcu'o// dol bdud rtsi thob pa'i phyir tshe lo dbang ba'o// sams tsam du yongs su shes pa'i phyir sems ladabang ba'o// lag na rin po che dang/ nam
mkha' mdzod rab tu rnyed pa'i phyir yo byad la dbang ba'o// bag chags dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'o ma zhun tshad pa'i phyir las la dbang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rnam par bzlog ba'i bsam gtanared
pa'i phyir skye ba la dbang ba'o// lhun gyis grub par bya ba la'ajug pa thob pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba'o// zad par gyi skye mched thob pa'i phyare mos pa la dbang ba'o// bsam pa/
tsam gyis don thob pa'i phyir smon lam la dbang ba'o// ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang gdung yid kyi las thob pa'i phyir shis 'dang ngadal/ de bzhin nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs dang/
yang dag pa'imatha' mnyam pa'i ashesadim med pa'i phyir chos la dbang ba'o// gzhan ung rigs kyi bu 'jig rten ni 'chi bas 'jigs skrag// de'i gnyen por tshil dbang ba'o// 'jig rten ni
sams kun nas nyonamos pas 'jigs skrag ste/ de'i gnyen porasams la dbang ba'o// 'jig rten ni yo byad kyis 'jig skrag ste de'i gnyen por yo byada' dbang ba'o// 'jigarten ni nyes par
sam/ spyod nga sa 'jigs skrag ste/ dwa'i gnyen po ra las la dbang ba kho// 'jig rten ni ngan 'gros 'jigs skrag ste/ de'i gnyen por skyabaladabangaba'o// 'jig rten ni kun tu tshol ba'i 'a khongs pas
'jogis phyag ste/ de'i gnyen por rdzu 'phrul 'a dbang ba'o// 'jig rtenanadam pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'phos bar 'gyurabo'i las kyis 'jigs skrag ste/ de'i gnyen dang mos pa la
dbang ba'o// 'jig rtenani 'dod pa'i tshong bas 'jigs skrag ste/ de'i gnyen par smon lam 'dabangaba'o// 'jigarten ni the tshom gyi zug rdus 'jigs skrag ste/ de'i gnyen por ye shes la
dbad ba'o// 'jig rtenani 'khor gyi nangan bag tsha bas 'jigs sprugaste/ de'i gnyen por chos la dbang ba'o// gzhan angs kyi bu srog gcod nga spangs shing/ sems can thams cad
la khong khro ba'i sems med pa ni tshe la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// bde ba rnams la sgrib ba med pa'i byams pa chen po dang/ sdug bsngal ba rnams la sgab pa med pa'i sAng rje chen po ni
sams ladabang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// sems snyoms shing dngos po thams cad yongs sugatong ba byang chub tu bsngo ban o byed la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// las dang bya ba la
zhugs nas lus dang ngag dang yod yongasaM su dag pa'i las kyis// las kyi bya ba las bdag gir bya ba la 'jug par ston pan las 'dang nga ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// byang chub kyi sems
kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi laman skye ba la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgya'o// redapa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa thams cad smin
pa dang/ gzhon pa spune pa ni rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgya'o// sems can thams cad dkon mchog gsum la 'god cinge 'dzud de/ mos par byed pa ni mas bu la dbang ba thob/
par bya ba'i rgyu'o/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang/ yid yongs su dag par sgrub ban smon lam la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o/ thang thing nad nga'i dems kyis chos kyi sbyin
pan e shes la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// sems can thams cad la chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud dur byed pa dang/ chos mtshungs bar ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
ni chos kyi sku ste/ zang zing gi sku ma a nan zhis yongs su 'byed pani chos la dbang ba thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu'o//
de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltaste/ kun rdzob kyi riden pa dang/ donadam pa'i bden pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyibaden pa dang/ rnam par
dbye ba'i bden pa dang/ phyi sta rtog pa'i bden pa dang/ dngos po'abaden pa dang/ nus pa'i bden pa dang/ zad pa dang mi skyabashesanga'i bden pa dang/ lam la 'jug pa shes pa'i
ba la/ bden pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun 'byung ba'i bdunang ste 'di dag ni bdenapa bcu'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni tshad dang 'brel ba yul ongs su chad pa kun tu tha snyad
dgag ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi rkyen kyi dbang gis nang tshud brgya chen po ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni kun rdzob kyi bdenang 'o// de ladon dam pa'i bden pa ni zab pa stong pa nyidadang rab tu ldan pa/
yul yongs su ma chad pa// gzhan gyi rkyenagyisam yane pa mnyamang/ mi mnyam pa med pa/ ma 'khrug pa// rtsod pa mad pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan
nyidede/ 'din don dam pa'i bden pa'o// de la mtshan nyid kyibaden pa ni/ gnod pa mtshan nyid sdug bsngal ba/ rang du skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni kun 'byung ba/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid ni
'gogo pa/ nges par 'byon pa 'i mtshan nyid ni lam sta/ 'di ni mtshan nyid kyi bden pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos thams cad rad bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas
nges par gyur ba la 'jug ste/ mtshan nyid 'dusu gyur ba'i nges par gyur pa ni mtshan nyid kyi bdon du zhes bya'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad rangabazhin gyis zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang/ rang bzhan/
gyis dben po'i mtshan nyid dang/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ rang bzhin gyis mi skye mi 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas/ nges par gyur pa la 'jug ste/ mtshan nyid las
'gyur pa'i nges par gyur pa ni mtshan nyid kyi bden pa zhes bya'o/ de la rnam par phye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dang ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa las gzhan gyi dbang
gas rnam par phye ste bstan pa bo// mtshan nyid gcig ces bya pan stongang nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa// smon pa med pa mngon par 'du

mi byed ba ma skyes pa// ma 'byung ba ma 'gags pa// 'di na stongang nyidade'i rnam par dbye ba ste/ rnamad ra dbye ba dedag thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de ltar stong pa nyid la/

bslu bar mi byed pa de'i phyir rnam po radabye ba'ibaden pa zhes bya ste/ 'dun rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la bya ste rtog pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ phral nas rtog pa ni phyis rtog pa ste/
sa par sams pa rigang// mthong ba khong du chudang/ man ngar rtogasang shes pa// shes bya la mi sla ba ste/ dag phyir pha sa rtog pa'ibadenang zhes bya'o// de la das pa'i bdenapa ni
dngos ngo shes pa ste/ dngos po de dag niphung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams so// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched de dag rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ stong ba dang
dngos po med par shes te/ de ltar shes nas nges par gyur pa la 'jug pas/ de'i phyir dngos po'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la nus pa'i bden pa ni shes de dang/ songo ba de dang/ lam de
nyon mongs pa song bar bud pa dang/ stabs dad/ mi 'jigs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dug pa khong du chud pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po nyid khang du
chud par nus pa ste/ de'i phyi'i nus pa 'bedan pa zhes bya'o// de la zad ng/ra dang mi skye ba shes ba'i bden pa ni/ 'dus byas thams cad zad pa can du sten te/zad da de ungami zad la byed pa la zad
ba mdad/ gal te zad pa la du da yodadu zin na/ 'gog pa yang zad par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir zad pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// gang bad par ma 'gyur ba de mi skya! 'di ni zad pa dang mi
skya ngashes pa'ibaden pa zhes bya'o// de la lam la 'jug dngashes pa'i bden pa gang zhen/ yi shes kyi lam bsod namasudang/ ma shes kyi tshogs bsags pa gang gsachog thams/
cad ma skyes ma 'gags pa rang shes pa des 'jug cing 'dzud pa// de'i phyir lam la 'jug ngashis pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang shes kun 'byung ba'i bden pa gang
zhen/ chos kyi gne gyis dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'apa ni/ de bzhin gshegs nga ti dngashes kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ste/ dbastan pa 'i lam gyis mngon par rtogs pa'o// 'di dag
ni byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi bden pa bcu'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthar gyis gnas nga'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod
[©]// pa dag las dben pa// sdig pa mi dgeba'i chaga' sa dben pa// rtog pa dang bcas pas// dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa 'dus skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de la 'dod pa rnams n bsam gan dang ngo ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin te/ gang sradang de dag lasadaban pa'o// de lasdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
ts+tsa rnams ni chags pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug ste/ gzhi de 'gusrog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa la log par g.yamapa dang/ brdzun smad dang/ phru ma dang/
ngag rtsub po dang/ tshig bkyal ba dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnodasams dang/ log par lta ba'o// 'din sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhu bya ste/ de dag lasadaben pa ni bsam/

! gtanadang po'o// rtog pa dang lhan cig pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ste/ rtog pa de dag gang zhe na/ gang dag bsam gtan dang po dang 'thunapa'i rtog pa ste/ da cho ga bzhin du rtog cing de dag kyang dul/
kyi bsan/ de dag ni rtog pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa dang/ khong du chud pa dang/ dngo/da pa dang/ rab tu rtog pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin 'du byed pa'i rtog pa'o// del spyod pa gang zhe na/ bsam
gtan dang po dang 'thun pa'i rtogabade gnyid la spyod ba dang/ rnam par dpyod pa dang/ nye bar dpyod pa dang/ kun tu langs spyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin du byed pa dang/ sams rjes su
'gro bun dngod nga pa zhes bya ste/ de dag dang lhan cage pa ni/ rtog pa dang bcas pa// dpyod pa dang bcas bu/ bsam gtan dang po'o// dga' ba dang bde ba dben pa//
las skyes pa// de'i phyir dben pa 'das skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba zhes bya'o// rdzogs par byas te gnas zhes bya la rdzogs par byas zhes bya ba nasdom pa dang/ sdom da ra
byed pa dang/ sbed pa dad sba bar byed ba dang/ ro myang ba dang/ mngon par dga' bsu/ bsam gtan dang po de la gnas ba'i byang chub sems dang ba'i ma skye ba'i chos la bzodapar khong
du chud par bya ba'i 'dun ba dang 'dod pa thob ste/ de ma skye ba'i chos la bgrod pa'i 'dun pa dang/ 'dod pa de bsam gtan dang po snyade ngor 'du shes pa ma yin no// de nga sum
gtan gnyis pa la rtsom ste/ de ba na/gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dedag zhi bar byed nye bar zhi dor byed/ de dag lasasamasarab tu zhi bar byed cing/ bsam gtan
gnyis pa yongs su grub pa'i rgyu tshol te/ de rtagang dang dpyod pa dang bral ngas/nang yongs su dang sa sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang
ldan pa bsam gtan gnyis ba rdzogs nga rangs te gnas so/ de la nang yongs su dang ban de'i bsam gtan gnyis ba'i ma mthun pa'i phyogs kyi tshos gangain pa/deganyepar zhi
ba dang/ dang ba yin te de'i phung nang yos sudang ba zhes bya'o// rgyudagacig tu gyur ces bya ba na bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang/ dpyodang de dag thams cad rab tu zhi/
nas thams cad rab tu shis rgya mtsho'i chu ltar ro gcig tu 'gyur ba globang 'o// 'di lta stadang ngan/ rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bab pa rnams ni 'di ltaste/ lan tshu'i ror ro gag par 'gyur
rgyu bde bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' basamagartan ganyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang/ dpyod bdedag thams cad zhanas/ ro gcig tu
'gyur te/ de ring de 'dzin skyes bya'o// ting nge 'dzin de las des ngs rgyas dad chos dang dge 'dun la dga' ba skyes te dodakon mchog gsum la dga' bas dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// de las mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i 'dun pa shin tu 'bar ba dang/ shani tu 'di gsal ba dang/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba thob bo// de mi skya ba'i chos la
bzod pa la 'dun pa des// bsam gtan gnyis pa de la mi chags te/ bsam gtan gsum pa kun tu 'tsholo/ da 'disnyams du sems te/ dga' ba ni bsam gtan/
gsum ba'i sgrib pa yin no snyam nas/ de dga' ba de las 'dod chags dang bral nas/ btang snyoms can dran ng tshod su dag pa 'phogs pa rnams kyis gangad dga' ba med pa
wa/ bde ba la gnas pa zhes brjod ng bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// ting nge 'dzin de las skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa ste// gang de dga'
ba med pa'i bde ba ni gtan tu bde ba ma yin gyi/ zad pa'i chos can 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de ni rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin zhing/ de yid brtan du mi rung ngo snyam pa'i
sams de lta bu thob bo// de de ltar shes nas mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu shod pa'i 'dun pa drag po chen po thob bo// dro mi skyaba'i chos kyi 'dun pa drag pa des bde ba dang/
sdug bsngal la mngon par chags na mi skya'o/ da bde ba yang spangs te/ sngonas sdug bsngal yang brab shing/ yid bde ba dang/ yid mi bde ba yang nub bas/ bde ba skad
ma yin sdug bsnga' pa yang ma yin da// btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag ba bsam go tan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas rta gnas so// de bsam gtan bzhi pa bsnyoms par zhugs
bas gnyan pa'i sems so// yid du 'ong ba'i sems so// 'as su rung ba'isams so// 'od gsal ba'i sams so// dran pa'i sems so// bde ba de sems can thams cad
kyis mngon par ston to// de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba la mngon du phyogs pas ma skyaba'ichos la bzod pa'i snang ba skye// de yi skyo ba'i chos la bzod
ba'i snang ba skyes pa des/ bsam gtan bzhi pa sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bdeb angan yin pa de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// ga btang snyoms dang dran
pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag po la yang chags par mi byed do// de lami chagos par de la nam mkha'anyid snang bar 'gyur ro/ de thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang
dag ngar 'das te/ thogs ba'i 'du shosa rnams nub par gyur rung/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams id lam byed ngas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha'
mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs bar byas te gnas so// de 'di snyan du bsams te/ mngon 'di la gzugasan rnam pa gnyis te/ 'byung badrang/ 'byung ba lasu gyur ba'o//
de'ang byang ba'i gzugagan sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams so// 'byung ba'i lag gyur pa'i gzugasaM ni kha dog dang dri dang ro dad rag pa ste//
pas de ltar gzugs rnam pa brgyad do// gzugs dedag gi'adu shes rnams las yang dgabaraM 'das nas/ thogasaM pa'i 'du shes mi 'byung ste nub par 'gyur ro/ gangan gzugagasu'adu
shes pa don thegs bar 'du shes pa ste/ de bas na gzugs kyi 'dushesa rnams las yang dag bar 'dus na thogs pa la 'du shes rnams nub par 'gyur ro// thogs pa'i 'du shes
[rnams nuban sna tshogs kyi 'du shesa rnams yid la byed pa mi 'jug go/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed ng// nam mkha' mtha' yasaso snyam du 'jugag/ de nam mkha'
mthub saMsaso snyam nas/ nam mkha' mthub yas skya mched rdzogs bar byas te gnas so// de'ang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchedal snyoms par zhugs pa'i
'di snyam du sems te/ namam ba 'di mtha' med pas 'tha' yas so// gang la mthaba medangs deb thogasam yod nga ra gal 'gyur/ dbusaed da ra ga la 'gyur te/ de ltar chos
thalagasud thog ma dang/ tha ma dang dbus mdado sAmamo// de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams lanosnying rje chen po bskyed/ chos rnams ni nam mkha'
dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi shes pa 'jug ste/ donodi'i dan ma skya ba'i chos 'babrod pa rtsom pa'o// de rnam pa thums cad nam mkha'amatha' nas skya na chadabs yang dag par 'das te/
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas/sAm nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchadardzogs par byas te gnasas// de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang nam ma/'a 'du shes ba/'dan/ rnam par
shes par 'gyur 'o sAm/ 2 de 'di sAm dusams 'di thams cad ni rnam par shes ba tsam ste/ rnam shesan h+pha' as de yad yod pa yod ma yin/ med pa angam inano som
@#// du soms so// de de ltar snyomasad/ra zhugs pas mi skyeba'i chos la bzod pa thob ba yin te/ yas su grubu pAni ma 5no// thams cad du rnam shes mtha'/
yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/tsa ya ngamed do snyam nas ci yang med ngo 'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// ciyang medaces byas nga 'a ci yang med zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod
rgyu chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ ga pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang/ ings su rtog pa dang/ 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad dang/ ang dag nga ma yin pa kun tu rtog/
pa las byung ba rnams ni ci yang med zhes bya'o// ci yang med pa ni ji skad du rjod bde dag las chung ngur gyur/ phra par gyur pa ni ci yang nadwang zhes bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sem/
dpa'i mi spyi ba'i chos la bzod pa ni shin tu 'bar ba/ shin tu 'od gsalab yin no// de rgyud dang skyon de dang/ gzhi de dang thob pa de'i phyir ci yAng med pa'i skye mched lumu chags te de
gong du rtsol la// de gong du rtsol ba na 'disAmadu sams te 'di ni gang 'du byed rnams kyi phra ba 'dri yang med par yongs su brtags pa ste de ni 'du shes med 'du shesamad pa yang ma
yin na snyam mo// de la 'du shes med pa ni stonganga'i phyir ro// 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'aphyira'o// de 'du shes med 'du shes mdamin skye
'am/ muched mngon du gyur te/ de rnam pa thams cad du ci angamud pa 'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shesamud men mched rdzogs par byas na gnas so//
de de la gnas nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang la 'du shes med 'dungoshes mdamin skye mched de la dga' ba ci zhig yod snyam de blo de las gong du bskyod do// de blo de las gong du
bskyod nas skya ba mad pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos mngon du 'gyur te/ dotshos thams cad ma skas pa dang/ ma 'gags par mthudang// de chos thams cad rang bzhin
gyib 'gags par mthong nas ma 'jug mi ldegag/ dada'i phyir ma skye ba'i chos la bzod par yongs su dag pa yongs su dal inano// de de las gong du lhan gyis 'grub pa rgyun mi
'chad par 'jugasdu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu gang
zhen/ 'dilta sta mos pa'i stobs dang/ so sor rtogos pa'i stobs dang/ bsgom pa'i stobs dang bzod pa'i stobs dang// ye shes kyi stobs dang/ spong ba'i stobs dang/
thos pa'i stobs dang/ sdobs pa 'i stobasad/ bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ bab pa 'i stobs so// de la mos pa'istobasagang zhen/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
gang dang gang mos dar de de ga'i da bzhin du 'gyur de'i chos pa'i stod sa de'i lce dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bu'i gyis kha gnon mi nus te/ 'din byang chub sems dpa'i
mos ba'i stong sa zhes bya'o// de la byung chub sems dang bas sor rtog pa'i stobs gang zhan/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags skyes pa mi sdug pa bsgoms pas zhi bar bye dado/

ts+tso zhe sdang skyes pa byams pa bsgoms ngas zhi bar byed do/ gti mug skyes pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgoms pas zhi bar byed do// gshe ba dang mi snyan par zer ba rnams ni brag cha dang mtshungs
bar yodog gung gos bas zhi bar byed do/ bsod pa dang bcing ba dang gor 'jug pa rnams ni 'os bdag gir bya ba shes ngas zhi bar byed do// lus la bsngages pa dang/ lus la gnod
pa dang lus la nyamang ba rnams zhig zugs brnyan dang mtshungs par shes ngas zhi bar byed do/ de ltar kun nas niyon mos pa'i sgo dzisnyad par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa'i
sgo yang desnyad du mthong/ 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i sosar rtogs nga'i stobag shosabya'o// de'abyang chub sems dpa'i stobs gang zhe na/ granganos ra sa spyod pa'is dang/ skyed
babs la bar du gcod por byed pa'i chos de dag gi/ byang chub sems de la bar chad byed mi nus so// des mthong ba dedang lamade las lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dbul bar mi nus
te 'di ni byang chub se mas dpa'i bas+saMmang 'astabs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'i bgrod pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni sprad kyang brag cha'i sgra/
dang mtshungs par shes pa 'astobs kyis sur so bar mi byed do// bsdigs shing ba rdegs kyang gzugs bar n dang mtshungs pa nyid du shes ngas slar ma stegs ni rdeg go/ gshe angasams
glu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid du shes pa'i stobs kyis slab ma gshe'o// khros kyang nom nga ra dag bar ng shes ba'i stobs kyis slar mo khro'o// 'jig rten gyi chos rnam par dag bar shesanga'i
stobs kyis 'jig rtenagyis chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so// rten cing 'brel bar 'abyung ba rnam par dag par shes pa 'a stobs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brje'o//
de ltar byang chub sems dang ba ni 'khrug pa'i sgo su d mthong bar rab tu/ zhi bar so angad snyid du mthong ste/ 'dinibagrodang 'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'i ga shes
kyi stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'gad phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mchedazhes pa de dag ni stong ba/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa'o// yengashes gang gis sangs rgyas/
kyi byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa de las mu smugs can dang/ dmigs pa can thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gnas pas kyang shengashes de 'the tsom bra
bar mi nus ba 'di ni byang chub sems dang bri angashes kyi stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sdongaba'i stobs gar zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems
du dunga' gnas gcig nas pa'i gan dusems can thamabacad lcags te/ khan zerami snyan ngar brjod/ tshigs brlang ba rtsub po // sas rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi mo btsugs pa
brjod kyang desems can de dag la mi 'khrub/cing yid mi bde par mi 'gyur ro// 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// bag la 'burami byed do// lus gshags gtubs kyang de bzhin du bag la nyal
mi skyodado// sems can de dag kyang dkona mchog gsum la rab tu 'godado/ 'di ni byang chub sems dnga'i spong ba'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i thos pa'i stobs
gang zhinu 'di la byang chub sems dang bani mang du thos pa thos pa 'dzin pa thos pa rgya mtsho thos pa btsugs pa yin te byang chub sems dpa' ni thos pa'i stobasade lta bu dang ldan pa yanin/
rgyu gal te stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i bams can thams cad tha tsam gzungs// byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhagasanas/ gang sangs can g.yog gi
'di ba de bzhin gzhan mi 'dibar thams cad kyis the tshomo bdad par lan cabag tu dra/kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thags thogs med par lan cig tu lana'adebasaso// bskal pa brgya stong
du bris kyang sa pas de bzhin du 'ud ston te/ 'din byed chub sems dpa' shos pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs nga 'i stobs gang zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems
dpa' 'khor bya ba khrag khrigabargya stong du ma'i nang du chos ston cing thos par byed kyang de ma sems mi rtog ngar gnas can du dang gang gi 'ad ba ji ltab bzhin du chos natsang shosang ba byed
kyang byang chub des dpa'i chos ston pa de don nyams par mi 'gyur/ tshig 'bru nyams dar mi 'gyur/ tsheg zlos par 'gyur/ thog ngar la 'gyur/ gcod par mi 'gyurab
bdeni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ng sadanams kyi stobasagang zhen/ gal te byang chub sems dang/ 'a shing drung na gnas kyang
rung gtsug lag khang na ba gnas kyang dud khyim spyod pa na ba gnas kyang dung/ bdud thams cad 'khor dang bcas te lhags nas bgegs bya ba dang/ gtsa ba'i phyang nan tan byed na/
de la bdudade dag bdag nyid 'jigs sgrig spyod shing gyis te// bdag mgon med par shesanas 'bros par 'gyur// gang bdud de dag gir la gri dang/ mtshon rtse gnyis dang/ mdung
rtsa gsum pa dang/ rdob dang star 'beb pa de dag byang chub sems dang ba'i bsod nams kyi byin gyis mnar ba'i me tog dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ sna ma'i ma tog dag dang/ ung+ga la dang/
bad+mar gyur nas 'bab bo/ gang bdud de dag gi tshig rtsa ba po dang/ tshig brlung bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa gragago/ byang chub semasu dang tA
lanam ang yid du ma'i ngo ba'i yul drug snang bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam pa tsam gyis de'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung go/ de yang de'i rang gi
( bsod nams kyi dbang gi nam mkha'i mdzod dang/ lag na rin po che las phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung// sems can thams cad tsho bar 'gyur ro/ de'i rang gi bsod nams
( kyi debang lag na ne po tshadazhitsho'atshad bskal ngar gnas te nga rjod kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi mthab rtogs par sla ba ma yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
bsod nams kyi stobs zhes byago de 'byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa'i stobs gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i stobs ni rnam pa bcu'o// rnam pa bcu gang zhen/ 'di
lta ste sbyin pa nga sgrub pa dang/ tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ brjod pa bosgrub pa dang/ brtson 'grus sgrub pa dang/ bsam gtan sgrub pa dang/ shes rab sgrab pa dang/ thabs sgrub
ba dang/ sngon lom sgrub pa dang/ stobs sgrub pa dang/ ashes beng sta/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa rnam padocu zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phe

rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa gangaji snyed bde dag thams cad ni sgrub du bcu po 'di'i nang du 'dusadar blta'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa sgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
ni spyani nga'i chos gangagis brems can rnams 'ganod par 'gyur ba ma/ rtogs par sems can rnams la mi spyani ba gang yang med do// byang chub sems dang 'isam gang gis sbyin ng byin pa'i/
sagog de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dapa'i bzod pa thob ba ma gtogs nga nga rang can rnams la mi sbyin pa gang yang ma yin na shes par 'gyur ba ltatsugs te/
'dini byang chub sems dpa'i spyan pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims sgrub ba gang zhe na/ byung chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi tshul khrims M sgrub pa ni rnam pa bcu'o//
rnam ba dacu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgrub pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'i tshul khrigs
sgrub pa dang/ dge ba'ichos thams cad sdudaba'i tshul khrims sgrub pa dang/ dge ba'ibashes gnyen kun tu tsha ba mi gtong ba'i tshul khrigs sgab pa da/ dam pa'i chos us su
'dzin pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgab pa dang/ rtag tu gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i rtsom pa'i tshul khrims sgab pa dang/ budachub tu gongos su nga tsho'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgrub pa dang/
rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgrub pa dang/ bag chagasakyi mtshams sbyorab yang dag par 'joms pa la bzod pa 'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims sgrub
pa'o// byang chub samasadabu'arnanas nii ma da ra mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims can yin te/ de dag gi tshul khrims sgrub pa ni thams cad mkhyen pam yin ba rnams kyis shes par sla ba ma yin te/
'din byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa sgrub ba gang zho na/ byang chub gnas dang 'a rnams kyi bgrodang sgrub pani rnam pa gsum mo//
rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang du len bzhib khrodapa dang/ gzhan gyis u0f38 gnod par bya ba la mi bde dang zhi bzod pa dang/ chos la nges ba'i sems dad 'i
babod pa'o// de la sdug bsngal dang du lenapa' bakhrod ra ni 'as bdag gir bya ba shes pa las 'jug pa'o// gzhan gyis gnod par byas ba lami 'dud pa'i brjod pa na sems can thams
zla cad la bu cig pa bzhin du byamasapa la 'jug go/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bgrod bani/ chos thams cad skye ba med par shes pa la 'jug pa ste// 'di ni byang chub sems pa'i
bzod pa rnam pa gsum zhes bya'o/ gang bzod pa 'di dag pa nga 'din byang chub sems dpa'i bzodapa sgrubapa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus sgrub po gang zhe na/
'di gung chu sams dang khri gang dang gang du ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams yo jus su 'grub bar bya ba'i phyir/ sbyor bde dang der 'du shes pa de 'di ltar sbyor te/ bdag gis sa rab can
thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos 'di yos su bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grusapa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sgrub pa gdan
na byang chub sems dpa' ni mnyam par ma gzhago pa'i tshos gang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de chos thoms nad ni rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa zhi ba/ soms dang yid
dang yid kyi rnam da rashes pa dang bral/ ma skyes ma 'gagabangashing mi g.yo ba thob par mthong// ded nim nyam par gzhag pa gzhan rnam par g.yengs pa'o snyam du ma sems so//
bdag dang gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/ byang chub yang dag par sgrub nga bre nga rtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa bde ni byang chub sems
nga'i bsam gtan sgrub pa'o// de la byang chub soms dnga'i shes rab sgra ba ngagang zhon/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gango rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'das rnam par grol ba dang/
gang stong pa nyid las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang mtshan ma med pa las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang na da mod da las rnam par grol ba dang/ ganganam mkha' las rnam par grol ba'i
thams/ @#// tshe de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la// byang chub kyi lam dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa 'dini byang chub sems dpa'i
shes rab sgrub pa// de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sgrub pa gang zhen gdabyang chub sems dpa ban ba dag kyang mi de tshigs la/ rtag tu bdag nyid kyi skyidad yang spyod de//
sems can yong mi derigs la rtag tus can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang spyod/ nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la rtag tu dbang po rnams sled pa yang spyod do// de
lagang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu songs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa yang yin no/ da la gang chos kyi sgra ma yin pa'i sgra gang
ang grags par mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu chos nyan pas ngomasam myong ba yang Anan// 'khor ba yang mi dmigegs la rtag tu 'khor bas 'jigs te skyid dang ldan pa yang yon no// mya na 'as
za 'das pa yang yang dag dor rjes su ma mthong ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chud par bya phyir bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar ang byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang mi dmangs
la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud par bya ba'i rtsore smon lam brgya stong mang po angaman ngar sgrub ste/ 'din byang chub sem dpa'i thabs sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ de la byang chub
thabs mag dang 'i sngon 'am sgrub pa gang zhen/ 'du u0f7a'byar chub sems dang 'ani chos gang yang 'drib 'am/ 'jal bar yang dag par rjes sume mo thod la sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
rtsa ba rnams la nga rjes su'an gnas / blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed de/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams na thams cad dang thunamong du byas na//
'dis bdag bla na med pa yodra ba/par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ bdagagi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar gyur ga/ 'khor phun sum tshogs
pa ni 'di bdu bar gyur cigaces// bla na med pa a dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de'i smon lam de yang yang dag par 'grub pasta/ mi 'grub par mi
'gyu'aro// de tshul khrims ma zhig pa mnyan sad// 'dren man yin nga srasar mgyur mkhas bsabasngags pa bsrung ngo// de tshul khrims de la rab tu gnas pas sums kyis smon pa/
'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam sgrub pa zhes bya// de 'byung chub sems dpa'i stobs sgrub pa gang zhon/ gal te la la zhig ngag rgyas kyi gzugs
su sgyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'ongs te/ sangs rgyas kyi deng chub las zlog par byed bdun pa zlog par byed dbyelanga' byed kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'de 'angan nga ldegong ra
mi 'gyur te/ byang chub nyid rjes su dran no// byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran no// bdud 'dul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor 'di rab tu skor bar byed pa dang/ snying
rjechen po mngon tu byed do// sams na gang byang chub sems dpa' de 'dun pa bzlog par byed dbral bar byed/ ma bar klog par byed n sems can de la byang chub sems dpa'
khed khro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gnad can de la byanas dachen po dang/ sAri rdzachen po bskyed do/ dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang ting de 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyi stobs
las kyang mi nyams te/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs/de sems can da nga la tu madrab grongs med pa dgusangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'arab tu 'god/ rab tu 'dzud de/ 'din byang chub sam
ba'i stobs sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dnga'i angashas sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dapa'i nu'adi 'a skyo ba 'am 'chi ba 'am/ grwa pa gang yang med do//
'di dag ni chosItsam du zad de/ bdag dang dug gi dang bral ba'o zhes so thams cad yang dag pu dza lte ba dazhin du rang shes te/ de yang shes kyi go bas de nyid kyis mas can dngag
tu tshadagrongs med pa dag yongashes kyi stobs de 'a rab tu'agodad// dasems can thams cad kyi chos nyid de las rnam par bzlog nas// 'jig rten gyi chos rnams la rab tu 'jog mi nus ta'adi ni/
byang chub sems dang khri ye shesasgrub pa'o/ 'di ni sgrub pa rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug tu zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sunas dang 'a rnanas/
kyi shes pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsnga'ongashes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes dang/ 'akog da shos nga dad/ lanang shes pa dang sdug bsngal la ches shes
shing kun 'byungab dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam la tshe dangashes ba dang/ phung po shes pa dang/ khamasangashes pa dang/ skyanachedas pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma
'ong dang shes po dang/ lam dang 'bras bu shes pa lta/ 'di dgan byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi shis pa bcu'o// de la sdug bsnga'/shesang gang zhe/
gad spyag bsngal la stsogapasngal du shes pa// sdug bsngal 'du kun 'byung nga rang shes du// sdug bsngal la 'gog nga/ra shes/snyag bsngal lamadu shes pa'o// gzhan yang sdug
bsngalo stong rang shes// sdug bsngal mtshan ma nyid ngang shesang/ sdug bsngal smon pa med par shes pa// sdug bsngal rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa// 'jig rten
skya ba 'di sdug bsngal bar shis pa nisdug bsngal shes pa'o// gzhan yang ma rig pa shes pa// srid ngangashes pa// lenang shes ni sdug bsngal shes pa ste/ 'di ni
sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'a byad dang shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gi sdug bsngal de kun 'byung bar 'gyur ba de shes ni kun 'byud dus/
ba'o/ kun 'byung ba de sdug bsngal nyid du shes pa ni 'byung ba shes pa'o// gzhan yang sradang shes pa ni kun 'byung ba shes pa yin te/ 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o// dela'agog
nga shes pa gang yon/ gang sngon gyi na thar mi 'pho bar shes pa// phyi ma'i mthar mi 'byung bar shes ba/ dbus lamig dang shes ba'o// gzhan Ang gang la
'das pa'i sa 'gag pa ma yin pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sa 'gags pa ma yin par shes ba bdin 'gog pa las pa zhe sa bya'o// de la lam
shas bu gang zhen/ gang sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung dang shes pa dang/ 'gog ba shesapa la tshol ba'i shis pa dang/ thob nga rabyed pub shesang bad ni 'an shos nga
[>zhes bya/ de la sdug bsngol la ches shos shing kun 'byung bo dang [】 ]'gog pa dang/ 'am la chos shes pa gang zhe na ( de 'di snyam du sums te/ sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang/
kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang/ 'gog pa gang yin pa dang/ lam gang yin pa de dag ni chos tsam du zad do snyam pa 'dini/ sdug bsngal la chesangashes pa dang/ kune'abyung ba dang/
bgog pa dang/ lam la chog shes bu zhes bya'o// de la phung po rnams shes pa ni gad dungapo rnams la sbyam dang/ rmi lam lta bur 'dra// gong bur shes pa// phung bong shes pa//
brtsegs par shes pa 'din bung bu shis pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gzugs kyi phung po la dbub rdol po lta bur shes pa dang/ tshor ba'i phung po la chu'i chu dung shes pa dang/ 'du
shes kyi phung po la sAg rgyu lta dungashesad dang/ 'du byed kyi phung ba 'chu shing lta bur shes pa dang/ rnam par shes ba'i bung bo la stsam lta bur shes pa 'di ni bu nga dngashes pa zhes du/
de la khams shes pa gang na na/ sa'i khamasanas kyi dbyings te chos kyi dbyings sub ni ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/ tshes kyi dbyings gsher ba ni/
ma in no// kha'i khams na tshes kyi dbyas te/ chos kyi dbyingasatshabani ma anen/ rlung gi khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbudab//yo ba ni ma yin te/ gang de ltar dang/
pa 'di ni khams shes pa zhes bya'o/ gzhan yang phub shes pa dang/ rigs ngashesapa da gis nyos pa dang/ chung dung shes pa dang/ chos thams cad kyin ma shes/
pa ni khams shes ba'o// gzhan yang sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang 'an shes pa 'di ni khams shes pa zhes bya'o// ]
gzhan yang khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas kyis khams dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi khems so// de la 'dus byas dang/ dus ma byas shes pa ni khams shes
pa'o// gzhan yang mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings ni lta ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ rdzas kyi ngo bonyid/
ma in/ rnam da ra shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no// rnaba'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyidabyisani sgra 'dzin/
pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ sgabazung ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ sgra rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no/ sna'akhams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnamapar shes pa'i khamasani chos kyi gling
te/ chos kyi dbyingasani snom pa ma yin bsnams pa/ma inA rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/
chos kyi dbyingasanaril srung ul ba ma yin/ ro brob ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pas thob pa ma yin no/ lus kyi khams dang/ rig bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes
ba'i khamasani chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyingasani gong bu'i mtshan shod ma yin/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ smag rgyu'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams
'bazhi/ dang yid kyi rnam pa bshes pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings ni skya ba dang/ gnas pa dang 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te/gang de ltar shes pa/ 'di ni/ byang/
chub sems dpa'i khams shes pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'ad+ma mched kyis nga ba dang zhen/ skye mched rnams la rgya che bar shes pa dang/ zab par shes pa dang/
dka' bar shasab dang mdud nga ra shes pa dang/ zug rngub shes pa dang/ 'jig nga zhes pa dang chu bo'ongs pa dang/ sbyor bar shos ra dang/ rnam par 'chir par shes pa ni mchangashes pa ste
'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang skye mched rnams la grong stong du shab nga lta/ dper na/ grong stong pa bdag nyid bdag ni grong stong pa'o snyam du
nu sa ba de bzhin du/ spyamatshad de dag kyang bdag nyid kyi bdal du caganu grong stong pa'o snyam du mi shes te/gang 'di la de ltar shes pa 'done byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched shes pa//
