zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du sems te/ su mchad bcu gnyis ni mgo gi skya mched dang/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang nuba'i skye mched dang/ snya'i skye
mched dang/ sna'i skye mched dang/ dri'i skye mchadadang/ lce'i skyemachod dang ( ro'i mchod dang/ lus kyi spyi mched dang/ reg byabaskya mchedadang/ yod kyi spyi mched de/
chos kyi skye mched de/ 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du khrid de/ 'di la bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba mdad snyan mo/ gang de ltar shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems/
dang 'iskya mched shes pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'i 'das pa dang/ ma 'os dang shes pa gang zhen/ gang 'das pa la 'gro ba tshad ngar shes pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa la/
'ong bkod dngashes pa 'din 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs bshas pa zhes bya'og gzhan du 'das pa la dbang shes dang/ ma'os pa 'byed pa mad bar shes pa 'dini/
gshis kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa shes nga zhes bya'o// de la lam dang 'bras bu sang gang zhan/ phapo'atu phyin pa drug po rnamasu shes pa
'dan lamashos bzhes bya'o// gad byang chub sems dang 'is bcu po rnams dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangashes pa 'di ni 'bras bu shes pa zhes bya ste grong 'di shes pa 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa'i'amadang 'bras bu shes pa zhes bya'o// rigasakyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi shes pa bar lta/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
kyi tshul la 'jug babcu po de dag gis zag pa med pa'i dge ba rnams kyi rnam par ni ba thob ba'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya'o// chos yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par brjod/
0 pa na byang chub sems dang 'i bonaa spang bu byas pa stongajug bdun bcu rtsa drugami slu ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam
par gnon gyis byang chub sems dapa' rtsomo ba nad la 'dod ces smras so// rigs kyibu khyod kyis byang chub sems dong ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan nga' chosu yang dag
nga ra brjod pa stobs par gyis shig/ deci'i phyi'i zhen rigasakyi bu 'di lta ste/ pha ro'o tu thun pa'i gtam 'di ltaste/ phal tu phyin pa'i gtam 'dinayang dag phur gyi gtam mo//
ges kyi bu de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni gang/ de dag yang dag par brjod pa nigang/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rtse ma pa med kyis byang chub sems dang 'a
blo gros rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 2 tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
dang/ bzod pa'i phu ri'ol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ yengashes kyi pha rol tu byin/ste/ rigs kyi bu bcol tu phyin pa ni 'di dag go/ de 'ang
'o tu ban pa de dag yang dag par brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs sanas mad pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu ni pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par bdog pa thams cad
yongs su gtod par mi byed pa gang ma gnin// tshul khrims kyi tshoms soms mdabs/ tshul khrims kyi b.rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshul khrims dngabaslob pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan
blo dang go byadabaskusub bams dal mi 'jug pa yang ma yin no// bzodapa'i tshom sumasamad ras/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu ni ba sta/ rtag tu bzod pa dang des bar la yang mi 'jug
pa ma yin no/brtson 'grus kyi rlomasams med pas/ brtson 'grus kyi yul tu phyin pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i rtsab thams cad yang dag par mi sgrub pa yung ma in/
no/ bsam gtan gyi rlom sems med pa/sa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind sdu/ rtag tu nges par soms pa lhur mi 'an pa yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi drimasanas med pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa ste ]rtag tu thos pa tsho la bu la Ang mngon par mi brtson pa yang ma Anano// thabs kyi rimasems ma da das thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ mu steg
kyi gnas thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bya ba'i rtsom pa rnams ni mi snang ba yang ma yin no// smon lam gyi rlomadems bas/ smon lam gyi parolotu
ban pa su/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi sgo rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/
blanand pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su ni rtogs bang mayin no// stobs kyi rem sems dngas/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa sud med kyi budang/ lag na rdo
rje'i gzugs rnams kyis nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ dregs pas khegs pa'i sems can rnams mi gdul ba ma yin no// ye shes kyi rlomo sanas med pas kaNashes kyi pha rol tu
phyin nga// bzo'i gnas dang/ spyir nga'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas thams cad la mi 'jug pa yang ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpaba rnams kyi pha rol//
tu ngan pa dang/ bad tshuldan pa'i chos yang dag par brjod pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rnam par sminapa la angare ba med la/ rnam da thams cad kyis dngos bo thums cad skong

su gtong ba'i phyi'i ang brtson dang tshul khrims la yang rnam par mi rtog la/srog gi phyir dang sladapagi dral gnang dgi 'khrug pa'i nyidikyang na// gnod sas kyi thab dang zhe sdang yang ma bskyod pa dang/
'dod pa yang yod la dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rtsom dang/ rnam par rtog pa yang med la bsam na dang/ mngon dar shas dag gang kun tu tshol ba nga/ chos thams cad
[t]@#// la the tshom yang med la/ thos pa dang bsam pa dang/ bsgom pa'i sbyorabu yang kun tu tshol ba dang/ chos thams cad den du gnyer ba yang mda' dge ba'i rtsa ba snyatshogs/
thams cad ' sa da dmigs pa dang/ sems gang la yang mi gnas la smon lam thams cad kyang man par sgrub pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ jigs pa kung bcom la sub rdo rje
( ltar mi khyadanga'i lus kyang sgrubod/dung bstan bcos thams cad kyang shes la// slob dang na dang/ blam rnams kyang kun tu tshol ba 'di'i rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dapa' rnams kyi
b.rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan nga'i chos mngag par brjod pa'o// gzhan yang rig kyi bu sbyin pa la yang dga' la samasu can ser sna can dang mthun par yang 'jug pa dang/ tshul
khrims la anga dga' 'a sems can tshulakhrims 'chal pa dang mthun par yang 'ajug pa dang/ bzod bal yang dga' la somasacan ganodasems can sems phyin ci log tu gyur
lho pa dang mthun par yang 'jugapa dang/ brtson 'grusal angaduga' la sems can la 'tshan brtson 'grus chung ba brtson 'grus nyams ba dang mthun par yang 'jug pa dang/ bsam
gtan la yang dga' la sems can bya ba mang po bsagayas pa sems phyin ci log tu gyur ba dang mthun par yang 'jug bdang/ shes rab la ang dga' lasems can blun bo lug
ltar zhugs pa'i rang zhin can rtal gtum dang dang mthun par nga 'jugang dang/ thapAl u dga' la byab thamang/ cad kyang don du mi gnyer ba dang/ snyan lam la yang dag ga' la sems can
'khor bas musu byung ba dang mthun par yang 'jug dang/ stobasalatsaAng ga' lasanas can nyamo chung ba mthunod pa dang mthun par yang 'jug pa dang/ shes laang dga' la/
sums can 'khor bo la mngon par dga' ba dang mthun par yang 'jug pa 'di/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos yang dag par
brjod pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'aparol tu na pas nai/ lag len po redang nam mkha'i mdzad thebab// tshul khrims kyi pha ro'atu yin pa nan
n gnas nga thams cad las shin tu 'dab bdang/ 'chi 'pho dang skyob la dbang ba dang/ cung shes pa khrims thob bo// bzod pa'i tharol tu phyin nga sa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos 'gras par brgyan pa lta bas mi ngoms pa thob bo/ brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pas nai mngon par shes pa myur ba dang/ chos thams cad 'dabang/
byed pa thobago// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni 'u sa dang sems yid du 'ong ba dang/ gzungs dang spobs pa rnam pa tha dad dang nyonomongs pa'i sgrib pa spyong ba thob ga/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa ni mi 'jigs pa dang/ sos yang dag par rig pa ba'i thob// thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na bya sa bdang lus dang dmag dang/ ad kyi
las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa thob bo// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni skya pa thams cad du skye ba dran pa dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang/ ji ltar 'dodong bzhin du/
dga' bar 'gyur ba thob po// stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las
mdon par 'phags pa thob bo// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ngasani bung bu dang 'chi bdag dang nyon mes pa dang/ lha'i bu'i bdud las lung dag par 'da' ba thob sta/ rigs kyi bu 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' tu phyin nga dang ra ba tuldan pa'i chos gang dag par brjod pa'o ga zhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dapa'i nisbyin pa'i
bsngags pas bu ang inal/ zhi pa'i dgagosnyam du yang mi bsnyam saso// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod ba dung brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang shes rab dang
thabs dang/ smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes kyi bsngags pa smra ba yang yin la/ angashes kyis dag gsum du yang mi ba gnas so// dachi'i nga zhen/ chos de dag thams cad zhi
0 yang dag dang bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba'o// 'di dag thams cad ni yongs su brtags pa las byung ba'o// du bas na gang yongs su rtagang dang/ yongs su rtogapa lasu byung ba'i chos de dag ni/
srang bar bya'o// de bsan byang chub sanas dang 'aniongasas rtog bdang/ yongs su rtog pa 'os byung ba'i chos rnamAkyis dgagosnyam du ma bsams te/ gzhan du na rnamo ngar mi tshug bsngos pa
med pal ul gyis engashes thub nga sa/ byang chub ma na par rdzogs par 'tshangargya'o// sas pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas/ byang chub sems dpa'
rtsom pa mad kyis smras pa// rigs kyi du bang chub sems ces bya ba 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas med pa 'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// de la ra 'dzin pa'i spos nga ni byang chub ma yin te/

dar 'dzin pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med pa na byang chub bo// nga yir 'dzi pa'i sras bzhi byang chub ma yin te/ nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi zhing spros pa med nga ni byang chub bo// rga ba dang na ba dang

'chi ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi rgyun gyi sos pan khyang chub ma yin te/rga ba dang na ba dang 'chib dang sdug bsnga la gyi rgyun nye bar zhi zhing spros pa ma dang ni byang chub go/ sarasnadang 'chal pa'i
tshul khrims dang/ gnod sems dang/ le ledang/ rnam par g.yeng ba dang/ 'chal pa'i shis da kyi sos pa ni byang chub ma yin te/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang bzha
[s] ]@#// 'grus dang bsam gtanadang/ shes rab gros pa med pa ni byang chub bo// ltab dang rnam pa ga pa dang/ smon lam gyi gros nga ni bya nga chub yin te/ stong pa nyid dang/
mtshan ma mdang dang/ smon pa med pa dang sas pa med pa ni byang chub bo/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni byang chub go/ chos thams cad ni byang chub pa ma yin no// rnam grangs
gang gis na chos thams cad byang chub yin la/ chos thams cad byang chub kyang m in/ sas pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang chos thams cad kyide ba zhinanyid khongadu chud pa ni byang
chub go chos thams cad l ba 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon ra chags pa ni byed chub ma yin no/ gzhan yang rigs bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla
drags so/ nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba dani chos thams cad kyi di bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyidadabazhin nyid ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/ pas ba/
rgyu rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni stong ba nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te/ stong pa nyidad na mi skya mi 'gag go/ su da/ gang ba rtsom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ chos
thams cad ni stong ngo zhes gsungs te/ de bas na chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go/ byang chub sems dapa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu ded ngazhin no// ji ltar khong
[ne$]du chud dang shin te/ chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go// rgyas pa gung 'di nga com ldan 'das kyis de dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni skye bo 'gag ga zhes gsungs na/ de bzhin gshegs
ngas 'di ru 'dus dgongs te gsungs/ bas pa/ gas kyi bu'ajig rten gnas pa skyob dang 'gag pa la mngon par chags pas/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos 'dzi'i
rten dngar ba'i gnas gsal ba'i phyir thasnyad kyi dbang gis skya bo'agag go zhes gsungs te/ bdi la chos gang yang skyo ba dang 'gag pa mad do// de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sa mas
dpas sangs rgyus shes par bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes par bya/ sems can rnams shes par bya/ sems can gyi chos rnams shes par bya/ bdag shes la
khya bdag gi chos rnams shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshodin da da tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dgagis
slas pa// byang chub sems dang ba bag yod pas// sangs rgyas 'byung dang sangs rgyas dang// sangs rgyas chos dang de dag// rang bzhin bdu rab tu shes// sangs rgyas/
'jige rten mkhyena mchogani// khrag med dge ba'i phung po ste// sems can bsam pa 'debang gis 'byung// sngon gyi 'du byed rgyu las skye/ gagis sangs rgyas rnam rtogs
[r/ ]@#// pa// dang ba bo de na ba rol phyin/ don thams cad yongs su shes// des ni thams cad khong du chud// byang chub sus kyang ma byin te/ gung gis kyang ni bzung ba med/
bdag gi chos rnams yongs shes ngas// sangs rgyas la ni sangs rgyas brjod/ gang gis bdag ni rang bzhin gyis// 'du shesatsam du rnam rig pa// des dras rgyas ci 'dra dang//
byang chub rang bzhin ci 'drar shes// 'gro ba thams cad 'du shesatsam// yongs su rtogs pa rnams kyis brjod// rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs mtshan// byang chub sems dar sa rnam par
gyi ji ltar tshul 'di shes 'gyur zhes// gang zhig de snyam sema'agyur na// dbang po'i rta rnams rab btulab// mnyam gzhagan rab tu shes// de la dgu dang brin mdad//
dgos pa dang ni mi dgos med/ dor ba med cing gzung ba med/ yang dag chos brjod 'di 'dra'/ chos rnams kun l arda dag tshig chos rnams yang dag brjod cas bya// de
jag yang dagatshigamanani/ dani skyon chags chos nyis brjod/ 'dod chagasachos dang 'dod medani/ ge pa rnams kyis mnyam pa'i mthong// de bzhin zhe snang gti mug ste// 'di ni chos
rnams yang dag brjod// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// snyinga'i bdag nyid go bgos ga/ gang zhig rang bzhin stong min pa/ sems can rab tu mi mthong/ de ltar chos nyid gang
rtag tu kun tu dri ma da la/ 'jigs med thang la phyin de dag// sangs rgyas khong du chud par gyur// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po tshwag/ sprul pa ltar bar du phyir rtson// des ni
nas de shes ngas// sprul pa de la chags ba med// srid gsum sprul pa 'dra bar ni// rdzogs pa'i byeng chub mkhas pas shes// 'gro ba'i chad du go bgos te// 'gro ba de ltar snyan s shes/
bdagan yang dag ma yin zhing// sems can rang bzhin stong par mthong/ kun tu song ba'i tshos mthong nas// bzod pa thob stathang la gnas// gang du'ang 'jug pa ma yin te// gang/
nas kyang ni ldog mad nga// de ni 'jug med ldogamadade// thong la gnas pa'i bram bralo// nam zhig bsam pamanyam pa yis// yang dag chos kyi dbying la gnas// de tshesangs rgyas
rnams kyis 'di// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur lung ston// nam zhig bdagan ji ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas lung bstanangog/ mthong gyuradim bor ba ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis
lung ston to// sgrib pa mdanga'i dbyings gnas nas// de nas rgya ngan 'das la spyod// snyadarje chen po' bdag nyid ni/ kun tu kha nam tho med// byang chub sems dapa' blo ldan gang/
chos rnams yangedag brjod 'dod rung// yang dag tshos nga rjod don gnyerade/ ]yong dag chos brjod 'adibagrod do// sems can chen de sa tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ ]
03/ byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stongan/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad stongani chos rnams la chos kyi mgo rdul dang bral zhing brem/
med pa rnam par dgag/ bam po bzhi da// gzhan ya nga byang chub sems sems dang 'chin pa rtsom pamed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnol 'di skad ces smras so// gas kyi bu byang chub sems dang san bden pa ces su byas te/ rigs kyi bu bden pa yang dag par brjod bani/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi chos gdag par brjod pa'o// rigs kyi budebaden bgang zhe na/ gang byang chub samasadapa' bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nus
sems desrog gi phyir yongs sum 'ar khreng/ sems can rnams la log dur yang mi sgrub pa// 'din byang chub sems dpa'ibaden pa'o// gar byang chub sems dang 'a blanamed
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedanas/ phyis sems de 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la rig par sgrub pa 'dzini/ byang chub ngos mgadapa'i rab tu smad nga brdzun
du smra ba'o/ smras pa ji ltar na/ blanamadab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyedas ( sems de phyis yongs su mo 'dong zhing/ sems can thams cad log pa mi sgrib pa
yani/ smras pa// nam byang chub sems dang bsdug bsngal gyi bden da shes shing/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang/ 'gog pa'i bden pa dang/ lam gyi bdenang shes pan/ des ms ra yongs su mi
'a zhing/ sems can thams cad la yang 'ag par mi sgrub pa yin no// de ci'i phyi bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa' bden pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pani/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub/
las phyir mi ldog go/ das pa/ sdug bsngal ni gang shes bzhi ji lta bu/ sas ba/ len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam par snyani pan sdug bsngal/
te 'din sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// nam sdug bsngal de rtenacing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ stong pa dang/ g.yo ba med pa dang/ bdag dang/ bodag gi dang bral ba shes pa 'di ni/ sdug/
bsngal shes ba zhes bya// namasdug bsngald kun 'byung ba tsam dang/ rdzas mad pa nga/ rdzas ma yin pa dang/ snying po med pa dang bdag po med par mthong ba 'di ni kun 'byung
bshes ba zhes bya'o// nam sdug bsngal de ston gyi mtha'os kyang m 'ongs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi 'pho// da ltar byung ba la yami gnas te/ thog ma med pa can yan la/ rang bzhin gyi
'gags pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyisadaban pa shes pa 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// sas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas/sas pa/
'a@#// gas kyi bu gog ni ci'i ang brjod par bya ba ma yan no/ smas pa/ rigs kyi gal te 'gog bzhi ci'i yang brjod par bya ba ma yin na/ deci'i phyir 'gog ba zhes bya 'o/
smras pa/ ri'i sakyi bu 'gog pa las bya bzhig bur gyi sgrub bzhed pa a nga dag pam in pa// yod pa ma yin pa/ kun brtags pa ste/ nam yang dag pa ma nyan pa de la kun tu mi rtog pa deni
sgro'agag pa zhes bya/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rto'i pa 'gag ngan/ tshos gang yang 'jig par mi 'gyur te de'i phyir chos thams cad mishin tu 'gags pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ byang chub sams dab 'a'agag pa mngon gsum du mi byed do// byang chub sems dang 'gang 'gog pa mngon m du byed pa doni/ nyan thos dang/ rad
sangs rgyas kyisar ltung ngo zhes gsungasan bcom ldan 'das kyis de ci las dgongs te gsungs// sa pa/ rigs kyi bu mngon sum du byed ces bya ba 'di ni/ bstanadu med pa mngon sum
du mthong ba'itshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gog pa nibastan tumadwapa'i chos so zhes gsus so// chos gang bstan du med pad ma ngon sum du bya bar mi nus so//de bsam
na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang 'a 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs te/ de la dgongs nas byang chub sems dang 'an 'gogab mngon sum du mi byed do/
nyan thosani chos la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i gros 'gog pa mngon sum du byed do// gnas so// kun shes so zhes gsungs so// dmigs ba dang yid la byed ng gang dag gis/ 'diltar shes/
'di ltar mthong 'di ltar ngs par byed pa 'di lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa'o// nga par 'dzin pa de'i rgya dang bcas ba gang 'byang ba
'dini kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// namade'i 'byung ba'i chos gang yang so sor nges pa ma yin nga mthob 'dini 'gog pa shes ba zhes bya'o// gangade ltar rnam par mthong zhing tshol ba 'di/
lam shes bo zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gas kyi bu gang sAm pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis snyams bab rang bzhin ni sdug bsngal le
zhes gsungs so// sIms pa nithams cad du yang dag pa ma An pa'o// de bsan sems pa kun 'byungab ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ sdug bsngal med pani 'gogong 'o// a
shes gang gis semapa de la mi snyams da ni lam mo/ gsakyi bu bdagagis bskal ba 'am/ bskalaM pa las lhagapar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bden pa shes pa bstan pa 'di'i
mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pan byang chub sems dpa'odrugastong gis bden pa yongs su bsgom pa phyir mi ldog ba'i sa khong du chudango// bar snang
la gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo stong phrag bcu ni chos rnams 'chos kyi mig rdul dang bru la zhing dris nad pa rnam pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
bams dang 'a chen po blo gros rnam par gnon gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshem mad la 'di skad ces skyasaso// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'i dran pa nye/
bar ba/ gag pa ni gang// dran pa ni gang/ dran pa'i gnas nA ga nga/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'chen po rtsom pamed kyis byang chub sems dang ba
sams dbang chen po blo gros rnam ra ra gnon la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyabu byang chub sems dbab rnams nichos thams cad lami skya ba'i shes pa dran pa yin no// byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni mi skye ba shes pa'i smon lam can yanito/ de dag gis dran pa de yang mi skye ba shes pas yongs su sbyang ba byas b/ thams cad du mi bskyod pa drang bami
g.yo ba gting dang 'gram mi rtog pa// 'jigartanub dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ byang chub sems dapa'idran pagangagis sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun 'dzin ba'i dran pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon sumago/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de na 'di
'dra'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa dag nas ni rnamapa b.ru ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhug pa dang/ tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang tshes dran
ba nye bar gzhag pa dang/ sangs rgyas rjes dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhug ba dang/ chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gshAg pa
dang tshulakhrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ lha rjes su dran nga ba dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ste/ 'di dag ni dran
pa nye bar bzhag pa bcu'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus dran pa nye bar zhag ngalagang zhe na/ 'di byang chub sems dang 'a 'di ltar lus 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' nas ma'od
phyi ma'i mthar mi 'jog sngon gyi mtha'adang phyi ma'i mtha' lami gnas te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci logalas 'byung ba/ byed pa po dang tshor ba po mdang// thog ma med pa
tha ma dang dbus med nga// rtsa ba gnas pa nad pa/ bdag po med nga// nga yir ba med pa// ongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ tshogs shes bya ba dang/ lus shes byu ba dang/ 'das
spyod cig bya ba dang/ gnas shes bya ba dang/ ro zhes bya ba dang/ rgyam tshad ces bya ba ni glo bur gyisaM tha snyad rnams kyis tha snyadadu brtags pa'o// lus 'dinisIde bo med nga ste/ ba
ma'i khu ba dang khrag las byung ba/ mi gtsang ba/ rul ba// rang bzhin gyis dri mi zhim pa// 'dod chags dang/ zhes dang/ gti mug dang/ 'jigs pa dang/
sgyid lug ba/ rkun pos dkrugs pa dang/ rtag tu 'jig pa/ 'bral ba/ 'brul ba/ rnam par 'byor ba/ rnam par 'joms pa'i chos can nd thadad pa brgya stong ba tshang ngo snyam du/
rgyu/ lus la dran pa nye bar 'jogago gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'diltar lugs 'dinicha nga pa dang/ rkangasong dang/ zhing dang/ bdudang/ dgudo dang/ lho
pa dang/ lte ba dang/ sgal tshigs dang/ snying dang/ rtsi 'gas dang/ rtsib ma dang/ log pa'i thal mo dang/ dadud pa dang/ bral gong dang/ mgrin pa dang/
'gram pa dang/ dpral ba dang/ mgro thod pa 'dus pa tsam ste/ las 'byang ba'i byed pas bsags pas/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa/
sgo dang rnam par rtog pa tha dadab brgya stong gi bainas so// 'di'i rjes mang po 'dus pa 'dil su/ zla dang pa dang/ so namo dang/so dang rus pa dang kha gas pa dang/ sha dang lus dang/
rgyus pa dang/ tshil dang/ zhag dang/ chu sar dang/ marapa dang/ gcin dang/ phyis dang/ phob dang/ long kadang/ khrag ra/ sngar skabs dang/ mkhris pa dang/
rnagadang/ mchil ma dang/ klad pa dang/ klad rgyas rnams te/ ded ltar rdzas mang po 'dus pa yin no// de la lus shes ji skadadu byas snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go/
daso sor rtog da 'di snyam dusems te/ lus 'di na nam mkha' dang mtshungs sa sAm nas/ de lus la nam mkha' ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ de thams cad nam mkha'
ltar mthong ngo// lus yongs su shes par byas pa bsagang la yang n nga mi 'jug go/ mi ldeg go/ mi 'jugami ldog pas dran pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar dran pa la gnas
ngani 'di ltar lus ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin du shes te/ 'di 'thogs par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyire zhen/ gang du phyogs pade thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni byang
chub sems dpa'i lus dran pa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhon/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'di mdu sams te tsho ba
zhes bya ban khong du chud nga// rig pa de gang yin tso lag pa dang/ phyin ci ma lag ngadang/ de gnyis ka las rnam par grol ba'osnyam mo// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo sems g.yengs
pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi tshorab zhin du log ste/ de dag ni ma rtog pa 'a rtas bar tshor ro// sdug bsngal bal bdabar tshor ro// bdag med pa la bdag tu ni// mi gtsang ba//
la gtsang bar tshor rta/ 'din phyin ci log gi tshor ba'o// gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag par tshor ba dang/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang/ bdagamad
pa la bdagamadang nga tshor ba dang/ mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar tshor ba 'din nyan thos rnams kyitshor ba'o// gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang/ mi rtag pa yang ma an bar tshor
ba dang/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin par tshor bdang/ bdagamed pa dang/ bdag med pa yang m in par tshor ba dang/ mi gtsang ba'
mi gtsang ba dang/ mi gtsangab yang m yin par tshor ba 'di'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshor ba// byang chub sems dpa 'de ltar tsho bani/ tshorab po yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong ngo// de ni mthong ngas tshor ba ang yang dag par rjes sum mthong/ dri 'disAm du sems te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis kyang 'dus byas thams cad ni tshor ba zhes gsungs so// gal te
'dus byas thams cad tshor ba ma Ananani/ 'di la tshor ba po zhig ba da dri zhig yod tshor ba'i nga tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ tshor ba dung tshor bar byed pa la ane/ 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus byas
tshor bar byed ba ma yin/ 'dus byas kyang 'dus ma byas las rnam par grol bar byed pa'i tshor ba gang yang medade/ de ltar tshor ba de dag tshor ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo// 'di/

latshor bas rtsol ba gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste byang chub ji lta bar tshor ba yang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dang 'tshor ba dran pa rkyabar gzhag
pa zhes bya'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar gazhagapa yang gang zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang tshor ba de nisams tsam mo/ sams de gang
gnas pa med pa gzung med pa lus med pa'o// gang gnas pa med da gzhung ba med pa lus med pa de'i gnas ji lta bu zhig yodasam mo// soms kyis soms mi shes so// sems kyis
sams mi mthong ngo// gang la brten nas byung ba'i sa mas de lung gzhan la galas pa rang dbang med pa 'o// sems ma gtogs par byang chub kyang mi shes so// de la byang chub sems tsam du
bshes nga sa sems la dbang thob bo// de sems la dbang bas thag pa chen po la dbang byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad la yang sams snyoms pa dang/ thog bachen po lagazhanagyi dri la mi
'jog pa yane te/ 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dran pa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am kha na ma thob mad pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i m/ 'jig rten
las 'das pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos sam/ chos gang dang gang la dran pa nye bar 'dzeg pa'i chos deshan
du bzungs shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa// shin tu bsags pa// shin du chug da// rang gi kha na las da shin tu dbang bdad 'i dran pa des skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa mad pa mnyam
bar byed d/ gang skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag ba med pa las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang stong bskyed dang// mtshan ma med pa
pa dang/ son pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos de gang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de 'di snyam du samasati/ chos thams cad ni bdag po medang// dben pa'i rang bzhin can/
chos thams cad ni bdagamed pa lta/ gnyis su med pa 'i rang bzhin can chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste//
sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid de/ nyon mongs pa mdaba'irang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni sa ba med pa lta/ brjod dumad
pa'irang nga zhin can/ chos thams cad ni yi gamed pa ste/ 'dus ma byas pa rang bzhin can/ chos thams cad ni grungasazhadad ste grongs zinacad las shin tu'ades pa/chos tham cad ni drang ba ste/
skyes pa thams cad 'ag shin tu 'das pa// chos thams cad ni sa bon med pa 'i phyir rtsod me dpa/ chos thams cad ni rtsa ba rnam par byang ba'i phyir skyon me da nga/ chos thams cad ni lus re dang zhi
phyir 'os pa med pa/ chos thams cad ni gnas med pa'i myong song ba med pa/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir chags pa med ba/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar
'byang ba'i phyir stong pa/ chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba/ chos thams cad ni ji ltar 'ded pa bzhin khong du chudapa'i phyir rang gi khan la sa ba/ chos thams/
don shes pa'i ro bshad kyi par byang chub pa// chos thams cad ni rdzus med pa'i phyir mang tsam pa// chos thams cad ni bsan tu mad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyi'i lta ba dang bral pa/ chos thams
cad ni lus med pa 'i phyir btsangs pa med pa// chos thams cad ningob nyadim da nga 'i phyi'i go ba med pa/ chos thams cad dabazhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir thabs ngo mad pa// chos thams
cad ni chos kyi dpu'us dper tshud pa'i phyir dbyis gcig ba/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir tha mi dad do// snyam du de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhingags
so/ de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhonge gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang ba ni sems can tha dad du me byad/ chos tha dad du mi byed/ thogapa tha dad du ma byed/ sangs rgyas tha dad du mi byed/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad du mi byed ( tha ma dang mchog dang/ bcings pa dang thur da dang/ 'khor ba dang/ myang n las 'das dag ad dag par rjes su mi mthong song ba
med/ 'dzin pa mad/ 'jug pa med/ ldog pa khrod/ len pached/ 'dor ba med de/ mi g.yo ba thob cing gnas pa gzhite/ byang chub sems dang bsams dang ba chen po zhu ba la ba/nas
nga de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisAgazigs// band pa ang ngagangar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston ste/ de ni byang chub sems
dba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di las byang chub sems dang ba sangs rgyas
rjes su dran pa'i dran ng nye bar gzhug pa sgom ste/ sems can thams cad mngon du byas nas/ bdag kyang sems can thams cad kyi ched du thunamed nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
par sgrub de// 'di ltar gangade bton gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyidabazhin gshegs pa'i stobs dachudang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhidang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dedag bdag gis bsgrub par bya// snyam du dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ dran pa des gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dran pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa// dri ma mdang// rnam par dag pa// 'od gsal bo bag la nyal ba med pa// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thums cad yang dag par chud pa/ sengashas sngon du 'gro ba//
e shas kyi debang du gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyidabang du gyur ba// chos kyi dbang du gyur pa// lha'i dbang du gyur pa/ nges par gyur pa/ thams cad thob ba/ shes bya slob pa'i
dri ma med pa/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thamang cad kyis mi rtogs pas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ mthu sgrib pa med pa thogs pa med par gnas
pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgyas par byed pa// nam mkha' ltar 'gyur ba med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de dag rjes su drano/ dran pa'i na bachesangs rgyas rnams kyi
nor sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad de dag rjes su dran te/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas dran pa/ yang mtshano/ mi dran pa yang ma yin par thams cad du lhun
gyis grubachunge rnam ngar mi rtog pa'i dran pa de dag rjes bu dran te/ de'i bde sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sems can dang chos la thadadapa'i 'du shesami mda' bsdu
de dag gi dran pa rjes su dran pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bgo sangs rgyas ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ ma len mi 'bo mi 'khor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/ mi skya mi
'badag pa skye/ de dag rjes su dran pas de'i phyires ngas rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bsod nams dang/ ngashes kyi tshog
chen po mang ba pa byams pa chen pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i spyod tshul can/ sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyobs su gyur ba// mgon du gyur pa// na pachen po zug rngu byan pa/ sems can
thams cad la sogs snyoms pa// rtag tu ting nge 'dzin sod ul ba/ 'khor ba dang/ myang n las 'das pa las rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs ba dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ba
rol tu phyining/ sems can chen po'a gnas / sems can chen po'i rtan/ rnam par 'dren pa// chos kyi sku spyod yulab/ thams cad du khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa//
rtag tu sems can gyi don bdagyes pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs rgya che ba spyad pa ra lung ston pa// skudang gsududang thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba medang/bag chags dang bcas
pa'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gtilugabakrus pa// bdudadang phyir rgol ba thams cad ng rtsom pa/ rtsod pa med pa// chos kyi mchogadang ldan pa// rgya mtsho thams cad da ches zab pa// ri
rab thams cad pas ches mtho ba/ sa pas ches brtan pa// chu bsaches mnyen pa/ ma pas ches 'bar la/ rludabs ches chags pa med pa/ nam mkha' bas che dri mad nga/ mi de sa
'gro ba bas ches mgyogs pa/ yid bazhin gyi nor bu bas ches khyad nga ra du 'phags pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyorab/ chags pa thams cad dad
bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phanang ra dartson pa'i rgyan ma btsud pa/ gzugs tshadamadapa/ sgratshad mad pa// yon tan tshadamad nga/ ul tshadamodang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ soms dang yid dang/ yid kyi ma ngar shes pa'i tshulalas yang dag par bdas pa// gas pa dang zhabs kyi sems dang ldan ng/ lan
gsum gyi sdig pa rnams yang dag par chadang/ snying rjechen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ sems can thams cud dang thunamong ba'i yon tan can/ sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur
gyur ba// dgra zin ba sems sgoms nga/ sta'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa// sems can tha ma dang 'bring dang/ mchog thams cad la thams cad du rtag tugasal bar byed pa'i chos can/
ba rol dpag par dka' ba/ sems can man po/ longs spyodachen ga/ rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa chen po// chos gsung ba chen go/ 'dul ba gsung bachen po// skyes
khu chen po// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thoms cad zilagyis non ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa/ rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa/
@#// bsam gtan chen po spyod yul ba// rnam par grol ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa/ bdag nyid che pa skye bo chen po'i zhabs bring ba dang ldan ba/ skya bo khyu dngar can gyi
zhabs 'bring ba dang ldan pa// lta ba dang nyan pa dang bstan pa dang/ bsArlabakur byed nga mi zlog pa bdag bde ba la mi ltang/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi de la byed nga la dgyes pa// chos la gzhol
zla pa chos kyi nor can ]chos kyi bas can/ chos kyi snyan can/ chos kyi gar can/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi bdag po// tshongs kyi sbyin bdag rtag tugatong ba la mngon par dgyes nga/
rtag tu bag yod pa/ rtag tu dbanab la mngon par dgyes pa thams cad du stegs dang zam par gyur pa/ rgyal po'i lamachen bo dang 'drab/ nyi ma chen po dang 'drab/ tshangs pa chen
podang 'drab/ sengashos chen po'i rdo rje'achang ba/ chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa gzugs bltabasam ngoms pa mthong bas mi ngoms pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag de ltar rjes su dran no// de ltar de dag rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon tan yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir byo'o// dran pa nye bar 'jogago/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de'i phyir sangs rgyas
rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'isangs rgyas dran pa'i dran ng nyab gzhag pa zhes bya'o// de labyang chung sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nyobar
gzhag ba gang zhe na/ 'dil byang chub sems dpa' 'disamadu sems te/ gangs sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tanamatha' yas mu med pasu/ de dag ni chos las skyes pa/
chos kyi bgo sal 'aspyod pa chos kyis sprul pa/ chos bdag por gyur pa chos las byung ba/ chos kyi spyod yul/ chos la rtag pa/ chos kyi grub pa ste/ gangasangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dab byad bzung po dedag kyang chos las gyis nga// chos kyis rnyed pa/ tshos kyis grub pa'o// gangade bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stangs bcu dang/ mi'ajigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa// chos kyis red pa// chos kyis grub pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
babacobargyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis red pa/ chos kyis grub pa'o// gang 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba yod pa de dag kyang chos las skyes
nga/ chos kyis dad pa// chos kyis grub pa'o// de lta bas na bdag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o// chos spyod yul ba dang/ chos la rton pa dang/ chos la gzhol/
ba dang/ chos sAng dor byed pa dang/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub par bya'o sAm pa 'dini/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos chos su dran pa'i dran pa nyebar gzhug pa zhes bya'o//
'khya// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyid sAmadusams te/ chog nas mas can thams cud la mnyam par 'jug ngas/ chos ni bla ma dang 'bring dngarar tumago nas 'jug
nga ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dung 'dra ba'i sems su grub// chos phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni don lta zhing 'jug pa ma yAn te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i/
sems su bya'o// ches nidus chad pa med pa 'di mthong ba la don dang rang gis rigs pas chos ni dus la lta zhing 'jug bram inate/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sams/
su bya'o// chos ni mtho dman med ngas chos nits+tsha tshab la 'jug pa ma yin/ dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/ de ltar dag gis kyang chos dang mthun pa'i sags su bya'o// chos ni
mchog dang tha mdang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin/ nyams pa la 'jug pa angam yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su du bo//
chos n zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i lta ba dang bral bas/ chos n 'bags pa la 'jug pa yang ma An/ so so'i skya bo la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdagagikyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems
su bya'o// chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas/ chos ni nyin mo 'jug pa ma na/ mtshan mo 'jug pa ma yin/ mtshan mo 'jug la nyin mo mi bajug pa ma yin te/ de ltar bdag
gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o// chos ni gang la yang nam ang stod ngam in pasuchos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'dabaste/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra babasam
su bya'o// chos ni thams cad du 'dod pa mad ngas chos ni sdong ba rnams la zhe 'gras ra langamad/ dad pa rnams rjes suchagasapa angamadade/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i
sams su bya'o// chos ni bro ba yang ma yin gang du yang ma niti/ dpag dumed grangs med pas nam mkha' ltar 'bri ba yang ma yani/ 'phal ba yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis
kyang tshes dang 'dra ba'i sams su bya'o// chos nas mas can rnams kyis bsrung ba ma in gyi chos kyis sems can rnams srung// deltar bdagagis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'isams
su bya'o// chos ni skyabs yongs su tshol bam in pasachos ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs yin te/ de ltar ba dag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o// chos ni thogs pa/
med pa'i mtshan nyid pas tshes nigang la yang thogs pa medade/ da ltar ba dag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'isams su bya'o// chos ni bag la nyal mad pas bag la nyalami 'jug ste/
de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o// chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni 'khor bas 'dzagis skyag pa yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa las rdzosasu
chags pa yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dung 'dra pa'i sams su bya'o snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog/
pas de'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya te rigs kyi bu dadan byang chub sems dpa' chos rjes su dran ng 'drenang nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub
sems dnga'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ba la bzhon/ 'di la byang chub sems dang ba 'di snyam du sems te/ dge 'dunan chos sab/ chos sod pa// chos
sems pa// chos kyi zhing/ chos 'dzin pa/ chos la rton pa// chos la mchod pa// chos kyi bya ba byed pa// chos spyod yul ba/ chos spyod pa thunasumatshogs pa rang bzhin gyis drang/
pa rang bzhon gyis dag ba/ snying rje ba tshos/can snying rje dang ldan partag tudangan pa spyod yul pa rtag tu sa la gzhol ba/ rtag tu dkar po spyod pa'o sAmam/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drag 'don rnam pa du mar gsungs pa ni 'di ltaste/ kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun dang/ don dam pa'i dge 'dunudang/
ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun dang/ ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun dang/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang/ cang shes kyi dge 'dunadang phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun no snyam mo// de la byang chub si/

0/ dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan byed do// don dam pa'i dge 'dun bstan pa'i phyir nan tan byed do// ngo shes nga 'i duge 'dun rnam pa gza' bar bya ba'i phyi nas na byed de// ngo tsha med pa'i
dge 'dun yongs su gdul ba'i phyi nan tan byed po// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de// cang shasakyi dge 'dun la sangs rgyas bzhin du nan tan byed do//
phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la chos kyi gtam gyi phyirinan tan byed do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ go ba'adzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi dgo 'dunan/

phyir yid du 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu son pa'i phyir/ zhinge ba brang po rnams kyi dge bdun no// gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyi'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// yongs su 'dzin ba/tangazhing
'dor ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no// shin tu dulaba'i phyir cangashas rnams kyidage 'dunano// ma 'dres pa'i phyi de nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dunano// sdig pa
dang bral ba'i re ngo tsha shes pa rnams kyidage 'dun no// bka' blo bde ba'i phyi'i slob ma rnams kyi dge 'dun no// bdag os su shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun/

zhi ba'i ri rgyugs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// 'dod pa nyung ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no// rnam par rtog ba yang dag par dpyad pa'i phyir nad med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//
pha rol tu son pa 'i phyir thang la gnas pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// thang la gnas pa'i phyir bde ba thob pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// de khona mthong ba'i phyir dag yod pa rnams kyi ga

'dun no// skyon ma chags pa'i phyir dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub la gzhol ba rnams kyi dge bdun no// bslab pa gsum gyi bya ba shes pa'i phyire bslab pa 'dod pa rnams/

kyidage 'dun no// dran nga ne par gzhag pa spyod yul pa'i phyir/ dran pa dang ldan pa rnam sa kyi dge 'dun no// yang dag nga 'i slong ba spyod yul ba'i phyir brtson 'grus bdu mas pa rnams kyi dge 'dun
no/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba sdod yul ba'i phyir ngol ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// dbang ngo sprod yul ba'i phyir mi byed pa rnams kyi dge 'dunani// stobs spyod yul ba'i phyiratsher ma bkrugs
pa rnams kyadage 'dunano/ byang chub kyi yan lag spyod yul ba'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no// lam spyod yul ba'i phyir angadwag pa lta ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no// bdenopa
stod yul ba'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dgebadunano// bsam gtan spyod yul ba'i phyir mnyam par gzhag ba rnams kyi dga' dunano// rten cinge'abrel par 'byung baspyod yul ba'i phyir chos kyi
'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rnams kyidage 'dun no// snying rje chen po dang ldan ng 'phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyidage 'dunano// bsod nams thams cad kyi tshogs bsagos nga'i6re skye ba gcig gis thog
pa rnams kyi dge 'dun chos m mo// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge 'dun rjes su dran ngas bde sum du sems tagangadage 'dun yang dag pa'i yon tanade dag ning+gag dang sems can
thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'dini/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dnga'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i
dran pa nye bar ba/ zhag pa gangashen/ 'di la byang chub sams dpa' 'disAm dusams te/ gang 'jig rten pa dang/ 'brog rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de
dag thams cad ni tshul khrims las byang shar ba lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa ni smanadang/ rtswa
dang nags tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyang phun sum tshogs bde dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab
tu gnas bani/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yan no// sbyin pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs bar angabyed do// tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
dga' ba skye'o// yid dgababs 'gyod pa med do// 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba thob po// mchog tu dga' bas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs par gyur to// lus dang sems shi[R/ ]
tu sbyangs pas bde ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ yid manyam par gzhag dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba yin no// yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du mthong ba'i byang
chub sems dpa' ni/ soms can rnams la snying rjechen po'agago snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la de dang 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dang/ chos rnams
ad dag pa jilta ba bzhin du mthong ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo// da sangarje chen po des bskul bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang/ lhag pa'isams dang/ lhag pa'i shes rab bslab pa/
[– ]yongs su rdzogasanas/ ban mad pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogasaM par 'tshang rgya'o// de bas bdag gis kyang tshul khrims la gnas pa mi bskyod pa mi lhod par
bya'o// sems can thams cad mngon du byas na// tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o snyam mo// deci'i phyir zhon/ byang chub sems dapa'i tshul khrims dani/ sems can thams cad la phan pa//
dad dadaba'i gnas la gnas pa ma sa sa pa inano// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di sumadusams te/ byang chub sems dang 'o mngon par 'byang ba'i tshul khrims ni gnodasams
mad pa yongs su rdzogs bar byed do/ khyang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni bodag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yongs su rdzogaso bar byed de/ byang chub sams dpa'i
bsab pa dang/ sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin ba'i tshul khrims ni lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims
na mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshul khrims ni/ byang chub kyi phyogasakyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/
byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de// byang chub sems dpa'i thos pa yangs su tshol ba'itshul khrims ni/
nga rgyal med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de// byang chub sems dpa' dage ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkurabyed pa'i tshul khrims ni/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad chud ma zo ba yongs su
rdzogs par byed do// byang chub ye mas dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar thos pa'i chos
rnams ston pa'i tshul khrims ni/ chos smra ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed d// byang chub semasudapa'i ji ltar thos ba'i chos rnams sams pa'i tshul khrims ni/ gzugs dang spobs pa thob
pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de// byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul khrims ni/ skye ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems
dpa'i sems can thams cad la khong khrob med pa'i tshul khrims ni/ byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dba'i byang chub
kyi sems chud mi za ba'i tshul khrims ni/ dkon mchog gsum cud ma grwa ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam dusems te/ tshul khrims bsrungs pas bsud pa//
thams cad bsrungs pa yazhin snyam pa 'di/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'i tshulakhrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gazhag pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems
lha dba'i gtong ba rdzas sun pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhagang gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'disnyan dusams te/ gang gtong ba de thams cad n bde lta ste/ zang khring ga gtong ba dang
chos kyi gtong ba dang/ bgatong ba rnam pa gnyis kyi nang du 'dusas snyam mo/ de la zang zing gigatong bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan dang/ dang byad bzang bo yo des su skyongab dang//

sangs rgyas kyi khang yongs su dag pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnam par dag pa yongs rdzog par byang ngo chos kyi gtong bas na stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bcobargyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bag chags kyang yang dag par 'joms par byed do// gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong ngs ni/ phung po thams cad nges par 'der bar byed do//
chos kyi gtong ngasani nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las yang dag nga ra bla'o// gzhan yang byung zing gi gtong bzhims pa'i lus yongs su sbyor bar byed de// chos kyi gtong ba ni
chos kyi sku yongasagusbyor bar byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang/'as mas dang/'chen po zang sring ga gtong basani/ pha ma las byang ba'i stobs sgrub par byed do/ stobs
deni de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs nga ra su 'a yang med de// chos kyi gtong bas nirdzu 'phrul gyi stobs sgrubo ngar byed de/ stobs de
nade bzhin gshegs pa dang/ sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a rnamA ma gtugs par su la angand do// gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong pos no pa'ongs su smini ngar byed do// chos kyi
gtong ngasani rnam par thar ngar byed de/ gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni tshogs sogasas// chos kyi 'og tong ba/nisgrol la// gzhan yang zang zing gi gteng pas ni nor yongs su gtong ngo//
chos kyi gtong bsani thams cad gtong ngo// gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bsgrub par byed do// chos kyi gtong bas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las
rnam pa ragrol bsgrub par byed do// gzhan yang gtong ba gtong pa zhes bya ba 'din/ yongs su rtog pa gtong ba'i tshig bla dgas se// 'di lta ste/ yongasasu rtog pa gtong ba de ni gtong ba rnams
kyi dam pa'o/ skad ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su rtog pa btang bas byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zhes bya'o// sas ba/ rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba bdenigangag
tshig bla dgas/ skyas ba/ rigs kyi bu yongs su rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ngadag pa ma yin zhing/ med pa las sgro btags pa'i tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ ji ltar n angadag pa ma yin
rgyu'ang med pa las sgro btags pa yin/ sa pa/ nam 'di ltar bdag tshogs pa/ bdag ni zhesdang ba/ bdag ni gzhug pa/ bdag ni nyon mongasad// bdag ni rnam par dag pa// bdag
ni bcings pa/ bdagazhi grol ba/ bdagani 'khor ba/ bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'o// snyam pa la sogs par sgro btags pa thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med du//
las yongs su brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen tsam ste/ 'di la bdag dang bdagagi med/ sems can med srog mad/ gang khrag mdashes las skyes med shed bu/
mad de/ rgyu rkyen de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyi dban ba soms dang yadirang/ id kyi rnam par shes pa dang bralu ba/ mi sems ba yongs su mi rtog pa/ kun nas nyon mod+ma
pa ma in po/ rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/ 'khor ba ma yin pa// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin pa la sgro ma 'dogs shing/ de

[4, ]sgro 'dogs pa btang bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya 'o// nam chos de dag rjes su dran pa da na dang gtong ba rjes su dran ng zhes bya/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
gdong pa rnam pa gsum// gtong ba dang/ gtong ba chen po dang/ shin tu gtong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ paza'ab 'dod pa rnams la
bza' ba spyi pa dang/ btung ba dang bzhon pa dang/ gsadang mar mdang bdug spos dang/ sras dang 'phreng pa dang/ byag pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/
bangan dang shing rta dang/ rgyun las gsang sbyin pa lta/ sbyin nga gangasems can rnams la gnod pa dang/ phongs par 'gyur ba de ma gtogs par byang chub sams dpa' dugasems can rnamu la
sAne pa gang a ngagad de/ 'di ni byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub samasadang 'a rnams kyi gtong ba chen po gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba/
phun sumatsho sa nas gtong ba chen po byadad/ 'dilta sta chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i bran pa dang/ bran ma dang lasabyed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho pa dang/ khyam dang
rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong ba 'danabyang chub sems dba'i gtong ba chen po zhes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu gtang ba gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
bya// gtong ba dang/ gtong ba chen po ngan sum tshogs nas shin tu gtong ba byed de/ 'di lta sta/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ rna ba dang/ snadangasha dang/ rus pa dang
ngags pa dang/ mig dang rtse dang/ mgo rus dang/ rkang la sogs pa yongs su gtong bsta/ bdin byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
tshades gtong ba dang/ gtong ba chen po dang/ shin tu gtong ba de dag rjes su dran nas// bdag gas kyang dran pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o sam pa 'din/ de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa
zhes bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sams dang 'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa gang zhe na/
bde la byang chub sems dpa'i na gang rnam par dag pa'i lha nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag rjes su dran no//
@#/'di ltar de dag rjes sudran te sgrub pa dang/ yon tanadang/ skya ba dang/ langs srod dang/ kun dapyod pa dang/ rtsom pa dang/ rab tu thob pa dang/ yongs su grub pas kyang rjes su
dran pa 'done lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o// gang lha de dag kyang rjes su dran no// 'di ltar de dag rjes su dran to/ lha 'di dgan 'i sa dge ba'i 'bras
ba bab bu ltas byung ba'o// dge ba'i las de dag ni 'di lta sta/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam mi dge ba las zlog pa rnams so// de las lha gango rnams kha dag dang ldan pa/ bde ba mang/ dbang pa tshig
mibadedago thums cad ni/ dge ba bcu'i 'asakyilamagyi rnam bar smane pa'o sAm sta/ de ba byang chub samasadapa' lha'i bdeb de la rjes su irang nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
phyir/ ba na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// lha'i bde ba de yang sems can thams cad kyir 'dod do// bdabade sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pas dag
ba'i rtsa bde yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po rtse mamo// ngan songa rnams su skyes pa'i sums can dag la snying rje chen po sAd de/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di ltar sems
can thams cad lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byed du gakhrud do// sems can gang dag lhar gyur pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar
'tshang rgyu bar bya'o// gang gis soms can rnams lha'i bde ba thob nas/ phyis nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang bde bar gyur nas 'dilta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob
par 'gyur ba'i lasade dag sems can rnams byed du gzhag go sAmadu sems pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni
byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bcu'o// de nas byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyi/ de'i tshe don de nyid
tshigs su bcad pa bdag gis sas pa/ gang phyir sdug bsngal ma gtogs par// stong pa nyid ni dmigs pas/ sdug bsngal sdug bsngal mibalta ste// sdug bsngal song bar blta bar
bya stong nga nyid ni lta'adod pas// sdug bsngal yang dag blta bar bya// sdug bsngal stong pa nyid kyi don// stong nga nyid ni 'dus ma byas// sdug bsngal byas pa ma in pas// sdug
bsngal lan byed pam// sdug bsngal bral ba'i byed pa po// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te sdugabasngal yang dag tu// kun nas sgrub par med gyur te/ gal te sdug bsngal
byas mnan// 'di la kun 'byung ga la yod// sdug bsngal la ni 'dzomad ri/ gang du yang ni 'gromin// gang gso de i chags 'byung// sdug bsnga la mi dan ga la yod// gal te sdug
bsngal kun 'byang ltasrid pa rgyun byung bshad nani// srid can su yod ma yin na// 'dan kun 'byung ji ltar 'gyur// sdug bsa'o la ni 'ang mdade/ 'ong ba mdan cing shig 'gro
bod dang 'gro ba med par ni// bgog pazhib zhes bstan to// chos rnams ra'o nyid kyisazhi// rtsa bdagocing rtsod kyang ba/sal/ 'gog pa dang ni chos rnams mtshungs// thams cad ma dza95
gnyis spyad du spangs// sngon durgyas ba'i chos rnams kun// de ma thagatu'agag bar 'gyur/ 'gag ba med par skye ba med// skye ba mad par zad ba med// da ltar gang gi blo tshol ba// de ni/
chags med bag med lam// lamanagazings dang 'dra bar bstan// ma nagazingasanoseng bar bya// gang bsags sbyang bar bya ba yin// chos de la ni ci zhig dga'// 'am sngangs thang la
gnas pa de// rnal 'bar pa ni grol zhes brjod// des ni lam gyi yi shes kyis// gang phyir chos kun basgoms ngasan// grol ba'i mtshan nyidar ba bstan pa// de ni gang du'ang rtsod pa med//
sku dngab spusan mo se// sha dang rus pa khrag dang shag/ tshil dang shu rgyas phyis dang/ mkhris pa bad kan klad nga/ dang
mcher pargyas ba gnyi ma dang// gtin gyi phung po lus shes brjod// rnal
'brel pas ni lus rnams la// yod min kun brtags tsam dugathong// 'di la byed dang tshor bdang// mthong ba po ni gang yang med// lus shes bya ba rang bzhin gyis// grong stong dnganibad/
ba'o tshor ba myong bar bstan pa gang// tshor ba po las tshor ba zhan// gudan yod pa ma yin na/ gang gis de ni medrabur 'gyur// byang chub ci 'drade bzhin du// zhi zhing dag la 'od gsal
'a@#// grol ba dona dga' pa'i ng mad// sems tsam dunarab mthongs// kun tu rtog pa kun sngarlas kyang/ sgrib pa med pa'i sdod yul can// rnal 'byoragatong ba'ang ma yin/
chos rnams rang byung ma yin te// gang gis kyang ni bslab pa med// grangs nga med cing yi ga mad// de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba'i mtshan// chos 'dirtogs pa khong chud nas// chos shes pa yi
rnal 'byor can/ mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas pa// 'jug pa med cing log pa'i ng mad// gang gi chos dran 'di lta ste// thams cad chos las mi g.yo ba// de dag pha rol phyin pa bstan//
na sa ngas rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sprod// sangs rgyas don rnams kun la mkhas// sgrib pa kun gyi dri ma med// dkar pa thams cad yang dag sngo// sems can kun la phan par bzhed// rigs
dang gabrugs dang yon tan las// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pa gang// yang dag dran pa de dag ni// dkar po'i chos kyis rab tu rgyas// gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing// chos la/
chi dran pa mi g.yeng ba// des ni 'das dang ma 'dres pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byas// dam pa'i chos l bstanadachos can// chos rjes dran pa spyod yul ba// byang chubusems
[j]dang 'a brtul zhugs brtan// rdzogs pa'i byang chub brtogs par 'gyur// chos rnams ci 'dra de bzhin du// bdag 'gyur snyam du gang dran nga// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag des//
chos dran pa 'di shes par bya// nga yi'i mad cing par 'dzin med// chos rnams ci 'dra de ltar bdag/ 'gyur ro snyam du dran pa ni// chos rjes dran pa 'di sgom yin/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams zhing
dge 'dun sangs rgyas slob ma rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub 'agyur ba dag/ rtagatuyang dag rjes su dran// rgya mtsho lta bur dpag dka'a rnams// bdagagis rjes sudun pa an// bsod nams
rab tu gang bsags des// sems can de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ mi ldog ngang tshul can rnams kyi// tshul khrims yang dag rjes dran pa// sems can kun la phan sems pa// mchog gi
bsod nams gang brgyadang// sems can kun la ban 'dod phye'i// de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo// sems can kun la phan byed pa// den tshul khrims dran zhes bya// zang zingamed par chos
btang dang/ nyon mongs spangs ba'igang dge ba// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// snying rje'i bdag nyid spro bar byed// gtong ba rjes dran bun sum tshogs// zhi dang skyo la rab gnas nga// mtshan/
ma na dacing rtsol na da nga// nyin bzhinedu kunupar// lha rnams kun gyi dge ba gang// dgaba'i las lamarab byung ba// bde dang sems can thams cad kyi// snying rje'i bdag nyid deltar 'dod//
gang gis 'jig rten lhar gyur nas// sangs rgyas rgyun na da 'gyur ba// bde ba dedag rtag tu bya// bdag gisado u0f38da ltar bsgrub//
bya@#// de nas byang chub sams dba' sems dang 'an po rtsom pa med pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon dang/ gnyis ka g.yogadang
bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhag pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan du ma bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nang nas phyog
gcig tu 'dug go/ ga ga dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyes 'a gcig
tu 'dusunas/ chos yang dag par brjod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi rigs pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mda' ba
lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang mthunang ra bgyis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gis kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/
ji skadu sas pa de lta'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams
cad du sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i angashos can te/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis chos a nga dag par brjod ba dang ma thug par byas so/ rig kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang res ba dang/
kun slab de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis bar bas su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// ji ltar khyed gnyis kyi byas pa de bzhin du/ chos yang dag par brjod/
par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis chos angadag par brjod pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa ang khyed gnyis kyis chos yang dag par ngarjod pa la rjes bu yi/
rang ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/ byang chubs mas dpa' rtsom pa mad la 'di skad ces sas so// gas kyi bu khyed ci'i phyi'i rtsom pa mdaces bya/ byang chub sems dngakha/

rtsom pa mod kyis skyes pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub samab dnga'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' ni shin tu byang ba/ bya ba thams cad la mi chags pa gang yang mi tshol ba
cungadzodakyang snang ba ni 'dang/ thob par mi 'dod pa/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba de bzhin nyid du mnyam par mthong ba tha ma dang/ 'bring dngarab kyi chos cung zad kyang

yang dag nga ra rjes su mi mthong ba de ni rtso na ba mad cas bya'o// datsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i buchos thams cad nogikhrod ma nas med pa'i phyi'i rtsom pa med pa'o// btsunang shar dwa ti'i bu galatechos/
'gab gagazodamanas yod par gyur na ni/ de brtsam par bu mchog gang yang gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin te/ gzod mnas mad pa'i phur/ chos thams cad ni brtsams pa med pa'o//
dachodang ldan pa shAre'i bus smras padiltar yin na khyod kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa de jiltar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshu ma pa med kyis sa nga/ btsun pa shAge'i
ba bus dortsams pa med pa nyid bdag gis chos yang dag par brjod par byas pa// btsun pa shAri'i bu 'di jisnyam du sems/ gang khyod kyis dri ba dris pa 'diji khyad kyis 'di brtsamasati//
dris sam/ 'on te ma rtsom par dris/ de gal te khyod kyis brtsams te dris na na ri la rten te brtsams gang rtsom pa dang bcas pa don 'drib ma yin no// rtsom pa ang gzhan la 'dri ba yang
gzhan zhes ni bya bar mi 'thad do// cis ma brtsams par dusan ni/ khyod gtam 'di la zhugs pa yin no// tshodang ldan ngashA ri'i bus skyes pa// rigs kyi bu gang bdag dang khyod kyi brjod pa de
ji ltar blta bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mad kyis sa pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dang ran sgyu me sprul pa'i brjod pa ji lta bar dngazhin nyid dang/ chos
kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa spang da ltar blta bar bya'o// btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma stsal ba ldani sams dang mos las byung ba'i chos rnams mad do// gang la
sems dang sams las byung ba'i chas rnams med pade ci zhig rtsom par 'gyur/ btsun pa 'di 'bu/ sgyum mchen gyi 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i brjod par 'byung ba ji lta bar de nga zhin
nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings la gnasapa'i byang chub sems dang 'i brjod pa ang de ltar blta bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan bashAri bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgyu ma lapani byang ba yang ma yin/ ma/
byung ba yang ma yin na/ ci khyod kyang byung ba yang ma yin/ mabyung ba yang ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dang 'u rtsom pa med kyis sas pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos
thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tum bshad dam/ sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhinatA/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon/
nga ra rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu bshad de// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mdakyis sas pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu dziltar sgyu ma byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin pa
de bzhin du/ sgyu ma lta bu'i chos de dag thams cad kyang byang ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yine par blta bar micu 'am/ btsunang ngoshAri'i bu galatabyungab 'am/ ma byungab zhig
yod nAn/ sgyu ma lta bur yang bstan par mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus sa pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod su'i ched du spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smas pa btsun
ngangashA ri'i bu bi bo nodonanam don ma yin pa'i ched la yang mi spyodad// de ci'i phyir na/ gang don gyi ched la spyod ba ni dmigs pa la spyod pa'o// dmigs pa la spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas
0/// rnams manyes par byed pa ma yin no// deci'i phyire kha na/ dmigs ba la spyod pani rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa angami thob// bzod pa gad nas sa rgyas mnyesabar
byed pa ma yin no// 'on te donam an pa'i ched la so nani/ log par lta ba la spyod pa'o// log par lta bani na med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag
don dang/ don ma yAn pa'i chad la mi spyod pa de dag khong du spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa// btsun pa shA'i bu byis pa so sa'i skye ba rnams gang 'aspyod bde nyade
lade dag la de dag spyod do// sas/ rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams gang la stod/ byang chub sems dapa'i rtsom de mad kyis sang/ btsunang shA ri'abu de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra ba dum baang dag nga 'a rdzogasapa'osasargyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis ba so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang spyod mod kyi/ de bzhin gshigs ba dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyus rnams gang la spyod bde nyid la bdag cag kyang spyod do/mdu masams so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa// rigs kyi bu sangs
rgyas kyi ul lani byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs medan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gong la spyod pa de 'de la byas pa/
[so so'i skye bo rnams kyang spyod de 'di ni de la// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyisasas du/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul shes sam/ shAri'i bus sus pa//
sbrang bu 'dra ba bdag lta dus gas rgyas kyi yul shes par ga la nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang ri'i sa kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas ni/ nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes te// rigs
kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis ulani mtha' yas mu med do// sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul ni gang yang medado// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis sas pa/ ban
bshAri'i bu gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul med na/ ci'i phyi'i khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs mad ces smras/ tshe dang
ldan pa shAri'i bus smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bag rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'o// byis pa so so'i skye ba rnams ni 'jig rten de laspyod pa'o// de bas na
sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi goskabs med do// byang chub sams dang 'a rtsom pa mad kyis smas pa// btsun pa shAri'i bu 'didzamanyam du sams/ de bzhin
gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ gang du bzhugs nas su'adon mdzad sa ba/ rigs kyi bugang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos
gang yang medade/ chos tham sa cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'dus byas nyid la spyod do// byang chub sems dang 'a rtsom/
pa med kyis slas pa/ gal te de ltar shes na/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rtan gyi ul las yang dag par 'das shes sa/ de ni gnas brtan shA ri'i bus khong du mchudado// datsun
shAri'abu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi ul las angadag pa ra 'das su zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing/ gang
bzhugs nas su'i don mdzad par 'gyur to/ 'dil gnas brtan shAri'i bus sas pa reshin tu nyams so// deskad cesas pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shar bo bye/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'disodacas sas so/ shis kyi bu bdag ni 'di ltar byang chub kyisams dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesalasashan nyams shing nyan thos kyis
la Ad shin tu gnas pas bdag ni sngon nas kyang nyams so// rigs kyi bu bdagan khyed kyi sogs pa 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo// sems can thams cad kyang khyod kyi spobs ba 'di thob par gyur cig/

gtam brjod pa 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sams dba' brgyad khrinamo skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ lta'i du drug stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam
par dag go/ dge slong lnga stongan nyan thos kyisams las leg nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad
pa rnams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad
rtses gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na/ bzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mkhas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang gin
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thams cad yang dag bar shes pa de'i tshe/ bzung ba dang 'dzin ba la mkhas pa yin no// byang chub sems dang 'artsom pa med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das thams cad ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu rmi lam dang/ sgyu ma dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ smig rgyu dang/ mgal res bskor ba dang
glangashad 'jangs ba dang/ sbrulapa dang brag cha dang/ gzugasabarAnalta bur thams cad blta bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gangarmi
lamangang/ skya ma dang dri za'i grong khyer dang/ smig rgyu dang/ mgal ma bskor ba dang/ sa shad 'dzings pa dang sprul pa dang/ brag cha dang/ gzugs bar n ltar bltab thams cad
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'agalapa/ rigs kyi bu thams cad ces bya banamage dang/ gzugs dang/ rna ba dang/ sa dang/ sna dang dri dang/ lce dang
ro dang/ lus dang/ reg bya dad/ adedang chos rnams te/ rigasakyi bu ded nib gang rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ ge rgyu dang/ mgal mas bskor bdang/ sku 'da'adzings
ba dang/ lapa dang/ brag cha dang/ gzugs padan lta bur bltabar bya ba ni thams cad do// de la 'dzin pa na mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid rnams so//
bzudabani gzugs dang/ sgra dang dri dang ro dadareg ba dang/ chos rnams te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos 'di dag rnam pa dang tshul thams cad kyis shes pa dang/ khong du chud pa dang/ ston
nus pa de ni thams cad mkhyan ba zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa don/ bag la nyal ba med pa// nyon mongs bamed po ra 'dzin pa mad/ nga yir 'dzin ba med par namakha'
pa dang mtshungs pa// mi 'gyur ba/ sems can thams cad lasams mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad la yun ba'is mas dang ldan pa// thamasacad dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa// thams
tshad du lhunagyis grub pa// lhun gyis grub pa'i chos can sems can gyi snyingepo// sems can thams cad kyi don la sgrib ba med pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ migyod pa'ichos
can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom ba mdakyigasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
nyid 'di khong du chud par 'atshal bsaji lta bur bgyi/ brtsomaldan badas kyis bka' skul pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dba'asangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di bod du
chud par 'dod pas/ sems can ba thams cad kyis ngan du byas pa dang/ mi snyan pa thums cad bzod par bya ba'i phyir sems dang mtshungs par bya'o// bdag dang sems can
gzhan rnams kyi rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bkru ba'i phyir sems chu dang mtshungs par bya'o// shes rab kyis bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams kyi
las dang nyon mongs ba'i rtsi shing bsregs pa'i phyir sems me dang mtshungs par bya'o// chags pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'i phyire sems rlung dang mtshungs par bya'o// thams cad du sgrub ba
med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bya'o// thams cad du 'jigs pa med cinge skyagu ba med bas/ byang chub sems dang/sa seng ge dang mtshungs par bya'o/ shan
tu dul ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas glang po che dang mtshungs par bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i phyir/ byang chub
u@#// sa mas dang sa gzhi lta bur du'o/ sems can thams cad la e shes kyis snang ba byed pa'i ri/ byang chub sems dang nyi ma lta bur bya'o// thams cad du sams
can thams cad la rtag tu bde bar snang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa zla ba lta bur bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i a shes kyi yoni po che'i gling chen por phyogs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dang sa ded dpon lta bur bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gso ba'i phyire byang chub sems dpas snyan pa lta bur bu'o// sems can thams cad kyi chos la
the tshom za ba'i zug rngu 'don pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbas zug rngu 'byin pa lta bur bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i engashes kyi phyogs la mkhas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dngas gdos pa
'dzin pa lta bur byug 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can sgol ba la mkhas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas glu lta bur bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa'i phyir/ byung
chub sems dpas stegs bu lta bur bya'o// sems can thams cad mtshungs par 'jug pa'i phyire/ byang chub sems dang su lam po chu lta bur bya'o/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che/
tham cad phun sumatshigasapa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa rin po che'i nga lta bur bya'o// yid bzhin gyinor bu rinapo che'adu bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phyi 1 byang chub/
[d ]sems dpas yid bzhin gyi nor bu ren po che lta bur bya'o// legs par bya ba'i las byed pa'i dur/ byang chub sems dpas cang shes lta bur bya'o// shes rab zab nyid gting dang ga dka'
ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa rgya mtsho lta bur bya// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las bsam pa ma g.yo ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa ri rab dang mtshungs par bya'o// kun nas
mdzes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dpag bsam gyi shing lta bur bya'o// mthong bar dka' ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas 'dzam bu chu bo'o gser 'dra bar bya'o// chos la dbang
thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas brgya byin lta bur bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam phun sumatshogs ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas tshangs pa lta bur bya'o// dam pa 'i chos
yongs su skyong ba'i phyir/ byang chub ngems dpas 'jig rten skyong ba lta bur bya'o// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas 'khor la sbyar ba lta bur bya'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas blonupo chen po lta bur bya'o// gso sbyong la gnasaba'iphyir/ byang chub sems dngos mngon par
'byung ba la dga' bar bya'o// lus dang ngagadangasems zhiba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dapas dge sbyong du bya'o// bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyan s par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par
@# Nashes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa'i nga byang chub sems dang sa dgon pa par bya'o// stong pa nyid rtogs pa nyid rtogs par khong du chud/
ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa bsam gtan par bya'o// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang/ rib/sa sngags 'chang grub pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa'iphyir/ byang chub sems dpas dbon pa/
la mngon par dag/'bar bya'o// ga pa gsum rtogs par khong duchudapa'i ye/ byang chub sems dpasu rigs sngags 'chang du bya'o// mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i phyir/ byang
nasamos dang sa mngon par shes pa'i shes su bya'o// phung po dang khams dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas mang du thos par byago/ bstan bcos thams/
cad la mkhas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbas slob dpon du bya'o// zang zingamad pa ra chos ston ng ba phyir/ byang chub sems dang bas chos smra bar bya'o// 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang
dang gti mug 'dul ba'i ri/ byang chub sems dpas 'dulab 'dzin par bya'o// thams cad du rungab latshongashes pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dngas mar 'dzin par bya'o// tshor nga thams cad
dang bral ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sadul bar bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dngasami rgod par bya'o// zhe sdang bral ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sam
khengs par bya'o// gti mug dang bral ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas chu cor mi smra bar bya'o// ngag bsdams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sema'adas tshigachol bar mis bar bya'o// theg/
pachen po la 'dzud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas ded dpon du bya'o// byang chub tu dam bcas panyams 'og tu chud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang sa khur tsab ltabur bya'o// sems
can thams cad rten pa'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dpas bskyed mos tshal 'dra bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i a shes kyi rdzong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ byed tshub sems dpas
grong khyer lta bur bu'o// sems can thams cad la bu cig ba bzhin du byams pa dang ldan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbus phan pa 'dod par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyis ci byab
yongs su thob par bya ba'i ri/ byang chub sems dbus bran lta bur bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mu rgod dag la drang ba rnams yin no// khengs pa dag
la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin no/ g.yon can dag la g.yo med pa rnams yin no// thigs bo spyod pa dag la sgyu med pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 'thog par zhugs pa dag la snying rje dang ldan ng
rnams yin no// ngo tsha med pa dag la ngo tshe dang ldan pa rnams yin no// mu cor smra ba dag la khral[”]rtsod pa thunasum tshogs pa rnams yin no// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad la sems sum gong
b rnams yin no// 'khor ba thams cad la bag tsha ba med pa rnams yin no// 'jig rten gyis chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// bdud thams cad kyis
mi 'phrogs pa rnams yin no// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thul ba rnams yin no// bla ma dag la gus pa dang bcas pa rnams yin no// 'phags pa dag la zhe sadang bcas pa rnams
sin no// mang du thos bdag la ri mor byed ba rnams yin no// bsam gtan pa dag la de mtshar thob pa rnams yin no// mkhas ba dag la lhag pa'i bsam pa la 'jug pa rnams inano/ ches
sku/ slu ba dag la sangs rgyas tsamadu phangs par sems pa dad ldan pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' dag la skyabs su song ba rnams yin no// sangs rgyas dag la bsam pa thams cad kyang zhugs/

! pa rnams yin no// nan tan dag la snying por 'du shes pa rnams manano// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams yin no// snying rje chen po la phyogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mi lta ba rnams
yin no// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mngon par dga' bas 'khor ba la phyogs pa rnams yin no// red pa dang bkur sti thams cad la mi lta bas zang zing med par chos
ston pa rnams yin no// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ mi gtsang ba yongs su shes pas sems shun tsim log pa rnams inano// ul thams cad la mi lta/
bas sems rnam par grol ba rnams yin no// 'phags pa'i rigs su skyas da/sa rigs thun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rab tu byung ba mang bas blo bunasum tshogs pa rnams yin no// sdug bsngal
ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lag shes da sa 'thags ba rnams yin no// tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ thog yod nga la gnas pas skyes bu dam pa rnams yin// 'du
byed bdag med pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan bas/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa rnams yin no// 'phags pa'i phyag rgyas btab bas legs par mi ltadzaba'i chos can rnams yin
