rgyu dang don nam mchisabar// 'dod chags bral ba 'dzum mi mdzad// thugs rje thugs kyis lung bstan ti// tho tshom rnam par gsal bar mdzod// ji ltar khyod kyi zhal nas su//
0 'od zer byung sa slar log ste// bod ni 'jig rten mgon pa a// dbu yi gtsug tu nub gyur pa// glog ris bzhin du nam mkha' la// dge ba dang gamadabakrakhagyed pa// rnam par
badren pa do dag gis// thams cad mkhyen ba'i spyod pa ston// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med 'di bskal ba bcu gnyis n/ lhas mngon par bstod pa'i bsal ba la dga' bachen po 'jig rten gyi khams su bod chen po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su
'gyur te/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtan mkhyen pa rgyas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas su 'gyur ro/ kun dga' bo de bzhinagshegs pa 'da chen po'i tshig tshad nibaskal pagacig thub pas 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang 'ad dag gi tshe'i tshad
nA bar gyibaskal pa bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dang pa na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa yang de 'dra ba'i 'gyur go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byon gyiso/ byang chub sems dang bsamasang 'a
bya// chen po rnam pa med la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyisasangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis red pa legs par
nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mad kyis smras pa/ btsun par ba 'byor 'di la su zhig sangs rgyas su 'gyur shes sam/ rab 'byor kyis sbas pa/ gas kyi bu kho bos
ni gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal tagang sangs rgyas su bgyur ba'i chos de eng dag par rjes sumi mthong na/
khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung ston to zhes bya bar de mi bsting ngam/ rab 'byor kyisazas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldanubadas kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lungam bstan tam
snyas pa/ btsun par ba 'byor don yongs su mkhyen pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyus su 'gyur ro zhes gasungs so/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i don yongs su mkhyan pagod
zhin byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu smon bde/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston to// byang chub sems dapa' gdabyang chub tu mi smon pa de/ de bzhin gshegs ka
rnams kyis lung ston to// de bas na don yongs su mkhyen pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes/
gsudas na/ khyon ci zhig la bltos nas 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// zhes sna/ sa pa/ rigasakyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thosakyi tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rtan gyi tha snyad
do smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyisagadagasasu med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'phags pa tha snyad 'dog pa ni bden pa'o// 'jig rten tha
snyad 'dogs pa ni log pa'o// btsun pa rab 'abyor de bas na/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad log pa 'phags pa rnams la brjod par mi 'os so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rtenani bsrungs bar
bya ba yin te/ don dmapas dngangasasu 'ong zhos/ dwa la 'phags pa rnams sAng rje chen pos bden pa yang dag par btang nas/ byis pa rnams la lag par tha snyad 'dogs kyi//
'phags pa rnams la ma yin te/ 'phags pa rnams ni bden pa yang dag pa lo dga' babo zhes 'phags pa rnams la bden pa brjod do// 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa gang zhe na/
btsun pa rab 'byor shin tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na/ 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o// chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden
pa'o sa pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibaden pa dang/ kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ 'gog pa'i bden pa dang/ lam gyibaden pa dang/ bden
pa bzhimad dam/ byang chub sems pa'i rtsom pa med kyags pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sdug bsngal 'dus byas pa ma yin nam/ sapa/ de de bzhin te/
du/ sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas so/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mad kyis slas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas thams cad brdzun pa slu ba'i sa so zhes ma gsung/
ra/ semasmras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsomapa med kyisasapa/ gal te sdugabasngalani 'dus byas te/ de rdzun pa yin no/ khyod 'di ltar me zhig
las sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibadenang 'o snyam du sems rab 'byon gyis slasapa/ rigs kyi sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te brdzun pa'o// sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa ni bden pa'o/
smras pa/ gal te sdug bsngal n 'dus byas bardzun pa slu ba'i chos can tu yang dag pam yin na/ ro yongs su shes pa yang bden por rung ngam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu du
kyi lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo ma pa mad kyis skyes ba/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs su shes ba'aphugs ba'i bden da lag la gyur/ rab 'byor gyisacas pa/ gas kyi
bu 'gog pa ni zhwa dus ma byas pa yin na/ da ru'i phyir 'phags pa'ibaden par ma 'gyur/ khyod chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa ba 'byor te 'gog pa de nyid/
bgog pa'i bden pa 'am/ 'on te chos gzhan 'ga' zhig 'gags pa las sam ci zhigang+ge 'gags pas 'gog pa'i bden par yid ches/ rab 'byor gyis sa pa/ rigs kyi bu
sdug bsngal 'gog pas 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes brjod de// byang chub sems dang brtsom pa med kyis sa pa// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi sngar sdug bsngal ni 'duse byas te/ brdzun pa
slu ba'i chos sa zhes masasam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// rigasakyi busaso// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mad kyis smas ba/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos gang rdzun
pa ang dag pa ma yin pa de lani 'gog pa medra na/ khyod kyis sdug bsngal ni 'gog par ga la 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen portsom pa med la 'di/da res sbas so/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi spobs pa la bdagarjes su yi rang ngo// sems can thams cad kyi kyang khyod kyi so dpa 'ob par gyur
cig rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa ni gang/ bdun pa mngon par rtogs pa ni gang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa ched kyis slas pa// btsun par ba 'byon
yis thams cad ni bden pa 'a tshul dang 'gal ba ma yin no// de bsan chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o/ an pa'ob khu nas thams rud ni
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ stong nga
nyid khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o// stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa na bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ mi skyes khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o// mi
skya ba mngon par rtogs pa'i bden pa man par rtogs pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa de lachos gang yang sgrub po 'am/ spab med do// btsun pa rab 'byor
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa nichos gang yang man par mi sgrub ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'din byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi bden bu mngon par rtogs pa'o//
btsun pa rab 'byor bdenA pa bden pa zhes bya ba 'dan bgyur ba med pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas si// btsun pa rab 'byor jitsam du rtog pa de tsam du leg pa ste/ rtogs pa dang bral ba doni thar pa'o//
btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas khyod red pa 'a gas par red do// zhes skyas ba ni btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag redang/
legs bar red pa de dag la na lung me ston to// gang dag red pa legs par ma rAdacinge/ rnyed pa med de dag lan lung ston do gang dag red bas dga' bar mi sems shidam red pas sro[}]
shibar mi 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to// gang dag 'khor pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyurab de dag la lung ston to/ gang dag so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las
kyang mi g.yo la/ des por gyur pa yang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to// gang dag lung ngasanang thoban dga' bar mi sems pa de dag la lung ston to// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu khyod kyis khong du chud pa 'di bab bo// skyasab/ btsun ba rab 'byoragang dag rtogs pas khodadu chud pa mthong ba de dag gi khong du chudapa khrab bo// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ khong du
chud pa 'di blta dka'o/ snus pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor blta 'dod pa rnams kyisas// gab 'byor gyisasapa/ khong du chudang 'di rtogs par dka'o// skyas pa btsun pa
rab 'byar mi brtson pa rnams kyis so// smras pa/ ragosakyi bu tshul 'di la su 'jug par 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas bar 'gyur ba dang/
dgaba'i rtsa ba ma bskyad ba ma yin pa dang/ sas rgyas byung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams kyi rna 'amadu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis sa pa/ rigs
kyi bu ji ltar na/ sas rgyas la bsun bkur byas pa yin/ smras pa// gang sgrub babastanaba'o// smras pa rigs kyi bu sgrub pa la gnas pa ji ltar rig par bya/ smras pa/
[7 ]/gangasems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa ji ltachu/ slas pa// gang byams ba chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo mi 'da' ba'o// rab 'byor gyes skyas ba/ byang chub
sams dang 'a rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang/ skyes pa/ gang lus dang srogadang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la byin yang lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'o//
smras pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po gang/ smras pa// gang thog ma kho nar sems can rnams byang chub rab 'dod kyi bdagan ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na//
srog chags bdun khri drug stong ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong nyasi stong ni 'a napa med par thagapa las sams rnam par grol la/
daang de'atshalha'abubazung sams zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
samasadapa'i sa ngos rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsapa'i rtan gyi gnas gang lags/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rtenagyi gnas nabasam pa phun sum
tshogs pa'i sems bskyod b.lo// lha'i bu bzangasams kyi gsol pa// de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i spyod yul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang
sbyin ba lang spyod tshul la// rnam por sAn ba lare ba medapa laanga mngon du phyogs pa yin/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa ang spyod yul la// rnam par mi rtogs pa'i tshul khrims la yang//
mngon du phyogaso ba yin/ babrod pa yang spyod yul la/ miganyis pa'i chos la yang mngon du phyogasapa yin brtson 'grus kyang bod yul la/ brtsam pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs
ba ni/ bsam gtan yang da ug la/ shin tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i chos thams cad la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin shes rab kyang sprod yul la// byas pa med pa la
yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ thos pa yodas su tshol ba yang spyod yul// brjod du chad pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ zhi gnas kyang da ul la/ shin tu zhi bad/ rab tu
zhi ba ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lhag mthong yang spyod yulo la/ chos thams rug stan dumad pa la anga mngon du phyogs pa yin/ dran pa nyebar gzhag pa yang spyod yul la/ dran
pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa la anga mngon du phyogs pa yin/ yang dag pa raphyung ba yang spyod yul la/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ rdza 'phrul gyi
rkang pa yang spyod yul la/ smonapa thams cad ang dag par chad pa la yang mngon du phyogs bayani/ dbang po yang spyod yul la/ dbang po las 'das pa'i chos rnams la yonga mngon du
phyogs ba yin/ stobs kyang spyod yul la// dbyar med pa'i chos la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag kyang spyod yulal/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
la ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lam ang spyod yul la/ lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can yongasasu skyabs ba la yang mngon du phyogs ba yin/ soms can yongs su smin par bya ba yang
spyod yul la/ chos thams cad la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'dul ba ang spyod yul la/ chos thams cad shin du dul bar bsam ba la anga mngon du phyogs pa yin/ pha rol tu
byin pa yang spyod yul la/ pha rol dang tshu rol lami chags pa la ang mngon du phyogs ba yin/ 'khor ba ang spyod yulal/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/
mya ngan las 'das pa yang spyod yul la/ mngon par 'du byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ skyob yang spyod yul la/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'byung ba la yang mngon du phyogs ba yin/
dung bo ang spyod yul la/ nyon mongs pa mdu ba la yang mngon du phyogs pa in/ khams kyang spyod yul la/ dbyer med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ spyamachid kyang spyod yul
la/ 'phags pa'i sku mched la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin// chos nyan ba ang spyod yul la/ sa pa sams pa la yang mngon du phyogs ba yin/ chos ston pa mang spyod yul la/
brjod du ched bu la yang man du phyogs pa yin/ gzugs kyi sku rnam par sgrub ba yang spyod yul la/ chos kyi sku la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos kyi 'khor la btusko ba lang spyod yul
la'ajug ba med pa dang/ ldogab med pa la yang mngon dugasapa ini/ nyathos kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyang
spyod yul la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa'i spyod pa la a mngon du phyogs pa yin te/ lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yulanyes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang samasakyis gsol/
pa/ byang chub samasadapa'i cho ga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag bde ba la mi lta ba dang/ sems can gazhan bde ba la gtod pa dang/ 'khor ba na gnas shing
tshul khrims dang/ gos pa dang/ bag yod pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas shing/ snyade rje chen po las phyi'i mi ga ba dang/ mya ngan las 'asapa lagam thi'adu 'ongs/
kyang thob par mi byed pa dang/ sems can yodas su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba nyid kyi rjes su babung ba dang/ rigs can thams cad rjes su skyong ba dang/ sums can shugs
zang byed med pa'i chos ston ba dang/ 'dab la tshong shes ba dang/ dben nga la mdon par dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dad/ skye bomang po'i nad du gnas shid
chos ud dag par ston pa la soms las med pa dang/ grong dang grong khyer du zhugs nas/ byamasapa la mngon par phyogs pa dang/ redapa dang/ bkur ste lo mngon bar mi dga' ba dang/
'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi las 'byol ba dang/ rigs pa dang bcas shing snyan ba dang/ 'jam por smra ba dad/ sasargyas dang tshe dang/ dge 'dun rnams la dngos po thams cad kyis
phyag 'tshal ba dang/ gsong por smra ba dang/ khro gnyon med pa dang/ rtag tu gzhan gyi don la dga' bed/ thams cad du sa chags pa med pa dad/ yod su 'dzin pa thams
cad la mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ 'bags pa'i skya bo dang 'grogs pa dang/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'iskya po rnams song pa dang/ sangs rgyas la bdag nyid tsam du kha bdas par soms pa
pa dang/ chos la srog tsam du gces par 'dzin pa dang/ sgrub pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo tsamadu gces par soms pa dang/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/ naba'i chad kyi sman dang/
yo bya nangon gyis chog par soms pa dang/ slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa tsam du langs par semagangashing/ srog gi phyir ad yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ lung chod pa dang/ [.]
kha ton la brtson pa dang/ nam gyi cha stod dang num gyi cha smad lami nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson ba dang/ bsam gtanadang/ tingang 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug ba mngon du byed pa dang/
ji ltar thos pa'i tshasa rnams tshul bzhin bsar rtogs pa dad 2 shes rab kyis rab turtogs par byed pa dang/ sa nas lag pa med pa dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/
nang du so sor rtogs pa dang/ phyi rol dumi'ajug pa dang/ lus yongs su gtong ba dang/ khro ba rnam par spong ba dang/ gti mug rnam par 'joms pa dang/ shes rab 'bar bur byed pa dang/
so sor thar ba sdom dang dung/ 'dul ba lus phyir mi 'da' bdod/ thams cad du sems can dusams su shes pa dang/ thams rudadu shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang/ sams phyin
ma lag bdang/ soms dri mam dacing 'od gsal ba dang/ rtag tu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rab tu brtson pa dang/ brtson pa mi 'dang ba dang/ rtag tu dag bgang yin zhes
tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'ichos rnams chud mi gzon pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang/ sems zang zingamad pa dang// rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa dang/
rtag tu sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang/ 'khor ba mi gdung bad/ rAd pa dang ma red pa dang/ grags pa dang mgrags pa dang//
bstodab dang smad pa dang/ bde ba dang stagabasngal gyis mi sprul ba dang/ thams cad du rtsod shes pa dang/ thams cad du dran ng nye bar 'jog pa dang/ sbyin nga sa long/
spang che ba dad/ tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang/ bgrodangs mas pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyis nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dor ba dang/ bsam gtan rnams kyi sems las
su rung bdang/ shes rab kyis 'jigartan pa dang/ 'jigartan las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtog pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis lan ma thob mad pa dang/ tshangs pa'i
gnas ba rnams kyis dul ba dang/ bden pa dang/ gtong ba drang/ nye bar zhi ba dang/ shes rab kyi byin gyis brlangesa rnams kyis sems shin tu dul ba dang/ bsam gtan
rnams kyisasems yid du 'ong ba dang/ ting 'dzin rnams kyis zab pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang/ stong pa
nyid sgom pas lta ba dang bral ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa sgom pas rnam par mi rtag bu dang smon pa med pa sgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa mad pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas theg pa chen po rtog
par khong du chud pa dang/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/sa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la la tongapa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po rnams kyis byang chub sems dba'i spyod pa
0/ yongs su skad ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen longs su tsholabs yon tan thams cad skya ba'i sgo dang/ slob dang nadang/ mkhan ba dang/ bla ma la sri zhu byed pas sa ngas rgyas thams cad
mnyes par byed pa dang/ rang gi lus dang sems yongs su shes pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ nga rgyalamad ngas gzi brjidadang ldan pa dang/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing
phyag 'tshal bsasI gtsug bltar mi mthong dang/ cho ma mo dgu byin pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sems can thams cad dang mthun par 'jug pas/ dang byad bzang
po yongs su rdzogs pa dad/ thag pachen po yang dag par rab tu ston pas cang shes pa'i sa dang/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par rab tu ston pas phyir mi ldog btis dang/ stong pa
nyid rab tu ston bas bag chagasaangadag par 'joms pa dang/ chos byin pasaso so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang/ dran pa rab tu byin pas gzungs thob pa dang/ chos khod
ngu chud pas sebs pa thob pa dang/ spabs panye bar sgrub pas khyad par lung ston pa dang/ nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pas srad ma dkyi bu'e'us thub pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams
lazod bas mthong ma thag tusems can thams cad ldangabar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan dag gi gnod ngesams rab tu zhi bar khyad pas/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ brtson 'grus
brtsams pas mngon par shes pa gyur ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu byin pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang/ spyod lam yang dag par rab tu byin pas kun tu
mdzas pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sbyor bas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sogs dang pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang su ngas rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa dang/ 'di/
pa yongs su gtong bas 'jig rten thams cad yodi chas pa dang/ khro ba yongs su 'a dor bas 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dad/ phra dog yongs su 'dog bsarAdang thams cad kyi
mchog dad/ grags pa'i mchog dung/ gnas byin pas 'jig rten thams cad ston pa dang/ redapa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su btsad par ba tu byin pas chos la rab tu
dga' ba dang/ grogs pa'i sgra dang/ gsong por sgrubs ngag yos su dag pa dang/ snyan par sabs tshangs ba'i sgra dang/ 'jam por skyabs bya ka la bapo'i sgra skad dang/
khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis 'jigarten thams cad du grags pa dang/ sems can thams cad la mi subs dbang gcig par 'gyur ba dang/ ltung ba mad globu bus de mngal gyi
gnas las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ srog gcod pa spong bas tshadapag tu med pa dang/ rkun po yongs su spong bas nam mkha'amadzod dang/ snyag pa 'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas
tsaNan/ lagan rin po che dang/ byang chub tu os su skyo bsales spyod mi zad pa dang/ 'dod pa la leg par g.yem pa yongs su myong bas/ skyes bu chen po dang/ brdzun du sa ba yongs su
slong bas dag gigasadab thob pa dang/ phyi ma yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa dang/ ngagartsub po yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad kyis bstod pa'i snod dang/
tshig bkyal pa mi sa bsagag mi spyad pa dang/ brnab sems yongs su sbyong bas gter chen pa nyid pa dang/ gnod sems yongasasu song bas stags su gyur pa dang 'dog pa lta ba
yongs su sbyong bas bajig rten thams cad ston pa dang/ chos rgyachen po la sbyor bas stobs b.ru nyid dang/ sbyin pa thams cad kyis rnam bar sman pa lami'i bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
phyir mi ldogo pa thob pa dang kun tu 'dzin pa thams cad yongs sugatong bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste rigs kyi bu ngas bsal ba'am bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga bstananas
kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chag tshad med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga zhes bya'o rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ cho ga dang srid yul/
phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de ltar cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub red par dka' ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no// lha'i bu
bzad sams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'adas ji ltar na byang chub sems dba' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//

lha'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting 'dzimi 'dor ba ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skyod dang ting 'dzin lasale gnas gang dusems can gyi don bya ba der skye bsto/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang
chub sems dba'ashis bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dang na ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'ad
kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dbab gang thams cad de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ chos kyi dbyis sumakhongang daskyaba'i mang po'i nang du song yang dben pa shes
par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bya'o// gang gnyis lablo mi 'jug pa de ni shin tudaban pa zhes bya'o/ la'i bubazang sems kyis gsol pa 3
bcom ldan 'das ji ltacan/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' yid kyis ston/
pa thams cad dang bral zhing/ chos gang yang gzung bar laspang bar yad ang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ da gang dang gang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de dang de stong ba dang adzad g pa ma
in par mthong sta lha'i bu da ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' manyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sums kyis gsal pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sem[N;]
dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas gang bdag dang sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam par angadag par
rjes su mthong ba lo// lha'i bu da lta'an/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzung sams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar n byang
chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o// lha'i bubazung sams kyis gsol pa
ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gang kun nas nyon mo sa par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam bar byungabar a nga mi 'gyur ba de zhi ba zhes bya'o// lha'abu bzang
sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdug gas 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni rang gi kho na lasapa'o// byang chub sums
dpan ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su spyod bde lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'dasas das rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang nas kyang blang ba ma
lags/ gang du skad bsar ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la yang shes rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sta/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su
zhugs bzhi byang chub kyi spyod pa'o// gang 'di ltengashes pa de ni thams cad mkhyen bu'o/ bcom ldan 'das gang dgamanyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin/
pa shun sumatshogs pa lags so// gang dag tshos mnyam pa nyid 'di la bstan pa de dang de dag/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags so// gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa de dang de
zladag ni bzod pa thun sum tshogs pa lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la chos ba dang/ sams pa dang/ sgom pa la brtson pa de dang de dag ni/ brtson 'grus phun
sum tshogs ba lags so// gang dag chos mnyam pa 'di la rjes par rtog pa de dang de dag ni/ bsam gtan pa lags s/ gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di rnam par spyad pa de dang de dag
ni/ shes ra ba dang ldan ba lags so/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo// de dag gis chos mngon sum du gyes so
bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdud btul lo// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam gros 'dirang du ston pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'gasaso/
0 bcom ldan 'adas gang dag gis chos kyi rnam gras 'di khong du chud pa de dag chos rtogs pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu bzang sems la legs
so zhes bya ba byin to/ bzad sems legs so legs so// de de bzhinan// ji skad smras ba de bzhinata/ bzang samasagang de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to// gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa de thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangasa'adi las ban
de byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de da gnurd pa chen po 'byor bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu song ba de dag ni/
chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur go/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grungs 'di yodas su 'dzin pa de dang dudag nA/ de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan pa'o/ de dang de dag ni gsadabu 'dzin/
pa'o/ da dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par byed pa'o// de dag nidam pa'i chos yangs su 'dzin pa'o/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
nas kyang mos pa de dang de dag ni/ lha'i bu da la lan du phan 'dogs pa'o// lha'i bu de dag ni phyogs thams cad du mun ba med par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis//
'khor thams cad la bka' stsal ba/ khyed las su dag phyi ma'itshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par
de nas byang chub sams dang 'a rtsom pa med stan las langs te/ bla gos phrug nga gcig tu bzur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudad
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag slad ma'i dusan chos kyi rnam gras 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad pa ra spro'o// bcom ldan 'das rtsom pa mang
ngas ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mi nus so// bdag nisims 'dzin pa ma mchis/ rtsom pa ma mchis shing/ sums can thams cad 'aT sam snyoms bste/ zung zing
ma mams pa'isams dang/ red nga dang// bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la re ba ma mchis ngos/ chos zab mo la brjod pa 'di yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o//
la de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dod pa dang/ bkur sti la gnas pas ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mi nus so/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bcom ldan
'das yongasasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'am nga dang/ 'dzin pa dang chang bu dang/ yi gar badriso ba dang/ klog pa dang/ bris te glegs bam du bgyis/
nas 'chad par 'gyur ba du dgan bcas ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mod kyi byin gyis brlabs su rig par bgyi'o/// danas bcam ldan 'dus kyis byang chub sems
dpa' rtsom pa mad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'gogs kyi bu legs so legs so// sems de 'dra bas dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar nus so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba dos/ dam pa'i chos yos su 'dzin par nus so// bdag ni snying rje chen po la
dmigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dang 'byams pas grasolapa/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su
'dzan par nus so/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnod sems mang ba la ngar pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byams pa'isams kyisachos kyi
rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dang 'a mthong dag gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bad chub sems dpa' gangu sems can rnams kyis mthong na ngom par mi 'gyur
ba ngos/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par nus te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nisi mas can thams cad la kheng khro ba ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di yodas su gzung
bar bgyi'o/ byang chub sems dapa' ded ngo nagyis gsal pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gung sems can rnams kyi don du sdug bsngal thams cad
la spro ba dang/ gang yang sems canu rnams sa dus nyid yang dag par 'tshalazhingasems can thams cad bsgral nas/ sAd kyisabadagargal bar 'tshal ba de chos kyi rnam grangs de 'dzin pa//
'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bganisems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas zhed ang dag par grub par 'tshal la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad bsal nas/ slad kyis
brgal bar 'tshal lo// bsgral bar bgyi ba dang/ sgrol ba po dang/ sgral ba yang midamigasapor bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni da lta bu'i sams dang ldan pas/ chos kyi rnam
grangs 'de gzung bar bgyi'o// brngam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'de ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos mos su gzung ngo snyam pa 'deni/ bajig rten gyi
phyin ci log go/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dngas nir shigabadwaganyid dul bar bgyi/ bdag nyidazhi bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas/ chos kyi ngo bo nyadekyi
dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar nus to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nirlag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos ongasasu gzung bar bgyi'o
0/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag 'diltar khyod cag sems can thams cad la
phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyi'i dam pa 'chos yongasasu gzungabar spro ba ni legs so legs so// bden khyed dang 'tsham mo// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamA
kyi yad dag bul gyi chos so// byung nubasams dang sa rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs subazung ba la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos yang dag par brjod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang/ klogs pa dang/ kun chub par dus nga 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/skye ba med pa dang 'gag ba med pa'i sku 'chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas
kyisu'o zhes sangs rgyas la snang ba chen ngo thub par 'gyur// chos thams cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'i nyes chos lasnang ba chen po thob par 'gyur bo/ nga'i bod pa dang yos su
'dzin pa med pani/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i deg 'dunano zhes/ dge 'dun la snang ba chen po sgrub par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i tshu pa'o zhes
byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa rnams la snang la snang ba thob par 'gyurare// nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni skyab mad po 'i ngo bo nyid dazhis spobs ba'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dren/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ages dang/ brgya byin gyi gnas dod klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas su da par 'gyur/ de'i 'og tu 'dzam/
bu'i gling du srodapar 'gyur te/ sems can gad dogasang skyos kyis yongs su bzungab dang/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang drang ba g.yo med pa des nga chos zab mo
la mos pa de dgag lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa mad dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a blo grosa rnam par
gnon dang/ byang chub sems dang 'di dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang ma dang lha ma yin dang dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par bstod da// 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las rtsom pa mad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis ba rdzogasaso/// rgya gar gyi man
po many+tsa shwa gan+d+hu dang bi dzaagAle dang shIlen dra bo dudang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he yachas sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ snyad gas cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/
chos kun bgro ba dang 'gyur khyad cung zad tsami snang ste/ mdo gtsag cing skad gsar bcad yin no// the tsom mi 'tshal lags/
[z/]rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya d+harma gan d+honAmamahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ba chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'amado// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'/
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dusagacig na/ bcom ldan 'das saraskya'i gnas nas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ban/ dag slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dgu
bdun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAsi'obu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tra/ phyogs gcig
du 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shar 'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi na/ de bzhin
gshegs pas chos kyi phud ngo 'o tshad nga tsam gyis chos kyi dud po zhes ka' stsal/ chos kyi phung po ji tsam zhig/ chos kyi phung po ni gang lags/ da skad ces gsal po dang
bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa shApa'i bu la 'di skad rus bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu de bzhin gshags pas chos kyi phung pon brgyad khri bzhi stong du gsungs te/ shA ri'i bu de la chos
[g]@#// thams cad skye bamud pa bdin/ chos kyi phung po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang po yin na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'ga' zhig la chos zhes bam/ chos gang yang skyo ba 'am/
'gag pa zhes nga mi su'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ khA'i 'o bu chos thams cad ni slu ba med pa'i chos can dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu 'di lta sta/ dpar
na ma ning ni skyes pa 'am bud med ces bya ba'i ming mi thob cing/ rgyas pa 'am/ bud med ces brjod par bya ba ma yin no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyAri'i bu de ni skyas pa 'am budand du/
zla gdags su med pa'i phyir ro/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs bas/ ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i
phyi chos kyis chos ng ba tungashesaso// zhes brjod bar mi bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'dilta ste dper na/ zam 'am mning ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags snang pa yang ma yin la/ 'dod ba la rten pa yang
ma yin no/ NashAri'i bu de dag bsabud med sdug gu mthong nas/ 'dod chagasakyi sems skyes pas/ bra ma 'amam ning rnams las thal cher byon bzhud kyis btabapor 'gyur/ byin
ba zag par 'gyur/ byin ngar 'khar ba lta bur 'gyur/ bzhen dmar por 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ za ma 'am ma ning gang yin pa de sa lam 'gyalaM/ de'i
lus la mtshon gyis ma btab par rtse'i phyir de dag byin pa na bar 'gyur snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das za ma 'am ma ning ni btsun mo'i 'khor srung ba lags te/ de dag bud med sdug gu mthong nas// 'dod chags kyi sems skyalags so// de dag 'dod chags
kyis sems kyis nyon mongs pa khol bar gyur te/ nyon mongs pa khol ba de dag gi lasakhu chus rgyas par 'gyur bas/ de dag 'dod chags kyis gdung bas gdungs pa na/ byin ng shin tu gas
par 'gyur lags te/ deltar dadag gi lus ma rung par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA'i 'bu la 'di skad dus/
bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu bram 'am ma ning las gang dag bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten du skya bani nyung sta phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ shA ri'i budag
sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams las gang dag bdod chags kyis 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba'i khyad par la ltos/ de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ 'dod pa rnams ni dngos po med pa shes/ 'dod pa rnams
ni ma gtsang bar shes nas de dag 'dod pa rnams kyis skyo zhing yid byung la mdon par mi dga' nas/ tshangs par sbyod pa spyod du/ bzhin dang dpral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no/ shA
pa'i bu skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyis ni skyo ba 'am yid 'byung bar mi nus so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 3gi ba bu 'di ltar skyes bu ngan pa de dag ni 'dod la kun tu rtog pa
rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams dang ldan ba'aphyir ro// shA ri'i bu skyes bu na ba rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams gang zhin/ gang dag med la rtog par byed pa// mi gtsang ba
lagatsadabar rtog par byed/ 'du shes ched ba la 'du shes su rtog par byed/ bud med la bud mdadu rtogapar byed/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas par rtog
sgyur par byed pa ste/shA ri'i bude lta de dag niskyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa rnam yin no// shAri'i bu de dag ni za ma dang ma ning 'dod pas zin pa rnams kyi las rnams yin te/ de dag/
skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams nam yin na/ shAri'i bu ma ning gang la la zhag skyes bu ngan ba rnams kyi kun tu rtog bde lta bu dag la kun tu rtog par byed pa ni/ bdag gisarag go zhes
rgyanyams su myong bar byed de bu ga dgu'i sgo dang ldan pa 'di mi gtsang ba 'dzag par 'du shes spyod par byed do// 'di dag thams cad nubya ba ma yin pa ste/ de dga'i skyes bu dam pa'i las
nams ma yin no// shAri'i bu dge sbyong dam/ bram zo gang la la dag 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa de dag ni/ bud med la kun tu rtogacing mgo la/
mtshan ma ra 'dzin par byed de ba skrun lta bu'i 'du shes su byed la/[】 ]tshu'i dbu ba lta bu'i 'du shes su mi byed do// nyAri'i bu 'di ltas dbar na/ bong mo 'brangs pa dang/ phag mo 'brangs
pa ni 'brugs pas lus stong par 'gyur zhing/ lus las sham migatsang ba btsog pa blta bar bya ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo// shA ri'i bumagakyang de dang 'dra bar brjod de/ 'di lta ste dper na
bdumarArIsha ma 'am/ phag mo 'am/ khyi ma 'ingesha mdang 'dra ba'i mig kyang de bzhin du 'dug ste/ mig gi 'bras bu'i nang de na chu'i chu bur lta bur 'dug/ da ltar mi gtsang ba 'byud/
zhing de ltar mi mthun pa ste/ rnag dad khugarab du 'drug ring mi gtsang ba 'ab tu 'jug go/ shAri'i bume gtsang ba rnag dang khrag rab tu 'jug cing/ chu'i sId po 'dzag pa'i lus la
chags pa gang yin nga da lta bu nimag ces brjod do// shA ri'i bu 'del rgyu gang gis tshig ces bya ba de'i rgyu ni gang/ kun ni gad zhon/ den lus kyi gtsobo yin te/ gzugs la lta
bas thog ma dang dngus dang/ mtha' mar ngom pa med la// lus kyis ma dag pa rgya mtsho snyad byed de rgyu dosan mig ces bya'o// shA ri'abu 'di lagangags na de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni/
gang rkyen ni gang zhen/ mi mthun pa'i phyir ro// shA'i bu mig gi mimathun pa de dag gang zhon/ gang gzugs med pa lagazugasasu 'angugs pa dang/ tshor ba med pa 'tshir
bar 'du shes pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du byed rnams med pa dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'o// yang 'di la rgya
gang gis de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni gad/ rkyen ni gang zhe nA/ 'dis dge ba spyod pa nyams par byed de/ rgyu des n mig ces bya'o// 'dis dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par byed pas
namag ces bya'o/ lari'akhyi mig ni mi rtag ba/ mi brtan pa/ ther zugam in pa ste/ rgyudasaMn mig ces bya bar shes par bya'o// hA'i bu dge slong mkhas ba mang du
thos pa/ zhum pa med pa rnams kyisani mig bud med ma yin/ skyas ba ma yin/ sems can mo yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang bgam yin nga da/ shA
ra'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba dang sna dang/ lce dang lus dang yid na bud mad ma yin/ skyes ba ma yin/ sems can ma yani/ sog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gad brag
ma yin te/ dadag ni phung po lnga la phyin ci log pa las byung ba'o// shA ri'i bu dag sbyong ngam/ bram brag ng dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyis nyes dmigs yang dag pa driltar ba bzhi rab tu
mi shes pa de dag ni/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur lo/ kha dog ban cing skyaskya bor 'gyur ro/ shAri'i bu 'di lta ste dparan/ shing ljon pa chen po'i lo
tsal na/ ma 'a// ljon pa'i 'bras bu sAne pa 'bul ba'i tshe skya bor 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag kha cig 'dod pa//
rnams kyi nyis dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dur ba tu mngashes pa du gni/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur/ kha dog na par 'gyur/ bsam pa mi gsal
bar 'gyur/ kha dog dran cing blta na mi sdug par 'gyur/ shAr 'du dge slong gang dag gsar bu dar la bab pa/ gzhon nur ba tu byung nas ring por ma lenapadi dag ni/ 'dod pa
rnams dangos po med do zhes 'dod pa rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i rtogapa skyes nuadu myur ba nyid du rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de dag mi dgab in
pa bshes par adabyadado// shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ dag slong dag gi 'dod pa rnams kyi nyis dmigs mthong nas/ 'dod pa de dag las yid 'byung bar byed/ 'dod chags dang bral
bar byed de/ mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyad de/ bzhin dang dpral ba'i mdangs gsal bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig gi lusund kyis
thebs la rnag smin nas de'i yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad la rma'i kha brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ rma'i kha re re la yang srin bu'atshogs brgya khri bzhi stong yod do/ de dag mchu
rnazhing mchu kha gnyis nayod la/ kha zas yongasasu khros pa'i rnams kyisatshim par byed par mi 'gyur zhing/ de dag me spangs pa'i drung du 'dug na/ jitsaman/
srog chags de dgams gdungs par gyur ba dang/ de la nga zhing za bar byed du ongs su khrubar byedun/ shAri'i bu 'didzasnyam dusems/ mi desrog chags de dgagis bris pa yin
nam/ 'on te ma zos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa drad/ tshe dang ldan bshA ri'akhus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di blos
pa nyid kyis lus kyi sku zing zhes bgyudang ra gyuran/ mdo'i mimathun pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'dasamed ni srog chags kyi rig de dag gis 'tshal ba lags kyi ma 'tshal ba nim
lags so/ de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lus g.ya' bar bgyid cing/ 'di ltar zhi bar mi bgyid la bde ba thob par angami bgyid pa lags so// shAri'i bu 'di jisnyam
du sems/ mi de'i lus rnag dang khrag 'dzagacing/ de lta bur gyur pa de snyadung ba bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa// smad par bgyi ba 'gas/ mi mthun ba lags/ blta bar mi 'os
pa lags so// bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du dge slong mkhas pa dag ni 'di la so so yang dag par slob sta/ bung mad ni 'di ltar btsog pa/ 'di ltar dri nga'/ 'di ltar mi
ba[0/]mthun pa/ 'di ltar blta bar mi 'os pa'o// nyon mongs pa khol ba'i bud medar dag dang bstan par bya ba ba yin te/ 'do ba rnams ni dring ba'o// 'dod pa rnams ni mi mthun pa'o//
'dod pa rnams ni mi gtsang ba'o// 'dod pa rnams nibalta bar mi 'os pa'o zhus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ sAm mo/ shA ri'i bu byas pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu
ma yin b/ budand las lhagapa srin bu'i tshags lnga yod de/ shA ri'i bu srin bu'i tshogs ltapa de dag ni bud med kyiganyiba' lam na gnas te/ srinabu'i tshogs re re la srin
brgyud cu brgyad cu yod la mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis n rtsod de/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud mad kyi lus la bla'o// des na nyon mongs ba dag gis bud med lhag bar g.yen spyod ste/
'dod pa yongs su spyang pa dag gis ngom mi myong ngo/ shA ra'i bu de ltar na/ 'dod pa rnams ni nyas dmigs yin par mthong nad ngag 'dod pa rnams la yid 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dod chags
dang pral bar 'gyur te/ mngon par dga' nas tshangs pa ra spyad pa spyod cing/ bzhin dang dpral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no// shAri'i bu 'di ni 'dod pa'i phung po'i phung po la btsum nas
chos ston pa an te/ shA ri'i bu 'dod ba yongs su spyod ba dag la yid 'byung bar bya'o/ shari 'i bu kun nas nyon mongs ba gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rang gis byas ba
nirang gis byas pa'o/ shAri'i bu rnam par byad ba dang/ rnam par zhi ba gang zhan/ shA ri'i bu rnam par byang ba dang/ rnam par zhi ba ni rang gis byas pa'o/ shA
ri'ibu kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gad rang gis byas pa ni gang zhen/ chos su 'du shes ba la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o// chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang zhin
zla 'di lta ste/ skye bar 'du shesapa dang/ 'gag par 'du shes pa dang/ bdag yod pa dang med par bdag tu 'dushes pa mngon par zhen pa yod do// de bzhin gshegs bas chos
kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal to/ shA ri'i bu byis pa so'i skye ba rnams ni lang ba yin te/ gzugs kyi phung po 'o zhes rnams sams su byed tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed
rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'o zhis rlom sams su byed de rlomasams byed n 'ching ngo rlom sanas su mi byed na grol lo// hAri'i bu thog sems su byed pa gang yin pa
skyo don gzugasakyi phung bor 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu bcu bo 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi skyes pa yin tabcu gang zhen/ tshul khrims 'chal pan 'chiba'i
dus kyi tshe gdus par gyur ba dang/ dge slongatshul khrims nyams pa 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang/ mnar med par 'gro' zhas 'khor gyi nang na 'dug n rgyag pa dang/ bdag nyid tshul khrims
la skur pa 'debs pa dad/ bdag nisangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang/ bdugani nyan thos rnams kyi yongs su spangs pa dang/ bdugan lha rnams kyi chos su spangs pa'o
snyam saM pa dang/ 'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang banus pa dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang/ mi'i lus thob par dka' ba'o// shAri'i bu de dganadage slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'onal
pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pas/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ni 'chiba'i dus kyi tsho/ gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ shwa 'bu de lta bas na/ 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du
shes bskyed bar bya'o/ shAri'i bu 'di la dag slong dgon pan gnas pa nyam/ shing drung na gnas pa 'am/ khang stong na gnas pa 'am// bla gab med pa na la gnas pa'i 'dod ba rnams
ni drang ba'o// 'dod ba rnams ni mi mthunapa'o// 'dod pa rnams ni rma kha lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnams ni lta bar mi 'os pa'// 'dod pa rnams ni smad par bya ba'o// 'dod pa rnams
mishadabs yongs su gang ba'i ro lta bu 'o zhes de ltar so so da dag par slob bo// de dag ni byis pa 'phyar ba'i rang yulain te/ shA'i 'i bu bud med 'a bstan pa dang bstan pa sachog go/
shAri'i bu bud mad kyi lus phyi sa dad/ 'chil mas yongs su gang bde la su zhig dga'/ shAri'i bu de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khyi ra rul pa dang 'dubar sad par bya ba yin no// shi ri'i bu
'di lta ste dparan khyir mi gtsang ba rul pa dri nga ba'o/ mdog mi sdug cingasnga la// pagasu pa mugs pa/ srog chags kyis yongs su gang ba zhig lam kan snang la//
de'i steng du char pa yang babacing/ de rlung gis kyang kun nasabatab/ der mi rnams kyang kuno nas 'khor bar gyur ted dag gis dre de tshoran/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems mi de dgadrimo zhim
pade snyem par byed dam/ 'on te mi sgomaM/ gsol// bcom ldan 'das de ni ga lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisatshe dang ldan
u0f8bri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ji sAm du sams/ khyi ro de la reg par byed dam/ spyod par byed dam/ mngon par dga' bar byed na/ da skya bo mang
pos bsngags par byed pa yin nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasam de ni blta bar
dka' ste/ dalabasngags par ga la bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ hwa
ri'i bu khyiro de la 'khyud par byed pa bam/ spyod par byed pa 'am/ mngon par dga' ba'i mi de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsngags pa mdzad kyi/ gang zhig bud med yul gyi
bzung mo na tshod le bcu drug 'dzin pa dang/ lhag pa lta bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa b.lan 'dug pa// nu ma rgyas par mdzas pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ shin tu gzhon pa/ reg
na bad ba nad dang bral ba de la thun rkang pa'i mthe bos regapar byed pa'i mi de lani/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngags bar mi mdzad de/ shA ri'a'u yul gyi bzang mo de la than rkang pa'i mthe
bosarag par byed pa'i mi gang zagade lta bu de mishin tu smad par bya ba yin te/ khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa 'am/ skyod par byed pa' ma/ mngon par dga' bar byed ba ni de lta ma yin no//
h+phali'i bu 'di nga snyam du sems khyi'o la 'khyud pa 'am/ rig pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ bka'
stsal pa/ shAri'i bu 'di ltar dge slong gis 'dod pa rnamasu lanyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyod pa dbya/shA ra'i bu ji ltar na/ dge slong gis lus la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes
bskyed par bya nu na/ shA ri'i bu lus 'di nagenod pa mang ba'o// 'khrug pa mang ba'o// shA ri'i bu bud mad kyi lus la ni skyas pa'i lus la yod pa ltabu ma yin pa ches lhag
pa'i srin bu'i tshogs nyi shu rtsa lnga yod de/ shA ra'i bu bud mod kyi mgo klad pa'i nang na sune bu'i tshogs 'phrog byed cesabya bdag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi klod pa la phra ba
byed do/ shA ri'i bu bud med kyi sna'i nang nasrin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yodade/ de dag bud mdakyi kha pa la za ste des na bud med la khasmrame skyo'o/
zhwa yi sha bu bud med kyi rna khung na srin bu'i tshogs za bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de dgabud med kyi rna ba la za zhing/ bud med kyi rna ba 'bogs par byed do/ shA ri'i bud mad kyi
mgrin pa'i mtshams dang mgo'i mtshams na srin bu'i tshogs chen byed ces bya bdag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi rna bawa zhin/ ud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par byed la// mge
kyang rno bar byed do/ shAri'i de skyes pa'i rna ba lan mi 'bags kyi/ bud mad kyi rna ba la 'begs so/ shAri'i bu bud med la srin bu'i tshogs aba'i ban khos bya ba dag yod
da de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud mad kyi kha la bra sta/ des na budamad kyi mgul dma' ba yin te/ skyes pa la de lta bu med de/ bza' ba dang bca' ba khar bcug
ma thug tu thog mar de dgaza bar byed do// de dganyal nyal bud med kyi nu ma'i nang du 'jug ste/ des na bud mdo nu ma 'byung ba yin no// gang gi tshabud med sbrum par gyur pa
de'i/ srin bu de dag kyang sbrum par 'gyur te/ de na bud med kyi nu zho mang ba yin no// shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lus kyi nang mngal gyi gnas gang na mngal yod po'i phyogs den/
srin du zud par byed pa dang 'a ba zhes bya ba de dag yod de/ de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed ces bya ba dag bsad nas za'o// da dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed de dag ma red na de dag kyang 'che'o
srin bu'i tshogs de gas kashista mad pa dang/ pha ma 'dus pa las mal chags par 'gyur ro/ shA ri'i bu bud med lus la lus kyi nang skye gnas kyi sgo na srin bu'i tshogs bzhi
yod do// 'di lta ste/ mchu mchog ces bya ba dang/ gong du spyod rgyas bya bdang/ rlung 'byin ces bya ba dang/ 'dod len ces bya ba dang/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad//
par bud med kyi lus la za bsta/ des n bud mad nyon mongs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'bar bar byed d/ 'dod pa yongs su spyad pas mi mas pa yin no/ de lta bas na/
de bzhin gshegs pas bud med kyi skyon ches lhag pa de dag mkhyen nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi lhag pa dag bca' bar mdzad do// shA ri'i bu chos kyi phung po 'chos kyi rnams grangs 'di
ang dang ad du 'khor bzhi bodag laston cig da ci'i phyir zhen/ 'dod pa rnams nasmad par bya ba yin pa shes par 'gyur/ lus ni smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
shAr 'bu de ltar lus 'di bcos ma yin par shes nas byis pa so so'i skyob thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par su zhig 'dod ba rnams la bstan par byed do/ de ni gnas modado/
b+hareg bu de lta bas na ( lus 'di la mngon par dga' bar mi bya/ lhag par chags par mi bya'o// bcom ldan rtangs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bar/
bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lus nam gtsang las byung ste// rtag tu srog chags rnams kyang gnas//
kha cin dang stug pas rab gnang na// de la byis ba rab tu chags/ dag slong pha dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyan pa dang dag snyan ma// 'di thos nas ni 'dod chags 'bral// 'dod
chags bral nas rnam par grol// chos dang ldan pa rnams la ni// nyes pa 'di dag ngas ma bstan// gang dag bdod la yongs bodru ba// de dag la ni skyon rnams bshad/
sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bzhin// bud med mthong na su rtog ste// yang dag bsal ba ngashes nas su// mkhas pa de dag rtog mi byed// bcom ldan 'das kyade skad ces bka'
stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i du dad/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lhamaM in dubacas pa'i 'jig rten ya nga te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsud pa la mngon par bstod do//
jagos pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amed rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po phrad dz+wa bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he e shes sde sabasgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// bka' 'khor lo dang por gtogs ba 'o// rgya gar skad du/ d+harma samu dra na nA ma ma A/
na sU tra/ bod skad du/ thog pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i nga phran bo rba la ka'i ri la rgyal ba'o/
srasaphyi'i ma ldog pa phal po nas bskor cing mdun du byas te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/
bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam bachos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig 'dod pa la rtog cing mi rten pa dang/ mi 'chang ba dang/ nga rgyal med pa dad/ shes rab dang/ phyobs la
mkhas pa dang/ stong nga la shin tu mos pa dang ldan te/ yod pa dang med pa sbangs ba dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtags pa grangs med bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na
dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang/ 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing/ ang dag par rdzogs pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams las 'das pa dang/
gnas don len pa la rtan cing 'jug pa'i soms dang/ yid dang id kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das ti/ mi gnyis pa'i chos thob pa shan turab tu byung ba'o// sems can gang tha dad po
